Pubmed_ID: 32887889

Pan-cancer study detects genetic risk variants and shared genetic basis in two large cohorts

泛癌研究在两个大型队列中检测了遗传风险变异和共有的遗传基础

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18246-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32887889/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/04/2020

Abstract: Deciphering the shared genetic basis of distinct cancers has the potential to elucidate carcinogenic mechanisms and inform broadly applicable risk assessment efforts. Here, we undertake genome-wide association studies (GWAS) and comprehensive evaluations of heritability and pleiotropy across 18 cancer types in two large, population-based cohorts: the UK Biobank (408,786 European ancestry individuals; 48,961 cancer cases) and the Kaiser Permanente Genetic Epidemiology Research on Adult Health and Aging cohorts (66,526 European ancestry individuals; 16,001 cancer cases). The GWAS detect 21 genome-wide significant associations independent of previously reported results. Investigations of pleiotropy identify 12 cancer pairs exhibiting either positive or negative genetic correlations; 25 pleiotropic loci; and 100 independent pleiotropic variants, many of which are regulatory elements and/or influence cross-tissue gene expression. Our findings demonstrate widespread pleiotropy and offer further insight into the complex genetic architecture of cross-cancer susceptibility.

摘要: 破译不同癌症的共同遗传基础有可能阐明致癌机制并为广泛适用的风险评估工作提供信息。在这里，我们进行了全基因组关联研究（GWAS），并在两个大型的以人群为基础的队列中对18种癌症类型的遗传力和多效性进行了综合评估：英国生物库（408,786名欧洲血统个体；48,961例癌症病例）和KaiserPermanenteGenetic成人健康和老龄化人群的流行病学研究（66,526名欧洲血统的个人；16,001名癌症病例）。GWAS检测到21个全基因组重要关联，而与先前报道的结果无关。多效性研究确定了12种显示正相关或负相关的癌症。25个多效位点;100个独立的多效变体，其中许多是调控元件和/或影响跨组织基因表达。我们的发现证明了广泛的多效性，并为跨癌症易感性的复杂遗传结构提供了进一步的见识。

Pubmed_ID: 32887883

Pharmacologically reversible zonation-dependent endothelial cell transcriptomic changes with neurodegenerative disease associations in the aged brain

老年脑神经退行性疾病关联与药理学上可逆的分区依赖性内皮细胞转录组变化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18249-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32887883/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/04/2020

Abstract: The molecular signatures of cells in the brain have been revealed in unprecedented detail, yet the ageing-associated genome-wide expression changes that may contribute to neurovascular dysfunction in neurodegenerative diseases remain elusive. Here, we report zonation-dependent transcriptomic changes in aged mouse brain endothelial cells (ECs), which prominently implicate altered immune/cytokine signaling in ECs of all vascular segments, and functional changes impacting the blood-brain barrier (BBB) and glucose/energy metabolism especially in capillary ECs (capECs). An overrepresentation of Alzheimer disease (AD) GWAS genes is evident among the human orthologs of the differentially expressed genes of aged capECs, while comparative analysis revealed a subset of concordantly downregulated, functionally important genes in human AD brains. Treatment with exenatide, a glucagon-like peptide-1 receptor agonist, strongly reverses aged mouse brain EC transcriptomic changes and BBB leakage, with associated attenuation of microglial priming. We thus revealed transcriptomic alterations underlying brain EC ageing that are complex yet pharmacologically reversible.

摘要: 大脑中细胞的分子标记已被前所未有地详细揭示，但与衰老相关的全基因组表达变化可能导致神经退行性疾病中神经血管功能障碍，目前仍难以捉摸。在这里，我们报告老年小鼠脑内皮细胞（ECs）的分区依赖性转录组变化，该变化显着地暗示了所有血管段ECs中免疫/细胞因子信号的改变，以及功能变化影响血脑屏障（BBB）和葡萄糖/能量尤其是在毛细管EC（capEC）中进行新陈代谢。在人类老龄化的capECs差异表达基因的直系同源物中，阿尔茨海默氏病（AD）GWAS基因的过度表达是显而易见的，而比较分析则揭示了人类AD脑中协调一致地下调，功能重要的基因的子集。用艾塞那肽（一种胰高血糖素样肽1受体激动剂）治疗可强烈逆转衰老的小鼠大脑EC转录组学变化和BBB渗漏，并伴有小胶质细胞引发的减弱。因此，我们揭示了脑EC衰老背后的转录组学变化，这些变化既复杂又在药理上是可逆的。

Pubmed_ID: 32887874

Chromosome 1q21.2 and additional loci influence risk of spontaneous coronary artery dissection and myocardial infarction

1q21.2染色体和其他基因座影响自发性冠状动脉夹层和心肌梗死的风险

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-17558-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32887874/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/04/2020

Abstract: Spontaneous coronary artery dissection (SCAD) is a non-atherosclerotic cause of myocardial infarction (MI), typically in young women. We undertook a genome-wide association study of SCAD (Ncases = 270/Ncontrols = 5,263) and identified and replicated an association of rs12740679 at chromosome 1q21.2 (Pdiscovery+replication = 2.19 × 10-12, OR = 1.8) influencing ADAMTSL4 expression. Meta-analysis of discovery and replication samples identified associations with P < 5 × 10-8 at chromosome 6p24.1 in PHACTR1, chromosome 12q13.3 in LRP1, and in females-only, at chromosome 21q22.11 near LINC00310. A polygenic risk score for SCAD was associated with (1) higher risk of SCAD in individuals with fibromuscular dysplasia (P = 0.021, OR = 1.82 [95% CI: 1.09-3.02]) and (2) lower risk of atherosclerotic coronary artery disease and MI in the UK Biobank (P = 1.28 × 10-17, HR = 0.91 [95% CI :0.89-0.93], for MI) and Million Veteran Program (P = 9.33 × 10-36, OR = 0.95 [95% CI: 0.94-0.96], for CAD; P = 3.35 × 10-6, OR = 0.96 [95% CI: 0.95-0.98] for MI). Here we report that SCAD-related MI and atherosclerotic MI exist at opposite ends of a genetic risk spectrum, inciting MI with disparate underlying vascular biology.

摘要: 自发性冠状动脉夹层术（SCAD）是通常在年轻女性中引起的非心肌梗塞（MI）的原因。我们进行了SCAD的全基因组关联研究（Ncases=270/Ncontrols=5,263），并鉴定并复制了影响ADAMTSL4表达的1q21.2染色体上rs12740679的关联（Pdiscovery+replication=2.19×10-12，OR=1.8）。。对发现和复制样本的荟萃分析发现，在PHACTR1的6p24.1染色体，LRP1的12q13.3染色体以及仅在LINC00310附近的21q22.11染色体的女性中，P<5×10-8与P<5×10-8相关。SCAD的多基因风险评分与（1）纤维肌发育不良的个体SCAD风险较高（P=0.021，OR=1.82[95％CI：1.09-3.02]）和（2）动脉粥样硬化性冠状动脉疾病风险较低和英国生物库中的MI（对于MI，P=1.28×10-17，HR=0.91[95％CI：0.89-0.93]）和百万退伍军人计划（P=9.33×10-36，OR=0.95[95％对于CAD，CI：0.94-0.96]；对于MI，P=3.35×10-6，或OR=0.96[95％CI：0.95-0.98]。在这里，我们报道与SCAD相关的心肌梗死和动脉粥样硬化性心肌梗死存在于遗传风险谱的相对两端，从而诱发了心肌梗死与潜在的基础血管生物学不同。

Pubmed_ID: 32884145

'CRISPR babies' are still too risky, says influential panel

有影响力的专家组说，“ CRISPR婴儿”的风险仍然很高

DOI: 10.1038/d41586-020-02538-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32884145/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 09/03/2020

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 32884136

Dissecting the epigenomic dynamics of human fetal germ cell development at single-cell resolution

以单细胞分辨率剖析人类胎儿生殖细胞发育的表观基因组动力学

DOI: 10.1038/s41422-020-00401-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32884136/

Journal: Cell research {'ISSN': '1001-0602', 'Name': 'cell research', '2015': '14.812', '2016': '15.606', '2017': '15.393', '2018': '17.848', '2019': '20.507'}

Date: 09/03/2020

Abstract: Proper development of fetal germ cells (FGCs) is vital for the precise transmission of genetic and epigenetic information through generations. The transcriptional landscapes of human FGC development have been revealed; however, the epigenetic reprogramming process of FGCs remains elusive. Here, we profiled the genome-wide DNA methylation and chromatin accessibility of human FGCs at different phases as well as gonadal niche cells at single-cell resolution. First, we found that DNA methylation levels of FGCs changed in a temporal manner, whereas FGCs at different phases in the same embryo exhibited comparable DNA methylation levels and patterns. Second, we revealed the phase-specific chromatin accessibility signatures at the promoter regions of a large set of critical transcription factors and signaling pathway genes. We also identified potential distal regulatory elements including enhancers in FGCs. Third, compared with other hominid-specific retrotransposons, SVA_D might have a broad spectrum of binding capacity for transcription factors, including SOX15 and SOX17. Finally, using an in vitro culture system of human FGCs, we showed that the BMP signaling pathway promoted the cell proliferation of FGCs, and regulated the WNT signaling pathway by orchestrating the chromatin accessibility of its ligand genes. Our single-cell epigenomic atlas and functional assays provide valuable insights for understanding the strongly heterogeneous, unsynchronized, yet highly robust nature of human germ cell development.

摘要: 胎儿生殖细胞（FGC）的正确发育对于世代遗传和表观遗传信息的精确传递至关重要。人类FGC发育的转录态势已被揭示。但是，FGC的表观遗传重编程过程仍然难以捉摸。在这里，我们介绍了人类FGC在不同阶段以及性腺小生境细胞在单细胞分辨率下的全基因组DNA甲基化和染色质可及性。首先，我们发现FGC的DNA甲基化水平随时间变化，而同一胚胎中不同阶段的FGC表现出可比的DNA甲基化水平和模式。其次，我们揭示了大量关键转录因子和信号通路基因的启动子区域的相特异性染色质可及性特征。我们还确定了潜在的远端调控元件，包括FGC中的增强子。第三，与其他人类特异的逆转录转座子相比，SVA_D可能具有与转录因子（包括SOX15和SOX17）的广泛结合能力。最后，使用人类FGC的体外培养系统，我们显示BMP信号通路促进了FGC的细胞增殖，并通过协调其配体基因的染色质可及性来调节WNT信号通路。我们的单细胞表观基因组图谱和功能分析为了解人类生殖细胞发育的高度异质，不同步但高度健壮的性质提供了宝贵的见识。

Pubmed_ID: 32883881

Expanding the horizons of genome editing in the fruit fly with Cas12a

利用Cas12a拓展果蝇中的基因组编辑视野

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2016446117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32883881/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 09/03/2020

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 32879509

Subclonal reconstruction of tumors by using machine learning and population genetics

利用机器学习和群体遗传学对肿瘤进行亚克隆重建

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0675-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879509/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: Most cancer genomic data are generated from bulk samples composed of mixtures of cancer subpopulations, as well as normal cells. Subclonal reconstruction methods based on machine learning aim to separate those subpopulations in a sample and infer their evolutionary history. However, current approaches are entirely data driven and agnostic to evolutionary theory. We demonstrate that systematic errors occur in the analysis if evolution is not accounted for, and this is exacerbated with multi-sampling of the same tumor. We present a novel approach for model-based tumor subclonal reconstruction, called MOBSTER, which combines machine learning with theoretical population genetics. Using public whole-genome sequencing data from 2,606 samples from different cohorts, new data and synthetic validation, we show that this method is more robust and accurate than current techniques in single-sample, multiregion and longitudinal data. This approach minimizes the confounding factors of nonevolutionary methods, thus leading to more accurate recovery of the evolutionary history of human cancers.

摘要: 大多数癌症基因组数据是从由癌症亚群以及正常细胞混合物组成的大量样本中产生的。基于机器学习的亚克隆重建方法旨在分离样品中的那些亚群并推断其进化历史。但是，当前的方法完全是数据驱动的，并且与进化论无关。我们证明，如果不考虑进化，则会在分析中发生系统性错误，并且对同一肿瘤进行多次采样会加剧这种错误。我们提出了一种基于模型的肿瘤亚克隆重建的新方法，称为MOBSTER，它将机器学习与理论种群遗传学相结合。使用来自不同队列的2606个样本的公共全基因组测序数据，新数据和综合验证，我们表明，在单样本，多区域和纵向数据中，该方法比当前技术更可靠，更准确。这种方法最大程度地减少了非进化方法的混杂因素，从而可以更准确地恢复人类癌症的进化史。

Pubmed_ID: 32879494

Pervasive chromosomal instability and karyotype order in tumour evolution

肿瘤发展中普遍的染色体不稳定性和核型顺序

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2698-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879494/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Chromosomal instability in cancer consists of dynamic changes to the number and structure of chromosomes1,2. The resulting diversity in somatic copy number alterations (SCNAs) may provide the variation necessary for tumour evolution1,3,4. Here we use multi-sample phasing and SCNA analysis of 1,421 samples from 394 tumours across 22 tumour types to show that continuous chromosomal instability results in pervasive SCNA heterogeneity. Parallel evolutionary events, which cause disruption in the same genes (such as BCL9, MCL1, ARNT (also known as HIF1B), TERT and MYC) within separate subclones, were present in 37% of tumours. Most recurrent losses probably occurred before whole-genome doubling, that was found as a clonal event in 49% of tumours. However, loss of heterozygosity at the human leukocyte antigen (HLA) locus and loss of chromosome 8p to a single haploid copy recurred at substantial subclonal frequencies, even in tumours with whole-genome doubling, indicating ongoing karyotype remodelling. Focal amplifications that affected chromosomes 1q21 (which encompasses BCL9, MCL1 and ARNT), 5p15.33 (TERT), 11q13.3 (CCND1), 19q12 (CCNE1) and 8q24.1 (MYC) were frequently subclonal yet appeared to be clonal within single samples. Analysis of an independent series of 1,024 metastatic samples revealed that 13 focal SCNAs were enriched in metastatic samples, including gains in chromosome 8q24.1 (encompassing MYC) in clear cell renal cell carcinoma and chromosome 11q13.3 (encompassing CCND1) in HER2+ breast cancer. Chromosomal instability may enable the continuous selection of SCNAs, which are established as ordered events that often occur in parallel, throughout tumour evolution.

摘要: 癌症中的染色体不稳定包括对染色体1,2，3数目和结构的动态改变。体细胞拷贝数改变（SCNA）的结果多样性可能为肿瘤的发展提供必要的变异1、3、4。在这里，我们使用多样本定相和SCNA分析来自22种肿瘤类型的394个肿瘤的1,421个样本，以显示连续的染色体不稳定性导致普遍的SCNA异质性。在单独的亚克隆中，引起相同基因（例如BCL9，MCL1，ARNT（也称为HIF1B），TERT和MYC）破坏的平行进化事件出现在37％的肿瘤中。大多数复发性损失可能发生在全基因组加倍之前，这是49％的肿瘤中的克隆事件。然而，即使在全基因组加倍的肿瘤中，人类白细胞抗原（HLA）基因座杂合性的丧失和单个单倍体拷贝的染色体8p的丧失仍然存在，甚至在全基因组加倍的肿瘤中也是如此，这表明核型正在重塑。影响染色体1q21（包括BCL9，MCL1和ARNT），5p15.33（TERT），11q13.3（CCND1），19q12（CCNE1）和8q24.1（MYC）的焦点扩增通常是亚克隆的，但在单个样本。对独立的1,024个转移性样本系列进行分析后发现，有13个局灶性SCNA富集了转移性样本，包括透明细胞肾细胞癌的8q24.1染色体（包含MYC）和HER2+乳腺癌的11q13.3染色体（包含CCND1）。。染色体不稳定性可能允许连续选择SCNA，SCNA被确定为在整个肿瘤进化过程中通常并行发生的有序事件。

Pubmed_ID: 32879318

Analysis of chromatin organization and gene expression in T cells identifies functional genes for rheumatoid arthritis

对T细胞中染色质组织和基因表达的分析确定了类风湿关节炎的功能基因

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18180-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879318/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Genome-wide association studies have identified genetic variation contributing to complex disease risk. However, assigning causal genes and mechanisms has been more challenging because disease-associated variants are often found in distal regulatory regions with cell-type specific behaviours. Here, we collect ATAC-seq, Hi-C, Capture Hi-C and nuclear RNA-seq data in stimulated CD4+ T cells over 24 h, to identify functional enhancers regulating gene expression. We characterise changes in DNA interaction and activity dynamics that correlate with changes in gene expression, and find that the strongest correlations are observed within 200 kb of promoters. Using rheumatoid arthritis as an example of T cell mediated disease, we demonstrate interactions of expression quantitative trait loci with target genes, and confirm assigned genes or show complex interactions for 20% of disease associated loci, including FOXO1, which we confirm using CRISPR/Cas9.

摘要: 全基因组关联研究已确定导致复杂疾病风险的遗传变异。但是，分配因果基因和机制更具挑战性，因为与疾病相关的变异通常在具有细胞类型特异性行为的远端调控区域中发现。在这里，我们收集经过24小时刺激的CD4+T细胞中的ATAC-seq，Hi-C，CaptureHi-C和核RNA-seq数据，以鉴定调节基因表达的功能增强子。我们表征与基因表达变化相关的DNA相互作用和活性动力学的变化，并发现在200kb的启动子内观察到最强的相关性。以类风湿关节炎为例，以T细胞介导的疾病为例，我们证明了表达数量性状基因座与靶基因的相互作用，并确认了分配的基因或显示了20％的疾病相关基因座（包括FOXO1）的复杂相互作用，我们使用CRISPR/Cas9证实了这一点。

Pubmed_ID: 32879317

Accurate quantification of copy-number aberrations and whole-genome duplications in multi-sample tumor sequencing data

准确量化多样本肿瘤测序数据中的拷贝数畸变和全基因组重复

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-17967-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879317/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Copy-number aberrations (CNAs) and whole-genome duplications (WGDs) are frequent somatic mutations in cancer but their quantification from DNA sequencing of bulk tumor samples is challenging. Standard methods for CNA inference analyze tumor samples individually; however, DNA sequencing of multiple samples from a cancer patient has recently become more common. We introduce HATCHet (Holistic Allele-specific Tumor Copy-number Heterogeneity), an algorithm that infers allele- and clone-specific CNAs and WGDs jointly across multiple tumor samples from the same patient. We show that HATCHet outperforms current state-of-the-art methods on multi-sample DNA sequencing data that we simulate using MASCoTE (Multiple Allele-specific Simulation of Copy-number Tumor Evolution). Applying HATCHet to 84 tumor samples from 14 prostate and pancreas cancer patients, we identify subclonal CNAs and WGDs that are more plausible than previously published analyses and more consistent with somatic single-nucleotide variants (SNVs) and small indels in the same samples.

摘要: 拷贝数畸变（CNA）和全基因组重复（WGD）是癌症中的常见体细胞突变，但是根据大块肿瘤样品的DNA测序对它们进行定量分析具有挑战性。CNA推论的标准方法分别分析肿瘤样本；然而，近来来自癌症患者的多个样品的DNA测序变得更加普遍。我们介绍了HATCHet（整体等位基因特异性肿瘤拷贝数异质性），该算法可在同一位患者的多个肿瘤样本中共同推断等位基因和克隆特异性CNA和WGDs。我们显示，HATCHet在我们使用MASCoTE（拷贝数肿瘤进化的多个等位基因特有的模拟）进行模拟的多样本DNA测序数据上优于当前的最新技术。将HATCHet应用于来自14位前列腺癌和胰腺癌患者的84个肿瘤样品中，我们确定了亚克隆的CNA和WGDs比以前发表的分析更合理，并且与相同样品中的体细胞单核苷酸变体（SNV）和小indel更为一致。

Pubmed_ID: 32879312

Flexible genes establish widespread bacteriophage pan-genomes in cryoconite hole ecosystems

柔性基因在冰孔洞生态系统中建立了广泛的噬菌体全基因组

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18236-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879312/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: Bacteriophage genomes rapidly evolve via mutation and horizontal gene transfer to counter evolving bacterial host defenses; such arms race dynamics should lead to divergence between phages from similar, geographically isolated ecosystems. However, near-identical phage genomes can reoccur over large geographical distances and several years apart, conversely suggesting many are stably maintained. Here, we show that phages with near-identical core genomes in distant, discrete aquatic ecosystems maintain diversity by possession of numerous flexible gene modules, where homologous genes present in the pan-genome interchange to create new phage variants. By repeatedly reconstructing the core and flexible regions of phage genomes from different metagenomes, we show a pool of homologous gene variants co-exist for each module in each location, however, the dominant variant shuffles independently in each module. These results suggest that in a natural community, recombination is the largest contributor to phage diversity, allowing a variety of host recognition receptors and genes to counter bacterial defenses to co-exist for each phage.

摘要: 噬菌体基因组通过突变和水平基因转移快速进化，以抵抗不断发展的细菌宿主防御。这种军备竞赛的动态应该导致噬菌体与相似的，地理上孤立的生态系统之间的分歧。但是，几乎相同的噬菌体基因组可以在较大的地理距离和数年之间再次出现，反之则表明许多噬菌体基因组已得到稳定维持。在这里，我们表明，在遥远的，离散的水生生态系统中，具有接近相同核心基因组的噬菌体通过拥有众多灵活的基因模块来维持多样性，泛基因组中存在的同源基因相互交换以产生新的噬菌体变体。通过从不同的元基因组中重复构建噬菌体基因组的核心和柔性区域，我们显示出同源基因变体池在每个位置的每个模块共存，但是，显性变体在每个模块中独立地随机排列。这些结果表明，在自然界中，重组是噬菌体多样性的最大贡献者，它使各种宿主识别受体和基因可以抵抗细菌的防御，并针对每种噬菌体共存。

Pubmed_ID: 32879011

Stable unmethylated DNA demarcates expressed genes and their cis-regulatory space in plant genomes

稳定的未甲基化DNA划分植物基因组中表达的基因及其顺式调控空间

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2010250117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32879011/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 09/02/2020

Abstract: The genomic sequences of crops continue to be produced at a frenetic pace. It remains challenging to develop complete annotations of functional genes and regulatory elements in these genomes. Chromatin accessibility assays enable discovery of functional elements; however, to uncover the full portfolio of cis-elements would require profiling of many combinations of cell types, tissues, developmental stages, and environments. Here, we explore the potential to use DNA methylation profiles to develop more complete annotations. Using leaf tissue in maize, we define ∼100,000 unmethylated regions (UMRs) that account for 5.8% of the genome; 33,375 UMRs are found greater than 2 kb from genes. UMRs are highly stable in multiple vegetative tissues, and they capture the vast majority of accessible chromatin regions from leaf tissue. However, many UMRs are not accessible in leaf, and these represent regions with potential to become accessible in specific cell types or developmental stages. These UMRs often occur near genes that are expressed in other tissues and are enriched for binding sites of transcription factors. The leaf-inaccessible UMRs exhibit unique chromatin modification patterns and are enriched for chromatin interactions with nearby genes. The total UMR space in four additional monocots ranges from 80 to 120 megabases, which is remarkably similar considering the range in genome size of 271 megabases to 4.8 gigabases. In summary, based on the profile from a single tissue, DNA methylation signatures provide powerful filters to distill large genomes down to the small fraction of putative functional genes and regulatory elements.

摘要: 作物的基因组序列继续以疯狂的速度产生。在这些基因组中开发功能基因和调控元件的完整注释仍然具有挑战性。染色质可及性测定可发现功能元件；但是，要揭示顺式元素的完整组合，将需要分析细胞类型，组织，发育阶段和环境的许多组合。在这里，我们探索使用DNA甲基化图谱开发更完整注释的潜力。利用玉米中的叶组织，我们定义了约100,000个未甲基化区域（UMR），占基因组的5.8％。从基因中发现33,375个UMR大于2kb。UMRs在多种营养组织中高度稳定，并且它们捕获了叶组织中绝大多数可到达的染色质区域。但是，许多UMR在叶中不可访问，并且这些区域代表着在特定细胞类型或发育阶段有可能变为可访问区域。这些UMR通常发生在其他组织中表达的基因附近，并且富含转录因子的结合位点。叶片不可触及的UMR表现出独特的染色质修饰模式，并丰富了染色质与附近基因的相互作用。另外四个单子叶植物的UMR总空间范围从80到120兆碱基，考虑到271兆碱基到4.8千兆酵母的基因组大小范围，这非常相似。总之，基于单个组织的特征，DNA甲基化标记提供了强大的过滤器，可将大型基因组精馏至假定功能基因和调节元件的一小部分。

Pubmed_ID: 32873645

Kinetic profiling of metabolic specialists demonstrates stability and consistency of in vivo enzyme turnover numbers

代谢专家的动力学分析表明体内酶转换数的稳定性和一致性

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2001562117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32873645/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: Enzyme turnover numbers (k cats) are essential for a quantitative understanding of cells. Because k cats are traditionally measured in low-throughput assays, they can be inconsistent, labor-intensive to obtain, and can miss in vivo effects. We use a data-driven approach to estimate in vivo k cats using metabolic specialist Escherichia coli strains that resulted from gene knockouts in central metabolism followed by metabolic optimization via laboratory evolution. By combining absolute proteomics with fluxomics data, we find that in vivo k cats are robust against genetic perturbations, suggesting that metabolic adaptation to gene loss is mostly achieved through other mechanisms, like gene-regulatory changes. Combining machine learning and genome-scale metabolic models, we show that the obtained in vivo k cats predict unseen proteomics data with much higher precision than in vitro k cats. The results demonstrate that in vivo k cats can solve the problem of inconsistent and low-coverage parameterizations of genome-scale cellular models.

摘要: 酶转换数（k猫）对于定量了解细胞至关重要。由于传统上是在低通量分析中测量k猫的，因此它们可能不一致，劳动强度大，并且可能错过体内效应。我们使用数据驱动的方法来估计使用代谢性专业大肠杆菌菌株的体内k猫，该菌株由中央代谢中的基因敲除产生，然后通过实验室进化进行代谢优化。通过将绝对蛋白质组学与通量组学数据相结合，我们发现体内的猫对遗传扰动具有鲁棒性，这表明对基因损失的代谢适应主要是通过其他机制实现的，例如基因调控变化。结合机器学习和基因组规模的代谢模型，我们表明，所获得的体内kcat预测看不见的蛋白质组学数据的准确性要比体外kcat高得多。结果表明，活体猫可以解决基因组规模的细胞模型参数不一致和覆盖率低的问题。

Pubmed_ID: 32873641

Molecular insights into the genome dynamics and interactions between core and acquired genomes of Vibrio cholerae

霍乱弧菌核心和后天基因组之间基因组动力学和相互作用的分子洞察

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2006283117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32873641/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 09/01/2020

Abstract: Bacterial species are hosts to horizontally acquired mobile genetic elements (MGEs), which encode virulence, toxin, antimicrobial resistance, and other metabolic functions. The bipartite genome of Vibrio cholerae harbors sporadic and conserved MGEs that contribute in the disease development and survival of the pathogens. For a comprehensive understanding of dynamics of MGEs in the bacterial genome, we engineered the genome of V. cholerae and examined in vitro and in vivo stability of genomic islands (GIs), integrative conjugative elements (ICEs), and prophages. Recombinant vectors carrying the integration module of these GIs, ICE and CTXΦ, helped us to understand the efficiency of integrations of MGEs in the V. cholerae chromosome. We have deleted more than 250 acquired genes from 6 different loci in the V. cholerae chromosome and showed contribution of CTX prophage in the essentiality of SOS response master regulator LexA, which is otherwise not essential for viability in other bacteria, including Escherichia coli In addition, we observed that the core genome-encoded RecA helps CTXΦ to bypass V. cholerae immunity and allow it to replicate in the host bacterium in the presence of similar prophage in the chromosome. Finally, our proteomics analysis reveals the importance of MGEs in modulating the levels of cellular proteome. This study engineered the genome of V. cholerae to remove all of the GIs, ICEs, and prophages and revealed important interactions between core and acquired genomes.

摘要: 细菌是水平获得的移动遗传元件（MGE）的宿主，该遗传元件编码毒力，毒素，抗菌素耐药性和其他代谢功能。霍乱弧菌的两部分基因组具有零星的和保守的MGE，这些MGE有助于疾病的发展和病原体的存活。为了全面了解细菌基因组中MGE的动力学，我们设计了霍乱弧菌的基因组，并检查了基因组岛（GIs），整合结合元件（ICEs）和原噬菌体的体外和体内稳定性。带有这些GI，ICE和CTXΦ整合模块的重组载体帮助我们了解了霍乱弧菌染色体中MGE整合的效率。我们已经从霍乱弧菌染色体中的6个不同基因座中删除了超过250个获得的基因，并显示了CTX噬菌体对SOS反应主调节剂LexA的重要性的贡献，否则它对于其他细菌（包括大肠杆菌）的生存力不是必需的，我们观察到核心基因组编码的RecA帮助CTXΦ绕过霍乱弧菌免疫力，并使其在染色体中存在类似噬菌体的情况下在宿主细菌中复制。最后，我们的蛋白质组学分析揭示了MGE在调节细胞蛋白质组水平中的重要性。这项研究设计了霍乱弧菌的基因组，以去除所有的GI，ICE和噬菌体，并揭示了核心基因组和获得性基因组之间的重要相互作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32868908

Alteration of genome folding via contact domain boundary insertion

通过接触域边界插入改变基因组折叠

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0680-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32868908/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: Animal chromosomes are partitioned into contact domains. Pathogenic domain disruptions can result from chromosomal rearrangements or perturbation of architectural factors. However, such broad-scale alterations are insufficient to define the minimal requirements for domain formation. Moreover, to what extent domains can be engineered is just beginning to be explored. In an attempt to create contact domains, we inserted a 2-kb DNA sequence underlying a tissue-invariant domain boundary-containing a CTCF-binding site (CBS) and a transcription start site (TSS)-into 16 ectopic loci across 11 chromosomes, and characterized its architectural impact. Depending on local constraints, this fragment variably formed new domains, partitioned existing ones, altered compartmentalization and initiated contacts reflecting chromatin loop extrusion. Deletions of the CBS or the TSS individually or in combination within inserts revealed its distinct contributions to genome folding. Altogether, short DNA insertions can suffice to shape the spatial genome in a manner influenced by chromatin context.

摘要: 动物染色体被分成接触域。致病性结构域破坏可能是由染色体重排或建筑因素引起的。但是，这样的大规模变更不足以定义域形成的最低要求。此外，在多大程度上可以设计域才刚刚开始探索。为了创建接触域，我们在11个染色体的16个异位基因位点中插入了一个2kbDNA序列，该序列位于包含CTCF结合位点（CBS）和转录起始位点（TSS）的组织不变域边界下面，并描述其对建筑的影响。取决于局部约束，该片段可变地形成新的域，将现有的域划分，改变分隔，并引发反映染色质环挤出的接触。单独或组合插入的CBS或TSS缺失显示了其对基因组折叠的独特贡献。总之，短的DNA插入足以以受染色质环境影响的方式塑造空间基因组。

Pubmed_ID: 32868891

A mini foxtail millet with an Arabidopsis-like life cycle as a C 4 model system

具有拟南芥样生命周期的迷你谷子小米作为C 4模型系统

DOI: 10.1038/s41477-020-0747-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32868891/

Journal: Nature plants {'ISSN': '2055-026x', 'Name': 'nature plants', '2015': '0', '2016': '10.3', '2017': '11.471', '2018': '13.297', '2019': '13.256'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: Foxtail millet (Setaria italica) is an important crop species and an emerging model plant for C4 grasses. However, functional genomics research on foxtail millet is challenging because of its long generation time, relatively large stature and recalcitrance to genetic transformation. Here we report the development of xiaomi, a rapid-cycling mini foxtail millet mutant as a C4 model system. Five to six generations of xiaomi can be grown in a year in growth chambers due to its short life cycle and small plant size, similar to Arabidopsis. A point mutation in the Phytochrome C (PHYC) gene was found to be causal for these characteristics. PHYC encodes a light receptor essential for photoperiodic flowering. A reference-grade xiaomi genome comprising 429.94 Mb of sequence was assembled and a gene-expression atlas from 11 different tissues was developed. These resources, together with an established highly efficient transformation system and a multi-omics database, make xiaomi an ideal model system for functional studies of C4 plants.

摘要: 谷子（Setariaitalica）是重要的农作物品种，是C4草的新兴模型植物。但是，由于谷子的生成时间长，身材相对较大以及对遗传转化的抵制，对谷子功能基因组学的研究具有挑战性。在这里，我们报告小米的发展，小米是一种快速循环的迷你谷子突变体，为C4模型系统。类似于拟南芥，由于小米的生命周期短且植物尺寸小，因此可以在生长室内一年内种植五到六代小米。发现植物色素C（PHYC）基因中的点突变是造成这些特征的原因。PHYC编码光周期开花必不可少的光受体。组装了包含429.94Mb序列的参考级小米基因组，并开发了来自11个不同组织的基因表达图谱。这些资源以及已建立的高效转化系统和多组学数据库，使小米成为进行C4植物功能研究的理想模型系统。

Pubmed_ID: 32868888

Seasonal plasticity and diel stability of H3K27me3 in natural fluctuating environments

H3K27me3在自然波动环境中的季节性可塑性和diel稳定性

DOI: 10.1038/s41477-020-00757-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32868888/

Journal: Nature plants {'ISSN': '2055-026x', 'Name': 'nature plants', '2015': '0', '2016': '10.3', '2017': '11.471', '2018': '13.297', '2019': '13.256'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: Diel and seasonal oscillations are two major environmental changes in nature. While organisms cope with the former by the well-characterized mechanism of the circadian clock1,2, there is limited information on the molecular mechanisms underlying long-term responses to the latter3-5. Histone H3 lysine 27 trimethylation (H3K27me3), a repressive histone modification, imparts stability and plasticity to gene regulation during developmental transitions6-9. Here we studied the seasonal and diel dynamics of H3K27me3 at the genome-wide level in a natural population of perennial Arabidopsis halleri and compared these dynamics with those of histone H3 lysine 4 trimethylation (H3K4me3), an active histone modification. Chromatin immunoprecipitation sequencing revealed that H3K27me3 exhibits seasonal plasticity and diel stability. Furthermore, we found that the seasonal H3K27me3 oscillation is delayed in phase relative to the H3K4me3 oscillation, particularly for genes associated with environmental memory. Our findings suggest that H3K27me3 monitors past transcriptional activity to create long-term gene expression trends during organismal responses over weeks in natural fluctuating environments.

摘要: 狄尔和季节性振荡是自然界的两个主要环境变化。虽然生物体通过昼夜节律时钟1,2的特征充分的机制来应对前者，但关于对后者3-5的长期响应所基于的分子机制的信息有限。组蛋白H3赖氨酸27三甲基化（H3K27me3）是一种抑制性的组蛋白修饰，可在发育过渡过程中为基因调控提供稳定性和可塑性6-9。在这里，我们研究了多年生拟南芥自然种群中全基因组水平的H3K27me3的季节性和diel动态，并将这些动态与组蛋白H3赖氨酸4三甲基化（H3K4me3）（一种有效的组蛋白修饰）进行了比较。染色质免疫沉淀测序表明，H3K27me3具有季节性可塑性和diel稳定性。此外，我们发现季节性H3K27me3振荡相对于H3K4me3振荡在相位上有所延迟，特别是对于与环境记忆相关的基因。我们的发现表明，H3K27me3可以监视过去的转录活性，以在自然波动的环境中持续数周的生物反应期间创建长期的基因表达趋势。

Pubmed_ID: 32868439

Site-specific covalent labeling of large RNAs with nanoparticles empowered by expanded genetic alphabet transcription

通过扩展的遗传字母转录功能，使用纳米颗粒对大型RNA进行定点共价标记

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2005217117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32868439/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: Conjugation of RNAs with nanoparticles (NPs) is of significant importance because of numerous applications in biology and medicine, which, however, remains challenging especially for large ones. So far, the majority of RNA labeling relies on solid-phase chemical synthesis, which is generally limited to RNAs smaller than 100 nucleotides (nts). We, here, present an efficient and generally applicable labeling strategy for site-specific covalent conjugation of large RNAs with a gold nanoparticle (Nanogold) empowered by transcription of an expanded genetic alphabet containing the A-T/U and G-C natural base pairs (bps) and the TPT3-NaM unnatural base pair (UBP). We synthesize an amine-derivatized TPT3 (TPT3A), which is site specifically incorporated into a 97-nt 3'SL RNA and a 719-nt minigenomic RNA (DENV-mini) from Dengue virus serotype 2 (DENV2) by in vitro T7 transcription. The TPT3A-modified RNAs are covalently conjugated with mono-Sulfo-N-hydroxysuccinimidyl (NHS)-Nanogold NPs via an amine and NHS ester reaction and further purified under nondenaturing conditions. TPT3 modification and Nanogold labeling cause minimal structural perturbations to the RNAs by circular dichroism, small angle X-ray scattering (SAXS), and binding activity assay. We demonstrate the application of the Nanogold-RNA conjugates in large RNA structural biology by an emerging molecular ruler, X-ray scattering interferometry (XSI). The internanoparticle distance distributions in the 3'SL and DENV-mini RNAs derived from XSI measurements support the hypothetical model of flavivirus genome circularization, thus, validate the applicability of this labeling strategy. The presented strategy overcomes the size constraints in conventional RNA labeling strategies and is expected to have wide applications in large RNA structural biology and RNA nanotechnology.

摘要: RNA与纳米颗粒（NPs）的结合非常重要，因为它在生物学和医学领域有许多应用，然而，尤其对于大型应用而言，仍然具有挑战性。到目前为止，大多数RNA标记依赖于固相化学合成，该合成通常限于小于100个核苷酸（nts）的RNA。我们在这里提出了一种有效且普遍适用的标记策略，用于大RNA与金纳米颗粒（Nanogold）的位点特异性共价缀合，其通过转录包含AT/U和GC天然碱基对（bps）和TPT3-NaM非天然碱基对（UBP）。我们合成了一种胺衍生的TPT3（TPT3A），该位点通过体外T7转录，从登革热病毒血清型2（DENV2）特异地整合到97nt3'SLRNA和719ntminigenomicRNA（DENV-mini）中。通过胺和NHS酯反应，将TPT3A修饰的RNA与单-磺基-N-羟基琥珀酰亚胺（NHS）-纳米金NP共价偶联，并在非变性条件下进一步纯化。TPT3修饰和Nanogold标记通过圆二色性，小角度X射线散射（SAXS）和结合活性测定，对RNA的结构干扰最小。我们通过新兴的分子尺X射线散射干涉仪（XSI）证明了Nanogold-RNA缀合物在大型RNA结构生物学中的应用。从XSI测量获得的3'SL和DENV-miniRNA中的间隔颗粒距离分布支持黄病毒基因组环化的假想模型，因此，验证了这种标记策略的适用性。提出的策略克服了常规RNA标记策略中的大小限制，并有望在大型RNA结构生物学和RNA纳米技术中得到广泛应用。

Pubmed_ID: 32868416

New Guinea highland wild dogs are the original New Guinea singing dogs

新几内亚高原野狗是原始的新几内亚唱歌狗

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2007242117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32868416/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 08/31/2020

Abstract: New Guinea singing dogs (NGSD) are identifiable by their namesake vocalizations, which are unlike any other canid population. Their novel behaviors and potential singular origin during dog domestication make them an attractive, but elusive, subject for evolutionary and conservation study. Although once plentiful on the island of New Guinea (NG), they were presumed to currently exist only in captivity. This conclusion was based on the lack of sightings in the lowlands of the island and the concurrent expansion of European- and Asian-derived dogs. We have analyzed the first nuclear genomes from a canid population discovered during a recent expedition to the highlands of NG. The extreme altitude (>4,000 m) of the highland wild dogs' (HWD) observed range and confirmed vocalizations indicate their potential to be a wild NGSD population. Comparison of single-nucleotide polymorphism genotypes shows strong similarity between HWD and the homogeneous captive NGSD, with the HWD showing significantly higher genetic diversity. Admixture analyses and estimation of shared haplotypes with phylogenetically diverse populations also indicates the HWD is a novel population within the distinct evolutionary lineage of Oceanic canids. Taken together, these data indicate the HWD possesses a distinct potential to aid in the conservation of NGSD both in the wild and under human care.

摘要: 新几内亚唱歌犬（NGSD）可以通过同名的发声来识别，这与其他犬科动物不同。它们在犬的驯化过程中的新颖行为和潜在的奇异起源使它们成为进化和保护研究的一个有吸引力但难以捉摸的主题。尽管曾经在新几内亚（NG）岛上有很多，但据推测它们目前仅在人工饲养下存在。这个结论是基于在岛上的低地上没有目击者以及欧洲和亚洲犬的同时扩张。我们分析了在最近一次对NG高地的探险中发现的犬科动物的第一个核基因组。高地野狗（HWD）观测范围的极端高度（>4,000m），经确认的发声表明它们具有成为野生NGSD种群的潜力。单核苷酸多态性基因型的比较显示，HWD和均质圈养NGSD之间有很强的相似性，而HWD显示出明显更高的遗传多样性。混合分析和系统发育多样性种群共有单倍型的估计还表明，HWD是海洋犬科动物不同进化谱系中的一个新种群。综上所述，这些数据表明HWD在野外和人类护理下均具有独特的潜力来保护NGSD。

Pubmed_ID: 32862479

Identification of a candidate gene associated with isoflavone content in soybean seeds using genome-wide association and linkage mapping

使用全基因组关联和连锁作图鉴定与大豆种子中异黄酮含量相关的候选基因

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14972

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32862479/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 08/30/2020

Abstract: Isoflavone, a secondary metabolite produced by soybeans (Glycine max (L.) Merr.), is valuable for human and plant health. However, the genetic architecture of soybean isoflavone content remains unclear, despite several mapping studies. We generated genomic data for 200 soybean cultivars and 150 recombinant inbred lines (RILs) to localize putative loci associated with soybean seed isoflavone content. Using a genome-wide association study (GWAS), we identified 87 single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) that were significantly associated with isoflavone concentration. Using linkage mapping, we identified 37 QTLs underlying four isoflavone content in the RILs. A major locus on Chromosome 8 (qISO8-1) was co-located by both the GWAS and linkage mapping. qISO8-1 was fine mapped to a 99.5-kilobase region, flanked by SSR_08_1651 and SSR_08_1656, in a BC2 F5 population. GmMPK1, encoding a mitogen-activated protein kinase, was identified as the causal gene in qISO8-1, and two natural GmMPK1 polymorphisms were significantly associated with isoflavone content. Overexpression of GmMPK1 in soybean hairy roots resulted in increased isoflavone concentrations. Overexpressing GmMPK1 in transgenic soybeans had greater resistance to Phytophthora root rot, suggesting that GmMPK1 might increase soybean resistance to biotic stress by influencing isoflavone content. Our results not only increase our understanding of the genetic architecture of soybean seed isoflavone content, but also provide a framework for the future marker-assisted breeding of high-isoflavone content in soybean cultivars.

摘要: 异黄酮是大豆产生的次生代谢产物（Glycinemax（L.）Merr。），对人体和植物健康具有重要意义。然而，尽管进行了一些作图研究，大豆异黄酮含量的遗传结构仍不清楚。我们生成了200个大豆品种和150个重组自交系（RIL）的基因组数据，以定位与大豆种子异黄酮含量相关的推定基因座。使用全基因组关联研究（GWAS），我们确定了87个与异黄酮浓度显着相关的单核苷酸多态性（SNP）。使用链接映射，我们确定了37个QTL，这些QTL是RIL中四个异黄酮含量的基础。GWAS和连锁图谱共同定位8号染色体（qISO8-1）的主要基因座。在BC2F5人群中，将qISO8-1精细映射到99.5碱基对的区域，侧翼为SSR_08_1651和SSR_08_1656。编码有丝分裂原活化蛋白激酶的GmMPK1被确定为qISO8-1中的致病基因，并且两种天然GmMPK1多态性与异黄酮含量显着相关。GmMPK1在大豆毛状根中的过表达导致异黄酮浓度增加。转基因大豆中过表达的GmMPK1对疫霉根腐病的抵抗力更大，这表明GmMPK1可能通过影响异黄酮含量来增加大豆对生物胁迫的抵抗力。我们的研究结果不仅增加了我们对大豆种子异黄酮含量遗传结构的了解，而且为今后大豆品种中高异黄酮含量标记辅助育种提供了框架。

Pubmed_ID: 32860739

Structural Basis for Blocking Sugar Uptake into the Malaria Parasite Plasmodium falciparum

阻止糖吸收到疟原虫恶性疟原虫的结构基础

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.08.015

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32860739/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 08/20/2020

Abstract: Plasmodium species, the causative agent of malaria, rely on glucose for energy supply during blood stage. Inhibition of glucose uptake thus represents a potential strategy for the development of antimalarial drugs. Here, we present the crystal structures of PfHT1, the sole hexose transporter in the genome of Plasmodium species, at resolutions of 2.6 Å in complex with D-glucose and 3.7 Å with a moderately selective inhibitor, C3361. Although both structures exhibit occluded conformations, binding of C3361 induces marked rearrangements that result in an additional pocket. This inhibitor-binding-induced pocket presents an opportunity for the rational design of PfHT1-specific inhibitors. Among our designed C3361 derivatives, several exhibited improved inhibition of PfHT1 and cellular potency against P. falciparum, with excellent selectivity to human GLUT1. These findings serve as a proof of concept for the development of the next-generation antimalarial chemotherapeutics by simultaneously targeting the orthosteric and allosteric sites of PfHT1.

摘要: 疟原虫是疟疾的病原体，在血液阶段依靠葡萄糖提供能量。因此，抑制葡萄糖的摄取代表了抗疟药开发的潜在策略。在这里，我们介绍了疟原虫物种基因组中唯一的己糖转运蛋白PfHT1的晶体结构，与D-葡萄糖复合时的分辨率为2.6，与中等选择性抑制剂C3361的分辨率为3.7。尽管两个结构都显示出封闭的构象，但C3361的结合会引起明显的重排，从而导致额外的口袋。该抑制剂结合诱导的口袋为PfHT1特异性抑制剂的合理设计提供了机会。在我们设计的C3361衍生物中，有几个表现出对PfHT1的抑制作用增强以及对恶性疟原虫的细胞效价，对人GLUT1具有极好的选择性。这些发现通过同时靶向PfHT1的正构和变构位点，为下一代抗疟化学疗法的发展提供了概念证明。

Pubmed_ID: 32860436

Nanoparticle-mediated gene transformation strategies for plant genetic engineering

纳米粒子介导的植物遗传工程基因转化策略

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14973

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32860436/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 08/29/2020

Abstract: Plant genetic engineering, a recent technological advancement in the field of plant science, is an important tool used to improve crop quality and increase yield, to enhance secondary metabolite content in medicinal plants, or to develop crops for sustainable agriculture. A new approach based on nanoparticle-mediated gene transformation can overcome the obstacle of the plant cell wall and accurately transfer DNA or RNA into plants to produce transient or stable transformation. In this review, several nanoparticle-based approaches are discussed, taking into account recent advances and challenges to hint at potential applications of these approaches in transgenic plant improvement programs. This review also highlights the challenges to implementing the nanoparticle-based approaches used in plant genetic engineering. A new technology that improves gene transformation efficiency and overcomes difficulties in plant regeneration has been established and will be used for de novo production of transgenic plants, and CRISPR/Cas9 genome editing has accelerated crop improvement. Therefore, we outline future perspectives based on combinations of genome editing, nanoparticle-mediated gene transformation and de novo regeneration technologies to accelerate crop improvement. The information provided here will assist effective exploration of the technological advances in plant genetic engineering to support plant breeding and important crop improvement programs.

摘要: 植物基因工程是植物科学领域的一项最新技术进步，是用于改善作物质量和增加产量，提高药用植物中次生代谢产物含量或开发可持续农业作物的重要工具。基于纳米粒子介导的基因转化的新方法可以克服植物细胞壁的障碍，并将DNA或RNA准确地转移到植物中以产生瞬时或稳定的转化。在这篇综述中，讨论了几种基于纳米粒子的方法，同时考虑了最近的进展和挑战，以暗示这些方法在转基因植物改良计划中的潜在应用。这篇综述还强调了实施植物遗传工程中使用的基于纳米粒子的方法所面临的挑战。已经建立了一种提高基因转化效率并克服植物再生困难的新技术，并将其用于从头生产转基因植物，并且CRISPR/Cas9基因组编辑加速了作物改良。因此，我们概述了基于基因组编辑，纳米粒子介导的基因转化和从头再生技术以促进作物改良的组合的未来前景。此处提供的信息将有助于有效探索植物基因工程的技术进步，以支持植物育种和重要的作物改良计划。

Pubmed_ID: 32859923

Defining the ATPome reveals cross-optimization of metabolic pathways

定义ATPome揭示了代谢途径的交叉优化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18084-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32859923/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/28/2020

Abstract: Disrupted energy metabolism drives cell dysfunction and disease, but approaches to increase or preserve ATP are lacking. To generate a comprehensive metabolic map of genes and pathways that regulate cellular ATP-the ATPome-we conducted a genome-wide CRISPR interference/activation screen integrated with an ATP biosensor. We show that ATP level is modulated by distinct mechanisms that promote energy production or inhibit consumption. In our system HK2 is the greatest ATP consumer, indicating energy failure may not be a general deficiency in producing ATP, but rather failure to recoup the ATP cost of glycolysis and diversion of glucose metabolites to the pentose phosphate pathway. We identify systems-level reciprocal inhibition between the HIF1 pathway and mitochondria; glycolysis-promoting enzymes inhibit respiration even when there is no glycolytic ATP production, and vice versa. Consequently, suppressing alternative metabolism modes paradoxically increases energy levels under substrate restriction. This work reveals mechanisms of metabolic control, and identifies therapeutic targets to correct energy failure.

摘要: 中断的能量代谢会驱动细胞功能障碍和疾病，但缺乏增加或保存ATP的方法。为了生成调节细胞ATP的基因和途径的全面代谢图谱（ATPome），我们进行了与ATP生物传感器整合的全基因组CRISPR干扰/激活筛选。我们表明，ATP水平受促进能量产生或抑制消耗的独特机制调节。在我们的系统中，HK2是最大的ATP消耗者，表明能量衰竭可能不是生产ATP的普遍缺陷，而是未能弥补糖酵解的ATP成本以及葡萄糖代谢物向戊糖磷酸途径的转移。我们确定HIF1通路和线粒体之间的系统级互惠抑制；即使不产生糖酵解ATP，促进糖酵解的酶也会抑制呼吸，反之亦然。因此，抑制替代代谢模式反常增加了底物限制下的能量水平。这项工作揭示了代谢控制的机制，并确定了纠正能量衰竭的治疗目标。

Pubmed_ID: 32859915

Selective flexible packaging pathways of the segmented genome of influenza A virus

甲型流感病毒基因组片段的选择性柔性包装途径

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18108-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32859915/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/28/2020

Abstract: The genome of influenza A viruses (IAV) is encoded in eight distinct viral ribonucleoproteins (vRNPs) that consist of negative sense viral RNA (vRNA) covered by the IAV nucleoprotein. Previous studies strongly support a selective packaging model by which vRNP segments are bundling to an octameric complex, which is integrated into budding virions. However, the pathway(s) generating a complete genome bundle is not known. We here use a multiplexed FISH assay to monitor all eight vRNAs in parallel in human lung epithelial cells. Analysis of 3.9 × 105 spots of colocalizing vRNAs provides quantitative insights into segment composition of vRNP complexes and, thus, implications for bundling routes. The complexes rarely contain multiple copies of a specific segment. The data suggest a selective packaging mechanism with limited flexibility by which vRNPs assemble into a complete IAV genome. We surmise that this flexibility forms an essential basis for the development of reassortant viruses with pandemic potential.

摘要: 甲型流感病毒（IAV）的基因组编码在八个不同的病毒核糖核蛋白（vRNP）中，这些核糖蛋白由IAV核蛋白覆盖的负义病毒RNA（vRNA）组成。先前的研究强烈支持选择性包装模型，通过该模型，vRNP片段可与八聚体复合并整合到萌芽的病毒体中。然而，产生完整基因组束的途径是未知的。我们在这里使用多重FISH分析来监测人肺上皮细胞中所有八个平行的vRNA。对共定位vRNA的3.9×105斑点的分析提供了对vRNP复合物片段组成的定量见解，因此对捆绑路线也有影响。复合体很少包含特定片段的多个副本。数据表明选择性包装机制具有有限的灵活性，通过该机制vRNP可组装成完整的IAV基因组。我们推测，这种灵活性构成了开发具有大流行潜力的重配病毒的必要基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32859912

Sex differences in oncogenic mutational processes

致癌突变过程中的性别差异

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-17359-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32859912/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/28/2020

Abstract: Sex differences have been observed in multiple facets of cancer epidemiology, treatment and biology, and in most cancers outside the sex organs. Efforts to link these clinical differences to specific molecular features have focused on somatic mutations within the coding regions of the genome. Here we report a pan-cancer analysis of sex differences in whole genomes of 1983 tumours of 28 subtypes as part of the ICGC/TCGA Pan-Cancer Analysis of Whole Genomes (PCAWG) Consortium. We both confirm the results of exome studies, and also uncover previously undescribed sex differences. These include sex-biases in coding and non-coding cancer drivers, mutation prevalence and strikingly, in mutational signatures related to underlying mutational processes. These results underline the pervasiveness of molecular sex differences and strengthen the call for increased consideration of sex in molecular cancer research.

摘要: 在癌症流行病学，治疗和生物学的多个方面以及性器官以外的大多数癌症中都观察到性别差异。将这些临床差异与特定分子特征联系起来的努力集中在基因组编码区内的体细胞突变。在这里，我们报告了28个亚型的1983年肿瘤全基因组中性别差异的全癌分析，这是ICGC/TCGA全基因组全癌分析（PCAWG）联盟的一部分。我们既确认外显子组研究的结果，也发现先前未描述的性别差异。这些包括编码和非编码癌症驱动程序中的性别偏见，突变发生率以及引人注目的是与基础突变过程相关的突变特征。这些结果强调了分子性别差异的普遍性，并加强了在分子癌症研究中更多考虑性别的呼吁。

Pubmed_ID: 32855407

Circadian clock mechanism driving mammalian photoperiodism

昼夜节律机制驱动哺乳动物的光周期

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18061-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32855407/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/27/2020

Abstract: The annual photoperiod cycle provides the critical environmental cue synchronizing rhythms of life in seasonal habitats. In 1936, Bünning proposed a circadian-based coincidence timer for photoperiodic synchronization in plants. Formal studies support the universality of this so-called coincidence timer, but we lack understanding of the mechanisms involved. Here we show in mammals that long photoperiods induce the circadian transcription factor BMAL2, in the pars tuberalis of the pituitary, and triggers summer biology through the eyes absent/thyrotrophin (EYA3/TSH) pathway. Conversely, long-duration melatonin signals on short photoperiods induce circadian repressors including DEC1, suppressing BMAL2 and the EYA3/TSH pathway, triggering winter biology. These actions are associated with progressive genome-wide changes in chromatin state, elaborating the effect of the circadian coincidence timer. Hence, circadian clock-pituitary epigenetic pathway interactions form the basis of the mammalian coincidence timer mechanism. Our results constitute a blueprint for circadian-based seasonal timekeeping in vertebrates.

摘要: 每年的光周期会提供关键的环境线索，以同步季节性栖息地的生活节奏。1936年，Bünning提出了一种基于昼夜节拍的巧合计时器，用于植物中的光周期同步。正式研究支持这种所谓的巧合计时器的普遍性，但是我们对所涉及的机制缺乏了解。在这里，我们在哺乳动物中显示出长的光周期会在垂体的鼻旁管中诱导昼夜节律转录因子BMAL2，并通过缺乏/促甲状腺素（EYA3/TSH）的眼睛触发夏季生物学。相反，短期光周期上的长期褪黑素信号诱导昼夜节律抑制因子包括DEC1，抑制BMAL2和EYA3/TSH途径，从而引发冬季生物学。这些作用与染色质状态的全基因组进行性变化有关，从而阐明了昼夜节律重合计时器的作用。因此，昼夜节律-垂体表观遗传途径相互作用形成了哺乳动物重合定时器机制的基础。我们的结果构成了基于昼夜节律的脊椎动物季节性计划的蓝图。

Pubmed_ID: 32855398

Multi-site clonality analysis uncovers pervasive heterogeneity across melanoma metastases

多站点克隆性分析揭示了黑色素瘤转移的普遍异质性

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18060-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32855398/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/27/2020

Abstract: Metastatic melanoma carries a poor prognosis despite modern systemic therapies. Understanding the evolution of the disease could help inform patient management. Through whole-genome sequencing of 13 melanoma metastases sampled at autopsy from a treatment naïve patient and by leveraging the analytical power of multi-sample analyses, we reveal evidence of diversification among metastatic lineages. UV-induced mutations dominate the trunk, whereas APOBEC-associated mutations are found in the branches of the evolutionary tree. Multi-sample analyses from a further seven patients confirmed that lineage diversification was pervasive, representing an important mode of melanoma dissemination. Our analyses demonstrate that joint analysis of cancer cell fraction estimates across multiple metastases can uncover previously unrecognised levels of tumour heterogeneity and highlight the limitations of inferring heterogeneity from a single biopsy.

摘要: 尽管采用了现代的全身疗法，但转移性黑色素瘤的预后却很差。了解疾病的进展可能有助于患者管理。通过对从未接受过治疗的患者进行尸体解剖而采集的13个黑色素瘤转移的全基因组测序，并利用多样本分析的分析能力，我们揭示了转移谱系之间多样化的证据。紫外线诱导的突变占主导地位，而与APOBEC相关的突变则在进化树的分支中发现。来自另外七名患者的多样本分析证实，谱系多样化是普遍的，代表了黑色素瘤传播的重要模式。我们的分析表明，跨多个转移的癌细胞分数估算值的联合分析可以揭示先前无法识别的肿瘤异质性水平，并突出显示从一次活检推断异质性的局限性。

Pubmed_ID: 32852039

Chromosome-level genome assembly of the female western mosquitofish (Gambusia affinis)

雌性西部蚊鱼的染色体级基因组装配

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa092

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32852039/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 08/01/2020

Abstract: Background: The western mosquitofish (Gambusia affinis) is a sexually dimorphic poeciliid fish known for its worldwide biological invasion and therefore an important research model for studying invasion biology. This organism may also be used as a suitable model to explore sex chromosome evolution and reproductive development in terms of differentiation of ZW sex chromosomes, ovoviviparity, and specialization of reproductive organs. However, there is a lack of high-quality genomic data for the female G. affinis; hence, this study aimed to generate a chromosome-level genome assembly for it. Results: The chromosome-level genome assembly was constructed using Oxford nanopore sequencing, BioNano, and Hi-C technology. G. affinis genomic DNA sequences containing 217 contigs with an N50 length of 12.9 Mb and 125 scaffolds with an N50 length of 26.5 Mb were obtained by Oxford nanopore and BioNano, respectively, and the 113 scaffolds (90.4% of scaffolds containing 97.9% nucleotide bases) were assembled into 24 chromosomes (pseudo-chromosomes) by Hi-C. The Z and W chromosomes of G. affinis were identified by comparative genomic analysis of female and male G. affinis, and the mechanism of differentiation of the Z and W chromosomes was explored. Combined with transcriptome data from 6 tissues, a total of 23,997 protein-coding genes were predicted and 23,737 (98.9%) genes were functionally annotated. Conclusions: The high-quality female G. affinis reference genome provides a valuable omics resource for future studies of comparative genomics and functional genomics to explore the evolution of Z and W chromosomes and the reproductive developmental biology of G. affinis.

摘要: 背景：西部蚊子（Gambusiaaffinis）是一种有性的双态性畸形鱼类，以其在世界范围内的生物入侵而闻名，因此是研究入侵生物学的重要研究模型。根据ZW性染色体的分化，卵胎生和生殖器官的特化，该生物还可以用作探索性染色体进化和生殖发育的合适模型。但是，缺乏女性亲和菌的高质量基因组数据。因此，这项研究旨在为其生成染色体水平的基因组装配。结果：使用牛津纳米孔测序，BioNano和Hi-C技术构建了染色体级基因组装配体。通过牛津纳米孔和BioNano分别获得含有217个重叠序列，N50长度为12.9Mb的重叠群和125个N50长度为26.5Mb的骨架的G.affinis基因组DNA序列，以及113个支架（90.4％的支架包含97.9％的核苷酸碱基））通过Hi-C组装成24条染色体（伪染色体）。通过对女性和男性亲子链霉菌的比较基因组分析，鉴定了亲子链霉菌的Z和W染色体，并探索了Z和W染色体的分化机理。结合来自6个组织的转录组数据，共预测了23,997个蛋白质编码基因，并对23,737个（98.9％）基因进行了功能注释。结论：高质量的女性链球菌参考基因组为将来的比较基因组学和功能基因组学研究提供了宝贵的组学资源，以探索Z和W染色体的进化以及链球菌的生殖发育生物学。

Pubmed_ID: 32848252

Closed mitosis requires local disassembly of the nuclear envelope

封闭的有丝分裂需要局部拆卸核膜

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2648-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32848252/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: At the end of mitosis, eukaryotic cells must segregate the two copies of their replicated genome into two new nuclear compartments1. They do this either by first dismantling and later reassembling the nuclear envelope in an 'open mitosis' or by reshaping an intact nucleus and then dividing it into two in a 'closed mitosis'2,3. Mitosis has been studied in a wide variety of eukaryotes for more than a century4, but how the double membrane of the nuclear envelope is split into two at the end of a closed mitosis without compromising the impermeability of the nuclear compartment remains unknown5. Here, using the fission yeast Schizosaccharomyces pombe (a classical model for closed mitosis5), genetics, live-cell imaging and electron tomography, we show that nuclear fission is achieved via local disassembly of nuclear pores within the narrow bridge that links segregating daughter nuclei. In doing so, we identify the protein Les1, which is localized to the inner nuclear envelope and restricts the process of local nuclear envelope breakdown to the bridge midzone to prevent the leakage of material from daughter nuclei. The mechanism of local nuclear envelope breakdown in a closed mitosis therefore closely mirrors nuclear envelope breakdown in open mitosis3, revealing an unexpectedly high conservation of nuclear remodelling mechanisms across diverse eukaryotes.

摘要: 在有丝分裂结束时，真核细胞必须将其复制的基因组的两个副本分隔到两个新的核区室中1。他们可以通过先拆开核壳然后重新组装成“开放的有丝分裂”，或者重塑完整的核，然后在“封闭的有丝分裂”中将其分成两部分来实现这一目的[2,3]。在各种真核生物中对有丝分裂的研究已有一个多世纪的历史4，但是如何在封闭的有丝分裂末期将核膜的双层膜分裂成两层而又不损害核室的不可渗透性仍是未知的5。在这里，我们使用裂殖酵母粟酒裂殖酵母（Schizosaccharomycespombe）（一种经典的封闭有丝分裂模型5），遗传学，活细胞成像和电子断层扫描技术，表明核裂变是通过连接分离的子核的窄桥内核孔的局部拆卸而实现的。通过这样做，我们确定了蛋白质Les1，它位于内部核膜，并限制了局部核膜对桥中间区的破坏，从而防止了子核物质的泄漏。因此，在封闭的有丝分裂中，局部核包膜的分解机制与开放的有丝分裂中的核包膜的分解紧密相关[3]，这揭示了各种真核生物中核重塑机制的出乎意料的高保守性。

Pubmed_ID: 32848247

Functionally uncoupled transcription-translation in Bacillus subtilis

枯草芽孢杆菌中功能解耦的转录翻译

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2638-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32848247/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: Tight coupling of transcription and translation is considered a defining feature of bacterial gene expression1,2. The pioneering ribosome can both physically associate and kinetically coordinate with RNA polymerase (RNAP)3-11, forming a signal-integration hub for co-transcriptional regulation that includes translation-based attenuation12,13 and RNA quality control2. However, it remains unclear whether transcription-translation coupling-together with its broad functional consequences-is indeed a fundamental characteristic of bacteria other than Escherichia coli. Here we show that RNAPs outpace pioneering ribosomes in the Gram-positive model bacterium Bacillus subtilis, and that this 'runaway transcription' creates alternative rules for both global RNA surveillance and translational control of nascent RNA. In particular, uncoupled RNAPs in B. subtilis explain the diminished role of Rho-dependent transcription termination, as well as the prevalence of mRNA leaders that use riboswitches and RNA-binding proteins. More broadly, we identified widespread genomic signatures of runaway transcription in distinct phyla across the bacterial domain. Our results show that coupled RNAP-ribosome movement is not a general hallmark of bacteria. Instead, translation-coupled transcription and runaway transcription constitute two principal modes of gene expression that determine genome-specific regulatory mechanisms in prokaryotes.

摘要: 转录和翻译的紧密结合被认为是细菌基因表达1,2的决定性特征。开拓性的核糖体可以在物理上与RNA聚合酶（RNAP）3-11缔合并在动力学上协调，从而形成信号整合中心，用于共转录调控，包括基于翻译的衰减12、13和RNA质量控制2。然而，尚不清楚转录-翻译偶联及其广泛的功能后果是否确实是除大肠杆菌以外的细菌的基本特征。在这里，我们显示出在革兰氏阳性模型细菌枯草芽孢杆菌中，RNAP超过了先驱核糖体，并且这种“失控的转录”为全球RNA监测和新生RNA的翻译控制创造了替代规则。尤其是，枯草芽孢杆菌中未偶联的RNAP解释了Rho依赖的转录终止作用减弱，以及使用核糖开关和RNA结合蛋白的mRNA前导分子的普遍性。更广泛地说，我们在整个细菌域中的不同门中鉴定了失控转录的广泛基因组特征。我们的结果表明，偶联的RNAP核糖体运动并不是细菌的普遍特征。相反，翻译偶联转录和失控转录构成了基因表达的两种主要模式，这些模式决定了原核生物中基因组特异性的调控机制。

Pubmed_ID: 32848246

Distinct viral reservoirs in individuals with spontaneous control of HIV-1

自发控制HIV-1的个体中不同的病毒库

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2651-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32848246/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 08/26/2020

Abstract: Sustained, drug-free control of HIV-1 replication is naturally achieved in less than 0.5% of infected individuals (here termed 'elite controllers'), despite the presence of a replication-competent viral reservoir1. Inducing such an ability to spontaneously maintain undetectable plasma viraemia is a major objective of HIV-1 cure research, but the characteristics of proviral reservoirs in elite controllers remain to be determined. Here, using next-generation sequencing of near-full-length single HIV-1 genomes and corresponding chromosomal integration sites, we show that the proviral reservoirs of elite controllers frequently consist of oligoclonal to near-monoclonal clusters of intact proviral sequences. In contrast to individuals treated with long-term antiretroviral therapy, intact proviral sequences from elite controllers were integrated at highly distinct sites in the human genome and were preferentially located in centromeric satellite DNA or in Krüppel-associated box domain-containing zinc finger genes on chromosome 19, both of which are associated with heterochromatin features. Moreover, the integration sites of intact proviral sequences from elite controllers showed an increased distance to transcriptional start sites and accessible chromatin of the host genome and were enriched in repressive chromatin marks. These data suggest that a distinct configuration of the proviral reservoir represents a structural correlate of natural viral control, and that the quality, rather than the quantity, of viral reservoirs can be an important distinguishing feature for a functional cure of HIV-1 infection. Moreover, in one elite controller, we were unable to detect intact proviral sequences despite analysing more than 1.5 billion peripheral blood mononuclear cells, which raises the possibility that a sterilizing cure of HIV-1 infection, which has previously been observed only following allogeneic haematopoietic stem cell transplantation2,3, may be feasible in rare instances.

摘要: 尽管存在具有复制能力的病毒库1，但在不到0.5％的感染个体（以下称为“精英控制者”）中自然可以实现对HIV-1复制的持续，无毒控制。诱导这种自发维持无法检测到的血浆病毒血症的能力是HIV-1治疗研究的主要目标，但是精英控制者中前病毒库的特征仍有待确定。在这里，使用近乎完整的单个HIV-1基因组和相应的染色体整合位点的下一代测序，我们表明，精英控制者的原病毒库经常由完整的原病毒序列的寡克隆至近单克隆簇组成。与接受长期抗逆转录病毒疗法治疗的个体相反，来自精英控制者的完整前病毒序列被整合在人类基因组中高度不同的位点，并且优先位于着丝粒卫星DNA或染色体上与克鲁勃相关的盒结构域含锌指基因中19，两者均与异染色质特征相关。而且，来自精英控制者的完整原病毒序列的整合位点显示出距宿主基因组转录起始位点和可及染色质的距离增加，并且富含抑制性染色质标记。这些数据表明，前病毒库的独特构型代表了自然病毒控制的结构相关性，病毒库的质量而非数量可能是功能治愈HIV-1感染的重要区别特征。此外，在一个精英控制者中，尽管分析了超过15亿个外周血单个核细胞，我们仍无法检测到完整的前病毒序列，这增加了对HIV-1感染进行无菌治疗的可能性，以前仅在同种异体造血干之后才观察到细胞移植2,3在极少数情况下可能是可行的。

Pubmed_ID: 32848148

ATAC-seq footprinting unravels kinetics of transcription factor binding during zygotic genome activation

ATAC-seq足迹揭示了合子基因组激活过程中转录因子结合的动力学

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18035-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32848148/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/26/2020

Abstract: While footprinting analysis of ATAC-seq data can theoretically enable investigation of transcription factor (TF) binding, the lack of a computational tool able to conduct different levels of footprinting analysis has so-far hindered the widespread application of this method. Here we present TOBIAS, a comprehensive, accurate, and fast footprinting framework enabling genome-wide investigation of TF binding dynamics for hundreds of TFs simultaneously. We validate TOBIAS using paired ATAC-seq and ChIP-seq data, and find that TOBIAS outperforms existing methods for bias correction and footprinting. As a proof-of-concept, we illustrate how TOBIAS can unveil complex TF dynamics during zygotic genome activation in both humans and mice, and propose how zygotic Dux activates cascades of TFs, binds to repeat elements and induces expression of novel genetic elements.

摘要: 尽管理论上可以对ATAC-seq数据进行足迹分析，但可以研究转录因子（TF）的结合，但由于缺乏能够进行不同程度的足迹分析的计算工具，迄今为止，该方法的广泛应用受到了阻碍。在这里，我们介绍了TOBIAS，这是一个全面，准确，快速的覆盖框架，可同时对数百个TF的TF结合动力学进行全基因组研究。我们使用成对的ATAC-seq和ChIP-seq数据验证了TOBIAS，发现TOBIAS优于现有的偏差校正和覆盖方法。作为概念验证，我们说明了TOBIAS如何在人类和小鼠的合子基因组激活过程中揭示复杂的TF动态，并提出了合子Dux如何激活TF的级联，结合重复元件并诱导新的遗传元件表达。

Pubmed_ID: 32848126

Reconciling qualitative, abstract, and scalable modeling of biological networks

协调生物网络的定性，抽象和可扩展建模

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18112-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32848126/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 08/26/2020

Abstract: Predicting biological systems' behaviors requires taking into account many molecular and genetic elements for which limited information is available past a global knowledge of their pairwise interactions. Logical modeling, notably with Boolean Networks (BNs), is a well-established approach that enables reasoning on the qualitative dynamics of networks. Several dynamical interpretations of BNs have been proposed. The synchronous and (fully) asynchronous ones are the most prominent, where the value of either all or only one component can change at each step. Here we prove that, besides being costly to analyze, these usual interpretations can preclude the prediction of certain behaviors observed in quantitative systems. We introduce an execution paradigm, the Most Permissive Boolean Networks (MPBNs), which offers the formal guarantee not to miss any behavior achievable by a quantitative model following the same logic. Moreover, MPBNs significantly reduce the complexity of dynamical analysis, enabling to model genome-scale networks.

摘要: 预测生物系统的行为需要考虑到许多分子和遗传因素，而对于它们之间的成对相互作用的全球性了解之后，可获得的信息却非常有限。逻辑建模，尤其是使用布尔网络（BN）的逻辑建模，是一种行之有效的方法，可以对网络的定性动力学进行推理。已经提出了对BN的几种动力学解释。同步和（完全）异步组件最为突出，在每个步骤中，所有组件或单个组件的值都可以更改。在这里我们证明，除了分析成本高昂之外，这些通常的解释还可能排除对定量系统中观察到的某些行为的预测。我们介绍了一种执行范式，即“最大允许布尔网络（MPBN）”，它提供了形式上的保证，即不会错过遵循相同逻辑的定量模型可实现的任何行为。此外，MPBN大大降低了动力学分析的复杂性，从而能够对基因组规模的网络进行建模。

Pubmed_ID: 32848072

Genomic plasticity of pathogenic Escherichia coli mediates d-serine tolerance via multiple adaptive mechanisms

致病性大肠杆菌的基因组可塑性通过多种适应机制介导d-丝氨酸耐受

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2004977117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32848072/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 08/26/2020

Abstract: The molecular environment of the host can have profound effects on the behavior of resident bacterial species. We recently established how the sensing and response of enterohemorrhagic Escherichia coli (EHEC) to d-serine (d-Ser) resulted in down-regulation of type 3 secretion system-dependent colonization, thereby avoiding unfavorable environments abundant in this toxic metabolite. However, this model ignores a key determinant of the success of bacterial pathogens, adaptive evolution. In this study, we have explored the adaptation of EHEC to d-Ser and its consequences for pathogenesis. We rapidly isolated multiple, independent, EHEC mutants whose growth was no longer compromised in the presence of d-Ser. Through a combination of whole-genome sequencing and transcriptomics, we showed that tolerance could be attributed to disruption of one of two d-Ser transporters and/or activation of a previously nonfunctional d-Ser deaminase. While the implication of cytoplasmic transport in d-Ser toxicity was unsurprising, disruption of a single transporter, CycA, was sufficient to completely overcome the repression of type 3 secretion system activity normally associated with exposure to d-Ser. Despite the fact that this reveals a mechanism by which evolution could drive a pathogen to colonize new niches, interrogation of sequenced E. coli O157:H7 genomes showed a high level of CycA conservation, highlighting a strong selective pressure for functionality. Collectively, these data show that CycA is a critically important conduit for d-Ser uptake that is central to the niche restriction of EHEC.

摘要: 宿主的分子环境可以对常驻细菌物种的行为产生深远影响。我们最近确定了肠出血性大肠杆菌（EHEC）对d-丝氨酸（d-Ser）的感知和反应如何导致下调依赖于3型分泌系统的定殖，从而避免了在这种有毒代谢产物中存在丰富的不利环境。但是，该模型忽略了细菌病原体成功与否的关键决定因素，即适应性进化。在这项研究中，我们探索了EHEC对d-Ser的适应及其对发病的影响。我们迅速分离了多个独立的EHEC突变体，这些突变体在d-Ser的存在下不再受到损害。通过全基因组测序和转录组学的结合，我们表明耐受性可归因于两个d-Ser转运蛋白之一的破坏和/或先前无功能的d-Ser脱氨酶的激活。虽然胞质转运对d-Ser毒性的影响并不令人惊讶，但单个转运蛋白CycA的破坏足以完全克服通常与暴露于d-Ser相关的3型分泌系统活性的抑制。尽管这揭示了进化可以驱动病原体定居新壁ni的机制，但对已测序的大肠杆菌O157：H7基因组的询问显示出高水平的CycA保守性，突显了强大的功能选择压力。总体而言，这些数据表明，CycA是d-Ser摄取的至关重要的途径，是EHEC利基限制的关键。

Pubmed_ID: 32846159

Thermus thermophilus Argonaute Functions in the Completion of DNA Replication

嗜热栖热菌Argonaute在DNA复制完成中的功能。

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.07.036

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32846159/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 08/20/2020

Abstract: In many eukaryotes, Argonaute proteins, guided by short RNA sequences, defend cells against transposons and viruses. In the eubacterium Thermus thermophilus, the DNA-guided Argonaute TtAgo defends against transformation by DNA plasmids. Here, we report that TtAgo also participates in DNA replication. In vivo, TtAgo binds 15- to 18-nt DNA guides derived from the chromosomal region where replication terminates and associates with proteins known to act in DNA replication. When gyrase, the sole T. thermophilus type II topoisomerase, is inhibited, TtAgo allows the bacterium to finish replicating its circular genome. In contrast, loss of gyrase and TtAgo activity slows growth and produces long sausage-like filaments in which the individual bacteria are linked by DNA. Finally, wild-type T. thermophilus outcompetes an otherwise isogenic strain lacking TtAgo. We propose that the primary role of TtAgo is to help T. thermophilus disentangle the catenated circular chromosomes generated by DNA replication.

摘要: 在许多真核生物中，由短RNA序列引导的Argonaute蛋白可以防御转座子和病毒。在真细菌嗜热栖热菌中，DNA引导的ArgonauteTtAgo可以防御DNA质粒的转化。在这里，我们报道TtAgo也参与DNA复制。在体内，TtAgo结合15至18nt的DNA向导，该向导来自染色体区域，在该区域复制终止并与已知在DNA复制中起作用的蛋白质结合。当唯一的II型嗜热嗜热丝菌拓扑异构酶回旋酶被抑制时，TtAgo可使细菌完成其环状基因组的复制。相比之下，回旋酶和TtAgo活性的丧失会减慢生长并产生长香肠状的细丝，其中的单个细菌通过DNA连接。最终，野生型嗜热链球菌胜过了其他缺乏TtAgo的同基因菌株。我们建议，TtAgo的主要作用是帮助嗜热链球菌解开由DNA复制产生的链状环状染色体。

Pubmed_ID: 32845983

Hi-C chromosome conformation capture sequencing of avian genomes using the BGISEQ-500 platform

使用BGISEQ-500平台对禽类基因组进行Hi-C染色体构象捕获测序

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa087

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32845983/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 08/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Hi-C experiments couple DNA-DNA proximity with next-generation sequencing to yield an unbiased description of genome-wide interactions. Previous methods describing Hi-C experiments have focused on the industry-standard Illumina sequencing. With new next-generation sequencing platforms such as BGISEQ-500 becoming more widely available, protocol adaptations to fit platform-specific requirements are useful to give increased choice to researchers who routinely generate sequencing data. Results: We describe an in situ Hi-C protocol adapted to be compatible with the BGISEQ-500 high-throughput sequencing platform. Using zebra finch (Taeniopygia guttata) as a biological sample, we demonstrate how Hi-C libraries can be constructed to generate informative data using the BGISEQ-500 platform, following circularization and DNA nanoball generation. Our protocol is a modification of an Illumina-compatible method, based around blunt-end ligations in library construction, using un-barcoded, distally overhanging double-stranded adapters, followed by amplification using indexed primers. The resulting libraries are ready for circularization and subsequent sequencing on the BGISEQ series of platforms and yield data similar to what can be expected using Illumina-compatible approaches. Conclusions: Our straightforward modification to an Illumina-compatible in situHi-C protocol enables data generation on the BGISEQ series of platforms, thus expanding the options available for researchers who wish to utilize the powerful Hi-C techniques in their research.

摘要: 背景：Hi-C实验将DNA-DNA邻近性与下一代测序结合在一起，以公正地描述基因组范围内的相互作用。先前描述Hi-C实验的方法都集中在行业标准的Illumina测序上。随着新的下一代测序平台（例如BGISEQ-500）的广泛使用，为适应平台特定要求而进行的协议调整可为常规生成测序数据的研究人员提供更多选择。结果：我们描述了适合与BGISEQ-500高通量测序平台兼容的原位Hi-C协议。使用斑马雀科（Taeniopygiaguttata）作为生物样品，我们证明了在环化和DNA纳米球生成之后，如何使用BGISEQ-500平台构建Hi-C文库以生成有用的数据。我们的协议是对Illumina兼容方法的一种修改，它基于文库构建中的平末端连接，使用未编码的，远端悬垂的双链衔接子，然后使用索引引物进行扩增。生成的库已准备好在BGISEQ系列平台上进行环化和后续测序，并产生与使用Illumina兼容方法所预期的数据相似的数据。结论：我们对Illumina兼容的situHi-C协议的直接修改使能够在BGISEQ系列平台上生成数据，从而为希望在研究中利用强大的Hi-C技术的研究人员提供了更多选择。

Pubmed_ID: 32843348

Multiplexed conditional genome editing with Cas12a in Drosophila

果蝇中Cas12a的多重条件基因组编辑

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2004655117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32843348/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 08/25/2020

Abstract: CRISPR-Cas genome engineering has revolutionized biomedical research by enabling targeted genome modification with unprecedented ease. In the popular model organism Drosophila melanogaster, gene editing has so far relied exclusively on the prototypical CRISPR nuclease Cas9. Additional CRISPR systems could expand the genomic target space, offer additional modes of regulation, and enable the independent manipulation of genes in different cells of the same animal. Here we describe a platform for efficient Cas12a gene editing in Drosophila We show that Cas12a from Lachnospiraceae bacterium, but not Acidaminococcus spec., can mediate robust gene editing in vivo. In combination with most CRISPR RNAs (crRNAs), LbCas12a activity is high at 29 °C, but low at 18 °C, enabling modulation of gene editing by temperature. LbCas12a can directly utilize compact crRNA arrays that are substantially easier to construct than Cas9 single-guide RNA arrays, facilitating multiplex genome engineering. Furthermore, we show that conditional expression of LbCas12a is sufficient to mediate tightly controlled gene editing in a variety of tissues, allowing detailed analysis of gene function in a multicellular organism. We also test a variant of LbCas12a with a D156R point mutation and show that it has substantially higher activity and outperforms a state-of-the-art Cas9 system in identifying essential genes. Cas12a gene editing expands the genome-engineering toolbox in Drosophila and will be a powerful method for the functional annotation of the genome. This work also presents a fully genetically encoded Cas12a system in an animal, laying out principles for the development of similar systems in other genetically tractable organisms for multiplexed conditional genome engineering.

摘要: CRISPR-Cas基因组工程通过前所未有的轻松实现目标基因组修饰，彻底改变了生物医学研究。迄今为止，在流行的模型生物果蝇果蝇中，基因编辑仅依赖于原型CRISPR核酸酶Cas9。额外的CRISPR系统可以扩展基因组靶标空间，提供其他调控方式，并能够对同一动物不同细胞中的基因进行独立操作。在这里，我们描述了一个在果蝇中有效编辑Cas12a基因的平台。我们显示了来自Lachnospiraceae细菌的Cas12a，而不是Acidaminococcusspec。，可以在体内介导强大的基因编辑。与大多数CRISPRRNA（crRNA）结合使用时，LbCas12a活性在29°C时较高，但在18°C时较低，从而可以通过温度调节基因编辑。LbCas12a可以直接利用紧凑的crRNA阵列，比Cas9单向导RNA阵列更容易构建，从而促进了多重基因组工程。此外，我们显示LbCas12a的条件表达足以介导在各种组织中严格控制的基因编辑，从而允许对多细胞生物中的基因功能进行详细分析。我们还测试了具有D156R点突变的LbCas12a变体，并显示它在鉴定必需基因方面具有更高的活性，并且胜过了最新的Cas9系统。Cas12a基因编辑扩展了果蝇中的基因组工程工具箱，将成为对基因组进行功能注释的有力方法。这项工作还提出了一种在动物中完全由基因编码的Cas12a系统，为在其他遗传易处理的生物体中用于多重条件基因组工程的类似系统的开发奠定了原理。

Pubmed_ID: 32841603

Large-Scale Topological Changes Restrain Malignant Progression in Colorectal Cancer

大规模拓扑学变化抑制大肠癌恶性进展

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.07.030

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32841603/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 08/18/2020

Abstract: Widespread changes to DNA methylation and chromatin are well documented in cancer, but the fate of higher-order chromosomal structure remains obscure. Here we integrated topological maps for colon tumors and normal colons with epigenetic, transcriptional, and imaging data to characterize alterations to chromatin loops, topologically associated domains, and large-scale compartments. We found that spatial partitioning of the open and closed genome compartments is profoundly compromised in tumors. This reorganization is accompanied by compartment-specific hypomethylation and chromatin changes. Additionally, we identify a compartment at the interface between the canonical A and B compartments that is reorganized in tumors. Remarkably, similar shifts were evident in non-malignant cells that have accumulated excess divisions. Our analyses suggest that these topological changes repress stemness and invasion programs while inducing anti-tumor immunity genes and may therefore restrain malignant progression. Our findings call into question the conventional view that tumor-associated epigenomic alterations are primarily oncogenic.

摘要: DNA甲基化和染色质的广泛变化在癌症中有充分的文献记载，但是高阶染色体结构的命运仍然不清楚。在这里，我们将结肠肿瘤和正常结肠的拓扑图与表观遗传，转录和成像数据进行了整合，以表征染色质环，拓扑相关域和大规模区室的变化。我们发现，在肿瘤中，开放和封闭的基因组区室的空间分配受到了严重损害。这种重组伴随着区室特异性的低甲基化和染色质变化。此外，我们在规范的A和B隔室之间的界面处识别出一个在肿瘤中重新组织的隔室。值得注意的是，在积累了过量分裂的非恶性细胞中也出现了类似的变化。我们的分析表明，这些拓扑变化在诱导抗肿瘤免疫基因的同时抑制了干细胞和侵袭程序，因此可能抑制恶性进展。我们的发现质疑传统观点，即肿瘤相关的表观基因组改变主要是致癌的。

Pubmed_ID: 32839606

Dynamic incorporation of multiple in silico functional annotations empowers rare variant association analysis of large whole-genome sequencing studies at scale

动态整合多个计算机功能注释，可大规模进行大型全基因组测序研究的稀有变异关联分析

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0676-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32839606/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: Large-scale whole-genome sequencing studies have enabled the analysis of rare variants (RVs) associated with complex phenotypes. Commonly used RV association tests have limited scope to leverage variant functions. We propose STAAR (variant-set test for association using annotation information), a scalable and powerful RV association test method that effectively incorporates both variant categories and multiple complementary annotations using a dynamic weighting scheme. For the latter, we introduce 'annotation principal components', multidimensional summaries of in silico variant annotations. STAAR accounts for population structure and relatedness and is scalable for analyzing very large cohort and biobank whole-genome sequencing studies of continuous and dichotomous traits. We applied STAAR to identify RVs associated with four lipid traits in 12,316 discovery and 17,822 replication samples from the Trans-Omics for Precision Medicine Program. We discovered and replicated new RV associations, including disruptive missense RVs of NPC1L1 and an intergenic region near APOC1P1 associated with low-density lipoprotein cholesterol.

摘要: 大规模的全基因组测序研究使得能够分析与复杂表型相关的稀有变异（RVs）。常用的RV关联测试的范围有限，无法利用各种功能。我们提出STAAR（使用注释信息进行关联的变量集测试），这是一种可扩展且功能强大的RV关联测试方法，可使用动态加权方案有效地合并变体类别和多个互补注释。对于后者，我们介绍了“注释主要组件”，即计算机变量注释的多维摘要。STAAR解决了人口结构和相关性问题，可扩展用于分析连续和二分性状的超大型队列和生物库全基因组测序研究。我们应用STAAR在Trans-OmicsforPrecisionMedicine计划的12,316个发现样品和17,822个复制样品中鉴定了与四个脂质性状相关的RV。我们发现并复制了新的RV关联，包括NPC1L1的破坏性错义RV和APOC1P1附近的一个与低密度脂蛋白胆固醇相关的基因间区域。

Pubmed_ID: 32839469

Genome-wide functional analysis of phosphatases in the pathogenic fungus Cryptococcus neoformans

全基因组功能分析致病性真菌新隐球菌中的磷酸酶。

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-18028-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32839469/
