To investigate, we assayed changes in the Arabidopsis root transcriptome to different doses of nitrogen (N)-a key plant nutrient-as a function of time. By these means, we found that rate changes of genome-wide transcript levels in response to N-dose could be explained by a simple kinetic principle: the Michaelis-Menten (MM) model. Fitting the MM model allowed us to estimate the maximum rate of transcript change (V max), as well as the N-dose at which one-half of V max was achieved (K m) for 1,153 N-dose-responsive genes. Since transcription factors (TFs) can act in part as the catalytic agents that determine the rates of transcript change, we investigated their role in regulating N-dose-responsive MM-modeled genes. We found that altering the abundance of TGA1, an early N-responsive TF, perturbed the maximum rates of N-dose transcriptomic responses (V max), K m, as well as the rate of N-dose-responsive plant growth. We experimentally validated that MM-modeled N-dose-responsive genes included both direct and indirect TGA1 targets, using a root cell TF assay to detect TF binding and/or TF regulation genome-wide. Taken together, our results support a molecular mechanism of transcriptional control that allows an increase in N-dose to lead to a proportional change in the rate of genome-wide expression and plant growth.

摘要: 营养剂量的增加导致作物生物量和农业产量成比例增加。但是，这种养分剂量反应的分子基础在很大程度上是未知的。为了进行调查，我们分析了拟南芥根转录组对不同剂量氮（一种关键植物营养素）的变化随时间的变化。通过这些方法，我们发现响应N剂量的全基因组转录物水平的速率变化可以通过简单的动力学原理来解释：Michaelis-Menten（MM）模型。拟合MM模型使我们能够估计最大的转录物变化率（Vmax），以及1,153个N剂量反应性基因达到一半的Vmax的N剂量（Km）。由于转录因子（TFs）可以部分充当决定转录物变化速率的催化剂，因此我们研究了它们在调节N剂量反应性MM模型基因中的作用。我们发现改变TGA1的丰度，即早期的N响应TF，会扰乱N剂量转录组响应的最大速率（Vmax），Km以及N剂量响应的植物生长的速率。我们使用根细胞TF测定法检测全基因组中的TF结合和/或TF调节，通过实验验证了MM建模的N剂量反应性基因包括直接和间接TGA1靶标。两者合计，我们的结果支持转录控制的分子机制，该机制允许N剂量的增加导致全基因组表达和植物生长速率的成比例变化。

Pubmed_ID: 32414920

Tibetan PHD2, an allele with loss-of-function properties

藏族PHD2，具有功能丧失特性的等位基因

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1920546117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32414920/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 06/02/2020

Abstract: Tibetans have adapted to the chronic hypoxia of high altitude and display a distinctive suite of physiologic adaptations, including augmented hypoxic ventilatory response and resistance to pulmonary hypertension. Genome-wide studies have consistently identified compelling genetic signatures of natural selection in two genes of the Hypoxia Inducible Factor pathway, PHD2 and HIF2A The product of the former induces the degradation of the product of the latter. Key issues regarding Tibetan PHD2 are whether it is a gain-of-function or loss-of-function allele, and how it might contribute to high-altitude adaptation. Tibetan PHD2 possesses two amino acid changes, D4E and C127S. We previously showed that in vitro, Tibetan PHD2 is defective in its interaction with p23, a cochaperone of the HSP90 pathway, and we proposed that Tibetan PHD2 is a loss-of-function allele. Here, we report that additional PHD2 mutations at or near Asp-4 or Cys-127 impair interaction with p23 in vitro. We find that mice with the Tibetan Phd2 allele display augmented hypoxic ventilatory response, supporting this loss-of-function proposal. This is phenocopied by mice with a mutation in p23 that abrogates the PHD2:p23 interaction. Hif2a haploinsufficiency, but not the Tibetan Phd2 allele, ameliorates hypoxia-induced increases in right ventricular systolic pressure. The Tibetan Phd2 allele is not associated with hemoglobin levels in mice. We propose that Tibetans possess genetic alterations that both activate and inhibit selective outputs of the HIF pathway to facilitate successful adaptation to the chronic hypoxia of high altitude.

摘要: 藏族人已经适应了高原的慢性低氧，并表现出独特的生理适应性，包括增强的低氧通气反应和对肺动脉高压的抵抗力。全基因组研究一致地在缺氧诱导因子途径的两个基因PHD2和HIF2A中确定了自然选择的引人注目的遗传特征。前者的产物诱导后者产物的降解。关于藏族PHD2的关键问题是它是功能获得的等位基因还是功能丧失的等位基因，以及它如何促进高海拔适应。藏族PHD2具有两个氨基酸变化，D4E和C127S。我们以前曾证明，在体外，藏族PHD2在与HSP90途径的伴侣分子p23的相互作用中存在缺陷，我们提出藏族PHD2是功能丧失的等位基因。在这里，我们报告在Asp-4或Cys-127或附近的其他PHD2突变会削弱与p23的体外相互作用。我们发现具有西藏Phd2等位基因的小鼠显示出增强的低氧通气反应，支持这种功能丧失的提议。p23突变消除了PHD2：p23相互作用的小鼠表现出这种现象。Hif2a单倍剂量不足，但不是西藏Phd2等位基因，可改善缺氧引起的右心室收缩压升高。藏族Phd2等位基因与小鼠血红蛋白水平无关。我们建议藏人拥有既能激活又能抑制HIF通路选择性输出的遗传改变，以促进成功适应高海拔地区的慢性低氧。

Pubmed_ID: 32414915

Two auxiliary factors promote Dmc1-driven DNA strand exchange via stepwise mechanisms

两个辅助因子通过逐步机制促进Dmc1驱动的DNA链交换

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1917419117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32414915/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 06/02/2020

Abstract: Homologous recombination (HR) is a universal mechanism operating in somatic and germ-line cells, where it contributes to the maintenance of genome stability and ensures the faithful distribution of genetic material, respectively. The ability to identify and exchange the strands of two homologous DNA molecules lies at the heart of HR and is mediated by RecA-family recombinases. Dmc1 is a meiosis-specific RecA homolog in eukaryotes, playing a predominant role in meiotic HR. However, Dmc1 cannot function without its two major auxiliary factor complexes, Swi5-Sfr1 and Hop2-Mnd1. Through biochemical reconstitutions, we demonstrate that Swi5-Sfr1 and Hop2-Mnd1 make unique contributions to stimulate Dmc1-driven strand exchange in a synergistic manner. Mechanistically, Swi5-Sfr1 promotes establishment of the Dmc1 nucleoprotein filament, whereas Hop2-Mnd1 defines a critical, rate-limiting step in initiating strand exchange. Following execution of this function, we propose that Swi5-Sfr1 then promotes strand exchange with Hop2-Mnd1. Thus, our findings elucidate distinct yet complementary roles of two auxiliary factors in Dmc1-driven strand exchange, providing mechanistic insights into some of the most critical steps in meiotic HR.

摘要: 同源重组（HR）是一种在体细胞和种系细胞中运行的通用机制，它分别有助于维持基因组的稳定性并确保遗传物质的忠实分布。鉴定和交换两个同源DNA分子链的能力是HR的核心，并由RecA家族重组酶介导。Dmc1是真核生物中减数分裂特异的RecA同源物，在减数分裂HR中起主要作用。但是，如果没有其两个主要辅助因子复合体Swi5-Sfr1和Hop2-Mnd1，Dmc1就无法运行。通过生化重组，我们证明Swi5-Sfr1和Hop2-Mnd1做出独特贡献，以协同方式刺激Dmc1驱动链交换。从机制上讲，Swi5-Sfr1促进Dmc1核蛋白丝的建立，而Hop2-Mnd1定义了启动链交换的关键，限速步骤。执行此功能后，我们建议Swi5-Sfr1然后促进与Hop2-Mnd1的链交换。因此，我们的发现阐明了Dmc1驱动的链交换中两个辅助因子的独特但互补的作用，为减数分裂HR中一些最关键的步骤提供了机械学见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32412129

Transcriptome and epigenome analyses of vernalization in Arabidopsis thaliana

拟南芥春化的转录组和表观基因组分析

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14817

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32412129/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Vernalization accelerates flowering after prolonged winter cold. Transcriptional and epigenetic changes are known to be involved in the regulation of the vernalization response. Despite intensive applications of next-generation sequencing in diverse aspects of plant research, genome-wide transcriptome and epigenome profiling during the vernalization response has not been conducted. In this work, to our knowledge, we present the first comprehensive analyses of transcriptomic and epigenomic dynamics during the vernalization process in Arabidopsis thaliana. Six major clusters of genes exhibiting distinctive features were identified. Temporary changes in histone H3K4me3 levels were observed that likely coordinate photosynthesis and prevent oxidative damage during cold exposure. In addition, vernalization induced a stable accumulation of H3K27me3 over genes encoding many development-related transcription factors, which resulted in either inhibition of transcription or a bivalent status of the genes. Lastly, FLC-like and VIN3-like genes were identified that appear to be novel components of the vernalization pathway.

摘要: 长期的冬季寒冷后，春化促进开花。已知转录和表观遗传变化与春化反应的调节有关。尽管下一代测序技术在植物研究的各个方面都得到了广泛的应用，但尚未进行春化反应期间的全基因组转录组和表观基因组分析。在这项工作中，就我们所知，我们对拟南芥春化过程中的转录组和表观基因组动力学进行了首次全面分析。鉴定出展现出独特特征的六个主要基因簇。观察到组蛋白H3K4me3水平的暂时变化可能协调光合作用并防止冷暴露期间的氧化损伤。另外，春化诱导H3K27me3在编码许多与发育相关的转录因子的基因上稳定积累，从而导致转录抑制或基因的二价状态。最后，鉴定出FLC样和VIN3样基因，它们似乎是春化途径的新组成部分。

Pubmed_ID: 32410353

Insertional mutagenesis of Brachypodium distachyon using the Tnt1 retrotransposable element

使用Tnt1逆转座子元件诱变短枝曲霉

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14813

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32410353/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 05/15/2020

Abstract: Brachypodium distachyon is an annual C3 grass used as a monocot model system in functional genomics research. Insertional mutagenesis is a powerful tool for both forward and reverse genetics studies. In this study, we explored the possibility of using the tobacco retrotransposon Tnt1 to create a transposon-based insertion mutant population in B. distachyon. We developed transgenic B. distachyon plants expressing Tnt1 (R0) and in the subsequent regenerants (R1) we observed that Tnt1 actively transposed during somatic embryogenesis, generating an average of 6.37 insertions per line in a population of 19 independent R1 regenerant plants analyzed. In seed-derived progeny of R1 plants, Tnt1 segregated in a Mendelian ratio of 3:1 and no new Tnt1 transposition was observed. A total of 126 flanking sequence tags (FSTs) were recovered from the analyzed R0 and R1 lines. Analysis of the FSTs showed a uniform pattern of insertion in all the chromosomes (1-5) without any preference for a particular chromosome region. Considering the average length of a gene transcript to be 3.37 kb, we estimated that 29 613 lines are required to achieve a 90% possibility of tagging a given gene in the B. distachyon genome using the Tnt1-based mutagenesis approach. Our results show the possibility of using Tnt1 to achieve near-saturation mutagenesis in B. distachyon, which will aid in functional genomics studies of other C3 grasses.

摘要: Brachypodiumdistachyon是一年生的C3草，在功能基因组学研究中用作单子叶植物模型系统。插入诱变是进行正向和反向遗传学研究的有力工具。在这项研究中，我们探索了使用烟草逆转录转​​座子Tnt1在地衣芽孢杆菌中创建基于转座子的插入突变体的可能性。我们开发了表达Tnt1（R0）的转基因B.distachyon植物，在随后的再生子（R1）中，我们观察到Tnt1在体细胞胚发生过程中被主动转座，在分析的19个独立R1再生植物种群中平均每株产生6.37个插入。在R1植物的种子衍生后代中，Tnt1以孟德尔比率为3：1分离，未观察到新的Tnt1转座。从分析的R0和R1品系中总共回收了126个侧翼序列标签（FST）。FST的分析显示了在所有染色体（1-5）中均一的插入模式，而对特定染色体区域没有任何偏好。考虑到基因转录本的平均长度为3.37kb，我们估计需要29613个品系，才能实现使用基于Tnt1的诱变方法在地衣芽孢杆菌基因组中标记给定基因的90％可能性。我们的研究结果表明，使用Tnt1可以在B.distachyon中实现近饱和诱变，这将有助于其他C3草的功能基因组学研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32409639

Genotoxic stress triggers the activation of IRE1α-dependent RNA decay to modulate the DNA damage response

基因毒性胁迫触发IRE1α依赖性RNA衰变的激活，从而调节DNA损伤反应

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15694-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32409639/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/14/2020

Abstract: The molecular connections between homeostatic systems that maintain both genome integrity and proteostasis are poorly understood. Here we identify the selective activation of the unfolded protein response transducer IRE1α under genotoxic stress to modulate repair programs and sustain cell survival. DNA damage engages IRE1α signaling in the absence of an endoplasmic reticulum (ER) stress signature, leading to the exclusive activation of regulated IRE1α-dependent decay (RIDD) without activating its canonical output mediated by the transcription factor XBP1. IRE1α endoribonuclease activity controls the stability of mRNAs involved in the DNA damage response, impacting DNA repair, cell cycle arrest and apoptosis. The activation of the c-Abl kinase by DNA damage triggers the oligomerization of IRE1α to catalyze RIDD. The protective role of IRE1α under genotoxic stress is conserved in fly and mouse. Altogether, our results uncover an important intersection between the molecular pathways that sustain genome stability and proteostasis.

摘要: 维持基因组完整性和蛋白稳态的稳态系统之间的分子联系知之甚少。在这里，我们确定了在遗传毒性胁迫下，未折叠的蛋白应答换能器IRE1α的选择性激活，以调节修复程序并维持细胞存活。在没有内质网（ER）压力信号的情况下，DNA损伤与IRE1α信号传导有关，从而导致受调节的IRE1α依赖性衰变（RIDD）的唯一激活而没有激活其转录因子XBP1介导的规范输出。IRE1α核糖核酸内切酶活性控制参与DNA损伤反应，影响DNA修复，细胞周期停滞和凋亡的mRNA的稳定性。DNA损伤激活c-Abl激酶会触发IRE1α的寡聚化，从而催化RIDD。IRE1α在遗传毒性胁迫下的保护作用在果蝇和小鼠中得以保留。总而言之，我们的结果揭示了维持基因组稳定性和蛋白质稳定的分子途径之间的重要交集。

Pubmed_ID: 32409606

Genomic evidence for convergent evolution of gene clusters for momilactone biosynthesis in land plants

陆地植物中妈咪内酯生物合成基因簇收敛进化的基因组证据

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1914373117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32409606/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 06/02/2020

Abstract: Momilactones are bioactive diterpenoids that contribute to plant defense against pathogens and allelopathic interactions between plants. Both cultivated and wild grass species of Oryza and Echinochloa crus-galli (barnyard grass) produce momilactones using a biosynthetic gene cluster (BGC) in their genomes. The bryophyte Calohypnum plumiforme (formerly Hypnum plumaeforme) also produces momilactones, and the bifunctional diterpene cyclase gene CpDTC1/HpDTC1, which is responsible for the production of the diterpene framework, has been characterized. To understand the molecular architecture of the momilactone biosynthetic genes in the moss genome and their evolutionary relationships with other momilactone-producing plants, we sequenced and annotated the C. plumiforme genome. The data revealed a 150-kb genomic region that contains two cytochrome P450 genes, the CpDTC1/HpDTC1 gene and the "dehydrogenase momilactone A synthase" gene tandemly arranged and inductively transcribed following stress exposure. The predicted enzymatic functions in yeast and recombinant assay and the successful pathway reconstitution in Nicotiana benthamiana suggest that it is a functional BGC responsible for momilactone production. Furthermore, in a survey of genomic sequences of a broad range of plant species, we found that momilactone BGC is limited to the two grasses (Oryza and Echinochloa) and C. plumiforme, with no synteny among these genomes. These results indicate that while the gene cluster in C. plumiforme is functionally similar to that in rice and barnyard grass, it is likely a product of convergent evolution. To the best of our knowledge, this report of a BGC for a specialized plant defense metabolite in bryophytes is unique.

摘要: Momilactones是具有生物活性的二萜类化合物，有助于植物抵御病原体和植物之间的化感相互作用。Oryza和Echinochloacrus-galli的耕种和野生草种（grass草）均利用其基因组中的生物合成基因簇（BGC）产生了马尼内酯。苔藓植物Cloohypnumplumiforme（以前称为Hypnumplumaeforme）也可产生妈咪内酯，并且已对负责生产二萜骨架的双功能二萜环化酶基因CpDTC1/HpDTC1进行了表征。为了了解苔藓基因组中妈咪内酯生物合成基因的分子结构以及它们与其他产生妈咪内酯的植物的进化关系，我们对羽衣梭菌基因组进行了测序和注释。数据揭示了一个150kb的基因组区域，其中包含两个细胞色素P450基因，即CpDTC1/HpDTC1基因和“脱氢酶MomilactoneA合酶”基因串联并在压力暴露后感应转录。预测的酶功能在酵母和重组测定中以及在本氏烟草中的成功途径重构表明它是负责妈咪内酯生产的功能性BGC。此外，在对广泛的植物物种的基因组序列进行的调查中，我们发现妈咪内酯BGC仅限于两种草（Oryza和Echinochloa）和羽状衣原体，在这些基因组之间没有同构关系。这些结果表明，尽管羽衣梭菌的基因簇在功能上与水稻和bar草中的相似，但可能是趋同进化的产物。就我们所知，关于苔藓植物中一种特殊植物防御代谢物的BGC报告是独一无二的。

Pubmed_ID: 32409602

Activin-A limits Th17 pathogenicity and autoimmune neuroinflammation via CD39 and CD73 ectonucleotidases and Hif1-α-dependent pathways

激活素A通过CD39和CD73胞外核苷酸酶和Hif1-α依赖性途径限制Th17致病性和自身免疫性神经炎症

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1918196117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32409602/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 06/02/2020

Abstract: In multiple sclerosis (MS), Th17 cells are critical drivers of autoimmune central nervous system (CNS) inflammation and demyelination. Th17 cells exhibit functional heterogeneity fostering both pathogenic and nonpathogenic, tissue-protective functions. Still, the factors that control Th17 pathogenicity remain incompletely defined. Here, using experimental autoimmune encephalomyelitis, an established mouse MS model, we report that therapeutic administration of activin-A ameliorates disease severity and alleviates CNS immunopathology and demyelination, associated with decreased activation of Th17 cells. In fact, activin-A signaling through activin-like kinase-4 receptor represses pathogenic transcriptional programs in Th17-polarized cells, while it enhances antiinflammatory gene modules. Whole-genome profiling and in vivo functional studies revealed that activation of the ATP-depleting CD39 and CD73 ectonucleotidases is essential for activin-A-induced suppression of the pathogenic signature and the encephalitogenic functions of Th17 cells. Mechanistically, the aryl hydrocarbon receptor, along with STAT3 and c-Maf, are recruited to promoter elements on Entpd1 and Nt5e (encoding CD39 and CD73, respectively) and other antiinflammatory genes, and control their expression in Th17 cells in response to activin-A. Notably, we show that activin-A negatively regulates the metabolic sensor, hypoxia-inducible factor-1α, and key inflammatory proteins linked to pathogenic Th17 cell states. Of translational relevance, we demonstrate that activin-A is induced in the CNS of individuals with MS and restrains human Th17 cell responses. These findings uncover activin-A as a critical controller of Th17 cell pathogenicity that can be targeted for the suppression of autoimmune CNS inflammation.

摘要: 在多发性硬化症（MS）中，Th17细胞是自身免疫中枢神经系统（CNS）炎症和脱髓鞘的关键驱动器。Th17细胞具有功能异质性，可促进致病性和非致病性的组织保护功能。尽管如此，控制Th17致病性的因素仍未完全确定。在这里，我们使用实验性自身免疫性脑脊髓炎，一种已建立的小鼠MS模型，我们报道了激活素A的治疗性给药改善了疾病的严重程度并减轻了CNS免疫病理和脱髓鞘，与Th17细胞的激活减少有关。实际上，通过激活素样激酶4受体的激活素A信号传导抑制Th17极化细胞中的致病性转录程序，同时增强了抗炎基因模块。全基因组分析和体内功能研究表明，消耗ATP的CD39和CD73胞外核苷酸酶的激活对于激活素A诱导的Th17细胞的致病特征和致脑功能的抑制至关重要。从机理上讲，芳烃受体与STAT3和c-Maf一起被募集到Entpd1和Nt5e（分别编码CD39和CD73）和其他抗炎基因上的启动子元件，并响应激活素A控制其在Th17细胞中的表达。。值得注意的是，我们显示激活素A负调节代谢传感器，缺氧诱导因子1α和与致病性Th17细胞状态相关的关键炎症蛋白。关于翻译的相关性，我们证明了激活素A在具有MS的个体的中枢神经系统中被诱导并抑制了人类Th17细胞的应答。这些发现揭示了激活素-A是Th17细胞致病性的关键控制因子，可将其作为抑制自身免疫性中枢神经系统炎症的靶标。

Pubmed_ID: 32409525

Cryo-EM structure of the human cohesin-NIPBL-DNA complex

人类黏着蛋白-NIPBL-DNA复合物的低温-EM结构

DOI: 10.1126/science.abb0981

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32409525/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 06/26/2020

Abstract: As a ring-shaped adenosine triphosphatase (ATPase) machine, cohesin organizes the eukaryotic genome by extruding DNA loops and mediates sister chromatid cohesion by topologically entrapping DNA. How cohesin executes these fundamental DNA transactions is not understood. Using cryo-electron microscopy (cryo-EM), we determined the structure of human cohesin bound to its loader NIPBL and DNA at medium resolution. Cohesin and NIPBL interact extensively and together form a central tunnel to entrap a 72-base pair DNA. NIPBL and DNA promote the engagement of cohesin's ATPase head domains and ATP binding. The hinge domains of cohesin adopt an "open washer" conformation and dock onto the STAG1 subunit. Our structure explains the synergistic activation of cohesin by NIPBL and DNA and provides insight into DNA entrapment by cohesin.

摘要: 作为一种环状腺苷三磷酸酶（ATPase）机器，粘着素通过挤压DNA环来组织真核生物基因组，并通过拓扑捕获DNA来介导染色单体的内聚。凝聚素如何执行这些基本的DNA交易尚不清楚。使用低温电子显微镜（cryo-EM），我们以中等分辨率确定了与其黏附分子NIPBL和DNA结合的人黏着蛋白的结构。黏着蛋白和NIPBL广泛相互作用，共同形成一条中央通道，以捕获72个碱基对的DNA。NIPBL和DNA促进粘着蛋白的ATPase头部结构域和ATP结合。粘着蛋白的铰链结构域采用“开放垫圈”构象并停靠在STAG1亚基上。我们的结构解释了NIPBL和DNA协同激活黏附素的过程，并提供了对黏附素对DNA包埋的了解。

Pubmed_ID: 32409524

Ancient DNA indicates human population shifts and admixture in northern and southern China

古代DNA表明中国北方和南方的人口迁移和混杂

DOI: 10.1126/science.aba0909

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32409524/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 07/17/2020

Abstract: Human genetic history in East Asia is poorly understood. To clarify population relationships, we obtained genome-wide data from 26 ancient individuals from northern and southern East Asia spanning 9500 to 300 years ago. Genetic differentiation in this region was higher in the past than the present, which reflects a major episode of admixture involving northern East Asian ancestry spreading across southern East Asia after the Neolithic, thereby transforming the genetic ancestry of southern China. Mainland southern East Asian and Taiwan Strait island samples from the Neolithic show clear connections with modern and ancient individuals with Austronesian-related ancestry, which supports an origin in southern China for proto-Austronesians. Connections among Neolithic coastal groups from Siberia and Japan to Vietnam indicate that migration and gene flow played an important role in the prehistory of coastal Asia.

摘要: 对东亚的人类遗传史了解甚少。为了阐明种群之间的关系，我们从9500到300年前的东亚北部和南部26位古代个体那里获得了全基因组数据。该地区的遗传分化过去比现在更高，这反映了新石器时代以后东亚北部血统主要分布在东亚南部的混合事件，从而改变了中国南部的遗传血统。来自新石器时代的东南亚大陆大陆和台湾海峡岛样本显示出与具有南洋人渊源的现代和古代个体之间的清晰联系，这支持了原南极人在中国南部的起源。从西伯利亚和日本到越南的新石器时代沿海群体之间的联系表明，迁移和基因流动在亚洲沿海史前发挥了重要作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32408337

Infection of dogs with SARS-CoV-2

狗感染SARS-CoV-2

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2334-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32408337/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 05/14/2020

Abstract: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) was first detected in Wuhan in December 2019 and caused coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19)1,2. In 2003, the closely related SARS-CoV had been detected in domestic cats and a dog3. However, little is known about the susceptibility of domestic pet mammals to SARS-CoV-2. Here, using PCR with reverse transcription, serology, sequencing the viral genome and virus isolation, we show that 2 out of 15 dogs from households with confirmed human cases of COVID-19 in Hong Kong were found to be infected with SARS-CoV-2. SARS-CoV-2 RNA was detected in five nasal swabs collected over a 13-day period from a 17-year-old neutered male Pomeranian. A 2.5-year-old male German shepherd was positive for SARS-CoV-2 RNA on two occasions and virus was isolated from nasal and oral swabs. Antibody responses were detected in both dogs using plaque-reduction-neutralization assays. Viral genetic sequences of viruses from the two dogs were identical to the virus detected in the respective human cases. The dogs remained asymptomatic during quarantine. The evidence suggests that these are instances of human-to-animal transmission of SARS-CoV-2. It is unclear whether infected dogs can transmit the virus to other animals or back to humans.

摘要: 严重急性呼吸系统综合症冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）于2019年12月在武汉首次发现，并导致2019年冠状病毒病（COVID-19）1,2。2003年，在家猫和狗中发现了密切相关的SARS-CoV3。但是，关于家养宠物哺乳动物对SARS-CoV-2的敏感性了解甚少。在这里，使用具有逆转录，血清学，病毒基因组测序和病毒分离的PCR技术，我们发现，在香港确诊人类感染COVID-19病例的家庭中，每15条狗中就有2条被SARS-CoV-2感染。在13天的时间里，从一名17岁的绝育男性博美犬中收集到的5个鼻拭子中检测到SARS-CoV-2RNA。一名2.5岁的雄性德国牧羊犬两次SARS-CoV-2RNA阳性，并且从鼻拭子和口腔拭子中分离出病毒。使用噬斑减少中和试验在两只狗中检测到抗体应答。来自两只狗的病毒的病毒遗传序列与在相应人类病例中检测到的病毒相同。这些狗在隔离期间无症状。证据表明，这是SARS-CoV-2人对动物传播的实例。尚不清楚受感染的狗是否可以将病毒传播给其他动物或传播给人类。

Pubmed_ID: 32404988

Publisher Correction: Comprehensive analysis of chromothripsis in 2,658 human cancers using whole-genome sequencing

出版商更正：使用全基因组测序对2658种人类癌症中的色霉菌病进行综合分析

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0634-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32404988/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 05/13/2020
