Pubmed_ID: 32404872

BAF60a deficiency uncouples chromatin accessibility and cold sensitivity from white fat browning

BAF60a缺乏使染色质可及性和冷敏性与白色脂肪褐变脱钩

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16148-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32404872/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/13/2020

Abstract: Brown and beige fat share a remarkably similar transcriptional program that supports fuel oxidation and thermogenesis. The chromatin-remodeling machinery that governs genome accessibility and renders adipocytes poised for thermogenic activation remains elusive. Here we show that BAF60a, a subunit of the SWI/SNF chromatin-remodeling complexes, serves an indispensable role in cold-induced thermogenesis in brown fat. BAF60a maintains chromatin accessibility at PPARγ and EBF2 binding sites for key thermogenic genes. Surprisingly, fat-specific BAF60a inactivation triggers more pronounced cold-induced browning of inguinal white adipose tissue that is linked to induction of MC2R, a receptor for the pituitary hormone ACTH. Elevated MC2R expression sensitizes adipocytes and BAF60a-deficient adipose tissue to thermogenic activation in response to ACTH stimulation. These observations reveal an unexpected dichotomous role of BAF60a-mediated chromatin remodeling in transcriptional control of brown and beige gene programs and illustrate a pituitary-adipose signaling axis in the control of thermogenesis.

摘要: 棕色和米色脂肪共有非常相似的转录程序，可支持燃料氧化和生热作用。染色质重塑机制控制着基因组的可及性，并使脂肪细胞蓄势致热。在这里，我们显示BAF60a，SWI/SNF染色质重塑复合物的一个亚基，在棕色脂肪的冷诱导产热中起着不可或缺的作用。BAF60a在关键产热基因的PPARγ和EBF2结合位点保持染色质可及性。出乎意料的是，脂肪特异性BAF60a失活会触发更明显的冷诱导腹股沟白色脂肪组织褐变，这与垂体激素ACTH的受体MC2R的诱导有关。MC2R的表达升高会使脂肪细胞和BAF60a缺乏的脂肪组织对促肾上腺皮质激素刺激产生的热激活敏感。这些观察结果揭示了BAF60a介导的染色质重塑在棕色和米色基因程序的转录控制中出乎意料的二分作用，并说明了在生热控制中垂体-脂肪信号转导轴。

Pubmed_ID: 32404420

Endogenous oxidized DNA bases and APE1 regulate the formation of G-quadruplex structures in the genome

内源性氧化DNA碱基和APE1调节基因组中G-四链体结构的形成

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1912355117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32404420/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/26/2020

Abstract: Formation of G-quadruplex (G4) DNA structures in key regulatory regions in the genome has emerged as a secondary structure-based epigenetic mechanism for regulating multiple biological processes including transcription, replication, and telomere maintenance. G4 formation (folding), stabilization, and unfolding must be regulated to coordinate G4-mediated biological functions; however, how cells regulate the spatiotemporal formation of G4 structures in the genome is largely unknown. Here, we demonstrate that endogenous oxidized guanine bases in G4 sequences and the subsequent activation of the base excision repair (BER) pathway drive the spatiotemporal formation of G4 structures in the genome. Genome-wide mapping of occurrence of Apurinic/apyrimidinic (AP) site damage, binding of BER proteins, and G4 structures revealed that oxidized base-derived AP site damage and binding of OGG1 and APE1 are predominant in G4 sequences. Loss of APE1 abrogated G4 structure formation in cells, which suggests an essential role of APE1 in regulating the formation of G4 structures in the genome. Binding of APE1 to G4 sequences promotes G4 folding, and acetylation of APE1, which enhances its residence time, stabilizes G4 structures in cells. APE1 subsequently facilitates transcription factor loading to the promoter, providing mechanistic insight into the role of APE1 in G4-mediated gene expression. Our study unravels a role of endogenous oxidized DNA bases and APE1 in controlling the formation of higher-order DNA secondary structures to regulate transcription beyond its well-established role in safeguarding the genomic integrity.

摘要: 基因组中关键调控区中G-四链体（G4）DNA结构的形成已成为基于二级结构的表观遗传机制，用于调控多种生物过程，包括转录，复制和端粒维持。必须调节G4的形成（折叠），稳定化和展开，以协调G4介导的生物学功能；然而，细胞如何调节基因组中G4结构的时空形成尚不清楚。在这里，我们证明了G4序列中的内源性氧化鸟嘌呤碱基以及随后的碱基切除修复（BER）途径的激活驱动了基因组中G4结构的时空形成。全基因组映射的apurinic/apyrimidinic（AP）站点发生的损害，BER蛋白的结合和G4结构揭示，氧化的碱基衍生的AP站点损害和OGG1和APE1的结合在G4序列中占主导地位。APE1的丧失消除了细胞中G4结构的形成，这表明APE1在调节基因组中G4结构的形成中起着至关重要的作用。APE1与G4序列的结合会促进G4折叠，而APE1的乙酰化会增加其停留时间，从而稳定细胞中的G4结构。随后，APE1促进转录因子加载到启动子上，从而提供了对APE1在G4介导的基因表达中的作用的机械了解。我们的研究揭示了内源性氧化DNA碱基和APE1在控制高级DNA二级结构的形成中所起的作用，以调节其在保护基因组完整性方面已确立的作用之外的转录作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32401319

Ewastools: Infinium Human Methylation BeadChip pipeline for population epigenetics integrated into Galaxy

Ewastools：将Infinium Human Methylation BeadChip管线整合到Galaxy中以用于人口表观遗传学

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa049

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32401319/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Infinium Human Methylation BeadChip is an array platform for complex evaluation of DNA methylation at an individual CpG locus in the human genome based on Illumina's bead technology and is one of the most common techniques used in epigenome-wide association studies. Finding associations between epigenetic variation and phenotype is a significant challenge in biomedical research. The newest version, HumanMethylationEPIC, quantifies the DNA methylation level of 850,000 CpG sites, while the previous versions, HumanMethylation450 and HumanMethylation27, measured >450,000 and 27,000 loci, respectively. Although a number of bioinformatics tools have been developed to analyse this assay, they require some programming skills and experience in order to be usable. Results: We have developed a pipeline for the Galaxy platform for those without experience aimed at DNA methylation analysis using the Infinium Human Methylation BeadChip. Our tool is integrated into Galaxy (http://galaxyproject.org), a web-based platform. This allows users to analyse data from the Infinium Human Methylation BeadChip in the easiest possible way. Conclusions: The pipeline provides a group of integrated analytical methods wrapped into an easy-to-use interface. Our tool is available from the Galaxy ToolShed, GitHub repository, and also as a Docker image. The aim of this project is to make Infinium Human Methylation BeadChip analysis more flexible and accessible to everyone.

摘要: 背景：Infinium人甲基化BeadChip是一个阵列平台，可基于Illumina的珠子技术对人基因组中单个CpG基因座的DNA甲基化进行综合评估，并且是表观基因组范围关联研究中最常用的技术之一。在表观遗传变异与表型之间寻找关联是生物医学研究中的重大挑战。最新版本的HumanMethylationEPIC量化了850,000个CpG位点的DNA甲基化水平，而先前版本的HumanMethylation450和HumanMethylation27分别测量了>450,000和27,000个基因座。尽管已经开发了许多生物信息学工具来分析该测定法，但是它们需要一定的编程技能和经验才能使用。结果：我们为那些没有经验的人使用InfiniumHumanMethylationBeadChip为DNA甲基化分析开发了Galaxy平台的管线。我们的工具已集成到基于网络的平台Galaxy（http://galaxyproject.org）中。这使用户能够以最简单的方式分析来自InfiniumHumanMethylationBeadChip的数据。结论：该管道提供了一组集成在易于使用的界面中的集成分析方法。我们的工具可从GalaxyToolShed，GitHub存储库以及Docker映像中获得。该项目的目的是使Infinium人类甲基化BeadChip分析更加灵活，每个人都可以使用。

Pubmed_ID: 32398863

Whole-genome sequencing of 508 patients identifies key molecular features associated with poor prognosis in esophageal squamous cell carcinoma

508名患者的全基因组测序确定了与食管鳞状细胞癌预后不良相关的关键分子特征

DOI: 10.1038/s41422-020-0333-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32398863/

Journal: Cell research {'ISSN': '1001-0602', 'Name': 'cell research', '2015': '14.812', '2016': '15.606', '2017': '15.393', '2018': '17.848', '2019': '20.507'}

Date: 05/12/2020

Abstract: Esophageal squamous cell carcinoma (ESCC) is a poor-prognosis cancer type with limited understanding of its molecular etiology. Using 508 ESCC genomes, we identified five novel significantly mutated genes and uncovered mutational signature clusters associated with metastasis and patients' outcomes. Several functional assays implicated that NFE2L2 may act as a tumor suppressor in ESCC and that mutations in NFE2L2 probably impaired its tumor-suppressive function, or even conferred oncogenic activities. Additionally, we found that the NFE2L2 mutations were significantly associated with worse prognosis of ESCC. We also identified potential noncoding driver mutations including hotspot mutations in the promoter region of SLC35E2 that were correlated with worse survival. Approximately 5.9% and 15.2% of patients had high tumor mutation burden or actionable mutations, respectively, and may benefit from immunotherapy or targeted therapies. We found clinically relevant coding and noncoding genomic alterations and revealed three major subtypes that robustly predicted patients' outcomes. Collectively, we report the largest dataset of genomic profiling of ESCC useful for developing ESCC-specific biomarkers for diagnosis and treatment.

摘要: 食管鳞状细胞癌（ESCC）是一种预后较差的癌症，对其分子病因学了解有限。我们使用508个ESCC基因组，鉴定了5个新颖的显着突变基因和未发现的与转移和患者预后相关的突变特征簇。几种功能测定暗示NFE2L2可能在ESCC中起抑癌作用，而NFE2L2中的突变可能损害其抑癌功能，甚至赋予其致癌活性。此外，我们发现NFE2L2突变与ESCC的不良预后显着相关。我们还确定了潜在的非编码驱动程序突变，包括SLC35E2启动子区域中的热点突变，这些突变与较差的生存率相关。分别约有5.9％和15.2％的患者具有较高的肿瘤突变负担或可操作的突变，并且可能受益于免疫疗法或靶向疗法。我们发现了临床上相关的编码和非编码基因组改变，并揭示了三种主要亚型可以强有力地预测患者的预后。总的来说，我们报告了最大的ESCC基因组谱数据集，可用于开发ESCC特定的生物标记物进行诊断和治疗。

Pubmed_ID: 32398369

Secure large-scale genome-wide association studies using homomorphic encryption

使用同态加密进行大规模的全基因组关联研究

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1918257117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32398369/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/26/2020

Abstract: Genome-wide association studies (GWASs) seek to identify genetic variants associated with a trait, and have been a powerful approach for understanding complex diseases. A critical challenge for GWASs has been the dependence on individual-level data that typically have strict privacy requirements, creating an urgent need for methods that preserve the individual-level privacy of participants. Here, we present a privacy-preserving framework based on several advances in homomorphic encryption and demonstrate that it can perform an accurate GWAS analysis for a real dataset of more than 25,000 individuals, keeping all individual data encrypted and requiring no user interactions. Our extrapolations show that it can evaluate GWASs of 100,000 individuals and 500,000 single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in 5.6 h on a single server node (or in 11 min on 31 server nodes running in parallel). Our performance results are more than one order of magnitude faster than prior state-of-the-art results using secure multiparty computation, which requires continuous user interactions, with the accuracy of both solutions being similar. Our homomorphic encryption advances can also be applied to other domains where large-scale statistical analyses over encrypted data are needed.

摘要: 全基因组关联研究（GWAS）旨在鉴定与性状相关的遗传变异，并且已经成为了解复杂疾病的有效方法。GWAS的关键挑战是依赖通常具有严格隐私要求的个人级别数据，因此迫切需要保持参与者个人级别隐私的方法。在这里，我们基于同态加密的一些进展提出了一个隐私保护框架，并证明了它可以对超过25,000个人的真实数据集执行准确的GWAS分析，从而使所有个人数据保持加密，并且不需要用户交互。我们的推断表明，它可以在单个服务器节点上的5.6小时（或在并行运行的31个服务器节点上的11分钟内）评估100,000个个体的GWAS和500,000个单核苷酸多态性（SNP）。使用安全的多方计算，我们的性能结果比以前的最新技术要快一个数量级，后者需要连续的用户交互，并且两种解决方案的准确性都差不多。我们在同态加密方面的进步也可以应用于需要对加密数据进行大规模统计分析的其他领域。

Pubmed_ID: 32396200

Sequencing smart: De novo sequencing and assembly approaches for a non-model mammal

智能测序：非模型哺乳动物的从头测序和组装方法

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa045

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32396200/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Whilst much sequencing effort has focused on key mammalian model organisms such as mouse and human, little is known about the relationship between genome sequencing techniques for non-model mammals and genome assembly quality. This is especially relevant to non-model mammals, where the samples to be sequenced are often degraded and of low quality. A key aspect when planning a genome project is the choice of sequencing data to generate. This decision is driven by several factors, including the biological questions being asked, the quality of DNA available, and the availability of funds. Cutting-edge sequencing technologies now make it possible to achieve highly contiguous, chromosome-level genome assemblies, but rely on high-quality high molecular weight DNA. However, funding is often insufficient for many independent research groups to use these techniques. Here we use a range of different genomic technologies generated from a roadkill European polecat (Mustela putorius) to assess various assembly techniques on this low-quality sample. We evaluated different approaches for de novo assemblies and discuss their value in relation to biological analyses. Results: Generally, assemblies containing more data types achieved better scores in our ranking system. However, when accounting for misassemblies, this was not always the case for Bionano and low-coverage 10x Genomics (for scaffolding only). We also find that the extra cost associated with combining multiple data types is not necessarily associated with better genome assemblies. Conclusions: The high degree of variability between each de novo assembly method (assessed from the 7 key metrics) highlights the importance of carefully devising the sequencing strategy to be able to carry out the desired analysis. Adding more data to genome assemblies does not always result in better assemblies, so it is important to understand the nuances of genomic data integration explained here, in order to obtain cost-effective value for money when sequencing genomes.

摘要: 背景：尽管许多测序工作集中在关键的哺乳动物模型生物（例如小鼠和人类）上，但对于非模型哺乳动物的基因组测序技术与基因组装配质量之间的关系知之甚少。这尤其与非模型哺乳动物有关，在非模型哺乳动物中，要测序的样品经常降解且质量低下。计划基因组计划时的一个关键方面是选择要生成的测序数据。这个决定是由几个因素决定的，包括所要询问的生物学问题，可用DNA的质量以及资金的可用性。现在，最先进的测序技术可以实现高度连续的染色体级基因组装配，但依赖于高质量的高分子量DNA。但是，许多独立研究小组使用这些技术的资金通常不足。在这里，我们使用从道路杀伤力欧洲鸡貂（Mustelaputorius）产生的一系列不同的基因组技术，来评估这种低质量样品的各种组装技术。我们评估了从头组装的不同方法，并讨论了它们与生物学分析有关的价值。结果：通常，包含更多数据类型的程序集在我们的排名系统中得分更高。但是，考虑到组装错误，Bionano和低覆盖率10x基因组学（并非仅适用于脚手架）并非总是如此。我们还发现，与组合多种数据类型相关的额外费用不一定与更好的基因组组装相关。结论：每种从头组装方法之间的高度可变性（根据7个关键指标进行评估）凸显了精心设计测序策略以进行所需分析的重要性。向基因组装配体中添加更多数据并不一定总能带来更好的装配体，因此了解此处解释的基因组数据集成的细微差别非常重要，以便在对基因组进行测序时获得具有成本效益的性价比。

Pubmed_ID: 32393878

PDK1 regulates auxin transport and Arabidopsis vascular development through AGC1 kinase PAX

PDK1通过AGC1激酶PAX调节植物生长素运输和拟南芥的血管发育

DOI: 10.1038/s41477-020-0650-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32393878/

Journal: Nature plants {'ISSN': '2055-026x', 'Name': 'nature plants', '2015': '0', '2016': '10.3', '2017': '11.471', '2018': '13.297', '2019': '13.256'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: The 3-phosphoinositide-dependent protein kinase 1 (PDK1) is a conserved master regulator of AGC kinases in eukaryotic organisms. pdk1 loss of function causes a lethal phenotype in animals and yeasts, but only mild phenotypic defects in Arabidopsis thaliana (Arabidopsis). The Arabidopsis genome contains two PDK1-encoding genes, PDK1 and PDK2. Here, we used clustered regularly interspaced short palindromic repeat (CRISPR)/CRISPR-associated protein 9 (Cas9) to generate true loss-of-function pdk1 alleles, which, when combined with pdk2 alleles, showed severe developmental defects including fused cotyledons, a short primary root, dwarf stature and defects in male fertility. We obtained evidence that PDK1 is responsible for AGC1 kinase PROTEIN KINASE ASSOCIATED WITH BRX (PAX) activation by phosphorylation during vascular development, and that the PDK1 phospholipid-binding Pleckstrin Homology domain is not required for this process. Our data indicate that PDK1 regulates polar auxin transport by activating AGC1 clade kinases, resulting in PIN phosphorylation.

摘要: 3-磷酸​​肌醇依赖性蛋白激酶1（PDK1）是真核生物中保守的AGC激酶主调节剂。pdk1功能丧失在动物和酵母中导致致命的表型，但在拟南芥（Arabidopsis）中仅引起轻度的表型缺陷。拟南芥基因组包含两个PDK1编码基因，PDK1和PDK2。在这里，我们使用成簇的规则间隔的短回文重复序列（CRISPR）/CRISPR相关蛋白9（Cas9）生成真正的功能丧失的pdk1等位基因，当与pdk2等位基因结合使用时，显示出严重的发育缺陷，包括融合的子叶，初生根短，矮小和雄性育性缺陷。我们获得的证据表明，PDK1负责通过血管发育过程中的磷酸化使AGC1激酶与BRX（PAX）活化相关的蛋白激酶，并且该过程不需要PDK1磷脂结合的Pleckstrin同源域。我们的数据表明，PDK1通过激活AGC1进化枝激酶来调节极性植物生长素的运输，从而导致PIN磷酸化。

Pubmed_ID: 32393788

Synergistic effect of fasting-mimicking diet and vitamin C against KRAS mutated cancers

禁食饮食和维生素C对KRAS突变癌症的协同作用

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16243-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32393788/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/11/2020

Abstract: Fasting-mimicking diets delay tumor progression and sensitize a wide range of tumors to chemotherapy, but their therapeutic potential in combination with non-cytotoxic compounds is poorly understood. Here we show that vitamin C anticancer activity is limited by the up-regulation of the stress-inducible protein heme-oxygenase-1. The fasting-mimicking diet selectivity reverses vitamin C-induced up-regulation of heme-oxygenase-1 and ferritin in KRAS-mutant cancer cells, consequently increasing reactive iron, oxygen species, and cell death; an effect further potentiated by chemotherapy. In support of a potential role of ferritin in colorectal cancer progression, an analysis of The Cancer Genome Atlas Database indicates that KRAS mutated colorectal cancer patients with low intratumor ferritin mRNA levels display longer 3- and 5-year overall survival. Collectively, our data indicate that the combination of a fasting-mimicking diet and vitamin C represents a promising low toxicity intervention to be tested in randomized clinical trials against colorectal cancer and possibly other KRAS mutated tumors.

摘要: 禁食类似饮食可以延缓肿瘤的进展并使多种肿瘤对化学疗法敏感，但与非细胞毒性化合物联合使用时其治疗潜力知之甚少。在这里，我们显示维生素C的抗癌活性受到应激诱导蛋白血红素加氧酶-1上调的限制。禁食模仿饮食的选择逆转了维生素C诱导的KRAS突变癌细胞中血红素加氧酶-1和铁蛋白的上调，从而增加了反应性铁，氧种类和细胞死亡。通过化学疗法进一步增强的效果。为了支持铁蛋白在结直肠癌进展中的潜在作用，对癌症基因组图谱数据库的分析表明，肿瘤内铁蛋白mRNA水平低的KRAS突变结直肠癌患者显示了更长的3年和5年总生存期。总的来说，我们的数据表明，禁食模拟饮食和维生素C的组合代表了一种有前途的低毒性干预措施，将在针对结直肠癌和可能的其他KRAS突变肿瘤的随机临床试验中进行测试。

Pubmed_ID: 32393780

Immune modulation by complement receptor 3-dependent human monocyte TGF-β1-transporting vesicles

补体受体3依赖性人单核细胞TGF-β1转运囊泡的免疫调节

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16241-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32393780/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/11/2020

Abstract: Extracellular vesicles have an important function in cellular communication. Here, we show that human and mouse monocytes release TGF-β1-transporting vesicles in response to the pathogenic fungus Candida albicans. Soluble β-glucan from C. albicans binds to complement receptor 3 (CR3, also known as CD11b/CD18) on monocytes and induces the release of TGF-β1-transporting vesicles. CR3-dependence is demonstrated using CR3-deficient (CD11b knockout) monocytes generated by CRISPR-CAS9 genome editing and isolated from CR3-deficient (CD11b knockout) mice. These vesicles reduce the pro-inflammatory response in human M1-macrophages as well as in whole blood. Binding of the vesicle-transported TGF-β1 to the TGF-β receptor inhibits IL1B transcription via the SMAD7 pathway in whole blood and induces TGFB1 transcription in endothelial cells, which is resolved upon TGF-β1 inhibition. Notably, human complement-opsonized apoptotic bodies induce production of similar TGF-β1-transporting vesicles in monocytes, suggesting that the early immune response might be suppressed through this CR3-dependent anti-inflammatory vesicle pathway.

摘要: 细胞外囊泡在细胞通讯中起重要作用。在这里，我们显示人类和小鼠的单核细胞释放对病原性真菌白色念珠菌的TGF-β1转运囊泡。来自白色念珠菌的可溶性β-葡聚糖与单核细胞上的补体受体3（CR3，也称为CD11b/CD18）结合，并诱导TGF-β1转运小泡的释放。使用由CRISPR-CAS9基因组编辑生成并从CR3缺乏（CD11b敲除）小鼠中分离的CR3缺乏（CD11b敲除）单核细胞证明了CR3依赖性。这些囊泡减少了人类M1巨噬细胞以及全血中的促炎反应。囊泡运输的TGF-β1与TGF-β受体的结合抑制了全血中通过SMAD7途径的IL1B转录，并诱导了内皮细胞中的TGFB1转录，这在TGF-β1抑制后得以解决。值得注意的是，人补体调理的凋亡小体在单核细胞中诱导了类似的TGF-β1转运小泡的产生，这表明早期的免疫反应可能通过这种依赖CR3的抗炎小泡途径被抑制。

Pubmed_ID: 32393762

Multiplex precise base editing in cynomolgus monkeys

食蟹猴的多重精确碱基编辑

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16173-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32393762/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/11/2020

Abstract: Common polygenic diseases result from compounded risk contributed by multiple genetic variants, meaning that simultaneous correction or introduction of single nucleotide variants is required for disease modeling and gene therapy. Here, we show precise, efficient, and simultaneous multiplex base editing of up to three target sites across 11 genes/loci in cynomolgus monkey embryos using CRISPR-based cytidine- and adenine-base editors. Unbiased whole genome sequencing demonstrates high specificity of base editing in monkey embryos. Our data demonstrate feasibility of multiplex base editing for polygenic disease modeling in primate zygotes.

摘要: 常见的多基因疾病是由多种遗传变异引起的复合风险所致，这意味着疾病建模和基因治疗需要同时纠正或引入单核苷酸变异。在这里，我们展示了使用基于CRISPR的胞苷和腺嘌呤为基础的编辑器，对食蟹猴胚胎中11个基因/基因座中的多达三个目标位点进行了精确，高效且同时的多重碱基编辑。无偏见的全基因组测序证明了猴胚胎碱基编辑的高度特异性。我们的数据证明了在灵长类合子中进行多基因编辑的多基因疾病建模的可行性。

Pubmed_ID: 32392465

Structural and Proteomic Characterization of the Initiation of Giant Virus Infection

巨病毒感染起始的结构和蛋白质组学表征

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.04.032

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32392465/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 05/28/2020

Abstract: Since their discovery, giant viruses have expanded our understanding of the principles of virology. Due to their gargantuan size and complexity, little is known about the life cycles of these viruses. To answer outstanding questions regarding giant virus infection mechanisms, we set out to determine biomolecular conditions that promote giant virus genome release. We generated four infection intermediates in Samba virus (Mimivirus genus, lineage A) as visualized by cryoelectron microscopy (cryo-EM), cryoelectron tomography (cryo-ET), and scanning electron microscopy (SEM). Each of these four intermediates reflects similar morphology to a stage that occurs in vivo. We show that these genome release stages are conserved in other mimiviruses. Finally, we identified proteins that are released from Samba and newly discovered Tupanvirus through differential mass spectrometry. Our work revealed the molecular forces that trigger infection are conserved among disparate giant viruses. This study is also the first to identify specific proteins released during the initial stages of giant virus infection.

摘要: 自发现以来，巨型病毒扩大了我们对病毒学原理的理解。由于其庞大的规模和复杂性，人们对这些病毒的生命周期知之甚少。为了回答有关巨型病毒感染机制的悬而未决的问题，我们着手确定促进巨型病毒基因组释放的生物分子条件。我们通过冷冻电子显微镜（cryo-EM），冷冻电子体层摄影术（cryo-ET）和扫描电子显微镜（SEM）观察到了桑巴病毒（Mimivirus属，谱系A）中的四种感染中间体。这四种中间体均反映出与体内发生的阶段相似的形态。我们显示这些基因组释放阶段在其他mimiviruses中是保守的。最后，我们通过差异质谱鉴定了从Samba和新发现的Tupanvirus中释放的蛋白质。我们的工作揭示了引发感染的分子力在不同的巨型病毒中是保守的。这项研究还是第一个鉴定在巨型病毒感染初期释放的特定蛋白质的研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32391598

A draft genome of sweet cherry (Prunus avium L.) reveals genome-wide and local effects of domestication

甜樱桃（Prunus avium L.）的基因组草图揭示了驯化的全基因组和局部效应

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14809

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32391598/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Sweet cherry (Prunus avium L.) trees are both economically important fruit crops but also important components of natural forest ecosystems in Europe, Asia and Africa. Wild and domesticated trees currently coexist in the same geographic areas with important questions arising on their historical relationships. Little is known about the effects of the domestication process on the evolution of the sweet cherry genome. We assembled and annotated the genome of the cultivated variety "Big Star*" and assessed the genetic diversity among 97 sweet cherry accessions representing three different stages in the domestication and breeding process (wild trees, landraces and modern varieties). The genetic diversity analysis revealed significant genome-wide losses of variation among the three stages and supports a clear distinction between wild and domesticated trees, with only limited gene flow being detected between wild trees and domesticated landraces. We identified 11 domestication sweeps and five breeding sweeps covering, respectively, 11.0 and 2.4 Mb of the P. avium genome. A considerable fraction of the domestication sweeps overlaps with those detected in the related species, Prunus persica (peach), indicating that artificial selection during domestication may have acted independently on the same regions and genes in the two species. We detected 104 candidate genes in sweep regions involved in different processes, such as the determination of fruit texture, the regulation of flowering and fruit ripening and the resistance to pathogens. The signatures of selection identified will enable future evolutionary studies and provide a valuable resource for genetic improvement and conservation programs in sweet cherry.

摘要: 甜樱桃树（PrunusaviumL.）既是经济上重要的水果作物，又是欧洲，亚洲和非洲天然森林生态系统的重要组成部分。目前，野生树和驯养树共存于同一地理区域，但它们的历史关系存在重要问题。关于驯化过程对甜樱桃基因组进化的影响知之甚少。我们组装并注释了栽培品种“BigStar*”的基因组，并评估了97种甜樱桃的遗传多样性，这些樱桃代表了驯化和育种过程中的三个不同阶段（野生树木，地方品种和现代品种）。遗传多样性分析揭示了三个阶段之间全基因组范围内的巨大变异损失，并支持野生树和驯养树之间的明显区别，仅在野生树和驯养的地方品种之间检测到有限的基因流。我们确定了11个驯化扫描和5个育种扫描，分别覆盖了鸟疫假单胞菌基因组的11.0和2.4Mb。驯化扫描的相当一部分与相关物种桃（Prunuspersica）（桃）中检测到的重叠，表明驯化过程中的人工选择可能独立作用于两个物种的相同区域和基因。我们在涉及不同过程的扫描区域中检测到104个候选基因，例如水果质地的确定，开花和果实成熟的调节以及对病原体的抗性。确定的选择特征将有助于未来的进化研究，并为甜樱桃的遗传改良和保护计划提供宝贵的资源。

Pubmed_ID: 32391580

Ptr1 evolved convergently with RPS2 and Mr5 to mediate recognition of AvrRpt2 in diverse solanaceous species

Ptr1与RPS2和Mr5融合进化，以介导对不同茄科物种AvrRpt2的识别

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14810

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32391580/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: The Ptr1 (Pseudomonas tomato race 1) locus in Solanum lycopersicoides confers resistance to strains of Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato expressing AvrRpt2 and Ralstonia pseudosolanacearum expressing RipBN. Here we describe the identification and phylogenetic analysis of the Ptr1 gene. A single recombinant among 585 F2 plants segregating for the Ptr1 locus was discovered that narrowed the Ptr1 candidates to eight nucleotide-binding leucine-rich repeat protein (NLR)-encoding genes. From analysis of the gene models in the S. lycopersicoides genome sequence and RNA-Seq data, two of the eight genes emerged as the strongest candidates for Ptr1. One of these two candidates was found to encode Ptr1 based on its ability to mediate recognition of AvrRpt2 and RipBN when it was transiently expressed with these effectors in leaves of Nicotiana glutinosa. The ortholog of Ptr1 in tomato and in Solanum pennellii is a pseudogene. However, a functional Ptr1 ortholog exists in Nicotiana benthamiana and potato, and both mediate recognition of AvrRpt2 and RipBN. In apple and Arabidopsis, recognition of AvrRpt2 is mediated by the Mr5 and RPS2 proteins, respectively. Phylogenetic analysis places Ptr1 in a distinct clade compared with Mr5 and RPS2, and it therefore appears to have arisen by convergent evolution for recognition of AvrRpt2.

摘要: 茄属茄属中的Ptr1（假单胞菌番茄小种1）位点赋予了对丁香假单胞菌pv菌株的抗性。表达AvrRpt2的番茄和表达RipBN的假单胞菌。在这里，我们描述了Ptr1基因的鉴定和系统发育分析。发现在585个F2植物中，有一个针对Ptr1基因座的重组体，该重组体将Ptr1候选基因缩小为八个核苷酸结合亮氨酸富集重复蛋白（NLR）编码基因。通过对番茄糖链霉菌基因组序列和RNA-Seq数据中的基因模型进行分析，八个基因中的两个成为了Ptr1的最强候选基因。当这两种候选物中的一种在烟叶烟草中以这些效应子瞬时表达时，基于其介导对AvrRpt2和RipBN的识别的能力，发现其中一种编码Ptr1。番茄和茄茄中Ptr1的直系同源基因是假基因。但是，功能性Ptr1直系同源物存在于本生烟草和马铃薯中，并且两者都介导对AvrRpt2和RipBN的识别。在苹果和拟南芥中，AvrRpt2的识别分别由Mr5和RPS2蛋白介导。与Mr5和RPS2相比，系统发育分析将Ptr1置于不同的进化枝中，因此它似乎是由于融合进化而产生的，用于识别AvrRpt2。

Pubmed_ID: 32386546

A Paleogenomic Reconstruction of the Deep Population History of the Andes

安第斯山脉深层人口史的古基因组学重建

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.04.015

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32386546/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 05/28/2020

Abstract: There are many unanswered questions about the population history of the Central and South Central Andes, particularly regarding the impact of large-scale societies, such as the Moche, Wari, Tiwanaku, and Inca. We assembled genome-wide data on 89 individuals dating from ∼9,000-500 years ago (BP), with a particular focus on the period of the rise and fall of state societies. Today's genetic structure began to develop by 5,800 BP, followed by bi-directional gene flow between the North and South Highlands, and between the Highlands and Coast. We detect minimal admixture among neighboring groups between ∼2,000-500 BP, although we do detect cosmopolitanism (people of diverse ancestries living side-by-side) in the heartlands of the Tiwanaku and Inca polities. We also highlight cases of long-range mobility connecting the Andes to Argentina and the Northwest Andes to the Amazon Basin. VIDEO ABSTRACT.

摘要: 关于中部和南部中部安第斯山脉的人口历史，尤其是关于像摩切，瓦里，蒂瓦纳库和印加这样的大规模社会的影响，还有许多未解决的问题。我们收集了大约9,000-500年前（BP）的89个个体的全基因组数据，特别关注国家社会的兴衰时期。今天的遗传结构开始于5800BP，随后是北高地和南高地之间以及高地和海岸之间的双向基因流动。尽管我们确实检测到了蒂瓦纳库和印加人政治中心地带的世界主义（并存的并存祖先的人），但我们在2,000至500BP之间发现了相邻群体之间的最小混合。我们还重点介绍了将安第斯山脉连接到阿根廷和将西北安第斯山脉连接到亚马逊盆地的远程机动案例。视频摘要。

Pubmed_ID: 32385332

Negative elongation factor complex enables macrophage inflammatory responses by controlling anti-inflammatory gene expression

负伸长因子复合物通过控制抗炎基因表达使巨噬细胞发炎反应

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16209-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32385332/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/08/2020

Abstract: Studies on macrophage gene expression have historically focused on events leading to RNA polymerase II recruitment and transcription initiation, whereas the contribution of post-initiation steps to macrophage activation remains poorly understood. Here, we report that widespread promoter-proximal RNA polymerase II pausing in resting macrophages is marked by co-localization of the negative elongation factor (NELF) complex and facilitated by PU.1. Upon inflammatory stimulation, over 60% of activated transcriptome is regulated by polymerase pause-release and a transient genome-wide NELF dissociation from chromatin, unexpectedly, independent of CDK9, a presumed NELF kinase. Genetic disruption of NELF in macrophages enhanced transcription of AP-1-encoding Fos and Jun and, consequently, AP-1 targets including Il10. Augmented expression of IL-10, a critical anti-inflammatory cytokine, in turn, attenuated production of pro-inflammatory mediators and, ultimately, macrophage-mediated inflammation in vivo. Together, these findings establish a previously unappreciated role of NELF in constraining transcription of inflammation inhibitors thereby enabling inflammatory macrophage activation.

摘要: 巨噬细胞基因表达的研究历来集中于导致RNA聚合酶II募集和转录启动的事件，而启动后步骤对巨噬细胞激活的贡献仍然知之甚少。在这里，我们报道，在静止的巨噬细胞中，广泛的启动子-近端RNA聚合酶II停顿是由负延伸因子（NELF）复合体的共定位和PU.1促进的。受到炎症刺激后，超过60％的活化转录组受聚合酶暂停释放和从染色质瞬时全基因组NELF的解离调控，这出乎意料地独立于CDK9（一种假定的NELF激酶）。巨噬细胞中NELF的遗传破坏增强了编码AP-1的Fos和Jun的转录，从而增强了包括Il10在内的AP-1靶标的转录。IL-10（一种关键的抗炎细胞因子）的增强表达反过来会减低促炎介质的产生，并最终减弱体内巨噬细胞介导的炎症。在一起，这些发现建立了在抑制炎症抑制剂转录从而使炎症巨噬细胞激活方面，NELF以前未曾意识到的作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32385320

The landscape of chromothripsis across adult cancer types

跨成人癌症类型的色杆菌病景观

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16134-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32385320/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/08/2020

Abstract: Chromothripsis is a recently identified mutational phenomenon, by which a presumably single catastrophic event generates extensive genomic rearrangements of one or a few chromosome(s). Considered as an early event in tumour development, this form of genome instability plays a prominent role in tumour onset. Chromothripsis prevalence might have been underestimated when using low-resolution methods, and pan-cancer studies based on sequencing are rare. Here we analyse chromothripsis in 28 tumour types covering all major adult cancers (634 tumours, 316 whole-genome and 318 whole-exome sequences). We show that chromothripsis affects a substantial proportion of human cancers, with a prevalence of 49% across all cases. Chromothripsis generates entity-specific genomic alterations driving tumour development, including clinically relevant druggable fusions. Chromothripsis is linked with specific telomere patterns and univocal mutational signatures in distinct tumour entities. Longitudinal analysis of chromothriptic patterns in 24 matched tumour pairs reveals insights in the clonal evolution of tumours with chromothripsis.

摘要: 拟除虫菊酯是最近发现的一种突变现象，据推测，单个突变事件会产生一个或几个染色体的广泛基因组重排。被认为是肿瘤发展的早期事件，这种形式的基因组不稳定性在肿瘤发作中起着重要作用。当使用低分辨率方法时，可能会低估了钩虫病的患病率，而且基于测序的泛癌研究很少见。在这里，我们分析了涵盖所有主要成人癌症（634个肿瘤，316个全基因组和318个全外显子序列）的28种肿瘤类型中的色霉菌病。我们表明，色杆菌病影响很大比例的人类癌症，在所有病例中患病率均为49％。嗜铬菌病会产生实体特异性的基因组改变，从而推动肿瘤的发展，包括临床相关的药物融合。嗜铬菌病与特定端粒模式和不同肿瘤实体中的明确突变特征有关。在24对匹配的肿瘤对中的染色体上的模式的纵向分析揭示了在患有染色体上的模式的肿瘤的克隆进化中的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32385287

Budding yeast complete DNA synthesis after chromosome segregation begins

染色体分离开始后发芽酵母完成DNA合成

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16100-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32385287/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/08/2020

Abstract: To faithfully transmit genetic information, cells must replicate their entire genome before division. This is thought to be ensured by the temporal separation of replication and chromosome segregation. Here we show that in 20-40% of unperturbed yeast cells, DNA synthesis continues during anaphase, late in mitosis. High cyclin-Cdk activity inhibits DNA synthesis in metaphase, and the decrease in cyclin-Cdk activity during mitotic exit allows DNA synthesis to finish at subtelomeric and some difficult-to-replicate regions. DNA synthesis during late mitosis correlates with elevated mutation rates at subtelomeric regions, including copy number variation. Thus, yeast cells temporally overlap DNA synthesis and chromosome segregation during normal growth, possibly allowing cells to maximize population-level growth rate while simultaneously exploring greater genetic space.

摘要: 为了忠实地传递遗传信息，细胞必须在分裂前复制其整个基因组。认为这是通过复制和染色体分离的时间分离来确保的。在这里，我们显示出在20-40％不受干扰的酵母细胞中，DNA合成在后期，有丝分裂后期持续进行。高细胞周期蛋白Cdk活性抑制了中期的DNA合成，有丝分裂退出过程中细胞周期蛋白Cdk活性的降低使DNA合成可以在亚端粒和一些难以复制的区域完成。晚期有丝分裂期间的DNA合成与亚端粒区域的突变率升高相关，包括拷贝数变异。因此，酵母细胞在正常生长过程中在时间上会重叠DNA合成和染色体分离，这可能会使细胞最大化群体水平的生长速率，同时探索更大的遗传空间。

Pubmed_ID: 32385271

Effect of sequence depth and length in long-read assembly of the maize inbred NC358

序列深度和长度对玉米自交系NC358长读组装的影响

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16037-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32385271/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/08/2020

Abstract: Improvements in long-read data and scaffolding technologies have enabled rapid generation of reference-quality assemblies for complex genomes. Still, an assessment of critical sequence depth and read length is important for allocating limited resources. To this end, we have generated eight assemblies for the complex genome of the maize inbred line NC358 using PacBio datasets ranging from 20 to 75 × genomic depth and with N50 subread lengths of 11-21 kb. Assemblies with ≤30 × depth and N50 subread length of 11 kb are highly fragmented, with even low-copy genic regions showing degradation at 20 × depth. Distinct sequence-quality thresholds are observed for complete assembly of genes, transposable elements, and highly repetitive genomic features such as telomeres, heterochromatic knobs, and centromeres. In addition, we show high-quality optical maps can dramatically improve contiguity in even our most fragmented base assembly. This study provides a useful resource allocation reference to the community as long-read technologies continue to mature.

摘要: 长期读取的数据和脚手架技术的改进使得能够快速生成用于复杂基因组的参考质量装配。尽管如此，对关键序列深度和读取长度的评估对于分配有限的资源仍然很重要。为此，我们使用PacBio数据集（范围为20至75×基因组深度，N50亚读长度为11-21kb）为玉米自交系NC358的复杂基因组生成了八个程序集。≤30×深度和N50亚读长度为11kb的程序集高度碎片化，即使低拷贝基因区也显示出在20×深度下的降解。观察到不同的序列质量阈值，可完整组装基因，转座因子和高度重复的基因组特征，例如端粒，异色结和着丝粒。此外，我们展示了即使在我们最零碎的基础组件中，高质量的光学贴图也可以极大地改善邻接度。随着长期阅读技术的不断成熟，该研究为社区提供了有用的资源分配参考。

Pubmed_ID: 32385269

Chromosome-level assembly of the horseshoe crab genome provides insights into its genome evolution

crab基因组的染色体级组装提供了对其基因组进化的见解

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16180-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32385269/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/08/2020

Abstract: The evolutionary history of horseshoe crabs, spanning approximately 500 million years, is characterized by remarkable morphological stasis and a low species diversity with only four extant species. Here we report a chromosome-level genome assembly for the mangrove horseshoe crab (Carcinoscorpius rotundicauda) using PacBio reads and Hi-C data. The assembly spans 1.67 Gb with contig N50 of 7.8 Mb and 98% of the genome assigned to 16 chromosomes. The genome contains five Hox clusters with 34 Hox genes, the highest number reported in any invertebrate. Detailed analysis of the genome provides evidence that suggests three rounds of whole-genome duplication (WGD), raising questions about the relationship between WGD and species radiation. Several gene families, particularly those involved in innate immunity, have undergone extensive tandem duplication. These expanded gene families may be important components of the innate immune system of horseshoe crabs, whose amebocyte lysate is a sensitive agent for detecting endotoxin contamination.

摘要: crab的进化历史跨越大约5亿年，其特征在于形态停滞，物种多样性低，仅有四个现存物种。在这里，我们使用PacBio读数和Hi-C数据报告了红树林horse（Carcinoscorpiusrotundicauda）的染色体级基因组装配。装配跨度为1.67Gb，重叠群N50为7.8Mb，98％的基因组被分配给16条染色体。基因组包含5个具有34个Hox基因的Hox簇，在所有无脊椎动物中报道的数量最高。对基因组的详细分析提供了表明三轮全基因组重复（WGD）的证据，从而引发了有关WGD与物种辐射之间关系的疑问。几个基因家族，特别是那些与先天免疫有关的家族，已经进行了广泛的串联复制。这些扩展的基因家族可能是of的先天免疫系统的重要组成部分，whose细胞的变形细胞是检测内毒素污染的敏感剂。

Pubmed_ID: 32385148

Histone H3K9 methylation promotes formation of genome compartments in Caenorhabditis elegans via chromosome compaction and perinuclear anchoring

组蛋白H3K9甲基化通过染色体紧实和核周锚定促进秀丽隐杆线虫的基因组区室的形成

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2002068117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32385148/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/26/2020

Abstract: Genomic regions preferentially associate with regions of similar transcriptional activity, partitioning genomes into active and inactive compartments within the nucleus. Here we explore mechanisms controlling genome compartment organization in Caenorhabditis elegans and investigate roles for compartments in regulating gene expression. Distal arms of C. elegans chromosomes, which are enriched for heterochromatic histone modifications H3K9me1/me2/me3, interact with each other both in cis and in trans, while interacting less frequently with central regions, leading to genome compartmentalization. Arms are anchored to the nuclear periphery via the nuclear envelope protein CEC-4, which binds to H3K9me. By performing genome-wide chromosome conformation capture experiments (Hi-C), we showed that eliminating H3K9me1/me2/me3 through mutations in the methyltransferase genes met-2 and set-25 significantly impaired formation of inactive Arm and active Center compartments. cec-4 mutations also impaired compartmentalization, but to a lesser extent. We found that H3K9me promotes compartmentalization through two distinct mechanisms: Perinuclear anchoring of chromosome arms via CEC-4 to promote their cis association, and an anchoring-independent mechanism that compacts individual chromosome arms. In both met-2 set-25 and cec-4 mutants, no dramatic changes in gene expression were found for genes that switched compartments or for genes that remained in their original compartment, suggesting that compartment strength does not dictate gene-expression levels. Furthermore, H3K9me, but not perinuclear anchoring, also contributes to formation of another prominent feature of chromosome organization, megabase-scale topologically associating domains on X established by the dosage compensation condensin complex. Our results demonstrate that H3K9me plays crucial roles in regulating genome organization at multiple levels.

摘要: 基因组区域优先与具有类似转录活性的区域相关联，从而将基因组划分为核内的活动和非活动区室。在这里，我们探索控制秀丽隐杆线虫的基因组区室组织的机制，并研究区室在调节基因表达中的作用。秀丽隐杆线虫染色体的远端臂富含异色组蛋白修饰H3K9me1/me2/me3，它们在顺式和反式中都相互作用，而与中心区域的相互作用较少，从而导致基因组分隔。手臂通过与H3K9me结合的核被膜蛋白CEC-4锚定在核外围。通过执行全基因组染色体构象捕获实验（Hi-C），我们显示通过甲基转移酶基因met-2和set-25的突变消除H3K9me1/me2/me3显着削弱了非活性臂和活动中心区室的形成。cec-4突变也削弱了区室化，但程度较小。我们发现，H3K9me通过两种不同的机制促进区室化：通过CEC-4促进染色体臂的核周围锚定以促进它们的顺式缔合，以及独立于单个染色体臂的锚定独立机制。在met-2set-25和cec-4突变体中，未发现切换隔室的基因或保留在其原始隔室中的基因的基因表达发生显着变化，这表明隔室的强度并不决定基因表达水平。此外，H3K9me（但不是核周锚定）也有助于染色体组织的另一个显着特征的形成，即通过剂量补偿凝聚素复合物在X上建立的百万碱基规模的拓扑关联域。我们的结果表明，H3K9me在调节基因组组织的多个层面上起着至关重要的作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32382064

Analysis of cardiac magnetic resonance imaging in 36,000 individuals yields genetic insights into dilated cardiomyopathy

对36,000例患者的心脏磁共振成像进行分析可得出有关扩张型心肌病的遗传学见解

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15823-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32382064/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/07/2020

Abstract: Dilated cardiomyopathy (DCM) is an important cause of heart failure and the leading indication for heart transplantation. Many rare genetic variants have been associated with DCM, but common variant studies of the disease have yielded few associated loci. As structural changes in the heart are a defining feature of DCM, we report a genome-wide association study of cardiac magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)-derived left ventricular measurements in 36,041 UK Biobank participants, with replication in 2184 participants from the Multi-Ethnic Study of Atherosclerosis. We identify 45 previously unreported loci associated with cardiac structure and function, many near well-established genes for Mendelian cardiomyopathies. A polygenic score of MRI-derived left ventricular end systolic volume strongly associates with incident DCM in the general population. Even among carriers of TTN truncating mutations, this polygenic score influences the size and function of the human heart. These results further implicate common genetic polymorphisms in the pathogenesis of DCM.

摘要: 扩张型心肌病（DCM）是心力衰竭的重要原因，也是心脏移植的主要指征。DCM与许多罕见的遗传变异有关，但对该病的常见变异研究很少产生相关的基因座。由于心脏的结构变化是DCM的定义特征，因此我们报告了36041个英国生物库参与者的心脏磁共振成像（MRI）衍生的左心室测量的全基因组关联研究，其中2184个来自多种族动脉粥样硬化的研究。我们确定了45个先前未报道的与心脏结构和功能相关的基因座，孟德尔心肌病的许多近乎成熟的基因。MRI派生的左心室收缩末期容积的多基因评分与一般人群中的DCM密切相关。即使在TTN截短突变的携带者中，该多基因评分也会影响人心脏的大小和功能。这些结果进一步暗示了DCM发病机理中常见的遗传多态性。

Pubmed_ID: 32382029

Evolutionary conserved NSL complex/BRD4 axis controls transcription activation via histone acetylation

进化保守的NSL复合物/ BRD4轴通过组蛋白乙酰化控制转录激活

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16103-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32382029/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/07/2020

Abstract: Cells rely on a diverse repertoire of genes for maintaining homeostasis, but the transcriptional networks underlying their expression remain poorly understood. The MOF acetyltransferase-containing Non-Specific Lethal (NSL) complex is a broad transcription regulator. It is essential in Drosophila, and haploinsufficiency of the human KANSL1 subunit results in the Koolen-de Vries syndrome. Here, we perform a genome-wide RNAi screen and identify the BET protein BRD4 as an evolutionary conserved co-factor of the NSL complex. Using Drosophila and mouse embryonic stem cells, we characterise a recruitment hierarchy, where NSL-deposited histone acetylation enables BRD4 recruitment for transcription of constitutively active genes. Transcriptome analyses in Koolen-de Vries patient-derived fibroblasts reveals perturbations with a cellular homeostasis signature that are evoked by the NSL complex/BRD4 axis. We propose that BRD4 represents a conserved bridge between the NSL complex and transcription activation, and provide a new perspective in the understanding of their functions in healthy and diseased states.

摘要: 细胞依赖多种多样的基因来维持体内动态平衡，但是其表达基础的转录网络仍然知之甚少。包含MOF乙酰转移酶的非特异性致死（NSL）复合物是广泛的转录调节因子。它在果蝇中是必不可少的，人KANSL1亚基的单倍剂量不足会导致Koolen-deVries综合征。在这里，我们进行了全基因组的RNAi筛选，并将BET蛋白BRD4鉴定为NSL复合物的进化保守辅助因子。使用果蝇和小鼠胚胎干细胞，我们表征了募集层次，其中NSL沉积的组蛋白乙酰化使BRD4募集以激活组成性活性基因。Koolen-deVries患者来源的成纤维细胞中的转录组分析显示，NSL复合物/BRD4轴引起了细胞稳态信号的扰动。我们提出，BRD4代表了NSL复合物和转录激活之间的保守桥梁，并为了解其在健康和疾病状态下的功能提供了新的视角。

Pubmed_ID: 32380006

Microbiota-Induced Type I Interferons Instruct a Poised Basal State of Dendritic Cells

微生物群诱导的I型干扰素指示树突状细胞处于平衡的基础状态。

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.04.022

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32380006/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 05/28/2020

Abstract: Environmental signals shape host physiology and fitness. Microbiota-derived cues are required to program conventional dendritic cells (cDCs) during the steady state so that they can promptly respond and initiate adaptive immune responses when encountering pathogens. However, the molecular underpinnings of microbiota-guided instructive programs are not well understood. Here, we report that the indigenous microbiota controls constitutive production of type I interferons (IFN-I) by plasmacytoid DCs. Using genome-wide analysis of transcriptional and epigenetic regulomes of cDCs from germ-free and IFN-I receptor (IFNAR)-deficient mice, we found that tonic IFNAR signaling instructs a specific epigenomic and metabolic basal state that poises cDCs for future pathogen combat. However, such beneficial biological function comes with a trade-off. Instructed cDCs can prime T cell responses against harmless peripheral antigens when removing roadblocks of peripheral tolerance. Our data provide fresh insights into the evolutionary trade-offs that come with successful adaptation of vertebrates to their microbial environment.

摘要: 环境信号影响宿主的生理和适应能力。在稳态过程中，需要微生物来源的提示来对常规树突状细胞（cDC）进行编程，以便它们在遇到病原体时可以迅速做出反应并启动适应性免疫反应。但是，微生物群指导的教学程序的分子基础还不是很清楚。在这里，我们报告说土著微生物群控制由浆细胞样DC组成的I型干扰素（IFN-I）的组成型生产。使用来自无菌和IFN-I受体（IFNAR）缺陷小鼠的cDC转录和表观遗传调控的全基因组分析，我们发现补品IFNAR信号传导指示特定的表观基因组和代谢基础状态，为未来的病原体战斗奠定了cDC的基础。但是，这种有益的生物学功能需要权衡。当消除外周耐受的障碍时，指导性的cDC可以引发针对无害外周抗原的T细胞反应。我们的数据提供了脊椎动物在适应微生物环境中成功进行进化折衷的最新见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32376827

Disruption of ATRX-RNA interactions uncovers roles in ATRX localization and PRC2 function

ATRX-RNA相互作用的破坏揭示了ATRX定位和PRC2功能的作用

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15902-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32376827/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/06/2020

Abstract: Heterochromatin in the eukaryotic genome is rigorously controlled by the concerted action of protein factors and RNAs. Here, we investigate the RNA binding function of ATRX, a chromatin remodeler with roles in silencing of repetitive regions of the genome and in recruitment of the polycomb repressive complex 2 (PRC2). We identify ATRX RNA binding regions (RBRs) and discover that the major ATRX RBR lies within the N-terminal region of the protein, distinct from its PHD and helicase domains. Deletion of this ATRX RBR (ATRXΔRBR) compromises ATRX interactions with RNAs in vitro and in vivo and alters its chromatin binding properties. Genome-wide studies reveal that loss of RNA interactions results in a redistribution of ATRX on chromatin. Finally, our studies identify a role for ATRX-RNA interactions in regulating PRC2 localization to a subset of polycomb target genes.

摘要: 真核生物基因组中的异染色质受到蛋白质因子和RNA协同作用的严格控制。在这里，我们研究了ATRX的RNA结合功能，ATRX是一种染色质重塑剂，在基因组重复区域的沉默和多梳阻抑复合物2（PRC2）的募集中发挥作用。我们鉴定出ATRXRNA结合区（RBRs），发现主要的ATRXRBR位于蛋白质的N末端区域，与其PHD和解旋酶结构域不同。删除该ATRXRBR（ATRXΔRBR）会损害ATRX与RNA在体外和体内的相互作用，并改变其染色质结合特性。全基因组研究表明，RNA相互作用的丧失导致ATRX在染色质上的重新分布。最后，我们的研究确定了ATRX-RNA相互作用在调节PRC2定位到多梳靶基因子集方面的作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32376826

Author Correction: Whole-genome resequencing of 472 Vitis accessions for grapevine diversity and demographic history analyses

作者更正：对472种葡萄品种的全基因组重测序，以进行葡萄多样性和人口历史分析

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16254-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32376826/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/06/2020

Abstract: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.

摘要: 该文件的修订版已经发布，可以通过文件顶部的链接进行访问。

Pubmed_ID: 32371941

Segregation of an MSH1 RNAi transgene produces heritable non-genetic memory in association with methylome reprogramming

MSH1 RNAi转基因的分离产生可遗传的非基因记忆，并与甲基化组重编程相关联

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16036-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32371941/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/05/2020

Abstract: MSH1 is a plant-specific protein. RNAi suppression of MSH1 results in phenotype variability for developmental and stress response pathways. Segregation of the RNAi transgene produces non-genetic msh1 'memory' with multi-generational inheritance. First-generation memory versus non-memory comparison, and six-generation inheritance studies, identifies gene-associated, heritable methylation repatterning. Genome-wide methylome analysis integrated with RNAseq and network-based enrichment studies identifies altered circadian clock networks, and phytohormone and stress response pathways that intersect with circadian control. A total of 373 differentially methylated loci comprising these networks are sufficient to discriminate memory from nonmemory full sibs. Methylation inhibitor 5-azacytidine diminishes the differences between memory and wild type for growth, gene expression and methylation patterning. The msh1 reprogramming is dependent on functional HISTONE DEACETYLASE 6 and methyltransferase MET1, and transition to memory requires the RNA-directed DNA methylation pathway. This system of phenotypic plasticity may serve as a potent model for defining accelerated plant adaptation during environmental change.

摘要: MSH1是一种植物特异性蛋白质。RNAi对MSH1的抑制导致发育和应激反应途径的表型变异。RNAi转基因的分离产生具有多代遗传的非遗传msh1“记忆”。第一代记忆与非记忆比较，以及第六代遗传研究，确定了与基因相关的遗传性甲基化再散射。与RNAseq和基于网络的富集研究相结合的全基因组甲基化组分析可识别出昼夜节律时钟网络以及与昼夜节律控制相交的植物激素和应激反应途径。构成这些网络的总共373个差异甲基化基因座足以将内存与非内存完整同胞区分开。甲基化抑制剂5-氮杂胞苷可减少记忆力和野生型之间的差异，以促进生长，基因表达和甲基化模式。msh1的重新编程取决于功能性组氨酸DEACETYLASE6和甲基转移酶MET1，向记忆的过渡需要RNA指导的DNA甲基化途径。该表型可塑性系统可以用作定义环境变化过程中植物加速适应的有效模型。

Pubmed_ID: 32371927

Demographic and genetic factors influence the abundance of infiltrating immune cells in human tissues

人口统计学和遗传因素影响人体组织中浸润性免疫细胞的丰度

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16097-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32371927/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/05/2020

Abstract: Despite infiltrating immune cells having an essential function in human disease and patients' responses to treatments, mechanisms influencing variability in infiltration patterns remain unclear. Here, using bulk RNA-seq data from 46 tissues in the Genotype-Tissue Expression project, we apply cell-type deconvolution algorithms to evaluate the immune landscape across the healthy human body. We discover that 49 of 189 infiltration-related phenotypes are associated with either age or sex (FDR < 0.1). Genetic analyses further show that 31 infiltration-related phenotypes have genome-wide significant associations (iQTLs) (P < 5.0 × 10-8), with a significant enrichment of same-tissue expression quantitative trait loci in suggested iQTLs (P < 10-5). Furthermore, we find an association between helper T cell content in thyroid tissue and a COMMD3/DNAJC1 regulatory variant (P = 7.5 × 10-10), which is associated with thyroiditis in other cohorts. Together, our results identify key factors influencing inter-individual variability of immune infiltration, to provide insights on potential therapeutic targets.

摘要: 尽管浸润的免疫细胞在人类疾病和患者对治疗的反应中起着至关重要的作用，但影响浸润方式变异性的机制仍不清楚。在这里，使用来自基因型组织表达项目中46个组织的大量RNA-seq数据，我们应用细胞类型反卷积算法来评估整个健康人体的免疫状况。我们发现189个与浸润相关的表型中有49个与年龄或性别相关（FDR<0.1）。遗传分析进一步显示31种与浸润相关的表型具有全基因组显着关联（iQTL）（P<5.0×10-8），在建议的iQTL中显着丰富了同组织表达定量性状基因座（P<10-5））。此外，我们发现甲状腺组织中辅助性T细胞含量与COMMD3/DNAJC1调节性变体（P=7.5×10-10）之间存在关联，而后者与其他人群的甲状腺炎相关。总之，我们的结果确定了影响个体间免疫浸润变异性的关键因素，以提供有关潜在治疗靶点的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32366663

Positive epistasis between viral polymerase and the 3' untranslated region of its genome reveals the epidemiologic fitness of dengue virus

病毒聚合酶与其基因组3'非翻译区之间的阳性上位揭示了登革热病毒的流行病学适应性

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1919287117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32366663/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/19/2020

Abstract: Dengue virus (DENV) is a global health threat, causing repeated epidemics throughout the tropical world. While low herd immunity levels to any one of the four antigenic types of DENV predispose populations to outbreaks, viral genetic determinants that confer greater fitness for epidemic spread is an important but poorly understood contributor of dengue outbreaks. Here we report that positive epistasis between the coding and noncoding regions of the viral genome combined to elicit an epidemiologic fitness phenotype associated with the 1994 DENV2 outbreak in Puerto Rico. We found that five amino acid substitutions in the NS5 protein reduced viral genomic RNA (gRNA) replication rate to achieve a more favorable and relatively more abundant subgenomic flavivirus RNA (sfRNA), a byproduct of host 5'-3' exoribonuclease activity. The resulting increase in sfRNA relative to gRNA levels not only inhibited type I interferon (IFN) expression in infected cells through a previously described mechanism, but also enabled sfRNA to compete with gRNA for packaging into infectious particles. We suggest that delivery of sfRNA to new susceptible cells to inhibit type I IFN induction before gRNA replication and without the need for further de novo sfRNA synthesis could form a "preemptive strike" strategy against DENV.

摘要: 登革热病毒（DENV）是一种全球健康威胁，在整个热带世界引起反复流行。尽管对DENV的四种抗原类型中的任何一种的畜群免疫力较低，都容易使人群暴发，但赋予流行病传播更大适应性的病毒遗传决定因素是登革热暴发的重要但鲜为人知的因素。在这里，我们报告病毒基因组的编码和非编码区域之间的阳性上位相结合，引发与1994年波多黎各DENV2爆发有关的流行病学适应症表型。我们发现NS5蛋白中的五个氨基酸取代降低了病毒基因组RNA（gRNA）的复制速率，从而获得了更有利且相对更丰富的亚基因组黄病毒RNA（sfRNA），这是宿主5'-3'外切核酸酶活性的副产物。相对于gRNA水平而言，sfRNA的增加不仅通过先前描述的机制抑制了感染细胞中的I型干扰素（IFN）表达，而且使sfRNA与gRNA竞争以包装成感染性颗粒。我们建议将sfRNA传递至新的易感细胞以抑制gRNA复制之前的I型IFN诱导，并且无需进一步从头合成sfRNA可以形成针对DENV的“先发制人”策略。

Pubmed_ID: 32365353

Rapid reconstruction of SARS-CoV-2 using a synthetic genomics platform

使用合成基因组学平台快速重建SARS-CoV-2

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2294-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32365353/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: Reverse genetics has been an indispensable tool to gain insights into viral pathogenesis and vaccine development. The genomes of large RNA viruses, such as those from coronaviruses, are cumbersome to clone and manipulate in Escherichia coli owing to the size and occasional instability of the genome1-3. Therefore, an alternative rapid and robust reverse-genetics platform for RNA viruses would benefit the research community. Here we show the full functionality of a yeast-based synthetic genomics platform to genetically reconstruct diverse RNA viruses, including members of the Coronaviridae, Flaviviridae and Pneumoviridae families. Viral subgenomic fragments were generated using viral isolates, cloned viral DNA, clinical samples or synthetic DNA, and these fragments were then reassembled in one step in Saccharomyces cerevisiae using transformation-associated recombination cloning to maintain the genome as a yeast artificial chromosome. T7 RNA polymerase was then used to generate infectious RNA to rescue viable virus. Using this platform, we were able to engineer and generate chemically synthesized clones of the virus, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2)4, which has caused the recent pandemic of coronavirus disease (COVID-19), in only a week after receipt of the synthetic DNA fragments. The technical advance that we describe here facilitates rapid responses to emerging viruses as it enables the real-time generation and functional characterization of evolving RNA virus variants during an outbreak.

摘要: 逆向遗传学一直是了解病毒发病机理和疫苗开发的必不可少的工具。大RNA病毒的基因组，例如冠状病毒的基因组，由于基因组1-3的大小和偶而不稳定，很难在大肠杆菌中克隆和操纵。因此，一种替代的快速而强大的RNA病毒反向遗传学平台将使研究界受益。在这里，我们展示了基于酵母的合成基因组学平台的完整功能，可以通过遗传方式重建各种RNA病毒，包括冠状病毒科，黄病毒科和肺炎科的成员。使用病毒分离物，克隆的病毒DNA，临床样品或合成DNA生成病毒亚基因组片段，然后使用转化相关重组克隆在酿酒酵母中一步组装这些片段，以保持基因组为酵母人工染色体。然后，将T7RNA聚合酶用于产生传染性RNA，以拯救活病毒。使用该平台，我们能够在仅短短的时间内就引起严重冠状病毒病（COVID-19）的严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）4的化学合成和工程化过程中进行克隆。收到合成DNA片段后一周。我们在这里描述的技术进步促进了对新兴病毒的快速响应，因为它可以在爆发期间实时生成不断发展的RNA病毒变体并对其功能进行表征。

Pubmed_ID: 32358547

Genome-wide association study of MRI markers of cerebral small vessel disease in 42,310 participants

42,310名参与者的脑小血管疾病MRI标记物的全基因组关联研究

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15932-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32358547/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Cerebral small vessel disease is a major cause of stroke and dementia, but its genetic basis is incompletely understood. We perform a genetic study of three MRI markers of the disease in UK Biobank imaging data and other sources: white matter hyperintensities (N = 42,310), fractional anisotropy (N = 17,663) and mean diffusivity (N = 17,467). Our aim is to better understand the disease pathophysiology. Across the three traits, we identify 31 loci, of which 21 were previously unreported. We perform a transcriptome-wide association study to identify associations with gene expression in relevant tissues, identifying 66 associated genes across the three traits. This genetic study provides insights into the understanding of the biological mechanisms underlying small vessel disease.

摘要: 脑小血管疾病是中风和痴呆的主要原因，但其遗传基础尚未完全了解。我们在UKBiobank影像数据和其他来源中对该疾病的三个MRI标记物进行了遗传研究：白质超高信号（N=42,310），分数各向异性（N=17,663）和平均扩散率（N=17,467）。我们的目的是更好地了解疾病的病理生理。通过这三个特征，我们确定了31个基因座，其中21个以前未报告。我们进行了一个转录组范围内的关联研究，以鉴定与相关组织中基因表达的关联，从而确定跨越这三个性状的66个相关基因。这项遗传研究为了解小血管疾病的潜在生物学机制提供了见识。

Pubmed_ID: 32358538

Photoactivatable Cre recombinase 3.0 for in vivo mouse applications

可光激活的Cre重组酶3.0用于体内小鼠应用

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16030-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32358538/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Optogenetic genome engineering tools enable spatiotemporal control of gene expression and provide new insight into biological function. Here, we report the new version of genetically encoded photoactivatable (PA) Cre recombinase, PA-Cre 3.0. To improve PA-Cre technology, we compare light-dimerization tools and optimize for mammalian expression using a CAG promoter, Magnets, and 2A self-cleaving peptide. To prevent background recombination caused by the high sequence similarity in the dimerization domains, we modify the codons for mouse gene targeting and viral production. Overall, these modifications significantly reduce dark leak activity and improve blue-light induction developing our new version, PA-Cre 3.0. As a resource, we have generated and validated AAV-PA-Cre 3.0 as well as two mouse lines that can conditionally express PA-Cre 3.0. Together these new tools will facilitate further biological and biomedical research.

摘要: 光遗传基因组工程工具可实现基因表达的时空控制，并提供对生物学功能的新见解。在这里，我们报告新版本的基因编码的光激活（PA）Cre重组酶，PA-Cre3.0。为了改善PA-Cre技术，我们比较了光二聚化工具，并使用CAG启动子，磁铁和2A自裂解肽优化了哺乳动物的表达。为了防止由二聚化域中的高序列相似性引起的背景重组，我们修改了用于小鼠基因靶向和病毒生产的密码子。总的来说，这些改进极大地减少了暗泄漏活动，并改善了我们的新版本PA-Cre3.0的蓝光感应。作为一种资源，我们已经生成并验证了AAV-PA-Cre3.0以及两条可以有条件表达PA-Cre3.0的小鼠品系。这些新工具将共同促进进一步的生物学和生物医学研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32358536

Ultrastructural visualization of 3D chromatin folding using volume electron microscopy and DNA in situ hybridization

使用体积电子显微镜和DNA原位杂交技术对3D染色质折叠进行超微结构可视化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15987-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32358536/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: The human genome is extensively folded into 3-dimensional organization. However, the detailed 3D chromatin folding structures have not been fully visualized due to the lack of robust and ultra-resolution imaging capability. Here, we report the development of an electron microscopy method that combines serial block-face scanning electron microscopy with in situ hybridization (3D-EMISH) to visualize 3D chromatin folding at targeted genomic regions with ultra-resolution (5 × 5 × 30 nm in xyz dimensions) that is superior to the current super-resolution by fluorescence light microscopy. We apply 3D-EMISH to human lymphoblastoid cells at a 1.7 Mb segment of the genome and visualize a large number of distinctive 3D chromatin folding structures in ultra-resolution. We further quantitatively characterize the reconstituted chromatin folding structures by identifying sub-domains, and uncover a high level heterogeneity of chromatin folding ultrastructures in individual nuclei, suggestive of extensive dynamic fluidity in 3D chromatin states.

摘要: 人类基因组被广泛折叠成3维组织。但是，由于缺少强大且超分辨率的成像功能，因此尚未完全看到详细的3D染色质折叠结构。在这里，我们报告了一种电子显微镜方法的发展，该方法将串行块面扫描电子显微镜与原位杂交（3D-EMISH）相结合，以超分辨率（5×5×30nm）可视化目标基因组区域的3D染色质折叠。xyz尺寸）优于荧光显微镜当前的超分辨率。我们将3D-EMISH用于基因组1.7Mb片段的人类淋巴母细胞，并以超分辨率可视化大量独特的3D染色质折叠结构。我们通过鉴定亚结构域进一步定量表征了重组的染色质折叠结构，并揭示了单个核中染色质折叠超结构的高水平异质性，这表明在3D染色质状态中存在广泛的动态流动性。

Pubmed_ID: 32358516

Mutational signatures are jointly shaped by DNA damage and repair

DNA损伤和修复共同形成突变特征

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15912-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32358516/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Cells possess an armamentarium of DNA repair pathways to counter DNA damage and prevent mutation. Here we use C. elegans whole genome sequencing to systematically quantify the contributions of these factors to mutational signatures. We analyse 2,717 genomes from wild-type and 53 DNA repair defective backgrounds, exposed to 11 genotoxins, including UV-B and ionizing radiation, alkylating compounds, aristolochic acid, aflatoxin B1, and cisplatin. Combined genotoxic exposure and DNA repair deficiency alters mutation rates or signatures in 41% of experiments, revealing how different DNA alterations induced by the same genotoxin are mended by separate repair pathways. Error-prone translesion synthesis causes the majority of genotoxin-induced base substitutions, but averts larger deletions. Nucleotide excision repair prevents up to 99% of point mutations, almost uniformly across the mutation spectrum. Our data show that mutational signatures are joint products of DNA damage and repair and suggest that multiple factors underlie signatures observed in cancer genomes.

摘要: 细胞拥有DNA修复途径的装备，可以抵抗DNA损伤并防止突变。在这里，我们使用秀丽隐杆线虫全基因组测序来系统地量化这些因素对突变特征的贡献。我们分析了野生型和53个DNA修复缺陷背景下的2,717个基因组，这些背景暴露于11种基因毒素，包括UV-B和电离辐射，烷基化化合物，马兜铃酸，黄曲霉毒素B1和顺铂。遗传毒性暴露和DNA修复缺陷的组合在41％的实验中改变了突变率或特征，揭示了相同基因毒素诱导的不同DNA改变是如何通过单独的修复途径修复的。容易出错的病变合成会导致大多数由基因毒素诱导的碱基取代，但避免了较大的缺失。核苷酸切除修复可防止多达99％的点突变，几乎可以在整个突变谱范围内一致地进行。我们的数据表明，突变特征是DNA损伤和修复的共同产物，并且表明在癌症基因组中观察到的特征是多种因素的基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32358503

SYNERGISTIC ON AUXIN AND CYTOKININ 1 positively regulates growth and attenuates soil pathogen resistance

协同作用的AUXIN和细胞分裂素1积极调节生长并减弱土壤病原体抗性

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15895-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32358503/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Plants as non-mobile organisms constantly integrate varying environmental signals to flexibly adapt their growth and development. Local fluctuations in water and nutrient availability, sudden changes in temperature or other abiotic and biotic stresses can trigger changes in the growth of plant organs. Multiple mutually interconnected hormonal signaling cascades act as essential endogenous translators of these exogenous signals in the adaptive responses of plants. Although the molecular backbones of hormone transduction pathways have been identified, the mechanisms underlying their interactions are largely unknown. Here, using genome wide transcriptome profiling we identify an auxin and cytokinin cross-talk component; SYNERGISTIC ON AUXIN AND CYTOKININ 1 (SYAC1), whose expression in roots is strictly dependent on both of these hormonal pathways. We show that SYAC1 is a regulator of secretory pathway, whose enhanced activity interferes with deposition of cell wall components and can fine-tune organ growth and sensitivity to soil pathogens.

摘要: 作为非移动生物的植物不断整合各种环境信号，以灵活地适应其生长发育。水和养分利用率的局部波动，温度的突然变化或其他非生物和生物胁迫都可能触发植物器官生长的变化。在植物的适应性反应中，多个相互连接的激素信号级联反应充当这些外源信号的重要内源翻译器。尽管已经确定了激素转导途径的分子骨架，但它们相互作用的基本机制尚不清楚。在这里，使用全基因组转录组谱分析，我们确定了生长素和细胞分裂素的串扰成分。协同作用于AUXIN和细胞分裂素1（SYAC1），其在根中的表达严格取决于这两种激素途径。我们显示SYAC1是分泌途径的调节剂，其增强的活性会干扰细胞壁成分的沉积，并可以微调器官的生长和对土壤病原体的敏感性。

Pubmed_ID: 32358487

Recent hybrids recapitulate ancient hybrid outcomes

最近的杂种总结了古代杂种的成果

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15641-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32358487/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Genomic outcomes of hybridization depend on selection and recombination in hybrids. Whether these processes have similar effects on hybrid genome composition in contemporary hybrid zones versus ancient hybrid lineages is unknown. Here we show that patterns of introgression in a contemporary hybrid zone in Lycaeides butterflies predict patterns of ancestry in geographically adjacent, older hybrid populations. We find a particularly striking lack of ancestry from one of the hybridizing taxa, Lycaeides melissa, on the Z chromosome in both the old and contemporary hybrids. The same pattern of reduced L. melissa ancestry on the Z chromosome is seen in two other ancient hybrid lineages. More generally, we find that patterns of ancestry in old or ancient hybrids are remarkably predictable from contemporary hybrids, which suggests selection and recombination affect hybrid genomes in a similar way across disparate time scales and during distinct stages of speciation and species breakdown.

摘要: 杂交的基因组结果取决于杂种的选择和重组。这些过程是否对当代杂种区和古代杂种谱系的杂种基因组组成有类似影响尚不清楚。在这里，我们显示在Lycaeides蝴蝶的当代杂种区中的渗入模式可预测地理上相邻的较早杂种种群中的祖先模式。我们发现，无论是旧杂交种还是现代杂交种，Z染色体上的杂交类群之一Lycaeidesmelissa都没有明显的祖先。在其他两个古老的杂种谱系中也观察到了Z染色体上的蜜蜂蜜蜂祖先减少的相同模式。更普遍地说，我们发现，从现代杂种中可以明显地预测出古老或古代杂种的祖先模式，这表明选择和重组会在不同的时间尺度上以及物种形成和物种分解的不同阶段以相似的方式影响杂种基因组。

Pubmed_ID: 32358197

Genome organization and interaction with capsid protein in a multipartite RNA virus

基因组组织以及与多部分RNA病毒中衣壳蛋白的相互作用

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1915078117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32358197/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/19/2020

Abstract: We report the asymmetric reconstruction of the single-stranded RNA (ssRNA) content in one of the three otherwise identical virions of a multipartite RNA virus, brome mosaic virus (BMV). We exploit a sample consisting exclusively of particles with the same RNA content-specifically, RNAs 3 and 4-assembled in planta by agrobacterium-mediated transient expression. We find that the interior of the particle is nearly empty, with most of the RNA genome situated at the capsid shell. However, this density is disordered in the sense that the RNA is not associated with any particular structure but rather, with an ensemble of secondary/tertiary structures that interact with the capsid protein. Our results illustrate a fundamental difference between the ssRNA organization in the multipartite BMV viral capsid and the monopartite bacteriophages MS2 and Qβ for which a dominant RNA conformation is found inside the assembled viral capsids, with RNA density conserved even at the center of the particle. This can be understood in the context of the differing demands on their respective lifecycles: BMV must package separately each of several different RNA molecules and has been shown to replicate and package them in isolated, membrane-bound, cytoplasmic complexes, whereas the bacteriophages exploit sequence-specific "packaging signals" throughout the viral RNA to package their monopartite genomes.

摘要: 我们报告了多链RNA病毒，布鲁姆花叶病毒（BMV）的三个否则相同的病毒体之一中的单链RNA（ssRNA）内容的不对称重建。我们利用仅由具有相同RNA含量的颗粒组成的样品，具体而言，是通过农杆菌介导的瞬时表达在植物中组装的RNA3和4。我们发现粒子的内部几乎是空的，大多数RNA基因组位于衣壳壳中。然而，从RNA不与任何特定结构相关，而是与与衣壳蛋白相互作用的二级/三级结构的整体相关的意义上讲，这种密度是无序的。我们的结果说明了多部分BMV病毒衣壳中的ssRNA组织与单部分噬菌体MS2和Qβ之间的根本区别，即在组装的病毒衣壳内部发现了占优势的RNA构象，即使在颗粒的中心也保持了RNA密度。在对它们各自的生命周期的不同要求的背景下可以理解这一点：BMV必须分别包装几个不同的RNA分子中的每一个，并且已被证明可以将它们复制并包装在分离的，膜结合的细胞质复合物中，而噬菌体则利用序列整个病毒RNA中具有特异性的“包装信号”，以包装其单基因组基因组。

Pubmed_ID: 32355288

The ChinaMAP analytics of deep whole genome sequences in 10,588 individuals

ChinaMAP分析10588个人的深层全基因组序列

DOI: 10.1038/s41422-020-0322-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32355288/

Journal: Cell research {'ISSN': '1001-0602', 'Name': 'cell research', '2015': '14.812', '2016': '15.606', '2017': '15.393', '2018': '17.848', '2019': '20.507'}

Date: 2020 Sep

Abstract: Metabolic diseases are the most common and rapidly growing health issues worldwide. The massive population-based human genetics is crucial for the precise prevention and intervention of metabolic disorders. The China Metabolic Analytics Project (ChinaMAP) is based on cohort studies across diverse regions and ethnic groups with metabolic phenotypic data in China. Here, we describe the centralized analysis of the deep whole genome sequencing data and the genetic bases of metabolic traits in 10,588 individuals from the ChinaMAP. The frequency spectrum of variants, population structure, pathogenic variants and novel genomic characteristics were analyzed. The individual genetic evaluations of Mendelian diseases, nutrition and drug metabolism, and traits of blood glucose and BMI were integrated. Our study establishes a large-scale and deep resource for the genetics of East Asians and provides opportunities for novel genetic discoveries of metabolic characteristics and disorders.

摘要: 代谢性疾病是世界范围内最常见且增长迅速的健康问题。大量基于人群的人类遗传学对于精确预防和干预代谢异常至关重要。中国代谢分析项目（ChinaMAP）是基于对跨地区和不同种族群体的队列研究，并具有中国的代谢表型数据。在这里，我们描述了对来自ChinaMAP的10,588个人的深层全基因组测序数据和代谢性状遗传基础的集中分析。分析了变异的频谱，种群结构，致病变异和新的基因组特征。对孟德尔疾病，营养和药物代谢以及血糖和BMI的特征进行了个体遗传学评估。我们的研究为东亚人的遗传学建立了广泛而深入的资源，并为新陈代谢特征和疾病的遗传发现提供了机会。

Pubmed_ID: 32355286

N 6-methyladenine is incorporated into mammalian genome by DNA polymerase

N 6-甲基腺嘌呤通过DNA聚合酶掺入哺乳动物基因组

Toward Precision Genome Editing in Crop Plants

致力于作物中精确基因组编辑

Pubmed_ID: 32353626

The Chromosome-Level Reference Genome of Tea Tree Unveils Recent Bursts of Non-autonomous LTR Retrotransposons in Driving Genome Size Evolution

茶树的染色体水平参考基因组揭示了驱动基因组大小进化的非自主LTR逆转座子的最新爆发。

DOI: 10.1016/j.molp.2020.04.009

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32353626/

Journal: Molecular plant {'ISSN': '1674-2052', 'Name': 'molecular plant', '2015': '7.142', '2016': '8.827', '2017': '9.326', '2018': '10.812', '2019': '12.084'}
