Pubmed_ID: 32353625

The Reference Genome of Tea Plant and Resequencing of 81 Diverse Accessions Provide Insights into Its Genome Evolution and Adaptation

茶树的参考基因组和81种不同种质的重新测序可洞察其基因组的进化和适应

DOI: 10.1016/j.molp.2020.04.010

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32353625/

Journal: Molecular plant {'ISSN': '1674-2052', 'Name': 'molecular plant', '2015': '7.142', '2016': '8.827', '2017': '9.326', '2018': '10.812', '2019': '12.084'}

Date: 07/06/2020

Abstract: Tea plant is an important economic crop, which is used to produce the world's oldest and most widely consumed tea beverages. Here, we present a high-quality reference genome assembly of the tea plant (Camellia sinensis var. sinensis) consisting of 15 pseudo-chromosomes. LTR retrotransposons (LTR-RTs) account for 70.38% of the genome, and we present evidence that LTR-RTs play critical roles in genome size expansion and the transcriptional diversification of tea plant genes through preferential insertion in promoter regions and introns. Genes, particularly those coding for terpene biosynthesis proteins, associated with tea aroma and stress resistance were significantly amplified through recent tandem duplications and exist as gene clusters in tea plant genome. Phylogenetic analysis of the sequences of 81 tea plant accessions with diverse origins revealed three well-differentiated tea plant populations, supporting the proposition for the southwest origin of the Chinese cultivated tea plant and its later spread to western Asia through introduction. Domestication and modern breeding left significant signatures on hundreds of genes in the tea plant genome, particularly those associated with tea quality and stress resistance. The genomic sequences of the reported reference and resequenced tea plant accessions provide valuable resources for future functional genomics study and molecular breeding of improved cultivars of tea plants.

摘要: 茶树是重要的经济作物，被用来生产世界上最古老，消费最广泛的茶饮料。在这里，我们介绍了由15个假染色体组成的茶树（茶树（Camelliasinensisvar。sinensis））的高质量参考基因组组装。LTR逆转座子（LTR-RTs）占基因组的70.38％，我们提供的证据表明LTR-RTs通过优先插入启动子区域和内含子，在基因组大小扩展和茶树基因的转录多样化中起关键作用。与茶香气和抗逆性有关的基因，特别是编码萜烯生物合成蛋白的基因，通过最近的串联复制得到了显着扩增，并以基因簇的形式存在于茶树基因组中。对81种不同起源的茶树种的序列进行系统进化分析，发现了3种高度分化的茶树种群，支持了中国栽培茶树的西南起源的主张，并通过引入而传播到了西亚。驯化和现代育种在茶树基因组中的数百个基因上留下了重要的特征，特别是与茶品质和抗逆性有关的基因。已报道的参考文献和重新排序的茶树种的基因组序列为将来的功能基因组学研究和茶树改良品种的分子育种提供了宝贵的资源。

Pubmed_ID: 32352532

The gene-rich genome of the scallop Pecten maximus

扇贝大花蜜的丰富基因组基因组

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa037

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32352532/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: Background: The king scallop, Pecten maximus, is distributed in shallow waters along the Atlantic coast of Europe. It forms the basis of a valuable commercial fishery and plays a key role in coastal ecosystems and food webs. Like other filter feeding bivalves it can accumulate potent phytotoxins, to which it has evolved some immunity. The molecular origins of this immunity are of interest to evolutionary biologists, pharmaceutical companies, and fisheries management. Findings: Here we report the genome assembly of this species, conducted as part of the Wellcome Sanger 25 Genomes Project. This genome was assembled from PacBio reads and scaffolded with 10X Chromium and Hi-C data. Its 3,983 scaffolds have an N50 of 44.8 Mb (longest scaffold 60.1 Mb), with 92% of the assembly sequence contained in 19 scaffolds, corresponding to the 19 chromosomes found in this species. The total assembly spans 918.3 Mb and is the best-scaffolded marine bivalve genome published to date, exhibiting 95.5% recovery of the metazoan BUSCO set. Gene annotation resulted in 67,741 gene models. Analysis of gene content revealed large numbers of gene duplicates, as previously seen in bivalves, with little gene loss, in comparison with the sequenced genomes of other marine bivalve species. Conclusions: The genome assembly of P. maximus and its annotated gene set provide a high-quality platform for studies on such disparate topics as shell biomineralization, pigmentation, vision, and resistance to algal toxins. As a result of our findings we highlight the sodium channel gene Nav1, known to confer resistance to saxitoxin and tetrodotoxin, as a candidate for further studies investigating immunity to domoic acid.

摘要: 背景：扇贝王（Pectenmaximus）扇贝分布在欧洲大西洋沿岸的浅水区。它构成有价值的商业渔业的基础，并在沿海生态系统和食物网中发挥关键作用。像其他滤食性双壳类动物一样，它可以积累有效的植物毒素，并且已经对其产生了一定的免疫力。这种免疫的分子起源是进化生物学家，制药公司和渔业管理感兴趣的。调查结果：在这里，我们报告了该物种的基因组组装，这是作为WellcomeSanger25基因组计划的一部分进行的。该基因组由PacBio读数组装而成，并带有10XChromium和Hi-C数据支架。它的3,983个支架的N50为44.8Mb（最长的支架为60.1Mb），其中19个支架包含92％的装配序列，对应于该物种中发现的19条染色体。总装配跨度为918.3Mb，是迄今为止发布的支架最好的海洋双壳类基因组，其后生动物BUSCO集的回收率达到95.5％。基因注释产生了67,741个基因模型。基因含量的分析显示，与其他海洋双壳类物种的测序基因组相比，双壳类中以前见过大量基因重复，而基因损失很少。结论：极大假单胞菌的基因组装配及其带注释的基因集为研究诸如贝壳生物矿化，色素沉着，视觉和对藻毒素的抗性等不同主题提供了一个高质量的平台。由于我们的发现，我们强调了已知可赋予对毒素和河豚毒素抗性的钠通道基因Nav1，作为进一步研究对杜摩酸的免疫力的候选药物。

Pubmed_ID: 32350471

The mutational landscape of normal human endometrial epithelium

正常人子宫内膜上皮的突变情况

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2214-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32350471/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: All normal somatic cells are thought to acquire mutations, but understanding of the rates, patterns, causes and consequences of somatic mutations in normal cells is limited. The uterine endometrium adopts multiple physiological states over a lifetime and is lined by a gland-forming epithelium1,2. Here, using whole-genome sequencing, we show that normal human endometrial glands are clonal cell populations with total mutation burdens that increase at about 29 base substitutions per year and that are many-fold lower than those of endometrial cancers. Normal endometrial glands frequently carry 'driver' mutations in cancer genes, the burden of which increases with age and decreases with parity. Cell clones with drivers often originate during the first decades of life and subsequently progressively colonize the epithelial lining of the endometrium. Our results show that mutational landscapes differ markedly between normal tissues-perhaps shaped by differences in their structure and physiology-and indicate that the procession of neoplastic change that leads to endometrial cancer is initiated early in life.

摘要: 人们认为所有正常的体细胞都具有突变，但是对正常细胞中体细胞突变的发生率，模式，原因和后果的了解是有限的。子宫内膜在一生中采用多种生理状态，并被形成腺体的上皮1,2所衬。在这里，使用全基因组测序，我们显示正常人子宫内膜腺体是克隆细胞群，其总突变负担每年以约29个碱基取代增加，并且比子宫内膜癌低很多倍。正常子宫内膜腺体经常在癌症基因中携带“驱动”突变，其负担随着年龄的增长而增加，而随着胎次的减少而减少。具有驱动因子的细胞克隆通常起源于生命的最初几十年，然后逐渐在子宫内膜的上皮内层定植。我们的研究结果表明，正常组织之间的突变态势存在显着差异（可能是由于其结构和生理差异而形成的），并表明导致子宫内膜癌的肿瘤改变过程是在生命的早期开始的。

Pubmed_ID: 32350470

Nucleosome-bound SOX2 and SOX11 structures elucidate pioneer factor function

核小体结合的SOX2和SOX11结构阐明了先驱因子的功能

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2195-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32350470/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: 'Pioneer' transcription factors are required for stem-cell pluripotency, cell differentiation and cell reprogramming1,2. Pioneer factors can bind nucleosomal DNA to enable gene expression from regions of the genome with closed chromatin. SOX2 is a prominent pioneer factor that is essential for pluripotency and self-renewal of embryonic stem cells3. Here we report cryo-electron microscopy structures of the DNA-binding domains of SOX2 and its close homologue SOX11 bound to nucleosomes. The structures show that SOX factors can bind and locally distort DNA at superhelical location 2. The factors also facilitate detachment of terminal nucleosomal DNA from the histone octamer, which increases DNA accessibility. SOX-factor binding to the nucleosome can also lead to a repositioning of the N-terminal tail of histone H4 that includes residue lysine 16. We speculate that this repositioning is incompatible with higher-order nucleosome stacking, which involves contacts of the H4 tail with a neighbouring nucleosome. Our results indicate that pioneer transcription factors can use binding energy to initiate chromatin opening, and thereby facilitate nucleosome remodelling and subsequent transcription.

摘要: 干细胞多能性，细胞分化和细胞重编程1,2需要“先锋”转录因子。先锋因子可以与核小体DNA结合，从而能够从具有封闭染色质的基因组区域表达基因。SOX2是一个突出的先驱因素，对胚胎干细胞的多能性和自我更新至关重要。在这里，我们报告的SOX2的DNA结合域及其与核小体紧密同源SOX11的低温电子显微镜结构。结构表明SOX因子可以结合超螺旋位置2上的DNA并使其局部变形。这些因子还促进末端核小体DNA与组蛋白八聚体的分离，从而增加了DNA的可及性。SOX因子与核小体的结合还可导致组蛋白H4的N末端尾巴（包括赖氨酸16残基）发生重定位。我们推测这种重定位与高阶核小体堆叠不兼容，后者涉及H4尾巴与邻近的核小体。我们的结果表明，先驱转录因子可以利用结合能来启动染色质的开放，从而促进核小体的重塑和随后的转录。

Pubmed_ID: 32350251

Synthetic hybrids of six yeast species

六种酵母的合成杂种

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15559-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32350251/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/29/2020

Abstract: Allopolyploidy generates diversity by increasing the number of copies and sources of chromosomes. Many of the best-known evolutionary radiations, crops, and industrial organisms are ancient or recent allopolyploids. Allopolyploidy promotes differentiation and facilitates adaptation to new environments, but the tools to test its limits are lacking. Here we develop an iterative method of Hybrid Production (iHyPr) to combine the genomes of multiple budding yeast species, generating Saccharomyces allopolyploids of at least six species. When making synthetic hybrids, chromosomal instability and cell size increase dramatically as additional copies of the genome are added. The six-species hybrids initially grow slowly, but they rapidly regain fitness and adapt, even as they retain traits from multiple species. These new synthetic yeast hybrids and the iHyPr method have potential applications for the study of polyploidy, genome stability, chromosome segregation, and bioenergy.

摘要: 异源多倍体通过增加染色体的拷贝数和来源来产生多样性。许多最著名的进化辐射，农作物和工业生物都是古老的或最近的同素多倍体。异源多倍体可促进分化并促进对新环境的适应，但缺乏测试其极限的工具。在这里，我们开发了一种杂交生产（iHyPr）的迭代方法，可以结合多个萌芽酵母物种的基因组，生成至少六个物种的酵母异源多倍体。当制作合成杂种时，染色体的不稳定性和细胞大小会随着添加基因组的其他副本而急剧增加。六种杂种起初生长缓慢，但是即使它们保留了多个物种的性状，它们仍能迅速恢复健康并适应。这些新的合成酵母杂种和iHyPr方法在研究多倍性，基因组稳定性，染色体分离和生物能方面具有潜在的应用。

Pubmed_ID: 32350249

Targeting codon 158 p53-mutant cancers via the induction of p53 acetylation

通过诱导p53乙酰化靶向158个p53突变密码子癌症

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15608-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32350249/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/29/2020

Abstract: Gain of function (GOF) DNA binding domain (DBD) mutations of TP53 upregulate chromatin regulatory genes that promote genome-wide histone methylation and acetylation. Here, we therapeutically exploit the oncogenic GOF mechanisms of p53 codon 158 (Arg158) mutation, a DBD mutant found to be prevalent in lung carcinomas. Using high throughput compound screening and combination analyses, we uncover that acetylating mutp53R158G could render cancers susceptible to cisplatin-induced DNA stress. Acetylation of mutp53R158G alters DNA binding motifs and upregulates TRAIP, a RING domain-containing E3 ubiquitin ligase which dephosphorylates IĸB and impedes nuclear translocation of RelA (p65), thus repressing oncogenic nuclear factor kappa-B (NF-ĸB) signaling and inducing apoptosis. Given that this mechanism of cytotoxic vulnerability appears inapt in p53 wild-type (WT) or other hotspot GOF mutp53 cells, our work provides a therapeutic opportunity specific to Arg158-mutp53 tumors utilizing a regimen consisting of DNA-damaging agents and mutp53 acetylators, which is currently being pursued clinically.

摘要: TP53的功能获得（GOF）DNA结合域（DBD）突变上调了染色质调节基因，从而促进了全基因组组蛋白的甲基化和乙酰化。在这里，我们治疗性地利用了p53密码子158（Arg158）突变的致癌GOF机制，该突变是在肺癌中普遍存在的DBD突变。使用高通量化合物筛选和组合分析，我们发现乙酰化mutp53R158G可使癌症易受顺铂诱导的DNA胁迫。乙酰化mutp53R158G会改变DNA结合基序并上调TRAIP，这是一个含RING域的E3泛素连接酶，可将IĸB磷酸化并阻止RelA的核易位（p65），从而抑制致癌核因子κB（NF-ĸB）信号传导并诱导凋亡。鉴于这种细胞毒性脆弱性机制似乎不适用于p53野生型（WT）或其他热点GOFmutp53细胞，我们的工作提供了一种针对Arg158-mutp53肿瘤的治疗机会，利用由DNA破坏剂和mutp53乙酰化剂组成的方案，目前正在临床上进行。

Pubmed_ID: 32350247

Haplotype-resolved genomes provide insights into structural variation and gene content in Angus and Brahman cattle

单倍型解析的基因组提供了对安格斯和婆罗门牛的结构变异和基因含量的见解

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15848-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32350247/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/29/2020

Abstract: Inbred animals were historically chosen for genome analysis to circumvent assembly issues caused by haplotype variation but this resulted in a composite of the two genomes. Here we report a haplotype-aware scaffolding and polishing pipeline which was used to create haplotype-resolved, chromosome-level genome assemblies of Angus (taurine) and Brahman (indicine) cattle subspecies from contigs generated by the trio binning method. These assemblies reveal structural and copy number variants that differentiate the subspecies and that variant detection is sensitive to the specific reference genome chosen. Six genes with immune related functions have additional copies in the indicine compared with taurine lineage and an indicus-specific extra copy of fatty acid desaturase is under positive selection. The haplotyped genomes also enable transcripts to be phased to detect allele-specific expression. This work exemplifies the value of haplotype-resolved genomes to better explore evolutionary and functional variations.

摘要: 历史上选择近交动物进行基因组分析，以避免单倍型变异引起的装配问题，但这导致了两个基因组的复合。在这里，我们报告了一个了解单倍型的脚手架和抛光管道，该管道用于从三重分箱方法生成的重叠群中创建安格斯（牛磺酸）和婆罗门（印度）牛亚种的单倍型分辨的，染色体水平的基因组组装体。这些装配揭示了区分亚种的结构和拷贝数变体，并且变体检测对所选的特定参考基因组敏感。与牛磺酸谱系相比，六个具有免疫相关功能的基因在标记中具有额外的拷贝，并且脂肪酸去饱和酶的标记特异性的额外拷贝处于阳性选择之下。单倍型基因组还使转录本能够被分阶段检测等位基因特异性表达。这项工作例证了单倍型解析的基因组的价值，以更好地探索进化和功能变异。

Pubmed_ID: 32349163

Genotypic and phenotypic characterization of a large, diverse population of maize near-isogenic lines

大量不同玉米近等基因系的基因型和表型特征

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14787

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32349163/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Genome-wide association (GWA) studies can identify quantitative trait loci (QTL) putatively underlying traits of interest, and nested association mapping (NAM) can further assess allelic series. Near-isogenic lines (NILs) can be used to characterize, dissect and validate QTL, but the development of NILs is costly. Previous studies have utilized limited numbers of NILs and introgression donors. We characterized a panel of 1270 maize NILs derived from crosses between 18 diverse inbred lines and the recurrent inbred parent B73, referred to as the nested NILs (nNILs). The nNILs were phenotyped for flowering time, height and resistance to three foliar diseases, and genotyped with genotyping-by-sequencing. Across traits, broad-sense heritability (0.4-0.8) was relatively high. The 896 genotyped nNILs contain 2638 introgressions, which span the entire genome with substantial overlap within and among allele donors. GWA with the whole panel identified 29 QTL for height and disease resistance with allelic variation across donors. To date, this is the largest and most diverse publicly available panel of maize NILs to be phenotypically and genotypically characterized. The nNILs are a valuable resource for the maize community, providing an extensive collection of introgressions from the founders of the maize NAM population in a B73 background combined with data on six agronomically important traits and from genotyping-by-sequencing. We demonstrate that the nNILs can be used for QTL mapping and allelic testing. The majority of nNILs had four or fewer introgressions, and could readily be used for future fine mapping studies.

摘要: 全基因组关联（GWA）研究可以确定潜在的特征性状的数量性状基因座（QTL），而嵌套关联映射（NAM）可以进一步评估等位基因系列。近等基因系（NIL）可用于表征，解剖和验证QTL，但NIL的开发成本很高。先前的研究仅使用了数量有限的NIL和基因渗入供体。我们对1270个玉米NIL进行了特征鉴定，它们来自18个不同的近交系与轮回自交亲本B73之间的杂交，被称为嵌套NIL（nNIL）。通过开花时间，高度和对三种叶面疾病的抗性对nNILs进行表型分析，并通过测序进行基因分型。在所有性状中，广义遗传力（0.4-0.8）相对较高。896个基因型nNIL包含2638个基因渗入，这些基因渗入整个基因组，在等位基因供体之内和之间存在实质性重叠。GWA和整个小组确定了29个QTL的身高和抗病性，各供体之间存在等位基因变异。迄今为止，这是在表型和基因型上表征的最大的，最多样化的公众可获得的玉米NIL。nNIL是玉米社区的宝贵资源，它提供了B73背景下玉米NAM种群创始人的大量基因渗入，并结合了六个农学重要性状和测序基因分型。我们证明了nNILs可用于QTL定位和等位基因测试。大多数nNIL具有4个或更少的基因渗入，可以很容易地用于将来的精细作图研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32349121

Massively multiplexed nucleic acid detection with Cas13

使用Cas13进行大规模多重核酸检测

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2279-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32349121/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: The great majority of globally circulating pathogens go undetected, undermining patient care and hindering outbreak preparedness and response. To enable routine surveillance and comprehensive diagnostic applications, there is a need for detection technologies that can scale to test many samples1-3 while simultaneously testing for many pathogens4-6. Here, we develop Combinatorial Arrayed Reactions for Multiplexed Evaluation of Nucleic acids (CARMEN), a platform for scalable, multiplexed pathogen detection. In the CARMEN platform, nanolitre droplets containing CRISPR-based nucleic acid detection reagents7 self-organize in a microwell array8 to pair with droplets of amplified samples, testing each sample against each CRISPR RNA (crRNA) in replicate. The combination of CARMEN and Cas13 detection (CARMEN-Cas13) enables robust testing of more than 4,500 crRNA-target pairs on a single array. Using CARMEN-Cas13, we developed a multiplexed assay that simultaneously differentiates all 169 human-associated viruses with at least 10 published genome sequences and rapidly incorporated an additional crRNA to detect the causative agent of the 2020 COVID-19 pandemic. CARMEN-Cas13 further enables comprehensive subtyping of influenza A strains and multiplexed identification of dozens of HIV drug-resistance mutations. The intrinsic multiplexing and throughput capabilities of CARMEN make it practical to scale, as miniaturization decreases reagent cost per test by more than 300-fold. Scalable, highly multiplexed CRISPR-based nucleic acid detection shifts diagnostic and surveillance efforts from targeted testing of high-priority samples to comprehensive testing of large sample sets, greatly benefiting patients and public health9-11.

摘要: 大多数全球传播的病原体未被发现，破坏了患者的护理并阻碍了疾病爆发的准备和响应。为了能够进行常规监视和全面的诊断应用，需要一种检测技术，该检测技术可以扩展以测试许多样品1-3，同时测试许多病原体4-6。在这里，我们开发了用于核酸评估的组合阵列反应（CARMEN），可扩展的，多重病原体检测平台。在CARMEN平台中，包含基于CRISPR的核酸检测试剂的纳升微滴7在微孔阵列8中自组织，以与扩增样品的液滴配对，从而针对每个CRISPRRNA（crRNA）重复测试每个样品。CARMEN和Cas13检测（CARMEN-Cas13）的组合可在单个阵列上对超过4,500个crRNA-靶标对进行可靠的测试。使用CARMEN-Cas13，我们开发了一种多重分析方法，该方法可同时区分所有169种人类相关病毒和至少10个已公开的基因组序列，并迅速整合其他crRNA以检测2020COVID-19大流行的病原体。CARMEN-Cas13进一步实现了A型流感病毒株的全面亚型化，并能多重鉴定数十种HIV耐药性突变。CARMEN固有的多路复用和吞吐能力使其可扩展规模，因为小型化使每次测试的试剂成本降低了300倍以上。基于CRISPR的可扩展，高度复用的核酸检测将诊断和监视工作从高优先级样品的靶向测试转移到大型样品集的全面测试，极大地受益于患者和公共健康9-11。

Pubmed_ID: 32347930

Expression of concern: Dissection of soybean populations according to selection signatures based on whole-genome sequences

关注的表达：根据基于全基因组序列的选择特征对大豆种群进行解剖

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa040

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32347930/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 05/01/2020

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Publisher Correction: Genome-wide association of polycystic ovary syndrome implicates alterations in gonadotropin secretion in European ancestry populations

出版商更正：多囊卵巢综合征的全基因组关联暗示了欧洲血统人群中促性腺激素分泌的改变

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15793-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32345980/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/28/2020

Abstract: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.

摘要: 该文件的修订版已经发布，可以通过文件顶部的链接进行访问。

Pubmed_ID: 32345976

Cytosine base editors with minimized unguided DNA and RNA off-target events and high on-target activity

胞嘧啶碱基编辑器具有最小化的非引导性DNA和RNA脱靶事件以及高靶上活性

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15887-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32345976/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/28/2020

Abstract: Cytosine base editors (CBEs) enable efficient, programmable reversion of T•A to C•G point mutations in the human genome. Recently, cytosine base editors with rAPOBEC1 were reported to induce unguided cytosine deamination in genomic DNA and cellular RNA. Here we report eight next-generation CBEs (BE4 with either RrA3F [wt, F130L], AmAPOBEC1, SsAPOBEC3B [wt, R54Q], or PpAPOBEC1 [wt, H122A, R33A]) that display comparable DNA on-target editing frequencies, whilst eliciting a 12- to 69-fold reduction in C-to-U edits in the transcriptome, and up to a 45-fold overall reduction in unguided off-target DNA deamination relative to BE4 containing rAPOBEC1. Further, no enrichment of genome-wide C•G to T•A edits are observed in mammalian cells following transfection of mRNA encoding five of these next-generation editors. Taken together, these next-generation CBEs represent a collection of base editing tools for applications in which minimized off-target and high on-target activity are required.

摘要: 胞嘧啶碱基编辑器（CBE）可实现人类基因组中T•A到C•G点突变的高效，可编程回复。最近，据报道，具有rAPOBEC1的胞嘧啶碱基编辑器可诱导基因组DNA和细胞RNA中的未引导胞嘧啶脱氨。在这里，我们报告了八个下一代CBE（具有RrA3F[wt，F130L]，AmAPOBEC1，SsAPOBEC3B[wt，R54Q]或PpAPOBEC1[wt，H122A，R33A]的BE4），它们在引诱时显示出可比的DNA靶编辑频率。相对于含rAPOBEC1的BE4，转录组中C-U编辑的减少12-69倍，未引导脱靶DNA脱氨的总体减少高达45-倍。此外，在转染了编码这些下一代编辑物中的5种的mRNA后，在哺乳动物细胞中未观察到全基因组C•G向T•A编辑的富集。总而言之，这些下一代CBE代表了针对需要最小化脱靶和高脱靶活性的应用程序的基础编辑工具的集合。

Pubmed_ID: 32344462

Three-dimensional genetic networks among seed oil-related traits, metabolites and genes reveal the genetic foundations of oil synthesis in soybean

种子油相关性状，代谢物和基因之间的三维遗传网络揭示了大豆油合成的遗传基础

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14788

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32344462/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Although the biochemical and genetic basis of lipid metabolism is clear in Arabidopsis, there is limited information concerning the relevant genes in Glycine max (soybean). To address this issue, we constructed three-dimensional genetic networks using six seed oil-related traits, 52 lipid metabolism-related metabolites and 54 294 SNPs in 286 soybean accessions in total. As a result, 284 and 279 candidate genes were found to be significantly associated with seed oil-related traits and metabolites by phenotypic and metabolic genome-wide association studies and multi-omics analyses, respectively. Using minimax concave penalty (MCP) and smoothly clipped absolute deviation (SCAD) analyses, six seed oil-related traits were found to be significantly related to 31 metabolites. Among the above candidate genes, 36 genes were found to be associated with oil synthesis (27 genes), amino acid synthesis (four genes) and the tricarboxylic acid (TCA) cycle (five genes), and four genes (GmFATB1a, GmPDAT, GmPLDα1 and GmDAGAT1) are already known to be related to oil synthesis. Using this information, 133 three-dimensional genetic networks were constructed, 24 of which are known, e.g. pyruvate-GmPDAT-GmFATA2-oil content. Using these networks, GmPDAT, GmAGT and GmACP4 reveal the genetic relationships between pyruvate and the three major nutrients, and GmPDAT, GmZF351 and GmPgs1 reveal the genetic relationships between amino acids and seed oil content. In addition, GmCds1, along with average temperature in July and the rainfall from June to September, influence seed oil content across years. This study provides a new approach for the construction of three-dimensional genetic networks and reveals new information for soybean seed oil improvement and the identification of gene function.

摘要: 尽管在拟南芥中脂类代谢的生化和遗传基础很明确，但是关于大豆最大相关基因的信息有限。为了解决这个问题，我们构建了三维遗传网络，利用六个与种子油有关的性状，52个与脂质代谢有关的代谢物以及总共286个大豆种质中的54294个SNP。结果，分别通过表型和代谢全基因组关联研究以及多组学分析，分别发现284和279个候选基因与种子油相关性状和代谢物显着相关。使用最小最大凹痕罚度（MCP）和平滑限幅绝对偏差（SCAD）分析，发现6种与种子油有关的性状与31种代谢物显着相关。在上述候选基因中，发现有36个基因与油合成（27个基因），氨基酸合成（四个基因）和三羧酸（TCA）循环（五个基因）相关，四个基因（GmFATB1a，GmPDAT，GmPLDα1）相关和GmDAGAT1）与油的合成有关。利用这些信息，构建了133个三维遗传网络，其中24个是已知的，例如丙酮酸-GmPDAT-GmFATA2-油含量。使用这些网络，GmPDAT，GmAGT和GmACP4揭示了丙酮酸与三种主要营养素之间的遗传关系，而GmPDAT，GmZF351和GmPgs1揭示了氨基酸与种子油含量之间的遗传关系。此外，GmCds1以及7月的平均温度和6月至9月的降雨都会影响多年的种子油含量。这项研究为构建三维遗传网络提供了一种新方法，并揭示了有关大豆种子油改良和基因功能鉴定的新信息。

Pubmed_ID: 32344461

Genetic variants and underlying mechanisms influencing variance heterogeneity in maize

影响玉米变异异质性的遗传变异和潜在机制

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14786

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32344461/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Traditional genetic studies focus on identifying genetic variants associated with the mean difference in a quantitative trait. Because genetic variants also influence phenotypic variation via heterogeneity, we conducted a variance-heterogeneity genome-wide association study to examine the contribution of variance heterogeneity to oil-related quantitative traits. We identified 79 unique variance-controlling single nucleotide polymorphisms (vSNPs) from the sequences of 77 candidate variance-heterogeneity genes for 21 oil-related traits using the Levene test (P < 1.0 × 10-5 ). About 30% of the candidate genes encode enzymes that work in lipid metabolic pathways, most of which define clear expression variance quantitative trait loci. Of the vSNPs specifically associated with the genetic variance heterogeneity of oil concentration, 89% can be explained by additional linked mean-effects genetic variants. Furthermore, we demonstrated that gene × gene interactions play important roles in the formation of variance heterogeneity for fatty acid compositional traits. The interaction pattern was validated for one gene pair (GRMZM2G035341 and GRMZM2G152328) using yeast two-hybrid and bimolecular fluorescent complementation analyses. Our findings have implications for uncovering the genetic basis of hidden additive genetic effects and epistatic interaction effects, and we indicate opportunities to stabilize efficient breeding and selection of high-oil maize (Zea mays L.).

摘要: 传统的遗传研究侧重于确定与定量性状的平均差异相关的遗传变异。由于遗传变异还通过异质性影响表型变异，因此我们进行了方差-异质性全基因组关联研究，以检验方差异质性对石油相关定量性状的贡献。我们使用Levene检验从21个与油相关的性状的77个候选变异异质性基因序列中鉴定了79个独特的变异控制单核苷酸多态性（vSNP）（P<1.0×10-5）。大约30％的候选基因编码在脂质代谢途径中起作用的酶，其中大多数定义了明确的表达差异定量性状基因座。在与油浓度的遗传变异异质性具体相关的vSNP中，有89％可以通过附加的连锁均值效应遗传变异来解释。此外，我们证明了基因×基因相互作用在脂肪酸组成性状的方差异质性形成中起重要作用。使用酵母双杂交和双分子荧光互补分析验证了一个基因对（GRMZM2G035341和GRMZM2G152328）的相互作用模式。我们的发现对揭示隐藏的累加遗传效应和上位互作效应的遗传基础具有启示意义，并且我们为稳定高油玉米（ZeamaysL.）的有效育种和选择提供了机会。

Pubmed_ID: 32341527

Genome-wide association meta-analyses combining multiple risk phenotypes provide insights into the genetic architecture of cutaneous melanoma susceptibility

全基因组关联荟萃分析结合多种风险表型，为皮肤黑素瘤易感性的遗传结构提供了见识

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0611-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32341527/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: Most genetic susceptibility to cutaneous melanoma remains to be discovered. Meta-analysis genome-wide association study (GWAS) of 36,760 cases of melanoma (67% newly genotyped) and 375,188 controls identified 54 significant (P < 5 × 10-8) loci with 68 independent single nucleotide polymorphisms. Analysis of risk estimates across geographical regions and host factors suggests the acral melanoma subtype is uniquely unrelated to pigmentation. Combining this meta-analysis with GWAS of nevus count and hair color, and transcriptome association approaches, uncovered 31 potential secondary loci for a total of 85 cutaneous melanoma susceptibility loci. These findings provide insights into cutaneous melanoma genetic architecture, reinforcing the importance of nevogenesis, pigmentation and telomere maintenance, together with identifying potential new pathways for cutaneous melanoma pathogenesis.

摘要: 皮肤黑素瘤的大多数遗传易感性仍有待发现。荟萃分析全基因组关联研究（GWAS）对36,760例黑素瘤病例（67％为新基因型）和375,188个对照进行了鉴定，确定了54个重要（P<5×10-8）位点和68个独立的单核苷酸多态性。跨地理区域和宿主因素的风险估计分析表明，急性黑素瘤亚型与色素沉着无关。结合这项荟萃分析与痣计数和头发颜色的GWAS以及转录组关联方法，发现了31个潜在的继发性基因座，共计85个皮肤黑色素瘤易感基因座。这些发现为皮肤黑色素瘤的遗传结构提供了见识，从而增强了神经发生，色素沉着和端粒维持的重要性，并为皮肤黑色素瘤的发病机理鉴定了潜在的新途径。

Pubmed_ID: 32341526

Genetic identification of cell types underlying brain complex traits yields insights into the etiology of Parkinson's disease

对大脑复杂性状的潜在细胞类型进行遗传鉴定，可深入了解帕金森氏病的病因

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0610-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32341526/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: Genome-wide association studies have discovered hundreds of loci associated with complex brain disorders, but it remains unclear in which cell types these loci are active. Here we integrate genome-wide association study results with single-cell transcriptomic data from the entire mouse nervous system to systematically identify cell types underlying brain complex traits. We show that psychiatric disorders are predominantly associated with projecting excitatory and inhibitory neurons. Neurological diseases were associated with different cell types, which is consistent with other lines of evidence. Notably, Parkinson's disease was genetically associated not only with cholinergic and monoaminergic neurons (which include dopaminergic neurons) but also with enteric neurons and oligodendrocytes. Using post-mortem brain transcriptomic data, we confirmed alterations in these cells, even at the earliest stages of disease progression. Our study provides an important framework for understanding the cellular basis of complex brain maladies, and reveals an unexpected role of oligodendrocytes in Parkinson's disease.

摘要: 全基因组关联研究已经发现了数百个与复杂脑部疾病相关的基因座，但目前尚不清楚这些基因座在哪种细胞类型中活跃。在这里，我们将全基因组关联研究结果与来自整个小鼠神经系统的单细胞转录组数据进行整合，以系统地识别潜在的大脑复杂性状的细胞类型。我们表明，精神疾病主要与投射的兴奋性和抑制性神经元有关。神经系统疾病与不同的细胞类型有关，这与其他证据一致。值得注意的是，帕金森氏病不仅与胆碱能和单胺能神经元（包括多巴胺能神经元）遗传相关，而且与肠道神经元和少突胶质细胞遗传相关。使用死后脑转录组数据，即使在疾病发展的最早阶段，我们也证实了这些细胞的改变。我们的研究为理解复杂的脑部疾病的细胞基础提供了重要的框架，并揭示了少突胶质细胞在帕金森氏病中的意外作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32341525

Genome-wide selection and genetic improvement during modern maize breeding

现代玉米育种中的全基因组选择和遗传改良

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0616-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32341525/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: Since the development of single-hybrid maize breeding programs in the first half of the twentieth century1, maize yields have increased over sevenfold, and much of that increase can be attributed to tolerance of increased planting density2-4. To explore the genomic basis underlying the dramatic yield increase in maize, we conducted a comprehensive analysis of the genomic and phenotypic changes associated with modern maize breeding through chronological sampling of 350 elite inbred lines representing multiple eras of germplasm from both China and the United States. We document several convergent phenotypic changes in both countries. Using genome-wide association and selection scan methods, we identify 160 loci underlying adaptive agronomic phenotypes and more than 1,800 genomic regions representing the targets of selection during modern breeding. This work demonstrates the use of the breeding-era approach for identifying breeding signatures and lays the foundation for future genomics-enabled maize breeding.

摘要: 自从20世纪上半叶开发单杂交玉米育种计划以来，玉米单产提高了7倍多，其中大部分增长可以归因于对种植密度提高的耐受性2-4。为了探索玉米产量显着增加的基础基因组基础，我们通过对350个代表中国和美国多个种质时代的优良近交系进行了时间采样，对与现代玉米育种相关的基因组和表型变化进行了全面分析。我们记录了这两个国家的几种趋同表型变化。使用全基因组关联和选择扫描方法，我们确定了160个潜在的适应性农艺表型位点和1,800个代表现代育种选择目标的基因组区域。这项工作证明了使用育种时代的方法来鉴定育种特征，并为将来利用基因组学的玉米育种奠定了基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32341360

Integrative functional genomics decodes herpes simplex virus 1

综合功能基因组学解码单纯疱疹病毒1

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15992-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32341360/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/27/2020

Abstract: The predicted 80 open reading frames (ORFs) of herpes simplex virus 1 (HSV-1) have been intensively studied for decades. Here, we unravel the complete viral transcriptome and translatome during lytic infection with base-pair resolution by computational integration of multi-omics data. We identify a total of 201 transcripts and 284 ORFs including all known and 46 novel large ORFs. This includes a so far unknown ORF in the locus deleted in the FDA-approved oncolytic virus Imlygic. Multiple transcript isoforms expressed from individual gene loci explain translation of the vast majority of ORFs as well as N-terminal extensions (NTEs) and truncations. We show that NTEs with non-canonical start codons govern the subcellular protein localization and packaging of key viral regulators and structural proteins. We extend the current nomenclature to include all viral gene products and provide a genome browser that visualizes all the obtained data from whole genome to single-nucleotide resolution.

摘要: 数十年来，对预计的80种单纯疱疹病毒1（HSV-1）的开放阅读框（ORF）进行了深入研究。在这里，我们通过多组学数据的计算整合，以碱基对的分辨率解译裂解感染期间的完整病毒转录组和转录组。我们确定总共201笔成绩单和284个ORF，包括所有已知的和46个新颖的大型ORF。这包括迄今为止在FDA批准的溶瘤病毒Imlygic中删除的基因座中未知的ORF。从单个基因位点表达的多种转录异构体可解释绝大多数ORF以及N端延伸（NTE）和截短的翻译。我们显示，具有非规范起始密码子的NTE控制着亚细胞蛋白的定位和关键病毒调节剂和结构蛋白的包装。我们将当前的命名法扩展为包括所有病毒基因产物，并提供一种基因组浏览器，该可视化器可以显示从全基因组到单核苷酸分辨率的所有数据。

Pubmed_ID: 32341162

Quantitative analysis of amino acid metabolism in liver cancer links glutamate excretion to nucleotide synthesis

肝癌中氨基酸代谢的定量分析将谷氨酸排泄与核苷酸合成联系起来

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1919250117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32341162/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/12/2020

Abstract: Many cancer cells consume glutamine at high rates; counterintuitively, they simultaneously excrete glutamate, the first intermediate in glutamine metabolism. Glutamine consumption has been linked to replenishment of tricarboxylic acid cycle (TCA) intermediates and synthesis of adenosine triphosphate (ATP), but the reason for glutamate excretion is unclear. Here, we dynamically profile the uptake and excretion fluxes of a liver cancer cell line (HepG2) and use genome-scale metabolic modeling for in-depth analysis. We find that up to 30% of the glutamine is metabolized in the cytosol, primarily for nucleotide synthesis, producing cytosolic glutamate. We hypothesize that excreting glutamate helps the cell to increase the nucleotide synthesis rate to sustain growth. Indeed, we show experimentally that partial inhibition of glutamate excretion reduces cell growth. Our integrative approach thus links glutamine addiction to glutamate excretion in cancer and points toward potential drug targets.

摘要: 许多癌细胞大量消耗谷氨酰胺。违反直觉，他们同时排泄谷氨酸，这是谷氨酰胺代谢的第一个中间体。谷氨酰胺的消耗与三羧酸循环（TCA）中间体的补充和三磷酸腺苷（ATP）的合成有关，但谷氨酸排泄的原因尚不清楚。在这里，我们动态地分析了肝癌细胞系（HepG2）的摄取和排泄通量，并使用基因组规模的代谢模型进行深入分析。我们发现，高达30％的谷氨酰胺在细胞质中代谢，主要用于核苷酸合成，产生胞质谷氨酸。我们假设排泄谷氨酸有助于细胞增加核苷酸合成速率以维持生长。实际上，我们通过实验表明，谷氨酸排泄的部分抑制会降低细胞的生长。因此，我们的综合方法将谷氨酰胺成瘾与癌症中的谷氨酸排泄联系起来，并指出了潜在的药物靶标。

Pubmed_ID: 32338390

Segmental duplications are hot spots of copy number variants affecting barley gene content

节段重复是影响大麦基因含量的拷贝数变异的热点

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14784

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32338390/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Copy number variants (CNVs) are pervasive in several animal and plant genomes and contribute to shaping genetic diversity. In barley, there is evidence that changes in gene copy number underlie important agronomic traits. The recently released reference sequence of barley represents a valuable genomic resource for unveiling the incidence of CNVs that affect gene content and for identifying sequence features associated with CNV formation. Using exome sequencing and read count data, we detected 16 605 deletions and duplications that affect barley gene content by surveying a diverse panel of 172 cultivars, 171 landraces, 22 wild relatives and other 32 uncategorized domesticated accessions. The quest for segmental duplications (SDs) in the reference sequence revealed many low-copy repeats, most of which overlap predicted coding sequences. Statistical analyses revealed that the incidence of CNVs increases significantly in SD-rich regions, indicating that these sequence elements act as hot spots for the formation of CNVs. The present study delivers a comprehensive genome-wide study of CNVs affecting barley gene content and implicates SDs in the molecular mechanisms that lead to the formation of this class of CNVs.

摘要: 拷贝数变异（CNV）广泛存在于一些动植物基因组中，并有助于塑造遗传多样性。在大麦中，有证据表明基因拷贝数的变化是重要的农艺性状的基础。大麦最近发布的参考序列代表了宝贵的基因组资源，可揭示影响基因含量的CNV发生率，并鉴定与CNV形成相关的序列特征。使用外显子组测序和读取计数数据，我们通过调查172个品种，171个地方品种，22个野生亲缘种和其他32个未归类的驯化种质组成的不同小组，检测到影响大麦基因含量的16605个缺失和重复。对参考序列中节段重复（SD）的追求揭示了许多低拷贝重复，其中大多数与预测的编码序列重叠。统计分析表明，在富含SD的区域中，CNV的发生率显着增加，表明这些序列元素充当CNV形成的热点。本研究提供了影响大麦基因含量的CNV的全基因组研究，并将SD牵连到导致此类CNV形成的分子机制中。

Pubmed_ID: 32332866

MethCORR modelling of methylomes from formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue enables characterization and prognostication of colorectal cancer

福尔马林固定石蜡包埋组织的甲基化组的MethCORR建模可实现结直肠癌的表征和预后

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-16000-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32332866/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/24/2020

Abstract: Transcriptional characterization and classification has potential to resolve the inter-tumor heterogeneity of colorectal cancer and improve patient management. Yet, robust transcriptional profiling is difficult using formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) samples, which complicates testing in clinical and archival material. We present MethCORR, an approach that allows uniform molecular characterization and classification of fresh-frozen and FFPE samples. MethCORR identifies genome-wide correlations between RNA expression and DNA methylation in fresh-frozen samples. This information is used to infer gene expression information in FFPE samples from their methylation profiles. MethCORR is here applied to methylation profiles from 877 fresh-frozen/FFPE samples and comparative analysis identifies the same two subtypes in four independent cohorts. Furthermore, subtype-specific prognostic biomarkers that better predicts relapse-free survival (HR = 2.66, 95%CI [1.67-4.22], P value < 0.001 (log-rank test)) than UICC tumor, node, metastasis (TNM) staging and microsatellite instability status are identified and validated using DNA methylation-specific PCR. The MethCORR approach is general, and may be similarly successful for other cancer types.

摘要: 转录特征和分类具有解决大肠癌肿瘤间异质性和改善患者管理的潜力。但是，使用福尔马林固定，石蜡包埋（FFPE）的样品进行有效的转录谱分析是困难的，这使得在临床和档案材料中的测试变得复杂。我们介绍了MethCORR，该方法可以对新鲜冷冻和FFPE样品进行统一的分子表征和分类。MethCORR可以识别新鲜冷冻样品中RNA表达与DNA甲基化之间的全基因组关联。此信息用于从FFPE样品的甲基化谱图推断基因表达信息。将MethCORR应用于来自877个新鲜冷冻/FFPE样品的甲基化谱图，比较分析在四个独立的队列中确定了相同的两个亚型。此外，与UICC肿瘤，淋巴结转移（TNM）分期相比，亚型特异性的预后生物标志物能更好地预测无复发生存（HR=2.66，95％CI[1.67-4.22]，P值<0.001（对数秩检验））DNA甲基化特异性PCR可以识别和验证微卫星的不稳定性状态。MethCORR方法是通用的，对于其他类型的癌症也可能同样成功。

Pubmed_ID: 32332764

Transcription-coupled repair and mismatch repair contribute towards preserving genome integrity at mononucleotide repeat tracts

转录偶联修复和错配修复有助于保持单核苷酸重复序列的基因组完整性

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15901-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32332764/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/24/2020

Abstract: The mechanisms that underpin how insertions or deletions (indels) become fixed in DNA have primarily been ascribed to replication-related and/or double-strand break (DSB)-related processes. Here, we introduce a method to evaluate indels, orientating them relative to gene transcription. In so doing, we reveal a number of surprising findings: First, there is a transcriptional strand asymmetry in the distribution of mononucleotide repeat tracts in the reference human genome. Second, there is a strong transcriptional strand asymmetry of indels across 2,575 whole genome sequenced human cancers. We suggest that this is due to the activity of transcription-coupled nucleotide excision repair (TC-NER). Furthermore, TC-NER interacts with mismatch repair (MMR) under physiological conditions to produce strand bias. Finally, we show how insertions and deletions differ in their dependencies on these repair pathways. Our analytical approach reveals insights into the contribution of DNA repair towards indel mutagenesis in human cells.

摘要: 支撑插入或缺失（indels）如何固定在DNA中的机制主要归因于复制相关和/或双链断裂（DSB）相关过程。在这里，我们介绍了一种评估插入缺失的方法，将其相对于基因转录进行定位。通过这样做，我们揭示了许多令人惊讶的发现：首先，在参考人类基因组中单核苷酸重复序列的分布中存在转录链不对称。其次，在2,575个全基因组测序的人类癌症中，插入缺失存在很强的转录链不对称性。我们建议这是由于转录偶联核苷酸切除修复（TC-NER）的活性。此外，TC-NER在生理条件下与错配修复（MMR）相互作用，产生链偏向。最后，我们展示了插入和删除对这些修复途径的依赖性如何不同。我们的分析方法揭示了DNA修复对人类细胞indel诱变的贡献的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32332759

FOXL2 directs DNA double-strand break repair pathways by differentially interacting with Ku

FOXL2通过与Ku差异相互作用来指导DNA双链断裂修复途径

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15748-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32332759/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/24/2020

Abstract: The balance between major DNA double-strand break (DSB) repair pathways is influenced by binding of the Ku complex, a XRCC5/6 heterodimer, to DSB ends, initiating non-homologous end joining (NHEJ) but preventing additional DSB end resection and homologous recombination (HR). However, the key molecular cue for Ku recruitment to DSB sites is unknown. Here, we report that FOXL2, a forkhead family transcriptional factor, directs DSB repair pathway choice by acetylation-dependent binding to Ku. Upon DSB induction, SIRT1 translocates to the nucleus and deacetylates FOXL2 at lysine 124, leading to liberation of XRCC5 and XRCC6 from FOXL2 and formation of the Ku complex. FOXL2 ablation enhances Ku recruitment to DSB sites, imbalances DSB repair kinetics by accelerating NHEJ and inhibiting HR, and thus leads to catastrophic genomic events. Our study unveils the SIRT1-(de)acetylated FOXL2-Ku axis that governs the balance of DSB repair pathways to maintain genome integrity.

摘要: 主要DNA双链断裂（DSB）修复途径之间的平衡受Ku复合物（XRCC5/6异二聚体）与DSB末端的结合影响，启动非同源末端连接（NHEJ），但阻止额外的DSB末端切除和同源性重组（HR）。但是，未知的Ku招募到DSB站点的关键分子线索。在这里，我们报告FOXL2，叉头家族转录因子，通过对Ku的乙酰化依赖性结合来指导DSB修复途径的选择。在DSB诱导后，SIRT1在赖氨酸124处转移至细胞核并使FOXL2脱乙酰化，从而导致XRCC5和XRCC6从FOXL2释放并形成Ku复合物。FOXL2消融可通过加速NHEJ和抑制HR增强Ku募集至DSB位点，平衡DSB修复动力学，从而导致灾难性的基因组事件。我们的研究揭示了SIRT1-（去）乙酰化的FOXL2-Ku轴，该轴控制DSB修复途径的平衡以维持基因组完整性。

Pubmed_ID: 32332753

Non-coding somatic mutations converge on the PAX8 pathway in ovarian cancer

非编码体细胞突变在卵巢癌中聚集在PAX8途径上

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15951-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32332753/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/24/2020

Abstract: The functional consequences of somatic non-coding mutations in ovarian cancer (OC) are unknown. To identify regulatory elements (RE) and genes perturbed by acquired non-coding variants, here we establish epigenomic and transcriptomic landscapes of primary OCs using H3K27ac ChIP-seq and RNA-seq, and then integrate these with whole genome sequencing data from 232 OCs. We identify 25 frequently mutated regulatory elements, including an enhancer at 6p22.1 which associates with differential expression of ZSCAN16 (P = 6.6 × 10-4) and ZSCAN12 (P = 0.02). CRISPR/Cas9 knockout of this enhancer induces downregulation of both genes. Globally, there is an enrichment of single nucleotide variants in active binding sites for TEAD4 (P = 6 × 10-11) and its binding partner PAX8 (P = 2×10-10), a known lineage-specific transcription factor in OC. In addition, the collection of cis REs associated with PAX8 comprise the most frequently mutated set of enhancers in OC (P = 0.003). These data indicate that non-coding somatic mutations disrupt the PAX8 transcriptional network during OC development.

摘要: 卵巢癌（OC）中的体细胞非编码突变的功能后果尚不清楚。要确定调控因子（RE）和受获得的非编码变异干扰的基因，我们在这里使用H3K27acChIP-seq和RNA-seq建立主要OC的表观基因组和转录组学景观，然后将其与来自232OC的全基因组测序数据整合。我们鉴定出25个经常突变的调控元件，包括在6p22.1处的增强子，该增强子与ZSCAN16（P=6.6×10-4）和ZSCAN12（P=0.02）的差异表达有关。该增强子的CRISPR/Cas9敲除诱导两个基因的下调。在全球范围内，在TEAD4（P=6×10-11）及其结合伴侣PAX8（P=2×10-10）（在OC中是已知的谱系特异性转录因子）的有效结合位点中存在丰富的单核苷酸变体。此外，与PAX8相关的顺式RE的集合包含OC中突变最频繁的一组增强子（P=0.003）。这些数据表明，非编码体细胞突变在OC发育过程中破坏了PAX8转录网络。

Pubmed_ID: 32332169

Induction of recurrent break cluster genes in neural progenitor cells differentiated from embryonic stem cells in culture

在培养物中分化出胚胎干细胞的神经祖细胞中反复断裂簇基因的诱导

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1922299117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32332169/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/12/2020

Abstract: Mild replication stress enhances appearance of dozens of robust recurrent genomic break clusters, termed RDCs, in cultured primary mouse neural stem and progenitor cells (NSPCs). Robust RDCs occur within genes ("RDC-genes") that are long and have roles in neural cell communications and/or have been implicated in neuropsychiatric diseases or cancer. We sought to develop an in vitro approach to determine whether specific RDC formation is associated with neural development. For this purpose, we adapted a system to induce neural progenitor cell (NPC) development from mouse embryonic stem cell (ESC) lines deficient for XRCC4 plus p53, a genotype that enhances DNA double-strand break (DSB) persistence to enhance detection. We tested for RDCs by our genome-wide DSB identification approach that captures DSBs via their ability to join to specific genomic Cas9/single-guide RNA-generated bait DSBs. In XRCC4/p53-deficient ESCs, we detected seven RDCs, all of which were in genes and two of which were robust. In contrast, in NPCs derived from these ESC lines we detected 29 RDCs, a large fraction of which were robust and associated with long, transcribed neural genes that were also robust RDC-genes in primary NSPCs. These studies suggest that many RDCs present in NSPCs are developmentally influenced to occur in this cell type and indicate that induced development of NPCs from ESCs provides an approach to rapidly elucidate mechanistic aspects of NPC RDC formation.

摘要: 轻度的复制压力会在培养的原代小鼠神经干细胞和祖细胞（NSPC）中增强数十种健壮的复发性基因组断裂簇（称为RDC）的外观。健壮的RDC出现在较长的基因（“RDC基因”）中，并在神经细胞通讯中起作用和/或与神经精神疾病或癌症有关。我们试图开发一种体外方法，以确定特定的RDC形成是否与神经发育有关。为此，我们采用了一种系统，以从缺乏XRCC4加p53的小鼠胚胎干细胞（ESC）系诱导神经祖细胞（NPC）发育，该基因型可增强DNA双链断裂（DSB）的持久性以增强检测。我们通过全基因组DSB鉴定方法对RDC进行了测试，该方法通过其加入特定基因组Cas9/单向导RNA产生的诱饵DSB的能力来捕获DSB。在XRCC4/p53缺失的ESC中，我们检测到7个RDC，所有这些都在基因中，其中两个很健壮。相反，在从这些ESC品系衍生的NPC中，我们检测到29个RDC，其中很大一部分是健壮的，并且与长转录的神经基因相关，而这些基因在初级NSPC中也是稳健的RDC基因。这些研究表明，存在于NSPC中的许多RDC在发育上都受到这种细胞类型的影响，并且表明从ESC诱导NPC的发育提供了一种快速阐明NPCRDC形成机理的方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32332163

NORs on human acrocentric chromosome p-arms are active by default and can associate with nucleoli independently of rDNA

人的acrocentric染色体p臂上的NOR在默认情况下处于活动状态，并且可以独立于rDNA与核仁结合

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2001812117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32332163/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/12/2020

Abstract: Nucleoli, the sites of ribosome biogenesis and the largest structures in human nuclei, form around nucleolar organizer regions (NORs) comprising ribosomal DNA (rDNA) arrays. NORs are located on the p-arms of the five human acrocentric chromosomes. Defining the rules of engagement between these p-arms and nucleoli takes on added significance as describing the three-dimensional organization of the human genome represents a major research goal. Here we used fluorescent in situ hybridization (FISH) and immuno-FISH on metaphase chromosomes from karyotypically normal primary and hTERT-immortalized human cell lines to catalog NORs in terms of their relative rDNA content and activity status. We demonstrate that a proportion of acrocentric p-arms in cell lines and from normal human donors have no detectable rDNA. Surprisingly, we found that all NORs with detectable rDNA are active, as defined by upstream binding factor loading. We determined the nucleolar association status of all NORs during interphase, and found that nucleolar association of acrocentric p-arms can occur independently of rDNA content, suggesting that sequences elsewhere on these chromosome arms drive nucleolar association. In established cancer lines, we characterize a variety of chromosomal rearrangements involving acrocentric p-arms and observe silent, rDNA-containing NORs that are dissociated from nucleoli. In conclusion, our findings indicate that within human nuclei, positioning of all 10 acrocentric chromosomes is dictated by nucleolar association. Furthermore, these nucleolar associations are buffered against interindividual variation in the distribution of rDNA.

摘要: 核仁是核糖体生物发生的位点，也是人类核中最大的结构，围绕着包含核糖体DNA（rDNA）阵列的核仁组织区（NORs）形成。NOR位于五个人类acrocentric染色体的p臂上。定义这些p臂与核仁之间的结合规则具有更大的意义，因为描述人类基因组的三维组织是一个主要的研究目标。在这里，我们在来自染色体核型正常原代和hTERT永生化人类细胞系的中期染色体上，使用荧光原位杂交（FISH）和免疫FISH对NOR进行了分类，以其相对rDNA含量和活性状态分类。我们证明，在细胞系中以及来自正常人类供体的一定比例的acrocentricp臂没有可检测的rDNA。出乎意料的是，我们发现具有可检测的rDNA的所有NOR均具有活性，如上游结合因子负载所定义。我们确定了相间所有NOR的核仁缔合状态，发现acrocentricp臂的核仁缔合可独立于rDNA含量发生，表明这些染色体臂上其他位置的序列驱动了核仁缔合。在已建立的癌症细胞系中，我们表征了涉及重心p臂的各种染色体重排，并观察了与核仁分离的沉默的含rDNANOR。总之，我们的发现表明，在人类核内，所有10个acrocentric染色体的位置均由核仁缔合决定。而且，这些核仁缔合被缓冲以抵抗rDNA分布中的个体差异。

Pubmed_ID: 32330414

The Architecture of SARS-CoV-2 Transcriptome

SARS-CoV-2转录组的体系结构

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.04.011

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32330414/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 05/14/2020

Abstract: SARS-CoV-2 is a betacoronavirus responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic. Although the SARS-CoV-2 genome was reported recently, its transcriptomic architecture is unknown. Utilizing two complementary sequencing techniques, we present a high-resolution map of the SARS-CoV-2 transcriptome and epitranscriptome. DNA nanoball sequencing shows that the transcriptome is highly complex owing to numerous discontinuous transcription events. In addition to the canonical genomic and 9 subgenomic RNAs, SARS-CoV-2 produces transcripts encoding unknown ORFs with fusion, deletion, and/or frameshift. Using nanopore direct RNA sequencing, we further find at least 41 RNA modification sites on viral transcripts, with the most frequent motif, AAGAA. Modified RNAs have shorter poly(A) tails than unmodified RNAs, suggesting a link between the modification and the 3' tail. Functional investigation of the unknown transcripts and RNA modifications discovered in this study will open new directions to our understanding of the life cycle and pathogenicity of SARS-CoV-2.

摘要: SARS-CoV-2是导致COVID-19大流行的乙型冠状病毒。尽管最近报道了SARS-CoV-2基因组，但其转录组结构尚不清楚。利用两种互补的测序技术，我们提出了SARS-CoV-2转录组和表位转录组的高分辨率图。DNA纳米球测序表明，由于许多不连续的转录事件，转录组非常复杂。除了典型的基因组RNA和9个亚基因组RNA外，SARS-CoV-2还能产生编码未知ORF且具有融合，缺失和/或移码的转录本。使用纳米孔直接RNA测序，我们进一步在病毒转录本上找到了至少41个RNA修饰位点，其中最常见的基序为AAGAA。修饰的RNA比未修饰的RNA具有较短的poly（A）尾巴，表明修饰和3'尾巴之间存在联系。在这项研究中发现的未知转录本和RNA修饰的功能研究将为我们对SARS-CoV-2的生命周期和致病性的理解开辟新的方向。

Pubmed_ID: 32327641

Sex chromosome evolution in parasitic nematodes of humans

人类寄生线虫的性染色体进化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15654-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32327641/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/23/2020

Abstract: Sex determination mechanisms often differ even between related species yet the evolution of sex chromosomes remains poorly understood in all but a few model organisms. Some nematodes such as Caenorhabditis elegans have an XO sex determination system while others, such as the filarial parasite Brugia malayi, have an XY mechanism. We present a complete B. malayi genome assembly and define Nigon elements shared with C. elegans, which we then map to the genomes of other filarial species and more distantly related nematodes. We find a remarkable plasticity in sex chromosome evolution with several distinct cases of neo-X and neo-Y formation, X-added regions, and conversion of autosomes to sex chromosomes from which we propose a model of chromosome evolution across different nematode clades. The phylum Nematoda offers a new and innovative system for gaining a deeper understanding of sex chromosome evolution.

摘要: 性别决定机制即使在相关物种之间也常常不同，但除少数模型生物外，对性染色体的进化知之甚少。某些线虫（如秀丽隐杆线虫）具有XO性别确定系统，而其他线虫（如丝状寄生虫马来虫）具有XY机制。我们提出了一个完整的马来西亚马来语基因组组装体，并定义了与秀丽隐杆线虫共享的尼贡元素，然后将其映射到其他丝虫物种和更远距离相关的线虫的基因组。我们在性染色体进化中发现了显着的可塑性，其中有几个不同的新X和新Y形成，X附加区域以及常染色体转化为性染色体的案例，据此我们提出了跨不同线虫进化枝的染色体进化模型。线虫门提供了一种新的和创新的系统，以加深对性染色体进化的了解。

Pubmed_ID: 32324922

The histone methylation readers MRG1/MRG2 and the histone chaperones NRP1/NRP2 associate in fine-tuning Arabidopsis flowering time

组蛋白甲基化阅读器MRG1 / MRG2和组蛋白伴侣NRP1 / NRP2与拟南芥开花时间的微调有关

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14780

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32324922/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Histones are highly basic proteins involved in packaging DNA into chromatin, and histone modifications are fundamental in epigenetic regulation in eukaryotes. Among the numerous chromatin modifiers identified in Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana), MORF-RELATED GENE (MRG)1 and MRG2 have redundant functions in reading histone H3 lysine 36 trimethylation (H3K36me3). Here, we show that MRG2 binds histone chaperones belonging to the NUCLEOSOME ASSEMBLY PROTEIN 1 (NAP1) family, including NAP1-RELATED PROTEIN (NRP)1 and NRP2. Characterization of the loss-of-function mutants mrg1 mrg2, nrp1 nrp2 and mrg1 mrg2 nrp1 nrp2 revealed that MRG1/MRG2 and NRP1/NRP2 regulate flowering time through fine-tuning transcription of floral genes by distinct molecular mechanisms. In particular, the physical interaction between NRP1/NRP2 and MRG1/MRG2 inhibited the binding of MRG1/MRG2 to the transcription factor CONSTANS (CO), leading to a transcriptional repression of FLOWERING LOCUS T (FT) through impeded H4K5 acetylation (H4K5ac) within the FT chromatin. By contrast, NRP1/NRP2 and MRG1/MRG2 act together, likely in a multiprotein complex manner, in promoting the transcription of FLOWERING LOCUS C (FLC) via an increase of both H4K5ac and H3K9ac in the FLC chromatin. Because the expression pattern of FLC represents the major category of differentially expressed genes identified by genome-wide RNA-sequencing analysis in the mrg1 mrg2, nrp1 nrp2 and mrg1 mrg2 nrp1 nrp2 mutants, it is reasonable to speculate that the NRP1/NRP2-MRG1/MRG2 complex may be involved in transcriptional activation of genes beyond FLC and flowering time control.

摘要: 组蛋白是参与将DNA包装到染色质中的高度碱性蛋白质，而组蛋白修饰是真核生物表观遗传调控的基础。在拟南芥（Arabidopsisthaliana）中鉴定出的众多染色质修饰剂中，与MORF相关的基因（MRG）1和MRG2在读取组蛋白H3赖氨酸36三甲基化（H3K36me3）方面具有多余的功能。在这里，我们表明MRG2结合属于NUCLEOSOMEASSEMBLY蛋白1（NAP1）家族的组蛋白伴侣，包括NAP1相关蛋白（NRP）1和NRP2。功能丧失突变体mrg1mrg2，nrp1nrp2和mrg1mrg2nrp1nrp2的表征揭示了MRG1/MRG2和NRP1/NRP2通过不同分子机制对花基因的微调来调节开花时间。特别是，NRP1/NRP2和MRG1/MRG2之间的物理相互作用抑制了MRG1/MRG2与转录因子CONSTANS（CO）的结合，从而通过阻止H4K5乙酰化（H4K5ac）导致了FLOWERINGLOCUST（FT）的转录抑制。FT染色质。相比之下，NRP1/NRP2和MRG1/MRG2可能以多蛋白复合物的形式共同起作用，通过增加FLC染色质中的H4K5ac和H3K9ac来促进FLOERINGLOCUSC（FLC）的转录。因为FLC的表达模式代表了通过mrg1mrg2，nrp1nrp2和mrg1mrg2nrp1nrp2突变体中的全基因组RNA测序分析鉴定的差异表达基因的主要类别，所以有理由推测NRP1/NRP2-MRG1/MRG2复合物可能参与FLC和开花时间控制之外的基因的转录激活。

Pubmed_ID: 32322066

Mechanisms and therapeutic implications of hypermutation in gliomas

神经胶质瘤高突变的机制及其治疗意义

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2209-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32322066/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: A high tumour mutational burden (hypermutation) is observed in some gliomas1-5; however, the mechanisms by which hypermutation develops and whether it predicts the response to immunotherapy are poorly understood. Here we comprehensively analyse the molecular determinants of mutational burden and signatures in 10,294 gliomas. We delineate two main pathways to hypermutation: a de novo pathway associated with constitutional defects in DNA polymerase and mismatch repair (MMR) genes, and a more common post-treatment pathway, associated with acquired resistance driven by MMR defects in chemotherapy-sensitive gliomas that recur after treatment with the chemotherapy drug temozolomide. Experimentally, the mutational signature of post-treatment hypermutated gliomas was recapitulated by temozolomide-induced damage in cells with MMR deficiency. MMR-deficient gliomas were characterized by a lack of prominent T cell infiltrates, extensive intratumoral heterogeneity, poor patient survival and a low rate of response to PD-1 blockade. Moreover, although bulk analyses did not detect microsatellite instability in MMR-deficient gliomas, single-cell whole-genome sequencing analysis of post-treatment hypermutated glioma cells identified microsatellite mutations. These results show that chemotherapy can drive the acquisition of hypermutated populations without promoting a response to PD-1 blockade and supports the diagnostic use of mutational burden and signatures in cancer.

摘要: 在一些神经胶质瘤1-5中观察到高的肿瘤突变负担（超突变）；然而，人们对超突变发展的机制及其是否预测免疫疗法的反应知之甚少。在这里，我们全面分析10294胶质瘤的突变负担和签名的分子决定因素。我们描述了超突变的两个主要途径：与DNA聚合酶和错配修复（MMR）基因的结构缺陷相关的从头途径，以及与化疗敏感性神经胶质瘤中MMR缺陷驱动的获得性耐药相关的更常见的后处理途径。化疗药物替莫唑胺治疗后复发。实验上，替莫唑胺诱导的MMR缺乏细胞的损伤可以概括治疗后超突变的神经胶质瘤的突变特征。MMR缺陷型神经胶质瘤的特点是缺乏突出的T细胞浸润，广泛的肿瘤内异质性，患者存活率差以及对PD-1阻断的反应率低。此外，尽管大量分析未检测到MMR缺陷型神经胶质瘤中的微卫星不稳定性，但对治疗后突变的神经胶质瘤细胞的单细胞全基因组测序分析发现了微卫星突变。这些结果表明化学疗法可以驱动超突变人群的获得，而不会促进对PD-1阻滞的反应，并支持对癌症中突变负担和特征的诊断使用。

Pubmed_ID: 32321909

Development of a thermophilic coculture for corn fiber conversion to ethanol

玉米纤维转化为乙醇的高温共培养技术的发展

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15704-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32321909/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/22/2020

Abstract: The fiber in corn kernels, currently unutilized in the corn to ethanol process, represents an opportunity for introduction of cellulose conversion technology. We report here that Clostridium thermocellum can solubilize over 90% of the carbohydrate in autoclaved corn fiber, including its hemicellulose component glucuronoarabinoxylan (GAX). However, Thermoanaerobacterium thermosaccharolyticum or several other described hemicellulose-fermenting thermophilic bacteria can only partially utilize this GAX. We describe the isolation of a previously undescribed organism, Herbinix spp. strain LL1355, from a thermophilic microbiome that can consume 85% of the recalcitrant GAX. We sequence its genome, and based on structural analysis of the GAX, identify six enzymes that hydrolyze GAX linkages. Combinations of up to four enzymes are successfully expressed in T. thermosaccharolyticum. Supplementation with these enzymes allows T. thermosaccharolyticum to consume 78% of the GAX compared to 53% by the parent strain and increases ethanol yield from corn fiber by 24%.

摘要: 玉米粒中的纤维，目前在玉米制乙醇工艺中尚未使用，为引入纤维素转化技术提供了机会。我们在这里报告，热纤梭菌可以溶解高压灭菌玉米纤维中90％以上的碳水化合物，包括其半纤维素成分葡萄糖醛酸阿拉伯糖基木聚糖（GAX）。但是，解热嗜热厌氧杆菌或其他一些描述的半纤维素发酵嗜热细菌只能部分利用该GAX。我们描述了先前未描述的生物Herbinixspp的分离。菌株LL1355，来自嗜热微生物组，可消耗85％的顽固性GAX。我们对它的基因组进行测序，并根据GAX的结构分析，确定了六种水解GAX键的酶。在嗜热糖球菌中成功表达了多达四种酶的组合。补充这些酶可以使解糖热曲霉消耗78％的GAX，而亲本菌株消耗53％，玉米纤维的乙醇产量提高24％。

Pubmed_ID: 32321835

A genome-wide association study identifies key modulators of complement factor H binding to malondialdehyde-epitopes

全基因组关联研究确定了补体因子H与丙二醛表位结合的关键调节剂

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1913970117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32321835/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/05/2020

Abstract: Genetic variants within complement factor H (CFH), a major alternative complement pathway regulator, are associated with the development of age-related macular degeneration (AMD) and other complementopathies. This is explained with the reduced binding of CFH or its splice variant factor H-like protein 1 (FHL-1) to self-ligands or altered self-ligands (e.g., malondialdehyde [MDA]-modified molecules) involved in homeostasis, thereby causing impaired complement regulation. Considering the critical role of CFH in inhibiting alternative pathway activation on MDA-modified surfaces, we performed an unbiased genome-wide search for genetic variants that modify the ability of plasma CFH to bind MDA in 1,830 individuals and characterized the mechanistic basis and the functional consequences of this. In a cohort of healthy individuals, we identified rs1061170 in CFH and the deletion of CFHR3 and CFHR1 as dominant genetic variants that modify CFH/FHL-1 binding to MDA. We further demonstrated that FHR1 and FHR3 compete with CFH for binding to MDA-epitopes and that FHR1 displays the highest affinity toward MDA-epitopes compared to CFH and FHR3. Moreover, FHR1 bound to MDA-rich areas on necrotic cells and prevented CFH from mediating its cofactor activity on MDA-modified surfaces, resulting in enhanced complement activation. These findings provide a mechanistic explanation as to why the deletion of CFHR3 and CFHR1 is protective in AMD and highlight the importance of genetic variants within the CFH/CFHR3/CFHR1 locus in the recognition of altered-self in tissue homeostasis.

摘要: 补体因子H（CFH）（一种主要的补体途径调节剂）中的遗传变异与年龄相关性黄斑变性（AMD）和其他补体病的发生有关。CFH或其剪接变异因子H样蛋白1（FHL-1）与体内稳态相关的自身配体或改变的自身配体（例如，丙二醛[MDA]修饰的分子）的结合减少，可以解释这一点补体调节受损。考虑到CFH在抑制MDA修饰的表面上的替代途径激活中的关键作用，我们进行了无偏见的全基因组搜索，寻找可改变血浆CFH在1,830位个体中结合MDA的能力的遗传变异，并表征了机械基础和功能后果这个的。在一群健康的个体中，我们鉴定出CFH中的rs1061170以及CFHR3和CFHR1的缺失是修饰CFH/FHL-1与MDA结合的主要遗传变异。我们进一步证明FHR1和FHR3与CFH竞争与MDA表位的结合，与CFH和FHR3相比，FHR1对MDA表位显示出最高的亲和力。此外，FHR1与坏死细胞上富含MDA的区域结合，阻止CFH介导其在MDA修饰表面上的辅因子活性，从而增强补体激活。这些发现为为何CFHR3和CFHR1的缺失在AMD中具有保护性提供了机械学解释，并突出了CFH/CFHR3/CFHR1基因座内遗传变异在识别组织稳态中自身改变中的重要性。

Pubmed_ID: 32321829

Landscape analysis of adjacent gene rearrangements reveals BCL2L14-ETV6 gene fusions in more aggressive triple-negative breast cancer

对相邻基因重排的景观分析显示，BCL2L14-ETV6基因融合可用于更具侵略性的三阴性乳腺癌

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1921333117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32321829/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/05/2020

Abstract: Triple-negative breast cancer (TNBC) accounts for 10 to 20% of breast cancer, with chemotherapy as its mainstay of treatment due to lack of well-defined targets, and recent genomic sequencing studies have revealed a paucity of TNBC-specific mutations. Recurrent gene fusions comprise a class of viable genetic targets in solid tumors; however, their role in breast cancer remains underappreciated due to the complexity of genomic rearrangements in this cancer. Our interrogation of the whole-genome sequencing data for 215 breast tumors catalogued 99 recurrent gene fusions, 57% of which are cryptic adjacent gene rearrangements (AGRs). The most frequent AGRs, BCL2L14-ETV6, TTC6-MIPOL1, ESR1-CCDC170, and AKAP8-BRD4, were preferentially found in the more aggressive forms of breast cancers that lack well-defined genetic targets. Among these, BCL2L14-ETV6 was exclusively detected in TNBC, and interrogation of four independent patient cohorts detected BCL2L14-ETV6 in 4.4 to 12.2% of TNBC tumors. Interestingly, these fusion-positive tumors exhibit more aggressive histopathological features, such as gross necrosis and high tumor grade. Amid TNBC subtypes, BCL2L14-ETV6 is most frequently detected in the mesenchymal entity, accounting for ∼19% of these tumors. Ectopic expression of BCL2L14-ETV6 fusions induce distinct expression changes from wild-type ETV6 and enhance cell motility and invasiveness of TNBC and benign breast epithelial cells. Furthermore, BCL2L14-ETV6 fusions prime partial epithelial-mesenchymal transition and endow resistance to paclitaxel treatment. Together, these data reveal AGRs as a class of underexplored genetic aberrations that could be pathological in breast cancer, and identify BCL2L14-ETV6 as a recurrent gene fusion in more aggressive form of TNBC tumors.

摘要: 三阴性乳腺癌（TNBC）占乳腺癌的10％到20％，由于缺乏明确的靶标，化学疗法是其主要治疗手段，最近的基因组测序研究表明，TNBC特异性突变很少。复发性基因融合包括实体瘤中的一类可行的遗传靶标。然而，由于该基因组重排的复杂性，它们在乳腺癌中的作用仍未被充分认识。我们对215个乳腺肿瘤的全基因组测序数据进行了调查，发现有99种复发性基因融合，其中57％是隐性相邻基因重排（AGR）。最常见的AGR，BCL2L14-ETV6，TTC6-MIPOL1，ESR1-CCDC170和AKAP8-BRD4被优先发现在缺乏明确遗传靶标的更具侵略性的乳腺癌中。其中，仅在TNBC中检测到BCL2L14-ETV6，对四个独立患者队列的询问在4.4％至12.2％的TNBC肿瘤中检测到BCL2L14-ETV6。有趣的是，这些融合阳性肿瘤表现出更具侵略性的组织病理学特征，例如严重坏死和高肿瘤等级。在TNBC亚型中，BCL2L14-ETV6最常在间充质实体中检出，约占这些肿瘤的19％。BCL2L14-ETV6融合蛋白的异位表达诱导了与野生型ETV6不同的表达变化，并增强了TNBC和良性乳腺上皮细胞的细胞运动性和侵袭性。此外，BCL2L14-ETV6融合物引发部分上皮-间质转化并赋予对紫杉醇治疗的耐药性。总之，这些数据揭示了AGRs是一类在乳腺癌中可能是病理性的未充分探索的遗传畸变，并且将BCL2L14-ETV6鉴定为更具侵略性的TNBC肿瘤形式的复发性基因融合。

Pubmed_ID: 32317640

Genomic release-recapture experiment in the wild reveals within-generation polygenic selection in stickleback fish

野生的基因组释放-捕获实验揭示了棘背鱼的代内多基因选择

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15657-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32317640/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/21/2020

Abstract: How rapidly natural selection sorts genome-wide standing genetic variation during adaptation remains largely unstudied experimentally. Here, we present a genomic release-recapture experiment using paired threespine stickleback fish populations adapted to selectively different lake and stream habitats. First, we use pooled whole-genome sequence data from the original populations to identify hundreds of candidate genome regions likely under divergent selection between these habitats. Next, we generate F2 hybrids from the same lake-stream population pair in the laboratory and release thousands of juveniles into a natural stream habitat. Comparing the individuals surviving one year of stream selection to a reference sample of F2 hybrids allows us to detect frequency shifts across the candidate regions toward the genetic variants typical of the stream population-an experimental outcome consistent with polygenic directional selection. Our study reveals that adaptation in nature can be detected as a genome-wide signal over just a single generation.

摘要: 在适应过程中，自然选择如何快速分类全基因组范围内的遗传变异仍在很大程度上未经实验研究。在这里，我们介绍了使用配对的三棘棘背鱼种群进行基因组释放-捕获实验，该种群适合于选择性地不同的湖泊和河流栖息地。首先，我们使用来自原始种群的合并全基因组序列数据来识别数百个候选基因组区域，这些区域可能在这些生境之间进行不同的选择。接下来，我们在实验室中从相同的湖流种群对中产生F2杂种，并将成千上万的幼体释放到自然流生境中。将流选择一年后的个体与F2杂种的参考样本进行比较，可以检测跨候选区域的频率向典型的群体遗传变异的频移，这是与多基因定向选择一致的实验结果。我们的研究表明，自然适应性可以在一代人的时间内被检测为全基因组信号。

Pubmed_ID: 32317632

Genome-wide association studies and Mendelian randomization analyses for leisure sedentary behaviours

全基因组关联研究和孟德尔随机分析的休闲久坐行为

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15553-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32317632/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/21/2020

Abstract: Leisure sedentary behaviours are associated with increased risk of cardiovascular disease, but whether this relationship is causal is unknown. The aim of this study is to identify genetic determinants associated with leisure sedentary behaviours and to estimate the potential causal effect on coronary artery disease (CAD). Genome wide association analyses of leisure television watching, leisure computer use and driving behaviour in the UK Biobank identify 145, 36 and 4 genetic loci (P < 1×10-8), respectively. High genetic correlations are observed between sedentary behaviours and neurological traits, including education and body mass index (BMI). Two-sample Mendelian randomization (MR) analysis estimates a causal effect between 1.5 hour increase in television watching and CAD (OR 1.44, 95%CI 1.25-1.66, P = 5.63 × 10-07), that is partially independent of education and BMI in multivariable MR analyses. This study finds independent observational and genetic support for the hypothesis that increased sedentary behaviour by leisure television watching is a risk factor for CAD.

摘要: 休闲久坐的行为会增加患心血管疾病的风险，但这种关系是否是因果关系尚不清楚。这项研究的目的是确定与休闲久坐行为相关的遗传决定因素，并估计对冠心病（CAD）的潜在因果关系。英国生物库中休闲电视观看，休闲计算机使用和驾驶行为的全基因组关联分析分别确定了145、36和4个遗传基因座（P<1×10-8）。久坐的行为和神经系统性状，包括教育程度和体重指数（BMI）之间，存在高度的遗传相关性。孟德尔随机抽样（MR）的两样本分析估计，电视观看时间增加1.5小时与CAD（OR1.44，95％CI1.25-1.66，P=5.63×10-07）之间有因果关系，这部分受教育程度和BMI的影响在多变量MR分析中。这项研究发现独立的观察和遗传学支持这一假说，即通过休闲电视观看增加久坐行为是CAD的危险因素。

Pubmed_ID: 32315617

MorphoSeq: Full Single-Cell Transcriptome Dynamics Up to Gastrulation in a Chordate

MorphoSeq：完整的单细胞转录组动力学，直至在卵酸盐中胃动。

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.03.055

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32315617/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 05/14/2020

Abstract: Single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) provides a leap forward in resolving cellular diversity and developmental trajectories but fails to comprehensively delineate the spatial organization and precise cellular makeup of individual embryos. Here, we reconstruct from scRNA-seq and light sheet imaging data a canonical digital embryo that captures the genome-wide gene expression trajectory of every single cell at every cell division in the 18 lineages up to gastrulation in the ascidian Phallusia mammillata. By using high-coverage scRNA-seq, we devise a computational framework that stratifies single cells of individual embryos into cell types without prior knowledge. Unbiased transcriptome data analysis mapped each cell's physical position and lineage history, yielding the complete history of gene expression at the genome-wide level for every single cell in a developing embryo. A comparison of individual embryos reveals both extensive reproducibility between symmetric embryo sides and a large inter-embryonic variability due to small differences in embryogenesis timing.

摘要: 单细胞RNA测序（scRNA-seq）在解决细胞多样性和发育轨迹方面提供了飞跃，但未能全面描述单个胚胎的空间组织和精确的细胞组成。在这里，我们从scRNA-seq和光片成像数据重建一个典型的数字胚胎，该胚胎捕获18个谱系中每个细胞分裂的每个单细胞的全基因组基因表达轨迹，直至在海鞘的阴茎中进行胃形成。通过使用高覆盖率的scRNA-seq，我们设计了一种计算框架，该框架可将单个胚胎的单个细胞分层为没有先验知识的细胞类型。公正的转录组数据分析可绘制每个细胞的物理位置和谱系历史记录，从而为发育中的胚胎中的每个单个细胞提供全基因组水平的完整基因表达历史。单个胚胎的比较揭示了对称胚胎侧之间的广泛再现性和由于胚胎发生时间的微小差异而导致的较大的胚间变异性。

Pubmed_ID: 32315029

Chromosome-level reference genome of the jellyfish Rhopilema esculentum

水母Rhopilema esculentum的染色体水平参考基因组

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa036

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32315029/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 04/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Jellyfish belong to the phylum Cnidaria, which occupies an important phylogenetic location in the early-branching Metazoa lineages. The jellyfish Rhopilema esculentum is an important fishery resource in China. However, the genome resource of R. esculentum has not been reported to date. Findings: In this study, we constructed a chromosome-level genome assembly of R. esculentum using Pacific Biosciences, Illumina, and Hi-C sequencing technologies. The final genome assembly was ∼275.42 Mb, with a contig N50 length of 1.13 Mb. Using Hi-C technology to identify the contacts among contigs, 260.17 Mb (94.46%) of the assembled genome were anchored onto 21 pseudochromosomes with a scaffold N50 of 12.97 Mb. We identified 17,219 protein-coding genes, with an average CDS length of 1,575 bp. The genome-wide phylogenetic analysis indicated that R. esculentum might have evolved more slowly than the other scyphozoan species used in this study. In addition, 127 toxin-like genes were identified, and 1 toxin-related "hub" was found by a genomic survey. Conclusions: We have generated a chromosome-level genome assembly of R. esculentum that could provide a valuable genomic background for studying the biology and pharmacology of jellyfish, as well as the evolutionary history of Cnidaria.

摘要: 背景：水母属于Cindaria门，在早期分支的后生动物谱系中占有重要的系统发育位置。海es是中国重要的渔业资源。然而，迄今尚未报道过番茄的基因组资源。发现：在这项研究中，我们使用PacificBiosciences，Illumina和Hi-C测序技术构建了番茄的染色体级基因组装配体。最终的基因组组装约为275.42Mb，重叠群N50长度为1.13Mb。使用Hi-C技术鉴定重叠群之间的接触，将260.17Mb（94.46％）的组装基因组锚定在21个假染色体上，其N50支架为12.97Mb。我们确定了17,219个蛋白质编码基因，平均CDS长度为1,575bp。全基因组范围内的系统发育分析表明，与该研究中使用的其他裂殖子物种相比，R。esculentum的进化速度可能更慢。另外，鉴定了127个毒素样基因，并且通过基因组调查发现了1个毒素相关的“集线器”。结论：我们已经产生了番茄的染色体级基因组装配体，可以为研究水母的生物学和药理学，以及刺C的进化史提供有价值的基因组背景。

Pubmed_ID: 32315028

SRPRISM (Single Read Paired Read Indel Substitution Minimizer): an efficient aligner for assemblies with explicit guarantees

SRPRISM（单读对读Indel替代最小化器）：有效的对准器，具有明确的保证

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa023

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32315028/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 04/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Alignment of sequence reads generated by next-generation sequencing is an integral part of most pipelines analyzing next-generation sequencing data. A number of tools designed to quickly align a large volume of sequences are already available. However, most existing tools lack explicit guarantees about their output. They also do not support searching genome assemblies, such as the human genome assembly GRCh38, that include primary and alternate sequences and placement information for alternate sequences to primary sequences in the assembly. Findings: This paper describes SRPRISM (Single Read Paired Read Indel Substitution Minimizer), an alignment tool for aligning reads without splices. SRPRISM has features not available in most tools, such as (i) support for searching genome assemblies with alternate sequences, (ii) partial alignment of reads with a specified region of reads to be included in the alignment, (iii) choice of ranking schemes for alignments, and (iv) explicit criteria for search sensitivity. We compare the performance of SRPRISM to GEM, Kart, STAR, BWA-MEM, Bowtie2, Hobbes, and Yara using benchmark sets for paired and single reads of lengths 100 and 250 bp generated using DWGSIM. SRPRISM found the best results for most benchmark sets with error rate of up to ∼2.5% and GEM performed best for higher error rates. SRPRISM was also more sensitive than other tools even when sensitivity was reduced to improve run time performance. Conclusions: We present SRPRISM as a flexible read mapping tool that provides explicit guarantees on results.

摘要: 背景：由下一代测序产生的序列读数的比对是分析下一代测序数据的大多数流程的必不可少的部分。已经有许多旨在快速比对大量序列的工具。但是，大多数现有工具都缺乏对其输出的明确保证。它们还不支持搜索基因组程序集，例如人类基因组程序集GRCh38，其包括主要序列和替代序列，以及组装中主要序列的替代序列的放置信息。发现：本文介绍了SRPRISM（单读配对读插入缺失替换最小化器），这是一种用于对齐无接头的对齐工具。SRPRISM具有大多数工具不具备的功能，例如（i）支持搜索具有替代序列的基因组装配，（ii）将阅读物与要包含在比对中的特定阅读区域进行部分比对，（iii）选择排名方案进行比对，以及（iv）明确的搜索敏感度标准。我们使用基准集比较了SRPRISM与GEM，Kart，STAR，BWA-MEM，Bowtie2，Hobbes和Yara的性能，它们使用DWGSIM生成的长度分别为100和250bp的配对和单次读取。SRPRISM在大多数基准测试集上发现了最佳结果，错误率高达〜2.5％，GEM在较高错误率下表现最佳。SRPRISM也比其他工具敏感，即使降低了敏感度以提高运行时性能也是如此。结论：我们将SRPRISM作为一种灵活的读取映射工具，为结果提供明确的保证。

Pubmed_ID: 32314488

Genome-wide binding analysis reveals that ANAC060 directly represses sugar-induced transcription of ABI5 in Arabidopsis

全基因组结合分析表明，ANAC060直接抑制拟南芥中糖诱导的ABI5转录

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14777

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32314488/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: The sugar status of a plant acts as a signal affecting growth and development. The phenomenon by which high levels of sugars inhibit seedling establishment has been widely used to gain insight into sugar-signaling pathways. Natural allelic variation has been identified at the ANAC060 locus. The Arabidopsis Columbia ecotype produces a short ANAC060 protein without a transmembrane domain that is constitutively located to the nucleus, causing sugar insensitivity when overexpressed. In this study, we generated a genome-wide DNA-binding map of ANAC060 via chromatin immunoprecipitation sequencing using transgenic lines that express a functional ANAC060-GFP fusion protein in an anac060 background. A total of 3282 genes associated with ANAC060-binding sites were identified. These genes were enriched in biotic and abiotic stress responses, and the G-box binding motif was highly enriched in ANAC060-bound genomic regions. Expression microarray analysis resulted in the identification of 8350 genes whose activities were altered in the anac060 mutant and upon sugar treatment. Cluster analysis revealed that ANAC060 attenuates sugar-regulated gene expression. Direct target genes of ANAC060 included equivalent numbers of genes that were upregulated or downregulated by ANAC060. The various functions of these target genes indicate that ANAC060 has several functions. Our results demonstrate that ANAC060 directly binds to the promoter of ABI5 and represses the sugar-induced transcription of ABI5. Genetic data indicate that ABI5 is epistatic to ANAC060 in both sugar and abscisic acid responses.

摘要: 植物的糖状态是影响生长发育的信号。高水平糖抑制幼苗生长的现象已被广泛用于深入了解糖信号通路。在ANAC060基因座已鉴定出天然等位基因变异。拟南芥哥伦比亚生态型产生短的ANAC060蛋白，而该蛋白没有跨膜结构域，其结构性地位于细胞核上，过表达会导致糖不敏感。在这项研究中，我们使用了在anac060背景中表达功能性ANAC060-GFP融合蛋白的转基因品系，通过染色质免疫沉淀测序，生成了ANAC060的全基因组DNA结合图。总共鉴定了3282个与ANAC060结合位点相关的基因。这些基因富含生物和非生物胁迫响应，而G-box结合基序高度富集于结合ANAC060的基因组区域。表达微阵列分析导致鉴定了8350个基因，这些基因的活性在anac060突变体和糖处理后发生了变化。聚类分析表明，ANAC060减弱了糖调节基因的表达。ANAC060的直接靶基因包括等效数目的被ANAC060上调或下调的基因。这些靶基因的各种功能表明ANAC060具有多种功能。我们的结果表明，ANAC060直接与ABI5的启动子结合并抑制糖诱导的ABI5的转录。遗传数据表明，糖和脱落酸应答中ABI5都比ANAC060上位。

Pubmed_ID: 32314451

Peeling back the layers of crassulacean acid metabolism: functional differentiation between Kalanchoë fedtschenkoi epidermis and mesophyll proteomes

剥去头皮中的克拉苏酸代谢层：Kalanchoëfedtschenkoi表皮和叶肉蛋白质组之间的功能区分

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14757

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32314451/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul
