Abstract: Crassulacean acid metabolism (CAM) is a specialized mode of photosynthesis that offers the potential to engineer improved water-use efficiency (WUE) and drought resilience in C3 plants while sustaining productivity in the hotter and drier climates that are predicted for much of the world. CAM species show an inverted pattern of stomatal opening and closing across the diel cycle, which conserves water and provides a means of maintaining growth in hot, water-limited environments. Recent genome sequencing of the constitutive model CAM species Kalanchoë fedtschenkoi provides a platform for elucidating the ensemble of proteins that link photosynthetic metabolism with stomatal movement, and that protect CAM plants from harsh environmental conditions. We describe a large-scale proteomics analysis to characterize and compare proteins, as well as diel changes in their abundance in guard cell-enriched epidermis and mesophyll cells from leaves of K. fedtschenkoi. Proteins implicated in processes that encompass respiration, the transport of water and CO2 , stomatal regulation, and CAM biochemistry are highlighted and discussed. Diel rescheduling of guard cell starch turnover in K. fedtschenkoi compared with that observed in Arabidopsis is reported and tissue-specific localization in the epidermis and mesophyll of isozymes implicated in starch and malate turnover are discussed in line with the contrasting roles for these metabolites within the CAM mesophyll and stomatal complex. These data reveal the proteins and the biological processes enriched in each layer and provide key information for studies aiming to adapt plants to hot and dry environments by modifying leaf physiology for improved plant sustainability.

摘要: Crassulacean酸代谢（CAM）是一种特殊的光合作用模式，具有潜力，可改善C3植物的水分利用效率（WUE）和干旱适应性，同时在世界上大部分地区预计的较热和干燥的气候下保持生产力。CAM物种在整个diel周期内显示出气孔打开和关闭的倒置模式，从而节约了水，并提供了一种在高温，缺水的环境中维持生长的方式。本构模型CAM物种Kalanchoëfedtschenkoi的最新基因组测序提供了一个平台，用于阐明将光合代谢与气孔运动相关联的蛋白质的集合，并保护CAM植物免受恶劣环境条件的侵害。我们描述了大规模的蛋白质组学分析，以表征和比较蛋白质，以及来自K.fedtschenkoi叶的富含保卫细胞的表皮和叶肉细胞中其丰度的狄尔变化。涉及并讨论了涉及呼吸，水和二氧化碳的输送，气孔调节和CAM生物化学的过程中涉及的蛋白质。与拟南芥中观察到的相比，K。fedtschenkoi中保卫细胞淀粉转换的Diel重新安排有报道，并且与淀粉和苹果酸转换相关的表皮和同工酶的叶肉组织特异性定位已被讨论，这与这些代谢物在植物体内的相反作用相一致。CAM叶肉和气孔复合体。这些数据揭示了每一层中丰富的蛋白质和生物过程，并为旨在通过修改叶片生理特性以改善植物可持续性而使植物适应炎热和干燥环境的研究提供了关键信息。

Pubmed_ID: 32314448

Relationships between genome methylation, levels of non-coding RNAs, mRNAs and metabolites in ripening tomato fruit

番茄果实成熟过程中基因组甲基化，非编码RNA，mRNA和代谢物含量之间的关系

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14778

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32314448/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Aug

Abstract: Ripening of tomato fruit is a complex tightly orchestrated developmental process that involves multiple physiological and metabolic changes that render fruit attractive, palatable and nutritious. Ripening requires initiation, activation and coordination of key pathways at the transcriptional and post-transcriptional levels that lead to ethylene synthesis and downstream ripening events determining quality. We studied wild-type, Gr and r mutant fruits at the coding and non-coding transcriptomic, metabolomic and genome methylation levels. Numerous differentially expressed non-coding RNAs were identified and quantified and potential competing endogenous RNA regulation models were constructed. Multiple changes in gene methylation were linked to the ethylene pathway and ripening processes. A combined analysis of changes in genome methylation, long non-coding RNAs, circular RNAs, micro-RNAs and fruit metabolites revealed many differentially expressed genes (DEGs) with differentially methylated regions encoding transcription factors and key enzymes related to ethylene or carotenoid pathways potentially targeted by differentially expressed non-coding RNAs. These included ACO2 (targeted by MSTRG.59396.1 and miR396b), CTR1 (targeted by MSTRG.43594.1 and miR171b), ERF2 (targeted by MSTRG.183681.1), ERF5 (targeted by miR9470-3p), PSY1 (targeted by MSTRG.95226.7), ZISO (targeted by 12:66127788|66128276) and NCED (targeted by MSTRG.181568.2). Understanding the functioning of this intricate genetic regulatory network provides new insights into the underlying integration and relationships between the multiple events that collectively determine the ripe phenotype.

摘要: 番茄果实的成熟是一个紧密协调的复杂发展过程，涉及多个生理和代谢变化，使果实具有吸引力，可口和营养。成熟需要在转录和转录后水平上启动，激活和协调关键途径，从而导致乙烯合成和下游成熟事件决定质量。我们在编码和非编码转录组，代谢组学和基因组甲基化水平上研究了野生型，Gr和r突变体水果。鉴定并定量了许多差异表达的非编码RNA，并建立了潜在竞争的内源RNA调控模型。基因甲基化的多种变化与乙烯途径和成熟过程有关。对基因组甲基化，长非编码RNA，环状RNA，微小RNA和水果代谢产物的甲基化变化的综合分析显示，许多差异表达基因（DEG）具有差异甲基化的区域，这些区域编码可能与靶向的乙烯或类胡萝卜素途径相关的转录因子和关键酶通过差异表达的非编码RNA。其中包括ACO2（以MSTRG.59396.1和miR396b为目标），CTR1（以MSTRG.43594.1和miR171b为目标），ERF2（以MSTRG.183681.1为目标），ERF5（以miR9470-3p为目标），PSY1（以MSTRG.95226.7为目标）。，ZISO（由12：66127788|66128276定位）和NCED（由MSTRG.181568.2定位）。了解这种复杂的遗传调控网络的功能，可以为潜在的整合和多个事件之间的关系提供新的见解，这些事件共同决定了成熟的表型。

Pubmed_ID: 32313248

Liability threshold modeling of case-control status and family history of disease increases association power

病例控制状态和疾病家族史的责任阈值建模提高了关联能力

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0613-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32313248/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: Family history of disease can provide valuable information in case-control association studies, but it is currently unclear how to best combine case-control status and family history of disease. We developed an association method based on posterior mean genetic liabilities under a liability threshold model, conditional on case-control status and family history (LT-FH). Analyzing 12 diseases from the UK Biobank (average N = 350,000) we compared LT-FH to genome-wide association without using family history (GWAS) and a previous proxy-based method incorporating family history (GWAX). LT-FH was 63% (standard error (s.e.) 6%) more powerful than GWAS and 36% (s.e. 4%) more powerful than the trait-specific maximum of GWAS and GWAX, based on the number of independent genome-wide-significant loci across all diseases (for example, 690 loci for LT-FH versus 423 for GWAS); relative improvements were similar when applying BOLT-LMM to GWAS, GWAX and LT-FH phenotypes. Thus, LT-FH greatly increases association power when family history of disease is available.

摘要: 疾病家族史可以在病例对照协会研究中提供有价值的信息，但是目前尚不清楚如何最好地结合病例对照状态和疾病家族史。我们根据责任控制阈值和家族史（LT-FH），在责任阈值模型下基于后平均遗传责任开发了一种关联方法。分析了来自英国生物库的12种疾病（平均N=350,000），我们比较了LT-FH与全基因组关联而不使用家族史（GWAS）和先前基于代理的结合家族史（GWAX）的方法。根据独立的全基因组数目，LT-FH比GWAS强63％（标准误（se）6％），比GWAS和GWAX的特异性最大值强36％（se4％）。在所有疾病中都有重要的基因座（例如，LT-FH为690个基因座，而GWAS为423个基因座）；将BOLT-LMM应用于GWAS，GWAX和LT-FH表型时，相对改进是相似的。因此，在有家族病史的情况下，LT-FH大大提高了关联能力。

Pubmed_ID: 32313247

Genomic diversifications of five Gossypium allopolyploid species and their impact on cotton improvement

五种棉同种多倍体物种的基因组多样化及其对棉花改良的影响

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0614-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32313247/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: Polyploidy is an evolutionary innovation for many animals and all flowering plants, but its impact on selection and domestication remains elusive. Here we analyze genome evolution and diversification for all five allopolyploid cotton species, including economically important Upland and Pima cottons. Although these polyploid genomes are conserved in gene content and synteny, they have diversified by subgenomic transposon exchanges that equilibrate genome size, evolutionary rate heterogeneities and positive selection between homoeologs within and among lineages. These differential evolutionary trajectories are accompanied by gene-family diversification and homoeolog expression divergence among polyploid lineages. Selection and domestication drive parallel gene expression similarities in fibers of two cultivated cottons, involving coexpression networks and N6-methyladenosine RNA modifications. Furthermore, polyploidy induces recombination suppression, which correlates with altered epigenetic landscapes and can be overcome by wild introgression. These genomic insights will empower efforts to manipulate genetic recombination and modify epigenetic landscapes and target genes for crop improvement.

摘要: 多倍体是许多动物和所有开花植物的进化创新，但其对选择和驯化的影响仍然难以捉摸。在这里，我们分析了所有五种多倍体棉种的基因组进化和多样化，包括具有经济意义的陆地棉和皮马棉。尽管这些多倍体基因组在基因含量和同义性上是保守的，但它们已经通过亚基因组转座子交换而多样化，从而平衡了基因组的大小，进化速率的异质性以及沿袭和沿袭同源物之间的正向选择。这些不同的进化轨迹伴随着多倍体谱系之间的基因家族多样化和同源表达差异。选择和驯化驱动两个栽培棉纤维中平行基因表达的相似性，涉及共表达网络和N6-甲基腺苷RNA修饰。此外，多倍体诱导重组抑制，这与改变的表观遗传环境相关，可以通过野生渗入克服。这些基因组见解将使人们能够进行遗传重组，修饰表观遗传景观和目标基因以改善作物。

Pubmed_ID: 32313138

Nuclear-encoded synthesis of the D1 subunit of photosystem II increases photosynthetic efficiency and crop yield

核编码的光系统II D1亚基的合成提高了光合效率和作物产量

DOI: 10.1038/s41477-020-0629-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32313138/

Journal: Nature plants {'ISSN': '2055-026x', 'Name': 'nature plants', '2015': '0', '2016': '10.3', '2017': '11.471', '2018': '13.297', '2019': '13.256'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: In photosynthetic organisms, the photosystem II (PSII) complex is the primary target of thermal damage. Plants have evolved a repair process to prevent the accumulation of damaged PSII. The repair of PSII largely involves de novo synthesis of proteins, particularly the D1 subunit protein encoded by the chloroplast gene psbA. Here we report that the allotropic expression of the psbA complementary DNA driven by a heat-responsive promoter in the nuclear genome sufficiently protects PSII from severe loss of D1 protein and dramatically enhances survival rates of the transgenic plants of Arabidopsis, tobacco and rice under heat stress. Unexpectedly, we found that the nuclear origin supplementation of the D1 protein significantly stimulates transgenic plant growth by enhancing net CO2 assimilation rates with increases in biomass and grain yield. These findings represent a breakthrough in bioengineering plants to achieve efficient photosynthesis and increase crop productivity under normal and heat-stress conditions.

摘要: 在光合生物中，光系统II（PSII）复合体是热损伤的主要目标。植物已经进化出一种修复过程来防止受损PSII的积累。PSII的修复主要涉及蛋白质的重新合成，尤其是叶绿体psbA编码的D1亚基蛋白。在这里我们报道由核基因组中的热响应启动子驱动的psbA互补DNA的同素异形表达足以保护PSII免受D1蛋白的严重损失，并显着提高热胁迫下拟南芥，烟草和水稻的转基因植物的存活率。出乎意料的是，我们发现D1蛋白的核起源补充通过提高净CO2同化率以及生物量和谷物产量的增加来显着刺激转基因植物的生长。这些发现代表了生物工程植物的突破，可以在正常和高温条件下实现有效的光合作用并提高农作物的生产力。

Pubmed_ID: 32313011

Perturbing proteomes at single residue resolution using base editing

使用碱基编辑以单个残留物分辨率干扰蛋白质组

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15796-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32313011/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/20/2020

Abstract: Base editors derived from CRISPR-Cas9 systems and DNA editing enzymes offer an unprecedented opportunity for the precise modification of genes, but have yet to be used at a genome-scale throughput. Here, we test the ability of the Target-AID base editor to systematically modify genes genome-wide by targeting yeast essential genes. We mutate around 17,000 individual sites in parallel across more than 1500 genes. We identify over 700 sites at which mutations have a significant impact on fitness. Using previously determined and preferred Target-AID mutational outcomes, we find that gRNAs with significant effects on fitness are enriched in variants predicted to be deleterious based on residue conservation and predicted protein destabilization. We identify key features influencing effective gRNAs in the context of base editing. Our results show that base editing is a powerful tool to identify key amino acid residues at the scale of proteomes.

摘要: 源自CRISPR-Cas9系统的碱基编辑器和DNA编辑酶为基因的精确修饰提供了前所未有的机会，但尚未以基因组​​规模的通量使用。在这里，我们测试了Target-AID基础编辑器通过靶向酵母必需基因来系统地修饰全基因组基因的能力。我们在1500多个基因中并行变异了大约17,000个独立位点。我们确定了700多个位点，这些位点的突变对适应性有重大影响。使用先前确定的和首选的Target-AID突变结果，我们发现在适应性上具有显着影响的gRNA富含基于残基保守性和预测的蛋白质去稳定作用的有害预测变异体。我们在碱基编辑的背景下确定影响有效gRNA的关键特征。我们的结果表明，碱基编辑是在蛋白质组学规模上鉴定关键氨基酸残基的强大工具。

Pubmed_ID: 32313009

Molecular profiling of driver events in metastatic uveal melanoma

转移性葡萄膜黑色素瘤驱动事件的分子分析

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15606-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32313009/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/20/2020

Abstract: Metastatic uveal melanoma is less well understood than its primary counterpart, has a distinct biology compared to skin melanoma, and lacks effective treatments. Here we genomically profile metastatic tumors and infiltrating lymphocytes. BAP1 alterations are overrepresented and found in 29/32 of cases. Reintroducing a functional BAP1 allele into a deficient patient-derived cell line, reveals a broad shift towards a transcriptomic subtype previously associated with better prognosis of the primary disease. One outlier tumor has a high mutational burden associated with UV-damage. CDKN2A deletions also occur, which are rarely present in primaries. A focused knockdown screen is used to investigate overexpressed genes associated withcopy number gains. Tumor-infiltrating lymphocytes are in several cases found tumor-reactive, but expression of the immune checkpoint receptors TIM-3, TIGIT and LAG3 is also abundant. This study represents the largest whole-genome analysis of uveal melanoma to date, and presents an updated view of the metastatic disease.

摘要: 与原发性葡萄膜黑色素瘤相比，转移性葡萄膜黑色素瘤尚不为人所知，与皮肤黑色素瘤相比，它具有独特的生物学特性，并且缺乏有效的治疗方法。在这里，我们从基因组上分析转移性肿瘤和浸润性淋巴细胞。BAP1变更被过分代表，并在29/32个案例中发现。将功能性BAP1等位基因重新引入到患者来源不足的细胞系中，揭示了向转录组亚型的广泛转变，该亚型以前与原发性疾病的更好预后相关。一种离群肿瘤具有与紫外线损伤相关的高突变负担。CDKN2A删除也发生，这很少出现在原发中。集中的击倒筛选用于研究与拷贝数增加相关的过表达基因。在一些情况下，发现肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞具有肿瘤反应性，但免疫检查点受体TIM-3，TIGIT和LAG3的表达也很丰富。这项研究代表了葡萄膜黑色素瘤迄今为止最大的全基因组分析，并提出了转移性疾病的最新观点。

Pubmed_ID: 32312999

Heat stress-induced transposon activation correlates with 3D chromatin organization rearrangement in Arabidopsis

热应激诱导的转座子激活与拟南芥中的3D染色质组织重排有关

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15809-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32312999/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/20/2020

Abstract: In higher eukaryotes, heterochromatin is mainly composed of transposable elements (TEs) silenced by epigenetic mechanisms. But, the silencing of certain heterochromatin-associated TEs is disrupted by heat stress. By comparing genome-wide high-resolution chromatin packing patterns under normal or heat conditions obtained through Hi-C analysis, we show here that heat stress causes global rearrangement of the 3D genome in Arabidopsis thaliana. Contacts between pericentromeric regions and distal chromosome arms, as well as proximal intra-chromosomal interactions along the chromosomes, are enhanced. However, interactions within pericentromeres and those between distal intra-chromosomal regions are decreased. Many inter-chromosomal interactions, including those within the KNOT, are also reduced. Furthermore, heat activation of TEs exhibits a high correlation with the reduction of chromosomal interactions involving pericentromeres, the KNOT, the knob, and the upstream and downstream flanking regions of the activated TEs. Together, our results provide insights into the relationship between TE activation and 3D genome reorganization.

摘要: 在高级真核生物中，异染色质主要由通过表观遗传机制沉默的转座因子（TEs）组成。但是，某些异染色质相关的TE的沉默被热应激破坏。通过比较在正常条件下或通过Hi-C分析获得的热条件下的全基因组高分辨率染色质填充模式，我们在这里表明，热胁迫导致拟南芥中3D基因组的全局重排。着丝粒区域与远端染色体臂之间的接触以及沿染色体的近端染色体内相互作用都得到增强。但是，在着丝粒周围以及远端染色体内区域之间的相互作用减少了。许多染色体间的相互作用，包括在KNOT内的相互作用也被减少。此外，TEs的热激活与涉及到着丝粒，KNOT，纽结以及激活的TEs的上游和下游侧翼区域的染色体相互作用的减少表现出高度相关性。总之，我们的结果提供了关于TE激活与3D基因组重组之间关系的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32302591

Pooled Knockin Targeting for Genome Engineering of Cellular Immunotherapies

针对细胞免疫治疗基因组工程的联合敲除靶向。

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.03.039

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32302591/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 04/30/2020

Abstract: Adoptive transfer of genetically modified immune cells holds great promise for cancer immunotherapy. CRISPR knockin targeting can improve cell therapies, but more high-throughput methods are needed to test which knockin gene constructs most potently enhance primary cell functions in vivo. We developed a widely adaptable technology to barcode and track targeted integrations of large non-viral DNA templates and applied it to perform pooled knockin screens in primary human T cells. Pooled knockin of dozens of unique barcoded templates into the T cell receptor (TCR)-locus revealed gene constructs that enhanced fitness in vitro and in vivo. We further developed pooled knockin sequencing (PoKI-seq), combining single-cell transcriptome analysis and pooled knockin screening to measure cell abundance and cell state ex vivo and in vivo. This platform nominated a novel transforming growth factor β (TGF-β) R2-41BB chimeric receptor that improved solid tumor clearance. Pooled knockin screening enables parallelized re-writing of endogenous genetic sequences to accelerate discovery of knockin programs for cell therapies.

摘要: 基因修饰的免疫细胞的过继转移对于癌症免疫疗法具有广阔的前景。CRISPR敲入靶向可以改善细胞疗法，但是需要更多的高通量方法来测试哪种敲入基因构建体最有效地增强体内原代细胞的功能。我们开发了一种广泛适用的技术来条形码和跟踪大型非病毒DNA模板的靶向整合，并将其应用于在原代人T细胞中进行合并的敲入筛选。将数十种独特的条形码模板的敲入汇集到T细胞受体（TCR）-基因座中，揭示了在体外和体内增强适应性的基因构建体。我们进一步开发了合并的敲入测序（PoKI-seq），结合了单细胞转录组分析和合并的敲入筛选以测量离体和体内细胞丰度和细胞状态。该平台提名了一种新型的转化生长因子β（TGF-β）R2-41BB嵌合受体，可改善实体瘤清除率。合并的敲入筛选使内源性基因序列的并行重写能够加快细胞疗法敲入程序的发现。

Pubmed_ID: 32302590

Heterochromatin-Driven Nuclear Softening Protects the Genome against Mechanical Stress-Induced Damage

异染色质驱动的核软化保护基因组免受机械应力引起的损害

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.03.052

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32302590/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 05/14/2020

Abstract: Tissue homeostasis requires maintenance of functional integrity under stress. A central source of stress is mechanical force that acts on cells, their nuclei, and chromatin, but how the genome is protected against mechanical stress is unclear. We show that mechanical stretch deforms the nucleus, which cells initially counteract via a calcium-dependent nuclear softening driven by loss of H3K9me3-marked heterochromatin. The resulting changes in chromatin rheology and architecture are required to insulate genetic material from mechanical force. Failure to mount this nuclear mechanoresponse results in DNA damage. Persistent, high-amplitude stretch induces supracellular alignment of tissue to redistribute mechanical energy before it reaches the nucleus. This tissue-scale mechanoadaptation functions through a separate pathway mediated by cell-cell contacts and allows cells/tissues to switch off nuclear mechanotransduction to restore initial chromatin state. Our work identifies an unconventional role of chromatin in altering its own mechanical state to maintain genome integrity in response to deformation.

摘要: 组织稳态需要在压力下维持功能完整性。应力的主要来源是作用于细胞，其细胞核和染色质的机械力，但是如何保护基因组免受机械应力尚不清楚。我们显示机械拉伸使细胞核变形，细胞最初通过由H3K9me3标记的异染色质的损失驱动的钙依赖性核软化抵消。染色质流变学和结构的最终变化需要使遗传物质与机械力隔离。未能安装这种核机械反应会导致DNA损伤。持续的高振幅拉伸诱导组织的细胞上排列，从而在到达核之前重新分配机械能。这种组织规模的机械适应通过细胞-细胞接触介导的单独途径起作用，并允许细胞/组织关闭核机械转导以恢复初始染色质状态。我们的工作确定了染色质在改变自身机械状态以维持基因组完整性以应对变形中的非常规作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32302567

Cultured Asgard Archaea Shed Light on Eukaryogenesis

培养的阿斯加德古细菌对真核发生的影响

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.03.058

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32302567/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 04/16/2020

Abstract: The first cultured Asgard archaeon lives in metabolic symbiosis with hydrogen-scavenging microbes. Its full-genome analysis authenticates the existence of Asgard archaea, previously only known from metagenome-assembled genomes, confirms their closer phylogenetic relatedness to eukaryotes and reinforces the idea that the eukaryotic cell evolved from an integrated archaeal-bacterial syntrophic consortium.

摘要: 最早培养的阿斯加德古细菌生活在与氢清除微生物的代谢共生中。它的全基因组分析证实了以前仅从元基因组组装的基因组中才知道的Asgard古细菌的存在，证实了它们与真核生物的亲缘关系更紧密，并加强了真核细胞由整合的古细菌-细菌共生菌群进化而来的观点。

Pubmed_ID: 32300014

RepeatModeler2 for automated genomic discovery of transposable element families

RepeatModeler2用于转座因子家族的自动基因组发现

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1921046117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32300014/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/28/2020

Abstract: The accelerating pace of genome sequencing throughout the tree of life is driving the need for improved unsupervised annotation of genome components such as transposable elements (TEs). Because the types and sequences of TEs are highly variable across species, automated TE discovery and annotation are challenging and time-consuming tasks. A critical first step is the de novo identification and accurate compilation of sequence models representing all of the unique TE families dispersed in the genome. Here we introduce RepeatModeler2, a pipeline that greatly facilitates this process. This program brings substantial improvements over the original version of RepeatModeler, one of the most widely used tools for TE discovery. In particular, this version incorporates a module for structural discovery of complete long terminal repeat (LTR) retroelements, which are widespread in eukaryotic genomes but recalcitrant to automated identification because of their size and sequence complexity. We benchmarked RepeatModeler2 on three model species with diverse TE landscapes and high-quality, manually curated TE libraries: Drosophila melanogaster (fruit fly), Danio rerio (zebrafish), and Oryza sativa (rice). In these three species, RepeatModeler2 identified approximately 3 times more consensus sequences matching with >95% sequence identity and sequence coverage to the manually curated sequences than the original RepeatModeler. As expected, the greatest improvement is for LTR retroelements. Thus, RepeatModeler2 represents a valuable addition to the genome annotation toolkit that will enhance the identification and study of TEs in eukaryotic genome sequences. RepeatModeler2 is available as source code or a containerized package under an open license (https://github.com/Dfam-consortium/RepeatModeler, http://www.repeatmasker.org/RepeatModeler/).

摘要: 整个生命之树中基因组测序的加快步伐推动了对基因组组件（如转座因子（TEs））的无监督注释改进的需求。由于TE的类型和序列在物种之间变化很大，因此自动化的TE发现和注释是一项艰巨而耗时的任务。关键的第一步是从头开始鉴定和准确编译代表分布在基因组中的所有独特TE家族的序列模型。在这里，我们介绍RepeatModeler2，这是大大简化此过程的管道。该程序相对于RepeatModeler的原始版本进行了实质性改进，RepeatModeler是用于TE发现的最广泛使用的工具之一。特别是，此版本包含用于完整长末端重复序列（LTR）修饰结构发现模块的模块，该模块广泛存在于真核生物基因组中，但由于其大小和序列复杂性而难以自动识别。我们在具有不同TE景观和高质量，人工策划的TE库的三个模型物种上对RepeatModeler2进行了基准测试：果蝇（Drosophilamelanogaster，果蝇），斑马鱼（Daniorerio）和斑米（Oryzasativa）。在这三个物种中，RepeatModeler2识别出比原始RepeatModeler多约3倍的一致序列，它们与>95％的序列同一性和手动覆盖的序列的序列覆盖率相匹配。不出所料，最大的改进是LTR改进。因此，RepeatModeler2代表了对基因组注释工具包的宝贵补充，它将增强真核生物基因组序列中TE的鉴定和研究。在开放许可下（https://github.com/Dfam-consortium/RepeatModeler，http://www.repeatmasker.org/RepeatModeler/)，RepeatModeler2可以作为源代码或容器化的软件包使用。

Pubmed_ID: 32300008

A viral toolkit for recording transcription factor-DNA interactions in live mouse tissues

记录活小鼠组织中转录因子-DNA相互作用的病毒工具包

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1918241117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32300008/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 05/05/2020

Abstract: Transcription factors (TFs) enact precise regulation of gene expression through site-specific, genome-wide binding. Common methods for TF-occupancy profiling, such as chromatin immunoprecipitation, are limited by requirement of TF-specific antibodies and provide only end-point snapshots of TF binding. Alternatively, TF-tagging techniques, in which a TF is fused to a DNA-modifying enzyme that marks TF-binding events across the genome as they occur, do not require TF-specific antibodies and offer the potential for unique applications, such as recording of TF occupancy over time and cell type specificity through conditional expression of the TF-enzyme fusion. Here, we create a viral toolkit for one such method, calling cards, and demonstrate that these reagents can be delivered to the live mouse brain and used to report TF occupancy. Further, we establish a Cre-dependent calling cards system and, in proof-of-principle experiments, show utility in defining cell type-specific TF profiles and recording and integrating TF-binding events across time. This versatile approach will enable unique studies of TF-mediated gene regulation in live animal models.

摘要: 转录因子（TFs）通过位点特异性，全基因组结合来精确调控基因表达。TF占用情况分析的常用方法（例如染色质免疫沉淀）受TF特异性抗体的限制，并且仅提供TF结合的终点快照。或者，TF标签技术将TF与DNA修饰酶融合，该DNA修饰酶可在发生基因组时标记整个基因组中的TF结合事件，不需要TF特异性抗体，并且具有独特的应用潜力，例如记录通过条件表达的TF-酶融合来确定TF随时间的变化和细胞类型的特异性。在这里，我们为一种这样的方法（电话卡）创建了一个病毒工具包，并演示了这些试剂可以传递给活的小鼠大脑并用于报告TF占用情况。此外，我们建立了一个Cre相关的电话卡系统，并在原理证明实验中显示了在定义特定于细胞类型的TF谱图以及记录和整合跨时间的TF绑定事件方面的效用。这种通用的方法将使在活体动物模型中进行TF介导的基因调控的独特研究成为可能。

Pubmed_ID: 32299917

Mechanisms generating cancer genome complexity from a single cell division error

由单个细胞分裂错误产生癌症基因组复杂性的机制

DOI: 10.1126/science.aba0712

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32299917/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 04/17/2020

Abstract: The chromosome breakage-fusion-bridge (BFB) cycle is a mutational process that produces gene amplification and genome instability. Signatures of BFB cycles can be observed in cancer genomes alongside chromothripsis, another catastrophic mutational phenomenon. We explain this association by elucidating a mutational cascade that is triggered by a single cell division error-chromosome bridge formation-that rapidly increases genomic complexity. We show that actomyosin forces are required for initial bridge breakage. Chromothripsis accumulates, beginning with aberrant interphase replication of bridge DNA. A subsequent burst of DNA replication in the next mitosis generates extensive DNA damage. During this second cell division, broken bridge chromosomes frequently missegregate and form micronuclei, promoting additional chromothripsis. We propose that iterations of this mutational cascade generate the continuing evolution and subclonal heterogeneity characteristic of many human cancers.

摘要: 染色体断裂-融合-桥（BFB）循环是一个突变过程，可产生基因扩增和基因组不稳定。BFB周期的标志可以在癌症基因组中与色霉菌病一起观察到，这是另一个灾难性的突变现象。我们通过阐明由单个细胞分裂错误-染色体桥形成触发的突变级联反应来解释这种关联，该突变级联会迅速增加基因组的复杂性。我们表明，最初的桥梁断裂需要放线菌素力。从桥DNA的异常间期复制开始，染色体上的菌丝增多。下一个有丝分裂中随后的DNA复制爆发会产生广泛的DNA损伤。在第二次细胞分裂过程中，断裂的桥染色体经常失聚并形成微核，从而促进了附加的色鳞病。我们建议这种突变级联的迭代生成许多人类癌症的持续进化和亚克隆异质性特征。

Pubmed_ID: 32296183

A reference map of the human binary protein interactome

人二元蛋白质相互作用组的参考图

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2188-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32296183/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Global insights into cellular organization and genome function require comprehensive understanding of the interactome networks that mediate genotype-phenotype relationships1,2. Here we present a human 'all-by-all' reference interactome map of human binary protein interactions, or 'HuRI'. With approximately 53,000 protein-protein interactions, HuRI has approximately four times as many such interactions as there are high-quality curated interactions from small-scale studies. The integration of HuRI with genome3, transcriptome4 and proteome5 data enables cellular function to be studied within most physiological or pathological cellular contexts. We demonstrate the utility of HuRI in identifying the specific subcellular roles of protein-protein interactions. Inferred tissue-specific networks reveal general principles for the formation of cellular context-specific functions and elucidate potential molecular mechanisms that might underlie tissue-specific phenotypes of Mendelian diseases. HuRI is a systematic proteome-wide reference that links genomic variation to phenotypic outcomes.

摘要: 对细胞组织和基因组功能的全球见解需要对介导基因型-表型关系1,2的相互作用组网络的全面理解。在这里，我们介绍了人类二进制蛋白质相互作用或“HuRI”的人类“全部”参考相互作用组图。与大约53,000种蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用相比，HuRI的这种相互作用大约是小规模研究中高质量策划的相互作用的四倍。HuRI与基因组3，转录组4和蛋白质组5数据的整合，使得能够在大多数生理或病理性细胞环境中研究细胞功能。我们证明了HuRI在鉴定蛋白质间相互作用的特定亚细胞作用中的效用。推断的组织特异性网络揭示了形成细胞背景特异性功能的一般原理，并阐明了可能是孟德尔疾病组织特异性表型基础的潜在分子机制。HuRI是一个系统的全蛋白质组参考，将基因组变异与表型结果联系起来。

Pubmed_ID: 32296174

Gut stem cell necroptosis by genome instability triggers bowel inflammation

肠道干细胞坏死病由基因组不稳定引发肠道炎症

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2127-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32296174/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: The aetiology of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) is a multifactorial interplay between heredity and environment1,2. Here we report that deficiency in SETDB1, a histone methyltransferase that mediates the trimethylation of histone H3 at lysine 9, participates in the pathogenesis of IBD. We found that levels of SETDB1 are decreased in patients with IBD, and that mice with reduced SETDB1 in intestinal stem cells developed spontaneous terminal ileitis and colitis. SETDB1 safeguards genome stability3, and the loss of SETDB1 in intestinal stem cells released repression of endogenous retroviruses (retrovirus-like elements with long repeats that, in humans, comprise approximately 8% of the genome). Excessive viral mimicry generated by motivated endogenous retroviruses triggered Z-DNA-binding protein 1 (ZBP1)-dependent necroptosis, which irreversibly disrupted homeostasis of the epithelial barrier and promoted bowel inflammation. Genome instability, reactive endogenous retroviruses, upregulation of ZBP1 and necroptosis were all seen in patients with IBD. Pharmaceutical inhibition of RIP3 showed a curative effect in SETDB1-deficient mice, which suggests that targeting necroptosis of intestinal stem cells may represent an approach for the treatment of severe IBD.

摘要: 炎症性肠病（IBD）的病因是遗传与环境1,2之间的多因素相互作用。在这里我们报道SETDB1，组氨酸甲基转移酶介导组蛋白H3在赖氨酸9的三甲基化的缺乏参与IBD的发病机制。我们发现，IBD患者的SETDB1水平降低，而肠道干细胞中SETDB1降低的小鼠发展为自发性终末回肠炎和结肠炎。SETDB1可以保护基因组稳定性3，肠干细胞中SETDB1的丢失会释放内源性逆转录病毒（在人类中约占基因组8％的具有长重复序列的逆转录病毒样元件）的阻遏。有动机的内源性逆转录病毒产生的过度病毒模仿触发了Z-DNA结合蛋白1（ZBP1）依赖性坏死病，不可逆转地破坏了上皮屏障的稳态并促进了肠炎。在IBD患者中均观察到基因组不稳定，反应性内源性逆转录病毒，ZBP1上调和坏死性坏死。RIP3的药物抑制作用在SETDB1缺陷小鼠中显示出治愈效果，这表明靶向肠道干细胞坏死病可能代表了一种治疗严重IBD的方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32296059

Genome-wide analysis highlights contribution of immune system pathways to the genetic architecture of asthma

全基因组分析强调了免疫系统途径对哮喘遗传结构的贡献

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15649-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32296059/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/15/2020

Abstract: Asthma is a chronic and genetically complex respiratory disease that affects over 300 million people worldwide. Here, we report a genome-wide analysis for asthma using data from the UK Biobank and the Trans-National Asthma Genetic Consortium. We identify 66 previously unknown asthma loci and demonstrate that the susceptibility alleles in these regions are, either individually or as a function of cumulative genetic burden, associated with risk to a greater extent in men than women. Bioinformatics analyses prioritize candidate causal genes at 52 loci, including CD52, and demonstrate that asthma-associated variants are enriched in regions of open chromatin in immune cells. Lastly, we show that a murine anti-CD52 antibody mimics the immune cell-depleting effects of a clinically used human anti-CD52 antibody and reduces allergen-induced airway hyperreactivity in mice. These results further elucidate the genetic architecture of asthma and provide important insight into the immunological and sex-specific relevance of asthma-associated risk variants.

摘要: 哮喘是一种慢性和遗传复杂的呼吸系统疾病，全世界有3亿人受其影响。在这里，我们报告了来自英国生物库和跨国哮喘遗传联盟的数据对哮喘的全基因组分析。我们确定了66个以前未知的哮喘基因座，并证明这些区域的易感性等位基因单独或作为累积遗传负担的函数，与男性相比，与女性相比，其患病风险更大。生物信息学分析对包括CD52在内的52个基因座的候选病因基因进行了优先排序，并证明与哮喘相关的变异体富集在免疫细胞的开放染色质区域。最后，我们显示了鼠抗CD52抗体模仿了临床​​上使用的人抗CD52抗体的免疫细胞消耗效应，并降低了小鼠中变应原诱导的气道高反应性。这些结果进一步阐明了哮喘的遗传结构，并为哮喘相关风险变异的免疫学和性别特异性相关性提供了重要见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32296058

Spatially resolved analyses link genomic and immune diversity and reveal unfavorable neutrophil activation in melanoma

空间分辨分析将基因组和免疫多样性联系起来，揭示黑素瘤中嗜中性粒细胞的活化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15538-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32296058/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/15/2020

Abstract: Complex tumor microenvironmental (TME) features influence the outcome of cancer immunotherapy (IO). Here we perform immunogenomic analyses on 67 intratumor sub-regions of a PD-1 inhibitor-resistant melanoma tumor and 2 additional metastases arising over 8 years, to characterize TME interactions. We identify spatially distinct evolution of copy number alterations influencing local immune composition. Sub-regions with chromosome 7 gain display a relative lack of leukocyte infiltrate but evidence of neutrophil activation, recapitulated in The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) samples, and associated with lack of response to IO across three clinical cohorts. Whether neutrophil activation represents cause or consequence of local tumor necrosis requires further study. Analyses of T-cell clonotypes reveal the presence of recurrent priming events manifesting in a dominant T-cell clonotype over many years. Our findings highlight the links between marked levels of genomic and immune heterogeneity within the physical space of a tumor, with implications for biomarker evaluation and immunotherapy response.

摘要: 复杂的肿瘤微环境（TME）功能会影响癌症免疫治疗（IO）的结果。在这里，我们对PD-1抑制剂耐药性黑色素瘤肿瘤的67个肿瘤内亚区域和8年内发生的2个其他转移进行免疫基因组分析，以表征TME相互作用。我们确定了影响局部免疫成分的拷贝数变化在空间上的不同演变。具有7号染色体增益的子区域显示出相对缺乏白细胞浸润，但有嗜中性粒细胞激活的证据，在癌症基因组图谱（TCGA）样本中有所概括，并且与三个临床队列中对IO的响应均缺乏相关。中性粒细胞的活化是否代表局部肿瘤坏死的原因或后果尚待进一步研究。对T细胞克隆型的分析揭示了多年来以显性T细胞克隆型表现的反复启动事件的存在。我们的发现突出了肿瘤物理空间内基因组水平和免疫异质性水平之间的联系，这对生物标志物评估和免疫治疗反应具有重要意义。

Pubmed_ID: 32296054

Increased burden of ultra-rare structural variants localizing to boundaries of topologically associated domains in schizophrenia

超稀有结构变异的局限性增加到精神分裂症的拓扑相关域的边界

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15707-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32296054/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/15/2020

Abstract: Despite considerable progress in schizophrenia genetics, most findings have been for large rare structural variants and common variants in well-imputed regions with few genes implicated from exome sequencing. Whole genome sequencing (WGS) can potentially provide a more complete enumeration of etiological genetic variation apart from the exome and regions of high linkage disequilibrium. We analyze high-coverage WGS data from 1162 Swedish schizophrenia cases and 936 ancestry-matched population controls. Our main objective is to evaluate the contribution to schizophrenia etiology from a variety of genetic variants accessible to WGS but not by previous technologies. Our results suggest that ultra-rare structural variants that affect the boundaries of topologically associated domains (TADs) increase risk for schizophrenia. Alterations in TAD boundaries may lead to dysregulation of gene expression. Future mechanistic studies will be needed to determine the precise functional effects of these variants on biology.

摘要: 尽管精神分裂症的遗传学取得了长足的进步，但大多数发现是在良好插补区域发现了罕见的大型结构变体和常见变体，而很少有基因与外显子组测序相关。除了高连锁不平衡的外显子组和区域外，全基因组测序（WGS）可能会提供病因遗传变异的更完整列举。我们分析了来自1162例瑞典精神分裂症病例和936个血统匹配的人群对照的高覆盖率WGS数据。我们的主要目标是评估WGS可获得的多种遗传变异对精神分裂症病因的贡献，但以前的技术则无法。我们的结果表明，影响拓扑相关域（TAD）边界的超罕见结构变异会增加精神分裂症的风险。TAD边界的改变可能导致基因表达失调。需要进一步的机理研究来确定这些变体对生物学的精确功能作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32296040

A high-content RNAi screen reveals multiple roles for long noncoding RNAs in cell division

高内涵RNAi筛选揭示了长非编码RNA在细胞分裂中的多种作用

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14978-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32296040/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/15/2020

Abstract: Genome stability relies on proper coordination of mitosis and cytokinesis, where dynamic microtubules capture and faithfully segregate chromosomes into daughter cells. With a high-content RNAi imaging screen targeting more than 2,000 human lncRNAs, we identify numerous lncRNAs involved in key steps of cell division such as chromosome segregation, mitotic duration and cytokinesis. Here, we provide evidence that the chromatin-associated lncRNA, linc00899, leads to robust mitotic delay upon its depletion in multiple cell types. We perform transcriptome analysis of linc00899-depleted cells and identify the neuronal microtubule-binding protein, TPPP/p25, as a target of linc00899. We further show that linc00899 binds TPPP/p25 and suppresses its transcription. In cells depleted of linc00899, upregulation of TPPP/p25 alters microtubule dynamics and delays mitosis. Overall, our comprehensive screen uncovers several lncRNAs involved in genome stability and reveals a lncRNA that controls microtubule behaviour with functional implications beyond cell division.

摘要: 基因组的稳定性取决于有丝分裂和胞质分裂的适当协调，动态微管捕获并忠实地将染色体分离成子细胞。通过针对2000多个人lncRNA的高内涵RNAi成像屏幕，我们可以确定许多lncRNA参与细胞分裂的关键步骤，例如染色体分离，有丝分裂持续时间和胞质分裂。在这里，我们提供的证据表明，与染色质相关的lncRNA（linc00899）在多种细胞类型中消耗后会导致有力的有丝分裂延迟。我们对linc00899耗尽的细胞进行转录组分析，并确定神经元微管结合蛋白TPPP/p25作为linc00899的靶标。我们进一步显示，linc00899结合TPPP/p25并抑制其转录。在耗尽linc00899的细胞中，TPPP/p25的上调会改变微管动力学并延迟有丝分裂。总体而言，我们全面的筛选揭示了与基因组稳定性有关的几种lncRNA，并揭示了可控制微管行为并具有细胞分裂以外功能的lncRNA。

Pubmed_ID: 32286350

Synthetic biology based construction of biological activity-related library of fungal decalin-containing diterpenoid pyrones

基于合成生物学的含真菌十氢萘的二萜类吡喃酮生物活性相关文库的构建

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15664-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286350/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: A synthetic biology method based on heterologous biosynthesis coupled with genome mining is a promising approach for increasing the opportunities to rationally access natural product with novel structures and biological activities through total biosynthesis and combinatorial biosynthesis. Here, we demonstrate the advantage of the synthetic biology method to explore biological activity-related chemical space through the comprehensive heterologous biosynthesis of fungal decalin-containing diterpenoid pyrones (DDPs). Genome mining reveals putative DDP biosynthetic gene clusters distributed in five fungal genera. In addition, we design extended DDP pathways by combinatorial biosynthesis. In total, ten DDP pathways, including five native pathways, four extended pathways and one shunt pathway, are heterologously reconstituted in a genetically tractable heterologous host, Aspergillus oryzae, resulting in the production of 22 DDPs, including 15 new analogues. We also demonstrate the advantage of expanding the diversity of DDPs to probe various bioactive molecules through a wide range of biological evaluations.

摘要: 基于异源生物合成与基因组挖掘相结合的合成生物学方法是一种有前途的方法，可用于通过总生物合成和组合生物合成来增加合理地利用具有新颖结构和生物活性的天然产物的机会。在这里，我们证明了合成生物学方法的优势，即通过真菌含十氢化萘的二萜类吡喃酮（DDP）的全面异源生物合成来探索与生物活性有关的化学空间。基因组挖掘揭示了分布在五个真菌属中的推定的DDP生物合成基因簇。此外，我们通过组合生物合成设计了扩展的DDP途径。共有十个DDP途径，包括五个天然途径，四个延伸途径和一个分流途径，在遗传上易处理的异源宿主米曲霉中异源重组，从而产生22个DDP，包括15个新类似物。我们还展示了通过广泛的生物学评估扩展DDP多样性以探测各种生物活性分子的优势。

Pubmed_ID: 32286328

Proper chromosome alignment depends on BRCA2 phosphorylation by PLK1

正确的染色体排列取决于PLK1的BRCA2磷酸化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15689-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286328/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: The BRCA2 tumor suppressor protein is involved in the maintenance of genome integrity through its role in homologous recombination. In mitosis, BRCA2 is phosphorylated by Polo-like kinase 1 (PLK1). Here we describe how this phosphorylation contributes to the control of mitosis. We identify a conserved phosphorylation site at T207 of BRCA2 that constitutes a bona fide docking site for PLK1 and is phosphorylated in mitotic cells. We show that BRCA2 bound to PLK1 forms a complex with the phosphatase PP2A and phosphorylated-BUBR1. Reducing BRCA2 binding to PLK1, as observed in BRCA2 breast cancer variants S206C and T207A, alters the tetrameric complex resulting in unstable kinetochore-microtubule interactions, misaligned chromosomes, faulty chromosome segregation and aneuploidy. We thus reveal a role of BRCA2 in the alignment of chromosomes, distinct from its DNA repair function, with important consequences on chromosome stability. These findings may explain in part the aneuploidy observed in BRCA2-mutated tumors.

摘要: BRCA2肿瘤抑制蛋白通过其在同源重组中的作用参与基因组完整性的维持。在有丝分裂中，BRCA2被Polo样激酶1（PLK1）磷酸化。在这里，我们描述了这种磷酸化如何有助于控制有丝分裂。我们在BRCA2的T207处发现一个保守的磷酸化位点，该位点构成了PLK1的真正停靠位点，并在有丝分裂细胞中被磷酸化。我们显示绑定到PLK1的BRCA2与磷酸酶PP2A和磷酸化的BUBR1形成复合物。如在BRCA2乳腺癌变体S206C和T207A中观察到的，减少BRCA2与PLK1的结合会改变四聚体复合物，从而导致不稳定的动粒-微管相互作用，染色体错位，错误的染色体分离和非整倍性。因此，我们揭示了BRCA2在染色体排列中的作用，不同于其DNA修复功能，对染色体稳定性具有重要意义。这些发现可能部分解释了在BRCA2突变的肿瘤中观察到的非整倍性。

Pubmed_ID: 32286310

Sex-associated molecular differences for cancer immunotherapy

癌症免疫疗法中与性别相关的分子差异

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15679-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286310/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: Immune checkpoint blockade therapies have extended patient survival across multiple cancer lineages, but there is a heated debate on whether cancer immunotherapy efficacy is different between male and female patients. We summarize the existing meta-analysis to show inconsistent conclusions for whether gender is associated with the immunotherapy response. We analyze molecular profiling from ICB-treated patients to identify molecular differences for immunotherapy responsiveness. We perform comprehensive analyses for patients from The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) and reveal divergent patterns for sex bias in immune features across multiple cancer types. We further validate our observations in multiple independent data sets. Considering that the majority of clinical trials are in melanoma and lung cancer, meta-analyses that pool multiple cancer types have limitations to discern whether cancer immunotherapy efficacy is different between male and female patients. Future studies should include omics profiling to investigate sex-associated molecular differences in immunotherapy.

摘要: 免疫检查站封锁疗法已使患者在多种癌症谱系中的生存期延长，但是关于男性和女性患者的癌症免疫疗法功效是否存在争议。我们总结了现有的荟萃分析，以显示关于性别是否与免疫治疗反应相关的结论不一致。我们分析了来自ICB治疗患者的分子谱，以鉴定免疫治疗反应性的分子差异。我们对癌症基因组图谱（TCGA）的患者进行了综合分析，揭示了多种癌症类型免疫功能中性别偏见的差异模式。我们进一步验证了我们在多个独立数据集中的观察结果。考虑到大多数临床试验是在黑色素瘤和肺癌中进行的，荟萃分析汇总了多种癌症类型，在分辨男性和女性患者的癌症免疫疗法疗效是否有所不同方面存在局限性。未来的研究应包括组学分析，以研究免疫疗法中与性别相关的分子差异。

Pubmed_ID: 32286303

Cellular origins and genetic landscape of cutaneous gamma delta T cell lymphomas

皮肤γ-δT细胞淋巴瘤的细胞起源和遗传景观

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15572-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286303/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: Primary cutaneous γδ T cell lymphomas (PCGDTLs) represent a heterogeneous group of uncommon but aggressive cancers. Herein, we perform genome-wide DNA, RNA, and T cell receptor (TCR) sequencing on 29 cutaneous γδ lymphomas. We find that PCGDTLs are not uniformly derived from Vδ2 cells. Instead, the cell-of-origin depends on the tissue compartment from which the lymphomas are derived. Lymphomas arising from the outer layer of skin are derived from Vδ1 cells, the predominant γδ cell in the epidermis and dermis. In contrast, panniculitic lymphomas arise from Vδ2 cells, the predominant γδ T cell in the fat. We also show that TCR chain usage is non-random, suggesting common antigens for Vδ1 and Vδ2 lymphomas respectively. In addition, Vδ1 and Vδ2 PCGDTLs harbor similar genomic landscapes with potentially targetable oncogenic mutations in the JAK/STAT, MAPK, MYC, and chromatin modification pathways. Collectively, these findings suggest a paradigm for classifying, staging, and treating these diseases.

摘要: 原发性皮肤γδT细胞淋巴瘤（PCGDTL）代表了一组不常见但侵袭性癌症。在本文中，我们对29个皮肤γδ淋巴瘤进行了全基因组DNA，RNA和T细胞受体（TCR）测序。我们发现PCGDTL不是从Vδ2细胞中统一衍生的。相反，起源细胞取决于淋巴瘤所来自的组织区室。皮肤外层产生的淋巴瘤来源于Vδ1细胞，Vδ1细胞是表皮和真皮中的主要γδ细胞。相反，脂膜淋巴瘤由Vδ2细胞引起，Vδ2细胞是脂肪中主要的γδT细胞。我们还表明，TCR链的使用是非随机的，分别提示Vδ1和Vδ2淋巴瘤的常见抗原。此外，Vδ1和Vδ2PCGDTL具有相似的基因组格局，在JAK/STAT，MAPK，MYC和染色质修饰途径中可能具有潜在的致癌突变。总的来说，这些发现提出了分类，分期和治疗这些疾病的范例。

Pubmed_ID: 32286293

CdbA is a DNA-binding protein and c-di-GMP receptor important for nucleoid organization and segregation in Myxococcus xanthus

CdbA是一种DNA结合蛋白和c-di-GMP受体，对于黄色粘球菌中的类核苷酸组织和分离很重要

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15628-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286293/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: Cyclic di-GMP (c-di-GMP) is a second messenger that modulates multiple responses to environmental and cellular signals in bacteria. Here we identify CdbA, a DNA-binding protein of the ribbon-helix-helix family that binds c-di-GMP in Myxococcus xanthus. CdbA is essential for viability, and its depletion causes defects in chromosome organization and segregation leading to a block in cell division. The protein binds to the M. xanthus genome at multiple sites, with moderate sequence specificity; however, its depletion causes only modest changes in transcription. The interactions of CdbA with c-di-GMP and DNA appear to be mutually exclusive and residue substitutions in CdbA regions important for c-di-GMP binding abolish binding to both c-di-GMP and DNA, rendering these protein variants non-functional in vivo. We propose that CdbA acts as a nucleoid-associated protein that contributes to chromosome organization and is modulated by c-di-GMP, thus revealing a link between c-di-GMP signaling and chromosome biology.

摘要: 循环双GMP（c-di-GMP）是第二个信使，它调节细菌对环境和细胞信号的多重响应。在这里，我们确定CdbA，带状螺旋螺旋家族的一种DNA结合蛋白，它结合了xythus粘球菌中的c-di-GMP。CdbA对生存力至关重要，其耗尽会导致染色体组织和分离缺陷，从而导致细胞分裂受阻。该蛋白在多个位点结合黄腐多菌种基因组，具有中等序列特异性。但是，它的耗竭只会引起适度的转录变化。CdbA与c-di-GMP和DNA的相互作用似乎是互斥的，并且对于c-di-GMP结合重要的CdbA区中的残基取代取消了与c-di-GMP和DNA的结合，从而使这些蛋白质变体失去功能体内。我们建议CdbA作为一种有助于核苷酸组织的核苷酸相关蛋白，并由c-di-GMP调节，从而揭示c-di-GMP信号与染色体生物学之间的联系。

Pubmed_ID: 32286279

Chromatin architecture reorganization in murine somatic cell nuclear transfer embryos

小鼠体细胞核移植胚胎中的染色质结构重组

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15607-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286279/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: The oocyte cytoplasm can reprogram the somatic cell nucleus into a totipotent state, but with low efficiency. The spatiotemporal chromatin organization of somatic cell nuclear transfer (SCNT) embryos remains elusive. Here, we examine higher order chromatin structures of mouse SCNT embryos using a low-input Hi-C method. We find that donor cell chromatin transforms to the metaphase state rapidly after SCNT along with the dissolution of typical 3D chromatin structure. Intriguingly, the genome undergoes a mitotic metaphase-like to meiosis metaphase II-like transition following activation. Subsequently, weak chromatin compartments and topologically associating domains (TADs) emerge following metaphase exit. TADs are further removed until the 2-cell stage before being progressively reestablished. Obvious defects including stronger TAD boundaries, aberrant super-enhancer and promoter interactions are found in SCNT embryos. These defects are partially caused by inherited H3K9me3, and can be rescued by Kdm4d overexpression. These observations provide insight into chromatin architecture reorganization during SCNT embryo development.

摘要: 卵母细胞的细胞质可以将体细胞核重编程为全能状态，但效率较低。体细胞核移植（SCNT）胚胎的时空染色质组织仍然难以捉摸。在这里，我们检查使用低输入Hi-C方法的小鼠SCNT胚胎的高阶染色质结构。我们发现供体细胞染色质随着典型3D染色质结构的溶解而迅速转变为SCNT后的中期状态。有趣的是，基因组在激活后经历了从有丝分裂中期到减数分裂中期II的过渡。随后，弱染色质区室和拓扑关联域（TADs）在中期退出后出现。在逐步重建之前，将TAD进一步移除直到2单元阶段。在SCNT胚胎中发现了明显的缺陷，包括更强的TAD边界，异常的超增强子和启动子相互作用。这些缺陷部分是由继承的H3K9me3引起的，并且可以通过Kdm4d过表达来挽救。这些观察结果提供了SCNT胚胎发育过程中染色质结构重组的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32286267

Pan-active imidazolopiperazine antimalarials target the Plasmodium falciparum intracellular secretory pathway

泛活性咪唑并哌嗪抗疟药靶向恶性疟原虫细胞内分泌途径

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15440-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286267/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: A promising new compound class for treating human malaria is the imidazolopiperazines (IZP) class. IZP compounds KAF156 (Ganaplacide) and GNF179 are effective against Plasmodium symptomatic asexual blood-stage infections, and are able to prevent transmission and block infection in animal models. But despite the identification of resistance mechanisms in P. falciparum, the mode of action of IZPs remains unknown. To investigate, we here combine in vitro evolution and genome analysis in Saccharomyces cerevisiae with molecular, metabolomic, and chemogenomic methods in P. falciparum. Our findings reveal that IZP-resistant S. cerevisiae clones carry mutations in genes involved in Endoplasmic Reticulum (ER)-based lipid homeostasis and autophagy. In Plasmodium, IZPs inhibit protein trafficking, block the establishment of new permeation pathways, and cause ER expansion. Our data highlight a mechanism for blocking parasite development that is distinct from those of standard compounds used to treat malaria, and demonstrate the potential of IZPs for studying ER-dependent protein processing.

摘要: 咪唑并哌嗪类（IZP）是治疗人类疟疾的一种有希望的新化合物。IZP化合物KAF156（加那普利特）和GNF179对疟原虫有症状的无性血液阶段感染有效，并且能够在动物模型中预防传播和阻断感染。但是，尽管在恶性疟原虫中发现了抗药性机制，但IZP的作用方式仍然未知。为了进行调查，我们在这里结合了酿酒酵母的体外进化和基因组分析与恶性疟原虫的分子，代谢组学和化学基因组学方法。我们的发现表明，抗IZP的酿酒酵母克隆在与基于内质网（ER）的脂质稳态和自噬有关的基因中携带突变。在疟原虫中，IZPs抑制蛋白质运输，阻止新的渗透途径的建立，并导致内质网扩张。我们的数据突显了一种与其他用于治疗疟疾的标准化合物不同的阻断寄生虫发育的机制，并证明了IZP在研究ER依赖性蛋白加工中的潜力。

Pubmed_ID: 32286261

Transposable elements contribute to cell and species-specific chromatin looping and gene regulation in mammalian genomes

转座因子有助于哺乳动物基因组中细胞和物种特定的染色质循环和基因调控

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15520-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32286261/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: Chromatin looping is important for gene regulation, and studies of 3D chromatin structure across species and cell types have improved our understanding of the principles governing chromatin looping. However, 3D genome evolution and its relationship with natural selection remains largely unexplored. In mammals, the CTCF protein defines the boundaries of most chromatin loops, and variations in CTCF occupancy are associated with looping divergence. While many CTCF binding sites fall within transposable elements (TEs), their contribution to 3D chromatin structural evolution is unknown. Here we report the relative contributions of TE-driven CTCF binding site expansions to conserved and divergent chromatin looping in human and mouse. We demonstrate that TE-derived CTCF binding divergence may explain a large fraction of variable loops. These variable loops contribute significantly to corresponding gene expression variability across cells and species, possibly by refining sub-TAD-scale loop contacts responsible for cell-type-specific enhancer-promoter interactions.

摘要: 染色质环化对于基因调控非常重要，跨物种和细胞类型的3D染色质结构研究提高了我们对控制染色质环化原理的理解。但是，3D基因组进化及其与自然选择的关系仍未得到充分探索。在哺乳动物中，CTCF蛋白定义了大多数染色质环的边界，并且CTCF占用率的变化与环的发散有关。尽管许多CTCF结合位点位于转座因子（TEs）内，但它们对3D染色质结构演变的贡献尚不清楚。在这里，我们报告TE驱动CTCF结合位点扩展对人类和小鼠中的保守和发散染色质环的相对贡献。我们证明，TE衍生的CTCF绑定差异可能解释了很大一部分可变环。这些可变环可能通过提炼负责细胞类型特异性增强子-启动子相互作用的亚TAD规模的环接触而显着地促进了跨细胞和物种的相应基因表达变异。

Pubmed_ID: 32284579

Genome sequence of Gossypium herbaceum and genome updates of Gossypium arboreum and Gossypium hirsutum provide insights into cotton A-genome evolution

棉铃虫的基因组序列以及棉酚和陆地棉的基因组更新为棉花A基因组进化提供了见识

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0607-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32284579/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: Upon assembling the first Gossypium herbaceum (A1) genome and substantially improving the existing Gossypium arboreum (A2) and Gossypium hirsutum ((AD)1) genomes, we showed that all existing A-genomes may have originated from a common ancestor, referred to here as A0, which was more phylogenetically related to A1 than A2. Further, allotetraploid formation was shown to have preceded the speciation of A1 and A2. Both A-genomes evolved independently, with no ancestor-progeny relationship. Gaussian probability density function analysis indicates that several long-terminal-repeat bursts that occurred from 5.7 million years ago to less than 0.61 million years ago contributed compellingly to A-genome size expansion, speciation and evolution. Abundant species-specific structural variations in genic regions changed the expression of many important genes, which may have led to fiber cell improvement in (AD)1. Our findings resolve existing controversial concepts surrounding A-genome origins and provide valuable genomic resources for cotton genetic improvement.

摘要: 组装了第一个药用草（A1）基因组并显着改善了现有的棉花树（A2）和陆地棉（（AD）1）基因组后，我们证明了所有现有的A基因组都可能起源于一个共同的祖先。A0，与A1在系统发育上的相关性高于A2。此外，显示出异源四倍体形成先于A1和A2的形成。两种A基因组都是独立进化的，没有祖先与后代的关系。高斯概率密度函数分析表明，从570万年前到不到61万年前发生的几次长末端重复爆发，对A基因组大小的扩展，物种形成和进化起了引人注目的贡献。基因区域中丰富的物种特异性结构变异改变了许多重要基因的表达，这可能导致（AD）1中纤维细胞的改善。我们的发现解决了围绕A基因组起源的现有争议概念，并为棉花遗传改良提供了宝贵的基因组资源。

Pubmed_ID: 32284578

Identifying genetic variants underlying phenotypic variation in plants without complete genomes

鉴定没有完整基因组的植物表型变异的遗传变异

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0612-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32284578/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: Structural variants and presence/absence polymorphisms are common in plant genomes, yet they are routinely overlooked in genome-wide association studies (GWAS). Here, we expand the type of genetic variants detected in GWAS to include major deletions, insertions and rearrangements. We first use raw sequencing data directly to derive short sequences, k-mers, that mark a broad range of polymorphisms independently of a reference genome. We then link k-mers associated with phenotypes to specific genomic regions. Using this approach, we reanalyzed 2,000 traits in Arabidopsis thaliana, tomato and maize populations. Associations identified with k-mers recapitulate those found with SNPs, but with stronger statistical support. Importantly, we discovered new associations with structural variants and with regions missing from reference genomes. Our results demonstrate the power of performing GWAS before linking sequence reads to specific genomic regions, which allows the detection of a wider range of genetic variants responsible for phenotypic variation.

摘要: 结构变异和存在/不存在多态性在植物基因组中很常见，但在全基因组关联研究（GWAS）中通常被忽略。在这里，我们扩展了在GWAS中检测到的遗传变异的类型，包括主要的缺失，插入和重排。我们首先直接使用原始测序数据来推导短序列k-mers，这些短序列独立于参考基因组而标志着广泛的多态性。然后，我们将与表型相关的k-mers链接到特定的基因组区域。使用这种方法，我们重新分析了拟南芥，番茄和玉米种群中的2,000个性状。用k-mers鉴定的关联概括了用SNPs发现的关联，但具有更强的统计支持。重要的是，我们发现了与结构变异和参考基因组缺失的区域的新关联。我们的结果证明了在将序列读数连接至特定基因组区域之前执行GWAS的功能，这使得可以检测到负责表型变异的更广泛的遗传变异。

Pubmed_ID: 32284404

The T1D-associated lncRNA Lnc13 modulates human pancreatic β cell inflammation by allele-specific stabilization of STAT1 mRNA

与T1D相关的lncRNA Lnc13通过STAT1 mRNA的等位基因特异性稳定调节人类胰腺β细胞炎症

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1914353117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32284404/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/21/2020

Abstract: The vast majority of type 1 diabetes (T1D) genetic association signals lie in noncoding regions of the human genome. Many have been predicted to affect the expression and secondary structure of long noncoding RNAs (lncRNAs), but the contribution of these lncRNAs to the pathogenesis of T1D remains to be clarified. Here, we performed a complete functional characterization of a lncRNA that harbors a single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) associated with T1D, namely, Lnc13 Human pancreatic islets harboring the T1D-associated SNP risk genotype in Lnc13 (rs917997*CC) showed higher STAT1 expression than islets harboring the heterozygous genotype (rs917997*CT). Up-regulation of Lnc13 in pancreatic β-cells increased activation of the proinflammatory STAT1 pathway, which correlated with increased production of chemokines in an allele-specific manner. In a mirror image, Lnc13 gene disruption in β-cells partially counteracts polyinosinic-polycytidylic acid (PIC)-induced STAT1 and proinflammatory chemokine expression. Furthermore, we observed that PIC, a viral mimetic, induces Lnc13 translocation from the nucleus to the cytoplasm promoting the interaction of STAT1 mRNA with (poly[rC] binding protein 2) (PCBP2). Interestingly, Lnc13-PCBP2 interaction regulates the stability of the STAT1 mRNA, sustaining inflammation in β-cells in an allele-specific manner. Our results show that the T1D-associated Lnc13 may contribute to the pathogenesis of T1D by increasing pancreatic β-cell inflammation. These findings provide information on the molecular mechanisms by which disease-associated SNPs in lncRNAs influence disease pathogenesis and open the door to the development of diagnostic and therapeutic approaches based on lncRNA targeting.

摘要: 绝大多数1型糖尿病（T1D）遗传关联信号都位于人类基因组的非编码区域。已经预测许多影响长的非编码RNA（lncRNA）的表达和二级结构，但是这些lncRNA对T1D发病机理的贡献尚待阐明。在这里，我们对具有与T1D相关的单核苷酸多态性（SNP）的lncRNA进行了完整的功能表征，即在Lnc13（rs917997*CC）中具有T1D相关SNP风险基因型的Lnc13人胰岛显示的STAT1表达高于具有杂合基因型（rs917997*CT）的胰岛。胰腺β细胞中Lnc13的上调增加了促炎性STAT1途径的激活，这与等位基因特异性方式增加了趋化因子的产生有关。在镜像图中，β细胞中的Lnc13基因破坏部分抵消了多肌苷酸-聚胞苷酸（PIC）诱导的STAT1和促炎性趋化因子的表达。此外，我们观察到，PIC，一种病毒模拟物，诱导Lnc13从细胞核转移到细胞质，促进STAT1mRNA与（poly[rC]结合蛋白2）（PCBP2）的相互作用。有趣的是，Lnc13-PCBP2相互作用调节STAT1mRNA的稳定性，以等位基因特异性方式维持β细胞中的炎症。我们的结果表明，与T1D相关的Lnc13可能通过增加胰腺β细胞炎症而促进T1D的发病。这些发现提供了有关lncRNA中与疾病相关的SNP影响疾病发病机理的分子机制的信息，并为基于lncRNA靶向的诊断和治疗方法的发展打开了大门。

Pubmed_ID: 32282967

The foxtail millet (Setaria italica) terpene synthase gene family

谷子（Setaria italica）萜烯合酶基因家族

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14771

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32282967/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: Terpenoid metabolism plays vital roles in stress defense and the environmental adaptation of monocot crops. Here, we describe the identification of the terpene synthase (TPS) gene family of the panicoid food and bioenergy model crop foxtail millet (Setaria italica). The diploid S. italica genome contains 32 TPS genes, 17 of which were biochemically characterized in this study. Unlike other thus far investigated grasses, S. italica contains TPSs producing all three ent-, (+)- and syn-copalyl pyrophosphate stereoisomers that naturally occur as central building blocks in the biosynthesis of distinct monocot diterpenoids. Conversion of these intermediates by the promiscuous TPS SiTPS8 yielded different diterpenoid scaffolds. Additionally, a cytochrome P450 monooxygenase (CYP99A17), which genomically clustered with SiTPS8, catalyzes the C19 hydroxylation of SiTPS8 products to generate the corresponding diterpene alcohols. The presence of syntenic orthologs to about 19% of the S. italica TPSs in related grasses supports a common ancestry of selected pathway branches. Among the identified enzyme products, abietadien-19-ol, syn-pimara-7,15-dien-19-ol and germacrene-d-4-ol were detectable in planta, and gene expression analysis of the biosynthetic TPSs showed distinct and, albeit moderately, inducible expression patterns in response to biotic and abiotic stress. In vitro growth-inhibiting activity of abietadien-19-ol and syn-pimara-7,15-dien-19-ol against Fusarium verticillioides and Fusarium subglutinans may indicate pathogen defensive functions, whereas the low antifungal efficacy of tested sesquiterpenoids supports other bioactivities. Together, these findings expand the known chemical space of monocot terpenoid metabolism to enable further investigations of terpenoid-mediated stress resilience in these agriculturally important species.

摘要: 萜类代谢在胁迫防御和单子叶植物的环境适应中起着至关重要的作用。在这里，我们描述了萜类食物和生物能源模型农作物谷子（Setariaitalica）的萜烯合酶（TPS）基因家族的鉴定。二倍体意大利链球菌基因组包含32个TPS基因，其中17个在本研究中进行了生化鉴定。不同于迄今研究过的其他草，意大利链球菌含有TPS，它们产生所有三种对-，（+）-和顺-戊基焦磷酸立体异构体，它们自然地作为独特的单子叶植物二萜生物合成中的重要组成部分而存在。这些中间体通过混杂的TPSSiTPS8的转化产生了不同的二萜骨架。另外，基因组上与SiTPS8成簇的细胞色素P450单加氧酶（CYP99A17）催化SiTPS8产物的C19羟基化反应，生成相应的二萜醇。在相关草中存在约19％的S.italicaTPS的同系直系同源物支持所选途径分支的共同祖先。在鉴定出的酶产物中，可在植物中检测到abietadien-19-ol，syn-pimara-7,15-dien-19-ol和geracrene-d-4-ol，生物合成TPS的基因表达分析显示出不同的特征，尽管适度地响应生物和非生物胁迫诱导表达模式。Abietadien-19-ol和syn-pimara-7,15-dien-19-ol在体外对镰孢镰刀菌和枯萎镰刀菌的抑制作用可能表明病原体具有防御功能，而被测试的倍半萜类药物的抗真菌功效低也支持其他生物活性。在一起，这些发现扩展了单子叶植物萜类化合物代谢的已知化学空间，从而使这些农业上重要的物种中萜类化合物介导的胁迫复原力得以进一步研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32273397

Horizontal gene transfer of Fhb7 from fungus underlies Fusarium head blight resistance in wheat

真菌中Fhb7的水平基因转移是小麦镰刀菌抗白叶枯病的基础

DOI: 10.1126/science.aba5435

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32273397/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 05/22/2020

Abstract: Fusarium head blight (FHB), a fungal disease caused by Fusarium species that produce food toxins, currently devastates wheat production worldwide, yet few resistance resources have been discovered in wheat germplasm. Here, we cloned the FHB resistance gene Fhb7 by assembling the genome of Thinopyrum elongatum, a species used in wheat distant hybridization breeding. Fhb7 encodes a glutathione S-transferase (GST) and confers broad resistance to Fusarium species by detoxifying trichothecenes through de-epoxidation. Fhb7 GST homologs are absent in plants, and our evidence supports that Th. elongatum has gained Fhb7 through horizontal gene transfer (HGT) from an endophytic Epichloë species. Fhb7 introgressions in wheat confers resistance to both FHB and crown rot in diverse wheat backgrounds without yield penalty, providing a solution for Fusarium resistance breeding.

摘要: 镰刀菌枯萎病（FHB）是由产生食物毒素的镰刀菌属物种引起的真菌病，目前破坏了全世界的小麦生产，但在小麦种质中发现的抗药性资源很少。在这里，我们通过组装小麦远缘杂交育种中使用的Thinopyrumelongatum基因组克隆了FHB抗性基因Fhb7。Fhb7编码一种谷胱甘肽S-转移酶（GST），并通过脱环氧化作用使毛孢菌素解毒，从而赋予对镰刀菌种的广泛抗性。植物中不存在Fhb7GST同源物，我们的证据支持Th。elongatum已通过内生Epichloë物种的水平基因转移（HGT）获得了Fhb7。小麦中的Fhb7渗入使小麦在不同背景下均对FHB和冠腐病具有抗性，而不会造成产量损失，为镰刀菌抗性育种提供了解决方案。

Pubmed_ID: 32273390

Derived alleles of two axis proteins affect meiotic traits in autotetraploid Arabidopsis arenosa

两个轴蛋白的衍生等位基因影响拟四倍体拟南芥的减数分裂特征

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1919459117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32273390/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/21/2020

Abstract: Polyploidy, which results from whole genome duplication (WGD), has shaped the long-term evolution of eukaryotic genomes in all kingdoms. Polyploidy is also implicated in adaptation, domestication, and speciation. Yet when WGD newly occurs, the resulting neopolyploids face numerous challenges. A particularly pernicious problem is the segregation of multiple chromosome copies in meiosis. Evolution can overcome this challenge, likely through modification of chromosome pairing and recombination to prevent deleterious multivalent chromosome associations, but the molecular basis of this remains mysterious. We study mechanisms underlying evolutionary stabilization of polyploid meiosis using Arabidopsis arenosa, a relative of A. thaliana with natural diploid and meiotically stable autotetraploid populations. Here we investigate the effects of ancestral (diploid) versus derived (tetraploid) alleles of two genes, ASY1 and ASY3, that were among several meiosis genes under selection in the tetraploid lineage. These genes encode interacting proteins critical for formation of meiotic chromosome axes, long linear multiprotein structures that form along sister chromatids in meiosis and are essential for recombination, chromosome segregation, and fertility. We show that derived alleles of both genes are associated with changes in meiosis, including reduced formation of multichromosome associations, reduced axis length, and a tendency to more rod-shaped bivalents in metaphase I. Thus, we conclude that ASY1 and ASY3 are components of a larger multigenic solution to polyploid meiosis in which individual genes have subtle effects. Our results are relevant for understanding polyploid evolution and more generally for understanding how meiotic traits can evolve when faced with challenges.

摘要: 多倍体是全基因组复制（WGD）的结果，它决定了所有王国中真核基因组的长期进化。多倍体也与适应，驯化和物种形成有关。然而，当WGD刚出现时，所得的新多倍体将面临众多挑战。一个特别有害的问题是减数分裂中多个染色体拷贝的分离。进化可以克服这一挑战，可能是通过修饰染色体配对和重组来防止有害的多价染色体缔合，但其分子基础仍然是神秘的。我们研究使用拟南芥（Arabidopsisarenosa）拟南芥（A.thaliana）与天然二倍体和减数分裂稳定的同源四倍体种群的亲缘关系，对多倍体减数分裂的进化稳定机制。在这里，我们调查了两个基因ASY1和ASY3的祖先（二倍体）与衍生（四倍体）等位基因的影响，这两个基因是在四倍体谱系中选择的几个减数分裂基因之一。这些基因编码相互作用的蛋白质，这些蛋白质对于减数分裂染色体轴的形成，沿减数分裂的姊妹染色单体形成的长线性多蛋白结构至关重要，对于重组，染色体分离和受精至关重要。我们显示这两个基因的衍生等位基因与减数分裂的变化相关，包括减少的多染色体关联形成，减少的轴长以及在中期I趋于更多的杆状二价。因此，我们得出结论，ASY1和ASY3是多倍体减数分裂的更大的多基因解决方案，其中单个基因具有微妙的作用。我们的结果与理解多倍体进化有关，更广泛地与理解减数分裂性状在面临挑战时如何进化有关。

Pubmed_ID: 32270540

A global survey of the transcriptome of allopolyploid Brassica napus based on single-molecule long-read isoform sequencing and Illumina-based RNA sequencing data

基于单分子长读同工型测序和基于Illumina的RNA测序数据的异源多倍体甘蓝型油菜转录组的全球调查

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14754

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32270540/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: Brassica napus is a recent allopolyploid derived from the hybridization of Brassica rapa (Ar Ar ) and Brassica oleracea (Co Co ). Because of the high sequence similarity between the An and Cn subgenomes, it is difficult to provide an accurate landscape of the whole transcriptome of B. napus. To overcome this problem, we applied a single-molecule long-read isoform sequencing (Iso-Seq) technique that can produce long reads to explore the complex transcriptome of B. napus at the isoform level. From the Iso-Seq data, we obtained 147 698 non-redundant isoforms, capturing 37 403 annotated genes. A total of 18.1% (14 934/82 367) of the multi-exonic genes showed alternative splicing (AS). In addition, we identified 549 long non-coding RNAs, the majority of which displayed tissue-specific expression profiles, and detected 7742 annotated genes that possessed isoforms containing alternative polyadenylation sites. Moreover, 31 591 AS events located in open reading frames (ORFs) lead to potential protein isoforms by in-frame or frameshift changes in the ORF. Illumina RNA sequencing of five tissues that were pooled for Iso-Seq was also performed and showed that 69% of the AS events were tissue-specific. Our data provide abundant transcriptome resources for a transcript isoform catalog of B. napus, which will facilitate genome reannotation, strengthen our understanding of the B. napus transcriptome and be applied for further functional genomic research.

摘要: 甘蓝型油菜是一种最近的同种多倍体，其来源于甘蓝型油菜（ArAr）和甘蓝型油菜（CoCo）的杂交。由于An和Cn亚基因组之间的高度序列相似性，很难提供一个准确的B.napus整个转录组景观图。为克服此问题，我们应用了单分子长读同种型测序（Iso-Seq）技术，该技术可产生长读本，以探索同种型水平的油菜双歧杆菌的复杂转录组。从Iso-Seq数据中，我们获得了147698个非冗余同工型，捕获了37403个带注释的基因。共有18.1％（14934/82367）的多外显子基因显示了可变剪接（AS）。此外，我们鉴定了549个长的非编码RNA，其中大多数显示了组织特异性表达谱，并检测到7742个带注释的基因，这些基因具有包含其他聚腺苷酸化位点的同工型。此外，位于开放阅读框（ORF）中的31591个AS事件通过ORF的读框内或移码变化导致潜在的蛋白亚型。还对收集到的Iso-Seq的五个组织进行了IlluminaRNA测序，结果表明69％的AS事件是组织特异性的。我们的数据为甘蓝型油菜的转录本同工型目录提供了丰富的转录组资源，这将有助于基因组重新注释，加强我们对甘蓝型油菜转录组的了解，并将其用于进一步的功能基因组研究。

Pubmed_ID: 32270526

Polyploidization events shaped the transcription factor repertoires in legumes (Fabaceae)

多倍化事件塑造了豆类（豆科）中的转录因子库

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14765

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32270526/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: Transcription factors (TFs) are essential for plant growth and development. Several legumes (e.g. soybean) are rich sources of protein and oil and have great economic importance. Here we report a phylogenomic analysis of TF families in legumes and their potential association with important traits (e.g. nitrogen fixation). We used TF DNA-binding domains to systematically screen the genomes of 15 leguminous and five non-leguminous species. Transcription factor orthologous groups (OGs) were used to estimate OG sizes in ancestral nodes using a gene birth-death model, which allowed the identification of lineage-specific expansions. The OG analysis and rate of synonymous substitutions show that major TF expansions are strongly associated with whole-genome duplication (WGD) events in the legume (approximately 58 million years ago) and Glycine (approximately 13 million years ago) lineages, which account for a large fraction of the Phaseolus vulgaris and Glycine max TF repertoires. Of the 3407 G. max TFs, 1808 and 676 have homeologs within single syntenic regions in Phaseolus vulgaris and Vitis vinifera, respectively. We found a trend for TFs expanded in legumes to be preferentially transcribed in roots and nodules, supporting their recruitment early in the evolution of nodulation in the legume clade. Some families also showed count differences between G. max and the wild soybean Glycine soja, including genes located within important quantitative trait loci. Our findings strongly support the roles of two WGDs in shaping the TF repertoires in the legume and Glycine lineages, and these are probably related to important aspects of legume and soybean biology.

摘要: 转录因子（TFs）对植物的生长和发育至关重要。几种豆类（例如大豆）是蛋白质和油脂的丰富来源，并且具有重要的经济意义。在这里，我们报告了豆科植物TF家族及其与重要性状（例如固氮）的潜在关联的系统生物学分析。我们使用TFDNA结合结构域系统地筛选了15个豆科和5个非豆科物种的基因组。转录因子直系同源基因组（OGs）用于通过基因出生死亡模型估算祖先节点的OG大小，从而可以鉴定谱系特异性扩增。OG分析和同义词替换率表明，主要的TF扩展与豆类（大约5800万年前）和甘氨酸（大约1300万年前）的全基因组复制（WGD）事件密切相关，这说明了菜豆和甘氨酸的最大TF组成部分很大。在3407个G.maxTF中，分别有1808和676个在菜豆和葡萄中的单一同音区域内具有同源物。我们发现TFs在豆科植物中扩展的趋势是优先在根和根瘤中转录，从而支持了它们在豆科进化枝中的结节性进化的早期募集。一些家庭还显示了最大大豆和野生大豆大豆大豆之间的计数差异，包括位于重要数量性状基因座内的基因。我们的发现有力地支持了两种WGD在塑造豆科植物和甘氨酸谱系中TF谱系中的作用，这可能与豆类和大豆生物学的重要方面有关。

Pubmed_ID: 32269344

A satellite repeat-derived piRNA controls embryonic development of Aedes

卫星重复来源的piRNA控制伊蚊的胚胎发育

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2159-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32269344/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Tandem repeat elements such as the diverse class of satellite repeats occupy large parts of eukaryotic chromosomes, mostly at centromeric, pericentromeric, telomeric and subtelomeric regions1. However, some elements are located in euchromatic regions throughout the genome and have been hypothesized to regulate gene expression in cis by modulating local chromatin structure, or in trans via transcripts derived from the repeats2-4. Here we show that a satellite repeat in the mosquito Aedes aegypti promotes sequence-specific gene silencing via the expression of two PIWI-interacting RNAs (piRNAs). Whereas satellite repeats and piRNA sequences generally evolve extremely quickly5-7, this locus was conserved for approximately 200 million years, suggesting that it has a central function in mosquito biology. piRNA production commenced shortly after egg laying, and inactivation of the more abundant piRNA resulted in failure to degrade maternally deposited transcripts in the zygote and developmental arrest. Our results reveal a mechanism by which satellite repeats regulate global gene expression in trans via piRNA-mediated gene silencing that is essential for embryonic development.

摘要: 串联重复序列，如卫星重复序列的不同种类，占据了真核染色体的大部分，主要位于着丝粒，着丝粒，端粒和亚端粒区域1。然而，一些元件位于整个基因组的常染色体区域中，并被认为通过调节局部染色质结构来顺式调节基因表达，或通过衍生自重复序列2-4的转录本来反式调节基因表达。在这里，我们显示蚊子埃及伊蚊中的卫星重复序列通过两个PIWI相互作用RNA（piRNA）的表达促进序列特异性基因沉默。卫星重复序列和piRNA序列通常进化非常快5-7，而该基因座已保存了约2亿年，这表明它在蚊子生物学中具有核心功能。产卵后不久就开始生产piRNA，而更丰富的piRNA的失活导致无法降解合子和发育停滞中母体沉积的转录本。我们的结果揭示了一种机制，通过这种机制，卫星重复通过piRNA介导的基因沉默调节反式的全局基因表达，这对于胚胎发育至关重要。

Pubmed_ID: 32269334

An intestinal zinc sensor regulates food intake and developmental growth

肠道锌传感器可调节食物的摄入量和发育发育

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2111-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32269334/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: In cells, organs and whole organisms, nutrient sensing is key to maintaining homeostasis and adapting to a fluctuating environment1. In many animals, nutrient sensors are found within the enteroendocrine cells of the digestive system; however, less is known about nutrient sensing in their cellular siblings, the absorptive enterocytes1. Here we use a genetic screen in Drosophila melanogaster to identify Hodor, an ionotropic receptor in enterocytes that sustains larval development, particularly in nutrient-scarce conditions. Experiments in Xenopus oocytes and flies indicate that Hodor is a pH-sensitive, zinc-gated chloride channel that mediates a previously unrecognized dietary preference for zinc. Hodor controls systemic growth from a subset of enterocytes-interstitial cells-by promoting food intake and insulin/IGF signalling. Although Hodor sustains gut luminal acidity and restrains microbial loads, its effect on systemic growth results from the modulation of Tor signalling and lysosomal homeostasis within interstitial cells. Hodor-like genes are insect-specific, and may represent targets for the control of disease vectors. Indeed, CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing revealed that the single hodor orthologue in Anopheles gambiae is an essential gene. Our findings highlight the need to consider the instructive contributions of metals-and, more generally, micronutrients-to energy homeostasis.

摘要: 在细胞，器官和整个生物体中，营养素感测是维持体内稳态和适应不断变化的环境的关键1。在许多动物中，在消化系统的肠内分泌细胞中发现了营养传感器。然而，人们对细胞兄弟姐妹吸收性肠上皮细胞的营养感知知之甚少。在这里，我们使用果蝇的遗传筛选来鉴定Hodor，这是维持幼体发育，尤其是在缺乏营养的条件下维持幼体发育的肠上皮细胞中的离子受体。在非洲爪蟾卵母细胞和果蝇中进行的实验表明，霍多尔（Hodor）是pH敏感的锌门控氯化物通道，该通道介导了以前对锌的饮食偏爱。霍多尔通过促进食物摄入和胰岛素/IGF信号传导，控制一部分肠上皮细胞（间质细胞）的系统性生长。尽管Hodor维持肠道腔内的酸度并抑制微生物负荷，但其对系统生长的影响是由间质细胞内Tor信号转导和溶酶体稳态引起的。类似于Hodor的基因是昆虫特异性的，可能代表控制疾病载体的靶标。确实，CRISPR-Cas9基因组编辑显示，冈比亚按蚊中的单个霍索直向同源物是必不可少的基因。我们的发现强调需要考虑金属（更广泛地说是微量营养素）对能量稳态的指导作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32269225

The Scaly-foot Snail genome and implications for the origins of biomineralised armour

鳞足蜗牛基因组及其对生物矿化装甲起源的影响

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15522-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32269225/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/08/2020

Abstract: The Scaly-foot Snail, Chrysomallon squamiferum, presents a combination of biomineralised features, reminiscent of enigmatic early fossil taxa with complex shells and sclerites such as sachtids, but in a recently-diverged living species which even has iron-infused hard parts. Thus the Scaly-foot Snail is an ideal model to study the genomic mechanisms underlying the evolutionary diversification of biomineralised armour. Here, we present a high-quality whole-genome assembly and tissue-specific transcriptomic data, and show that scale and shell formation in the Scaly-foot Snail employ independent subsets of 25 highly-expressed transcription factors. Comparisons with other lophotrochozoan genomes imply that this biomineralisation toolkit is ancient, though expression patterns differ across major lineages. We suggest that the ability of lophotrochozoan lineages to generate a wide range of hard parts, exemplified by the remarkable morphological disparity in Mollusca, draws on a capacity for dynamic modification of the expression and positioning of toolkit elements across the genome.

摘要: 鳞足蜗牛（Chrysomallonsquamiferum）具有生物矿化的特征，让人联想到复杂的贝壳和硬藻类（如sachtids）的神秘的早期化石类群，但在最近分化的生物中甚至有注入铁的硬质部分。因此，S足蜗牛是研究生物矿化装甲进化多样化基础的基因组机制的理想模型。在这里，我们提出了高质量的全基因组装配和组织特异性转录组数据，并显示鳞足蜗牛中的鳞片和壳形成采用了25个高度表达的转录因子的独立子集。与其他滋养滋养体基因组的比较表明，这种生物矿化工具包是古老的，尽管主要谱系之间的表达方式也不同。我们认为，次绒毛虫体谱系产生广泛的硬部分的能力，以软体动物中显着的形态差异为例，它具有动态修饰基因组中工具箱元件表达和定位的能力。

Pubmed_ID: 32269217

Nuclear-mitochondrial DNA segments resemble paternally inherited mitochondrial DNA in humans

核线粒体DNA片段类似于人类父系遗传的线粒体DNA

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15336-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32269217/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/08/2020

Abstract: Several strands of evidence question the dogma that human mitochondrial DNA (mtDNA) is inherited exclusively down the maternal line, most recently in three families where several individuals harbored a 'heteroplasmic haplotype' consistent with biparental transmission. Here we report a similar genetic signature in 7 of 11,035 trios, with allelic fractions of 5-25%, implying biparental inheritance of mtDNA in 0.06% of offspring. However, analysing the nuclear whole genome sequence, we observe likely large rare or unique nuclear-mitochondrial DNA segments (mega-NUMTs) transmitted from the father in all 7 families. Independently detecting mega-NUMTs in 0.13% of fathers, we see autosomal transmission of the haplotype. Finally, we show the haplotype allele fraction can be explained by complex concatenated mtDNA-derived sequences rearranged within the nuclear genome. We conclude that rare cryptic mega-NUMTs can resemble paternally mtDNA heteroplasmy, but find no evidence of paternal transmission of mtDNA in humans.

摘要: 几条证据对人的线粒体DNA（mtDNA）仅沿母系遗传的教条提出了质疑，最近在三个家庭中，有几个人具有与双亲传播一致的“异质单倍型”。在这里，我们报告了11,035个三重奏中的7个相似的遗传特征，等位基因分数为5-25％，这意味着在0.06％的后代中mtDNA的双亲遗传。但是，通过分析核全基因组序列，我们观察到了可能从父亲在所有7个家庭中传播的大的稀有或独特的核线粒体DNA片段（mega-NUMT）。在0.13％的父亲中独立检测mega-NUMT，我们看到了单体型的常染色体传播。最后，我们显示单倍型等位基因部分可以通过在核基因组内重新排列的复杂串联的mtDNA衍生序列来解释。我们得出的结论是，罕见的隐性mega-NUMT可能与父系mtDNA异质性相似，但没有发现父系mtDNA在人体内传播的证据。

Pubmed_ID: 32269081

Phylogenetic network analysis of SARS-CoV-2 genomes

SARS-CoV-2基因组的系统进化网络分析

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2004999117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32269081/
