Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/28/2020

Abstract: In a phylogenetic network analysis of 160 complete human severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-Cov-2) genomes, we find three central variants distinguished by amino acid changes, which we have named A, B, and C, with A being the ancestral type according to the bat outgroup coronavirus. The A and C types are found in significant proportions outside East Asia, that is, in Europeans and Americans. In contrast, the B type is the most common type in East Asia, and its ancestral genome appears not to have spread outside East Asia without first mutating into derived B types, pointing to founder effects or immunological or environmental resistance against this type outside Asia. The network faithfully traces routes of infections for documented coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) cases, indicating that phylogenetic networks can likewise be successfully used to help trace undocumented COVID-19 infection sources, which can then be quarantined to prevent recurrent spread of the disease worldwide.

摘要: 在对160个完整的人类严重急性呼吸系统综合症冠状病毒2（SARS-Cov-2）基因组进行的系统进化网络分析中，我们发现了三个主要的变异体，它们的氨基酸变化不同，我们将其命名为A，B和C，其中A为根据蝙蝠外祖冠状病毒的祖先类型。在东亚以外地区（即欧洲人和美国人中），A和C类型的比例很高。相比之下，B型是东亚最常见的类型，其祖先基因组似乎没有先突变成衍生的B型就不会扩散到东亚以外，这表明在亚洲以外对该类型的创始人具有影响力或免疫或环境抵抗力。该网络忠实地跟踪了记录在案的冠状病毒病2019（COVID-19）病例的感染途径，这表明系统进化网络同样可以成功地用于帮助跟踪未记录的COVID-19感染源，然后可以对其进行隔离以防止疾病复发全世界。

Pubmed_ID: 32265451

Publisher Correction: Multi-resolution localization of causal variants across the genome

发布者校正：基因组中因果变异的多分辨率定位

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15690-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32265451/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/07/2020

Abstract: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.

摘要: 该文件的修订版已经发布，可以通过文件顶部的链接进行访问。

Pubmed_ID: 32265285

Hog1 activation delays mitotic exit via phosphorylation of Net1

Hog1激活通过Net1的磷酸化延迟有丝分裂退出

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1918308117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32265285/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/21/2020

Abstract: Adaptation to environmental changes is crucial for cell fitness. In Saccharomyces cerevisiae, variations in external osmolarity trigger the activation of the stress-activated protein kinase Hog1 (high-osmolarity glycerol 1), which regulates gene expression, metabolism, and cell-cycle progression. The activation of this kinase leads to the regulation of G1, S, and G2 phases of the cell cycle to prevent genome instability and promote cell survival. Here we show that Hog1 delays mitotic exit when cells are stressed during metaphase. Hog1 phosphorylates the nucleolar protein Net1, altering its affinity for the phosphatase Cdc14, whose activity is essential for mitotic exit and completion of the cell cycle. The untimely release of Cdc14 from the nucleolus upon activation of Hog1 is linked to a defect in ribosomal DNA (rDNA) and telomere segregation, and it ultimately delays cell division. A mutant of Net1 that cannot be phosphorylated by Hog1 displays reduced viability upon osmostress. Thus, Hog1 contributes to maximizing cell survival upon stress by regulating mitotic exit.

摘要: 适应环境变化对于细胞适应性至关重要。在酿酒酵母中，外部渗透压的变化会触发应力激活蛋白激酶Hog1（高渗透压甘油1）的激活，后者调节基因表达，代谢和细胞周期进程。该激酶的激活导致细胞周期的G1，S和G2期调节，从而防止基因组不稳定并促进细胞存活。在这里，我们显示当细胞在中期处于压力状态时，Hog1会延迟有丝分裂退出。Hog1使核仁蛋白Net1磷酸化，从而改变其对磷酸酶Cdc14的亲和力，磷酸酶Cdc14的活性对于有丝分裂退出和细胞周期的完成至关重要。激活Hog1后，Cdc14从核仁中不合时宜的释放与核糖体DNA（rDNA）和端粒分离中的缺陷有关，最终延迟了细胞分裂。不能被Hog1磷酸化的Net1突变体在渗透压下显示出降低的生存力。因此，Hog1有助于通过调节有丝分裂出口来最大化应激时的细胞存活率。

Pubmed_ID: 32259488

Genetic Screen for Cell Fitness in High or Low Oxygen Highlights Mitochondrial and Lipid Metabolism

高氧或低氧细胞适应性的遗传筛查突出了线粒体和脂质代谢

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.03.029

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32259488/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 04/30/2020

Abstract: Human cells are able to sense and adapt to variations in oxygen levels. Historically, much research in this field has focused on hypoxia-inducible factor (HIF) signaling and reactive oxygen species (ROS). Here, we perform genome-wide CRISPR growth screens at 21%, 5%, and 1% oxygen to systematically identify gene knockouts with relative fitness defects in high oxygen (213 genes) or low oxygen (109 genes), most without known connection to HIF or ROS. Knockouts of many mitochondrial pathways thought to be essential, including complex I and enzymes in Fe-S biosynthesis, grow relatively well at low oxygen and thus are buffered by hypoxia. In contrast, in certain cell types, knockout of lipid biosynthetic and peroxisomal genes causes fitness defects only in low oxygen. Our resource nominates genetic diseases whose severity may be modulated by oxygen and links hundreds of genes to oxygen homeostasis.

摘要: 人类细胞能够感知并适应氧气水平的变化。历史上，该领域的许多研究都集中在缺氧诱导因子（HIF）信号和活性氧（ROS）上。在这里，我们以21％，5％和1％的氧气进行全基因组CRISPR生长筛查，以系统性地鉴定出在高氧气（213个基因）或低氧气（109个基因）中具有相对适应性缺陷的基因敲除，大多数与HIF或ROS。许多线粒体途径的敲除被认为是必不可少的，包括复杂的I和Fe-S生物合成中的酶，在低氧条件下生长相对良好，因此受到缺氧的缓冲。相反，在某些细胞类型中，脂质生物合成和过氧化物酶体基因的敲除仅在低氧条件下才导致健身缺陷。我们的资源提名了可能由氧气调节其严重性的遗传疾病，并将数百种基因与氧气稳态联系在一起。

Pubmed_ID: 32251286

8q24 genetic variation and comprehensive haplotypes altering familial risk of prostate cancer

8q24遗传变异和全面单体型改变前列腺癌家族风险

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15122-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32251286/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 03/23/2020

Abstract: The 8q24 genomic locus is tied to the origin of numerous cancers. We investigate its contribution to hereditary prostate cancer (HPC) in independent study populations of the Nashville Familial Prostate Cancer Study and International Consortium for Prostate Cancer Genetics (combined: 2,836 HPC cases, 2,206 controls of European ancestry). Here we report 433 variants concordantly associated with HPC in both study populations, accounting for 9% of heritability and modifying age of diagnosis as well as aggressiveness; 183 reach genome-wide significance. The variants comprehensively distinguish independent risk-altering haplotypes overlapping the 648 kb locus (three protective, and four risk (peak odds ratios: 1.5, 4, 5, and 22)). Sequence of the near-Mendelian haplotype reveals eleven causal mutation candidates. We introduce a linkage disequilibrium-based algorithm discerning eight independent sentinel variants, carrying considerable risk prediction ability (AUC = 0.625) for a single locus. These findings elucidate 8q24 locus structure and correlates for clinical prediction of prostate cancer risk.

摘要: 8q24基因组位点与多种癌症的起源有关。我们在纳什维尔家族性前列腺癌研究和国际前列腺癌遗传学国际联合会的独立研究人群中调查了其对遗传性前列腺癌（HPC）的贡献（合计：2,836例HPC病例，2,206例欧洲血统的对照）。在这里，我们报告了在这两个研究人群中与HPC一致相关的433个变异，占9％的遗传性，并改变了诊断年龄和攻击性。183个达到全基因组意义。这些变体全面区分了与648kb位点重叠的独立风险改变单倍型（三个保护性和四个风险（峰值比：1.5、4、5和22））。近孟德尔单倍型的序列揭示了十一个因果突变候选者。我们介绍了一种基于连锁不平衡的算法，该算法可识别八个独立的前哨变异，对单个基因座具有相当大的风险预测能力（AUC=0.625）。这些发现阐明了8q24基因座结构并与前列腺癌风险的临床预测相关。

Pubmed_ID: 32249784

Structural morphing in a symmetry-mismatched viral vertex

对称不匹配的病毒顶点中的结构变形

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15575-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32249784/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/06/2020

Abstract: Large biological structures are assembled from smaller, often symmetric, sub-structures. However, asymmetry among sub-structures is fundamentally important for biological function. An extreme form of asymmetry, a 12-fold-symmetric dodecameric portal complex inserted into a 5-fold-symmetric capsid vertex, is found in numerous icosahedral viruses, including tailed bacteriophages, herpesviruses, and archaeal viruses. This vertex is critical for driving capsid assembly, DNA packaging, tail attachment, and genome ejection. Here, we report the near-atomic in situ structure of the symmetry-mismatched portal vertex from bacteriophage T4. Remarkably, the local structure of portal morphs to compensate for symmetry-mismatch, forming similar interactions in different capsid environments while maintaining strict symmetry in the rest of the structure. This creates a unique and unusually dynamic symmetry-mismatched vertex that is central to building an infectious virion.

摘要: 大型生物结构是由较小的，通常是对称的子结构组装而成的。但是，子结构之间的不对称对于生物学功能至关重要。在许多二十面体病毒（包括带尾噬菌体，疱疹病毒和古细菌）中发现了一种极端的不对称形式，即插入5倍对称衣壳顶点的12倍对称十二聚体门户复合物。该顶点对于驱动衣壳装配，DNA包装，尾部附着和基因组弹出至关重要。在这里，我们报道了来自噬菌体T4的对称失配的门户顶点的近原子原位结构。值得注意的是，门型的局部结构可补偿对称性不匹配，在不同的衣壳环境中形成相似的相互作用，同时在其余结构中保持严格的对称性。这将创建一个独特且异常动态对称不匹配的顶点，这对于构建感染性病毒体至关重要。

Pubmed_ID: 32249765

Dynamic genome evolution and complex virocell metabolism of globally-distributed giant viruses

全球分布的巨型病毒的动态基因组进化和复杂的病毒细胞代谢

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15507-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32249765/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/06/2020

Abstract: The discovery of eukaryotic giant viruses has transformed our understanding of the limits of viral complexity, but the extent of their encoded metabolic diversity remains unclear. Here we generate 501 metagenome-assembled genomes of Nucleo-Cytoplasmic Large DNA Viruses (NCLDV) from environments around the globe, and analyze their encoded functional capacity. We report a remarkable diversity of metabolic genes in widespread giant viruses, including many involved in nutrient uptake, light harvesting, and nitrogen metabolism. Surprisingly, numerous NCLDV encode the components of glycolysis and the TCA cycle, suggesting that they can re-program fundamental aspects of their host's central carbon metabolism. Our phylogenetic analysis of NCLDV metabolic genes and their cellular homologs reveals distinct clustering of viral sequences into divergent clades, indicating that these genes are virus-specific and were acquired in the distant past. Overall our findings reveal that giant viruses encode complex metabolic capabilities with evolutionary histories largely independent of cellular life, strongly implicating them as important drivers of global biogeochemical cycles.

摘要: 真核巨型病毒的发现改变了我们对病毒复杂性极限的理解，但是它们编码的代谢多样性的程度仍不清楚。在这里，我们从全球环境中生成了501个由核基因胞质质大DNA病毒（NCLDV）组成的基因组组装基因组，并分析了其编码的功能能力。我们报告了广泛存在的巨型病毒中代谢基因的显着多样性，其中包括许多与养分吸收，光收集和氮素代谢有关的病毒。令人惊讶的是，许多NCLDV编码糖酵解和TCA循环的成分，表明它们可以重新编程宿主中央碳代谢的基本方面。我们对NCLDV代谢基因及其细胞同源物的系统发育分析表明，病毒序列有不同的聚类成不同的进化枝，表明这些基因是病毒特异性的，并且是在遥远的过去获得的。总的来说，我们的发现表明，巨型病毒编码复杂的代谢能力，而进化历史在很大程度上与细胞生命无关，这强烈暗示着它们是全球生物地球化学循环的重要驱动力。

Pubmed_ID: 32246786

High-density genetic variation maps reveal the correlation between asymmetric interspecific introgressions and improvement of agronomic traits in Upland and Pima cotton varieties developed in Xinjiang, China

高密度遗传变异图揭示了中国新疆开发的陆地棉和皮马棉品种不对称种间渗入与农艺性状改善之间的相关性

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14760

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32246786/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: The two new world tetraploid cottons, Gossypium hirsutum and Gossypium barbadense, are cultivated worldwide and are characterised by a high yield and superior fibre quality, respectively. Historical genetic introgression has been reported between them; however, the existence of introgression and its genetic effects on agronomic traits remain unclear with regard to independent breeding of G. hirsutum (Upland cotton) and G. barbadense (Pima cotton) elite cultivars. We collected 159 G. hirsutum and 70 G. barbadense cultivars developed in Xinjiang, China, along with 30 semi-wild accessions of G. hirsutum, to perform interspecific introgression tests, intraspecific selection analyses and genome-wide association studies (GWAS) with fibre quality and yield component traits in multiple environments. In total, we identified seven interspecific introgression events and 52 selective sweep loci in G. hirsutum, as well as 17 interspecific introgression events and 19 selective sweep loci in G. barbadense. Correlation tests between agronomic traits and introgressions showed that introgression loci were mutually beneficial for the improvement of fibre quality and yield traits in both species. In addition, the phenotypic effects of four interspecific introgression events could be detected by intraspecific GWAS, with Gb_INT13 significantly improving fibre yield in G. barbadense. The present study describes the landscape of genetic introgression and selection between the two species, and highlights the genetic effects of introgression among populations, which can be used for future improvement of fibre yield and quality in G. barbadense and G. hirsutum, respectively.

摘要: 世界上种植了两种新的世界四倍体棉，即陆地棉和巴巴棉，它们分别具有高产和优质纤维的特点。他们之间曾有过历史的基因渗入报道。然而，就独立栽培G.hirsutum（陆地棉）和G.barbadense（Pima棉花）优良品种而言，基因渗入的存在及其对农艺性状的遗传影响仍不清楚。我们收集了在中国新疆开发的159G.hirsutum和70G.barbadense品种，以及30个半野生G.hirsutum品种，以进行种间渗入测试，种内选择分析和与纤维的全基因组关联研究（GWAS）多环境中的质量和产量成分特征。总的来说，我们在G.hirsutum中鉴定了7个种间渗入事件和52个选择性扫除基因座，以及在巴巴德森种中鉴定了17个种间渗入事件和19个选择性扫除基因座。农艺性状与基因渗入量之间的相关性测试表明，基因渗入基因座对于改善两个物种的纤维品质和产量性状互惠互利。此外，通过种内GWAS可以检测到四种种间渗入事件的表型效应，其中Gb_INT13显着提高了巴氏假单胞菌的纤维产量。本研究描述了两种物种之间的基因渗入和选择的概况，并强调了种群间渗入的遗传效应，可分别用于未来提高巴巴登斯棉和陆地棉的纤维产量和质量。

Pubmed_ID: 32245969

The Litsea genome and the evolution of the laurel family

Litsea基因组和月桂树家族的进化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15493-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32245969/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/03/2020

Abstract: The laurel family within the Magnoliids has attracted attentions owing to its scents, variable inflorescences, and controversial phylogenetic position. Here, we present a chromosome-level assembly of the Litsea cubeba genome, together with low-coverage genomic and transcriptomic data for many other Lauraceae. Phylogenomic analyses show phylogenetic discordance at the position of Magnoliids, suggesting incomplete lineage sorting during the divergence of monocots, eudicots, and Magnoliids. An ancient whole-genome duplication (WGD) event occurred just before the divergence of Laurales and Magnoliales; subsequently, independent WGDs occurred almost simultaneously in the three Lauralean lineages. The phylogenetic relationships within Lauraceae correspond to the divergence of inflorescences, as evidenced by the phylogeny of FUWA, a conserved gene involved in determining panicle architecture in Lauraceae. Monoterpene synthases responsible for production of specific volatile compounds in Lauraceae are functionally verified. Our work sheds light on the evolution of the Lauraceae, the genetic basis for floral evolution and specific scents.

摘要: 由于其气味，可变的花序和有争议的系统发育位置，Magnoliids中的月桂树家族引起了人们的关注。在这里，我们介绍了Litseacubeba基因组的染色体水平装配，以及许多其他月桂科植物的低覆盖基因组和转录组数据。系统发育分析显示，在木兰虫的位置发生系统发育不一致性，表明在单子叶植物，双子叶植物和木兰虫的发散过程中谱系排序不完整。在劳拉莱斯和木兰分裂之前，发生了一个古老的全基因组重复事件。随后，在三个劳拉良世系中几乎同时发生了独立的WGD。月桂科内的系统发育关系对应于花序的差异，这由FUWA的系统发生所证实，FUWA是一种参与确定月桂科穗构型的保守基因。在功能上验证了负责在月桂科中产生特定挥发性化合物的单萜合酶。我们的工作揭示了月桂科的进化，花卉进化和特定气味的遗传基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32245943

The circadian clock and darkness control natural competence in cyanobacteria

昼夜节律和黑暗控制着蓝细菌的自然能力

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15384-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32245943/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/03/2020

Abstract: The cyanobacterium Synechococcus elongatus is a model organism for the study of circadian rhythms. It is naturally competent for transformation-that is, it takes up DNA from the environment, but the underlying mechanisms are unclear. Here, we use a genome-wide screen to identify genes required for natural transformation in S. elongatus, including genes encoding a conserved Type IV pilus, genes known to be associated with competence in other bacteria, and others. Pilus biogenesis occurs daily in the morning, while natural transformation is maximal when the onset of darkness coincides with the dusk circadian peak. Thus, the competence state in cyanobacteria is regulated by the circadian clock and can adapt to seasonal changes of day length.

摘要: 蓝藻延长菌是研究昼夜节律的模型生物。它自然具有转化的能力-也就是说，它吸收了环境中的DNA，但是其潜在机制尚不清楚。在这里，我们使用全基因组筛选来识别长链金枪鱼自然转化所需的基因，包括编码保守的IV型菌毛的基因，已知与其他细菌的能力相关的基因，以及其他基因。毛发生物发生在每天的早晨，而当黑暗的发作与黄昏的昼夜节律峰相吻合时，自然转化最大。因此，蓝藻细菌的能力状态受昼夜节律的调节，并且可以适应白天的季节性变化。

Pubmed_ID: 32243786

CRISPR-Based Therapeutic Genome Editing: Strategies and In Vivo Delivery by AAV Vectors

基于CRISPR的治疗性基因组编辑：策略和AAV载体的体内递送

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.03.023

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32243786/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 04/02/2020

Abstract: The development of clustered regularly interspaced short-palindromic repeat (CRISPR)-based biotechnologies has revolutionized the life sciences and introduced new therapeutic modalities with the potential to treat a wide range of diseases. Here, we describe CRISPR-based strategies to improve human health, with an emphasis on the delivery of CRISPR therapeutics directly into the human body using adeno-associated virus (AAV) vectors. We also discuss challenges facing broad deployment of CRISPR-based therapeutics and highlight areas where continued discovery and technological development can further advance these revolutionary new treatments.

摘要: 基于簇的规则间隔短回文重复（CRISPR）生物技术的发展彻底改变了生命科学，并引入了具有治疗广泛疾病潜力的新治疗方式。在这里，我们描述了基于CRISPR的改善人类健康的策略，重点是使用腺相关病毒（AAV）载体将CRISPR治疗药物直接送入人体。我们还将讨论基于CRISPR的疗法的广泛应用所面临的挑战，并重点介绍不断发现和技术发展可以进一步推进这些革命性新疗法的领域。

Pubmed_ID: 32242610

Continuous chromosome-scale haplotypes assembled from a single interspecies F1 hybrid of yak and cattle

由a牛和牛的单一种间F1杂种组装而成的连续染色体规模单倍型

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa029

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32242610/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 04/01/2020

Abstract: Background: The development of trio binning as an approach for assembling diploid genomes has enabled the creation of fully haplotype-resolved reference genomes. Unlike other methods of assembly for diploid genomes, this approach is enhanced, rather than hindered, by the heterozygosity of the individual sequenced. To maximize heterozygosity and simultaneously assemble reference genomes for 2 species, we applied trio binning to an interspecies F1 hybrid of yak (Bos grunniens) and cattle (Bos taurus), 2 species that diverged nearly 5 million years ago. The genomes of both of these species are composed of acrocentric autosomes. Results: We produced the most continuous haplotype-resolved assemblies for a diploid animal yet reported. Both the maternal (yak) and paternal (cattle) assemblies have the largest 2 chromosomes in single haplotigs, and more than one-third of the autosomes similarly lack gaps. The maximum length haplotig produced was 153 Mb without any scaffolding or gap-filling steps and represents the longest haplotig reported for any species. The assemblies are also more complete and accurate than those reported for most other vertebrates, with 97% of mammalian universal single-copy orthologs present. Conclusions: The high heterozygosity inherent to interspecies crosses maximizes the effectiveness of the trio binning method. The interspecies trio binning approach we describe is likely to provide the highest-quality assemblies for any pair of species that can interbreed to produce hybrid offspring that develop to sufficient cell numbers for DNA extraction.

摘要: 背景：三重装仓作为一种组装二倍体基因组的方法的发展使得能够创建完全由单倍型解析的参考基因组。与二倍体基因组的其他组装方法不同，此方法通过单个测序的杂合性增强而不是受到阻碍。为了最大化杂合性并同时组装2个物种的参考基因组，我们将三重分类应用于to牛（Bosgrunniens）和牛（Bostaurus）的F1杂种，这两个物种在近500万年前就已经分化了。这两个物种的基因组均由近端常染色体组成。结果：我们为二倍体动物生产了最连续的单倍型解析装配体。母体（y牛）和父体（牛）装配体在单个单体中都具有最大的2条染色体，同样，超过三分之一的常染色体也缺乏缺口。没有任何脚手架或缝隙填充步骤，产生的单倍体的最大长度为153Mb，代表任何物种中报道的最长单倍体。组装也比大多数其他脊椎动物报道的组装更完整和准确，存在97％的哺乳动物通用单拷贝直系同源物。结论：种间杂交固有的高杂合度使三重装仓法的有效性最大化。我们描述的种间三重装仓方法可能为任何一对能够杂交产生杂交后代的物种提供最高质量的装配，这些后代发展到足以提取DNA的细胞数量。

Pubmed_ID: 32242144

Genome-wide association study identifies 143 loci associated with 25 hydroxyvitamin D concentration

全基因组关联研究确定了与25羟维生素D浓度相关的143个基因座

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15421-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32242144/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/02/2020

Abstract: Vitamin D deficiency is a candidate risk factor for a range of adverse health outcomes. In a genome-wide association study of 25 hydroxyvitamin D (25OHD) concentration in 417,580 Europeans we identify 143 independent loci in 112 1-Mb regions, providing insights into the physiology of vitamin D and implicating genes involved in lipid and lipoprotein metabolism, dermal tissue properties, and the sulphonation and glucuronidation of 25OHD. Mendelian randomization models find no robust evidence that 25OHD concentration has causal effects on candidate phenotypes (e.g. BMI, psychiatric disorders), but many phenotypes have (direct or indirect) causal effects on 25OHD concentration, clarifying the epidemiological relationship between 25OHD status and the health outcomes examined in this study.

摘要: 维生素D缺乏症是一系列不利健康结果的候选危险因素。在417,580个欧洲人中25个羟基维生素D（25OHD）浓度的全基因组关联研究中，我们在112个1-Mb地区确定了143个独立基因座，从而深入了解了维生素D的生理学以及涉及脂质和脂蛋白代谢，皮肤组织的基因性质，以及25OHD的磺化和葡糖醛酸化。孟德尔随机模型未发现有力的证据表明25OHD浓度对候选表型有因果关系（例如BMI，精神病），但许多表型对25OHD浓度有（直接或间接）因果关系，从而阐明了25OHD状况与健康结果之间的流行病学关系在这项研究中进行了检查。

Pubmed_ID: 32242022

Ancestry deconvolution and partial polygenic score can improve susceptibility predictions in recently admixed individuals

祖先反卷积和部分多基因得分可以改善最近混合个体的易感性预测

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15464-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32242022/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/02/2020

Abstract: Polygenic Scores (PSs) describe the genetic component of an individual's quantitative phenotype or their susceptibility to diseases with a genetic basis. Currently, PSs rely on population-dependent contributions of many associated alleles, with limited applicability to understudied populations and recently admixed individuals. Here we introduce a combination of local ancestry deconvolution and partial PS computation to account for the population-specific nature of the association signals in individuals with admixed ancestry. We demonstrate partial PS to be a proxy for the total PS and that a portion of the genome is enough to improve susceptibility predictions for the traits we test. By combining partial PSs from different populations, we are able to improve trait predictability in admixed individuals with some European ancestry. These results may extend the applicability of PSs to subjects with a complex history of admixture, where current methods cannot be applied.

摘要: 多基因评分（PS）描述了个体定量表型的遗传成分或具有遗传基础的疾病易感性。当前，PS依赖于许多相关等位基因的依赖于人口的贡献，对研究不足的人群和最近混入的个体的适用性有限。在这里，我们介绍了局部祖先反卷积和部分PS计算的组合，以说明具有混合祖先的个体中关联信号的特定于人口的性质。我们证明部分PS可以代替总PS，并且基因组的一部分足以改善我们测试的性状的易感性预测。通过组合来自不同人群的部分PS，我们能够提高具有欧洲血统的混合个体的性状可预测性。这些结果可能将PS的适用性扩展到具有复杂混合历史的对象，而当前的方法无法应用。

Pubmed_ID: 32241887

Computational design of probes to detect bacterial genomes by multivalent binding

通过多价结合检测细菌基因组的探针的计算设计

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1918274117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32241887/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/21/2020

Abstract: Rapid methods for diagnosis of bacterial infections are urgently needed to reduce inappropriate use of antibiotics, which contributes to antimicrobial resistance. In many rapid diagnostic methods, DNA oligonucleotide probes, attached to a surface, bind to specific nucleotide sequences in the DNA of a target pathogen. Typically, each probe binds to a single target sequence; i.e., target-probe binding is monovalent. Here we show using computer simulations that the detection sensitivity and specificity can be improved by designing probes that bind multivalently to the entire length of the pathogen genomic DNA, such that a given probe binds to multiple sites along the target DNA. Our results suggest that multivalent targeting of long pieces of genomic DNA can allow highly sensitive and selective binding of the target DNA, even if competing DNA in the sample also contains binding sites for the same probe sequences. Our results are robust to mild fragmentation of the bacterial genome. Our conclusions may also be relevant for DNA detection in other fields, such as disease diagnostics more broadly, environmental management, and food safety.

摘要: 迫切需要快速诊断细菌感染的方法，以减少不当使用抗生素的情况，这会增加抗菌素的耐药性。在许多快速诊断方法中，附着在表面的DNA寡核苷酸探针与靶病原体DNA中的特定核苷酸序列结合。通常，每个探针都结合一个单一的靶序列。即，靶标-探针结合是单价的。在这里，我们显示了使用计算机模拟可以通过设计与病原体基因组DNA的全长多价结合的探针来提高检测灵敏度和特异性，从而使给定的探针与目标DNA的多个位点结合。我们的结果表明，即使样品中的竞争性DNA也包含相同探针序列的结合位点，对长片段基因组DNA的多价靶向也可以实现目标DNA的高度敏感和选择性结合。我们的结果对于细菌基因组的轻度断裂具有鲁棒性。我们的结论也可能与其他领域的DNA检测相关，例如更广泛的疾病诊断，环境管理和食品安全。

Pubmed_ID: 32239588

Ethyl methanesulfonate mutant library construction in Gossypium hirsutum L. for allotetraploid functional genomics and germplasm innovation

陆地棉中甲磺酸乙酯突变体文库的构建，用于异源四倍体功能基因组学和种质创新

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14755

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32239588/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: As the gene pool is exposed to both strain on land resources and a lack of diversity in elite allotetraploid cotton, the acquisition and identification of novel alleles has taken on epic importance in facilitating cotton genetic improvement and functional genomics research. Ethyl methanesulfonate (EMS) is an excellent mutagen that induces genome-wide efficient mutations to activate the mutagenic potential of plants with many advantages. The present study established, determined and verified the experimental procedure suitable for EMS-based mutant library construction as the general reference guide in allotetraploid upland cotton. This optimized method and procedure are efficient, and abundant EMS mutant libraries (approximately 12 000) in allotetraploid cotton were successfully obtained. More than 20 mutant phenotypes were observed and screened, including phenotypes of the leaf, flower, fruit, fiber and plant architecture. Through the plants mutant library, high-throughput and high-resolution melting technology-based variation evaluation detected the EMS-induced site mutation. Additionally, based on overall genome-wide mutation analyses by re-sequencing and mutant library assessment, the examination results demonstrated the ideal quality of the cotton EMS-treated mutant library constructed in this study with appropriate high mutation density and saturated genome. What is more, the collection is composed of a broad repertoire of mutants, which is the valuable resource for basic genetic research and functional genomics underlying complex allotetraploid traits, as well as cotton breeding.

摘要: 由于基因库既受到土地资源压力的影响，又缺乏优质异源四倍体棉花的多样性，因此，新等位基因的获得和鉴定在促进棉花遗传改良和功能基因组学研究中具有重要意义。甲磺酸乙酯（EMS）是一种出色的诱变剂，可诱导全基因组有效突变，从而激活植物的诱变潜力，具有许多优势。本研究建立，确定和验证了适用于基于EMS的突变体库构建作为异源四倍体陆地棉通用参考指南的实验程序。这种优化的方法和程序是有效的，并且成功地获得了异源四倍体棉中丰富的EMS突变体文库（约12000个）。观察和筛选了20多种突变表型，包括叶，花，果实，纤维和植物结构的表型。通过植物突变体库，基于高通量和高分辨率解链技术的变异评估检测到了EMS诱导的位点突变。此外，基于通过重新测序和突变体文库评估进行的全基因组突变分析，检查结果表明，在本研究中构建的棉花经EMS处理的突变体文库具有理想的质量，具有适当的高突变密度和饱和基因组。不仅如此，该馆藏还包含大量的突变体，这是基础遗传研究和复杂的异源四倍体性状基础的功能基因组学以及棉花育种的宝贵资源。

Pubmed_ID: 32238941

Recapitulating the human segmentation clock with pluripotent stem cells

用多能干细胞概括人类分割时钟

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2144-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238941/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Pluripotent stem cells are increasingly used to model different aspects of embryogenesis and organ formation1. Despite recent advances in in vitro induction of major mesodermal lineages and cell types2,3, experimental model systems that can recapitulate more complex features of human mesoderm development and patterning are largely missing. Here we used induced pluripotent stem cells for the stepwise in vitro induction of presomitic mesoderm and its derivatives to model distinct aspects of human somitogenesis. We focused initially on modelling the human segmentation clock, a major biological concept believed to underlie the rhythmic and controlled emergence of somites, which give rise to the segmental pattern of the vertebrate axial skeleton. We observed oscillatory expression of core segmentation clock genes, including HES7 and DKK1, determined the period of the human segmentation clock to be around five hours, and demonstrated the presence of dynamic travelling-wave-like gene expression in in vitro-induced human presomitic mesoderm. Furthermore, we identified and compared oscillatory genes in human and mouse presomitic mesoderm derived from pluripotent stem cells, which revealed species-specific and shared molecular components and pathways associated with the putative mouse and human segmentation clocks. Using CRISPR-Cas9-based genome editing technology, we then targeted genes for which mutations in patients with segmentation defects of the vertebrae, such as spondylocostal dysostosis, have been reported (HES7, LFNG, DLL3 and MESP2). Subsequent analysis of patient-like and patient-derived induced pluripotent stem cells revealed gene-specific alterations in oscillation, synchronization or differentiation properties. Our findings provide insights into the human segmentation clock as well as diseases associated with human axial skeletogenesis.

摘要: 多能干细胞被越来越多地用来模拟胚胎发生和器官形成的不同方面。尽管最近在体外诱导主要中胚层谱系和细胞类型方面取得了进展[2,3]，但仍缺乏能够概括人类中胚层发育和模式复杂特征的实验模型系统。在这里，我们使用诱导多能干细胞逐步体外诱导早体中胚层及其衍生物，以模拟人类体细胞发生的不同方面。我们最初专注于模拟人体分割时钟，这是一个主要的生物学概念，被认为是节律节律性和可控性出现的基础，从而引起了脊椎动物轴向骨骼的分割模式。我们观察到核心分段时钟基因（包括HES7和DKK1）的振荡表达，确定了人类分段时钟的周期大约为五个小时，并证明了在体外诱导的人类早熟中胚层中存在动态行波状基因表达。此外，我们鉴定并比较了来自多能干细胞的人类和小鼠早熟中胚层中的振荡基因，该基因揭示了物种特异性和共享的分子成分以及与推定的小鼠和人类分割时钟相关的途径。然后，我们使用基于CRISPR-Cas9的基因组编辑技术，针对已报道了椎骨节段缺损患者的突变（例如脊椎肋骨发育不全）的基因（HES7，LFNG，DLL3和MESP2）。随后对患者样和患者衍生的多能干细胞的分析揭示了振荡，同步或分化特性的基因特异性改变。我们的发现提供了对人类分割时钟以及与人类轴向骨骼生成相关的疾病的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32238934

A genomic and epigenomic atlas of prostate cancer in Asian populations

亚洲人群前列腺癌的基因组和表观基因组图集

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2135-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238934/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Prostate cancer is the second most common cancer in men worldwide1. Over the past decade, large-scale integrative genomics efforts have enhanced our understanding of this disease by characterizing its genetic and epigenetic landscape in thousands of patients2,3. However, most tumours profiled in these studies were obtained from patients from Western populations. Here we produced and analysed whole-genome, whole-transcriptome and DNA methylation data for 208 pairs of tumour tissue samples and matched healthy control tissue from Chinese patients with primary prostate cancer. Systematic comparison with published data from 2,554 prostate tumours revealed that the genomic alteration signatures in Chinese patients were markedly distinct from those of Western cohorts: specifically, 41% of tumours contained mutations in FOXA1 and 18% each had deletions in ZNF292 and CHD1. Alterations of the genome and epigenome were correlated and were predictive of disease phenotype and progression. Coding and noncoding mutations, as well as epimutations, converged on pathways that are important for prostate cancer, providing insights into this devastating disease. These discoveries underscore the importance of including population context in constructing comprehensive genomic maps for disease.

摘要: 前列腺癌是全球男性中第二大最常见的癌症1。在过去的十年中，大规模整合基因组学的努力通过表征成千上万患者的遗传和表观遗传学特征，加深了我们对该疾病的了解2，3。但是，这些研究中描述的大多数肿瘤均来自西方人群的患者。在这里，我们产生并分析了来自中国原发性前列腺癌患者的208对肿瘤组织样品和匹配的健康对照组织的全基因组，全转录组和DNA甲基化数据。与来自2,554例前列腺肿瘤的已发表数据进行系统比较发现，中国患者的基因组改变特征与西方人群明显不同：具体而言，41％的肿瘤包含FOXA1突变，18％的ZNF292和CHD1缺失。基因组和表观基因组的变化是相关的，并且可以预测疾病的表型和进展。编码和非编码突变以及表位突变都集中在对前列腺癌重要的途径上，从而为这种毁灭性疾病提供了见识。这些发现强调了在构建疾病综合基因组图谱时纳入种群背景的重要性。

Pubmed_ID: 32238933

Parental-to-embryo switch of chromosome organization in early embryogenesis

胚胎早期发育中染色体组织的亲代转换

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2125-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238933/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Paternal and maternal epigenomes undergo marked changes after fertilization1. Recent epigenomic studies have revealed the unusual chromatin landscapes that are present in oocytes, sperm and early preimplantation embryos, including atypical patterns of histone modifications2-4 and differences in chromosome organization and accessibility, both in gametes5-8 and after fertilization5,8-10. However, these studies have led to very different conclusions: the global absence of local topological-associated domains (TADs) in gametes and their appearance in the embryo8,9 versus the pre-existence of TADs and loops in the zygote5,11. The questions of whether parental structures can be inherited in the newly formed embryo and how these structures might relate to allele-specific gene regulation remain open. Here we map genomic interactions for each parental genome (including the X chromosome), using an optimized single-cell high-throughput chromosome conformation capture (HiC) protocol12,13, during preimplantation in the mouse. We integrate chromosome organization with allelic expression states and chromatin marks, and reveal that higher-order chromatin structure after fertilization coincides with an allele-specific enrichment of methylation of histone H3 at lysine 27. These early parental-specific domains correlate with gene repression and participate in parentally biased gene expression-including in recently described, transiently imprinted loci14. We also find TADs that arise in a non-parental-specific manner during a second wave of genome assembly. These de novo domains are associated with active chromatin. Finally, we obtain insights into the relationship between TADs and gene expression by investigating structural changes to the paternal X chromosome before and during X chromosome inactivation in preimplantation female embryos15. We find that TADs are lost as genes become silenced on the paternal X chromosome but linger in regions that escape X chromosome inactivation. These findings demonstrate the complex dynamics of three-dimensional genome organization and gene expression during early development.

摘要: 父本和母本的表观基因组受精后发生明显变化1。最近的基因组学研究揭示了卵母细胞，精子和早期植入前胚胎中存在着不寻常的染色质景观，包括配子5-8和受精后5,8-10的组蛋白修饰2-4的非典型模式以及染色体组织和可及性的差异。然而，这些研究得出了截然不同的结论：配子中全局不存在局部拓扑相关结构域（TAD），它们在胚胎中的出现8,9与合子中TAD和环的先验存在5,11。亲本结构是否可以在新形成的胚胎中遗传以及这些结构如何与等位基因特异性基因调控有关的问题仍然悬而未决。在这里，我们在小鼠植入前的过程中，使用优化的单细胞高通量染色体构象捕获（HiC）协议12,13，绘制了每个亲本基因组（包括X染色体）的基因组相互作用。我们整合了具有等位基因表达状态和染色质标记的染色体组织，并揭示了受精后高阶染色质结构与组氨酸H3在赖氨酸27的甲基化等位基因特异性富集相吻合。这些早期的亲本特异性结构域与基因阻抑相关并参与亲本偏向的基因表达中的基因突变-包括最近描述的瞬时印迹的基因座14。我们还发现在第二次基因组组装浪潮中以非亲本特异性方式出现的TAD。这些从头结构域与活性染色质相关。最后，我们通过研究在植入前女性胚胎中X染色体失活之前和期间，父亲X染色体的结构变化，来了解TAD与基因表达之间的关系15。我们发现，随着父系X染色体上的基因沉默，TAD丢失了，但仍停留在逃脱X染色体失活的区域。这些发现证明了在早期发育过程中三维基因组组织和基因表达的复杂动力学。

Pubmed_ID: 32238925

CRISPR screens in cancer spheroids identify 3D growth-specific vulnerabilities

癌症球体中的CRISPR筛查可识别3D生长相关的漏洞

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2099-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238925/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Cancer genomics studies have identified thousands of putative cancer driver genes1. Development of high-throughput and accurate models to define the functions of these genes is a major challenge. Here we devised a scalable cancer-spheroid model and performed genome-wide CRISPR screens in 2D monolayers and 3D lung-cancer spheroids. CRISPR phenotypes in 3D more accurately recapitulated those of in vivo tumours, and genes with differential sensitivities between 2D and 3D conditions were highly enriched for genes that are mutated in lung cancers. These analyses also revealed drivers that are essential for cancer growth in 3D and in vivo, but not in 2D. Notably, we found that carboxypeptidase D is responsible for removal of a C-terminal RKRR motif2 from the α-chain of the insulin-like growth factor 1 receptor that is critical for receptor activity. Carboxypeptidase D expression correlates with patient outcomes in patients with lung cancer, and loss of carboxypeptidase D reduced tumour growth. Our results reveal key differences between 2D and 3D cancer models, and establish a generalizable strategy for performing CRISPR screens in spheroids to reveal cancer vulnerabilities.

摘要: 癌症基因组学研究已经鉴定出数千种推定的癌症驱动基因。开发高通量和精确的模型以定义这些基因的功能是一个重大挑战。在这里，我们设计了可扩展的癌症球体模型，并以2D单层和3D肺癌球体进行了全基因组CRISPR筛选。3D中的CRISPR表型更准确地概括了体内肿瘤的表型，并且2D和3D条件之间敏感性差异的基因高度丰富了肺癌中突变的基因。这些分析还揭示了对于3D和体内癌症生长至关重要的驱动程序，但对于2D却不是。值得注意的是，我们发现羧肽酶D负责从对受体活性至关重要的胰岛素样生长因子1受体的α链中去除C端RKRR基序2。羧肽酶D的表达与肺癌患者的预后相关，而羧肽酶D的缺失会降低肿瘤的生长。我们的研究结果揭示了2D和3D癌症模型之间的关键差异，并建立了在球体中进行CRISPR筛选以揭示癌症脆弱性的通用策略。

Pubmed_ID: 32238924

U1 snRNP regulates chromatin retention of noncoding RNAs

U1 snRNP调节非编码RNA的染色质保留

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2105-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238924/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Long noncoding RNAs (lncRNAs) and promoter- or enhancer-associated unstable transcripts locate preferentially to chromatin, where some regulate chromatin structure, transcription and RNA processing1-13. Although several RNA sequences responsible for nuclear localization have been identified-such as repeats in the lncRNA Xist and Alu-like elements in long RNAs14-16-how lncRNAs as a class are enriched at chromatin remains unknown. Here we describe a random, mutagenesis-coupled, high-throughput method that we name 'RNA elements for subcellular localization by sequencing' (mutREL-seq). Using this method, we discovered an RNA motif that recognizes the U1 small nuclear ribonucleoprotein (snRNP) and is essential for the localization of reporter RNAs to chromatin. Across the genome, chromatin-bound lncRNAs are enriched with 5' splice sites and depleted of 3' splice sites, and exhibit high levels of U1 snRNA binding compared with cytoplasm-localized messenger RNAs. Acute depletion of U1 snRNA or of the U1 snRNP protein component SNRNP70 markedly reduces the chromatin association of hundreds of lncRNAs and unstable transcripts, without altering the overall transcription rate in cells. In addition, rapid degradation of SNRNP70 reduces the localization of both nascent and polyadenylated lncRNA transcripts to chromatin, and disrupts the nuclear and genome-wide localization of the lncRNA Malat1. Moreover, U1 snRNP interacts with transcriptionally engaged RNA polymerase II. These results show that U1 snRNP acts widely to tether and mobilize lncRNAs to chromatin in a transcription-dependent manner. Our findings have uncovered a previously unknown role of U1 snRNP beyond the processing of precursor mRNA, and provide molecular insight into how lncRNAs are recruited to regulatory sites to carry out chromatin-associated functions.

摘要: 长的非编码RNA（lncRNA）和与启动子或增强子相关的不稳定转录本优先位于染色质上，其中一些调节染色质的结构，转录和RNA加工1-13。尽管已鉴定出几种负责核定位的RNA序列-例如在长RNAs14-16中的lncRNAXist和Alu-like元件中重复，但如何将lncRNA作为一类在染色质上的富集仍是未知的。在这里，我们描述了一种随机，诱变耦合，高通量的方法，我们将其命名为“用于测序的亚细胞定位的RNA元件”（mutREL-seq）。使用这种方法，我们发现了识别U1小核糖核糖核蛋白（snRNP）的RNA基序，这对于将报告RNA定位于染色质至关重要。在整个基因组中，与染色质结合的lncRNA富含5'剪接位点，并且耗尽了3'剪接位点，与细胞质定位的信使RNA相比，其U1snRNA结合水平高。U1snRNA或U1snRNP蛋白成分SNRNP70的急性消耗显着降低了数百个lncRNA和不稳定转录本的染色质缔合，而不会改变细胞的总体转录速率。此外，SNRNP70的快速降解减少了新生和聚腺苷酸化的lncRNA转录本对染色质的定位，并破坏了lncRNAMalat1的核和全基因组定位。此外，U1snRNP与转录参与的RNA聚合酶II相互作用。这些结果表明，U1snRNP广泛发挥作用，以转录依赖性方式束缚并动员lncRNAs进入染色质。我们的发现揭露了U1snRNP在前体mRNA加工之外的先前未知的作用，并为如何将lncRNAs募集到调节位点以执行与染色质相关的功能提供了分子见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32238901

Accelerated evolution of an Lhx2 enhancer shapes mammalian social hierarchies

Lhx2增强子的加速进化塑造了哺乳动物的社会阶层

DOI: 10.1038/s41422-020-0308-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238901/

Journal: Cell research {'ISSN': '1001-0602', 'Name': 'cell research', '2015': '14.812', '2016': '15.606', '2017': '15.393', '2018': '17.848', '2019': '20.507'}

Date: 2020 May

Abstract: Social hierarchies emerged during evolution, and social rank influences behavior and health of individuals. However, the evolutionary mechanisms of social hierarchy are still unknown in amniotes. Here we developed a new method and performed a genome-wide screening for identifying regions with accelerated evolution in the ancestral lineage of placental mammals, where mammalian social hierarchies might have initially evolved. Then functional analyses were conducted for the most accelerated region designated as placental-accelerated sequence 1 (PAS1, P = 3.15 × 10-18). Multiple pieces of evidence show that PAS1 is an enhancer of the transcription factor gene Lhx2 involved in brain development. PAS1s isolated from various amniotes showed different cis-regulatory activity in vitro, and affected the expression of Lhx2 differently in the nervous system of mouse embryos. PAS1 knock-out mice lack social stratification. PAS1 knock-in mouse models demonstrate that PAS1s determine the social dominance and subordinate of adult mice, and that social ranks could even be turned over by mutated PAS1. All homozygous mutant mice had normal huddled sleeping behavior, motor coordination and strength. Therefore, PAS1-Lhx2 modulates social hierarchies and is essential for establishing social stratification in amniotes, and positive Darwinian selection on PAS1 plays pivotal roles in the occurrence of mammalian social hierarchies.

摘要: 社会等级制度是在进化过程中出现的，社会等级会影响个人的行为和健康。然而，羊膜羊对社会等级制度的进化机制仍是未知的。在这里，我们开发了一种新方法，并进行了全基因组筛选，以鉴定胎盘哺乳动物祖先谱系中进化加速的区域，而哺乳动物的社会阶层可能最初在此进化。然后对指定为胎盘加速序列1（PAS1，P=3.15×10-18）的最加速区域进行功能分析。多个证据表明，PAS1是参与大脑发育的转录因子基因Lhx2的增强子。分离自各种羊膜的PAS1s在体外表现出不同的顺式调节活性，并在小鼠胚胎的神经系统中不同地影响Lhx2的表达。PAS1基因敲除小鼠缺乏社会分层。PAS1敲入小鼠模型表明，PAS1决定了成年小鼠的社会优势和从属地位，并且突变的PAS1甚至可以改变社会地位。所有纯合突变小鼠的睡眠行为，运动协调能力和强度均正常。因此，PAS1-Lhx2调节了社会等级，对于建立羊膜动物的社会分层至关重要，并且对PAS1进行积极的达尔文选择对哺乳动物社会等级的产生起着关键作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32238817

The translational landscape of ground state pluripotency

基态多能性的翻译景观

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15449-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238817/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/01/2020

Abstract: Translational control plays a central role in regulation of gene expression and can lead to significant divergence between mRNA- and protein-abundance. Here, we used genome-wide approaches combined with time-course analysis to measure the mRNA-abundance, mRNA-translation rate and protein expression during the transition of naïve-to-primed mouse embryonic stem cells (ESCs). We find that the ground state ESCs cultured with GSK3-, MEK-inhibitors and LIF (2iL) display higher ribosome density on a selective set of mRNAs. This set of mRNAs undergo strong translational buffering to maintain stable protein expression levels in 2iL-ESCs. Importantly, we show that the global alteration of cellular proteome during the transition of naïve-to-primed pluripotency is largely accompanied by transcriptional rewiring. Thus, we provide a comprehensive and detailed overview of the global changes in gene expression in different states of ESCs and dissect the relative contributions of mRNA-transcription, translation and regulation of protein stability in controlling protein abundance.

摘要: 翻译控制在基因表达的调节中起着核心作用，并可能导致mRNA和蛋白质丰度之间的显着差异。在这里，我们使用了全基因组方法与时程分析相结合，以测量从幼稚到初免的小鼠胚胎干细胞（ESC）过渡过程中的mRNA丰度，mRNA翻译率和蛋白质表达。我们发现，与GSK3，MEK抑制剂和LIF（2iL）培养的基态ESC在一组选择性的mRNA上显示出更高的核糖体密度。这套mRNA经历强大的翻译缓冲，以维持2iL-ESCs中稳定的蛋白质表达水平。重要的是，我们表明，从幼稚到原始的多能性的过渡过程中，细胞蛋白质组的总体变化在很大程度上伴随着转录重新连接。因此，我们提供了在ESCs不同状态下基因表达的全球变化的全面而详尽的概述，并剖析了mRNA转录，翻译和蛋白稳定性调节在控制蛋白丰度方面的相对贡献。

Pubmed_ID: 32238811

Publisher Correction: Deep coverage whole genome sequences and plasma lipoprotein(a) in individuals of European and African ancestries

出版商更正：覆盖欧洲和非洲祖先个体的全基因组序列和血浆脂蛋白（a）

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15236-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32238811/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 04/01/2020

Abstract: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.

摘要: 该文件的修订版已经发布，可以通过文件顶部的链接进行访问。

Pubmed_ID: 32236524

Canfam_GSD: De novo chromosome-length genome assembly of the German Shepherd Dog (Canis lupus familiaris) using a combination of long reads, optical mapping, and Hi-C

Canfam_GSD：结合使用长读取，光学作图和Hi-C技术，对德国牧羊犬（Canis lupus friendlyis）进行从头染色体长度基因组组装

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa027

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32236524/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 04/01/2020

Abstract: Background: The German Shepherd Dog (GSD) is one of the most common breeds on earth and has been bred for its utility and intelligence. It is often first choice for police and military work, as well as protection, disability assistance, and search-and-rescue. Yet, GSDs are well known to be susceptible to a range of genetic diseases that can interfere with their training. Such diseases are of particular concern when they occur later in life, and fully trained animals are not able to continue their duties. Findings: Here, we provide the draft genome sequence of a healthy German Shepherd female as a reference for future disease and evolutionary studies. We generated this improved canid reference genome (CanFam_GSD) utilizing a combination of Pacific Bioscience, Oxford Nanopore, 10X Genomics, Bionano, and Hi-C technologies. The GSD assembly is ∼80 times as contiguous as the current canid reference genome (20.9 vs 0.267 Mb contig N50), containing far fewer gaps (306 vs 23,876) and fewer scaffolds (429 vs 3,310) than the current canid reference genome CanFamv3.1. Two chromosomes (4 and 35) are assembled into single scaffolds with no gaps. BUSCO analyses of the genome assembly results show that 93.0% of the conserved single-copy genes are complete in the GSD assembly compared with 92.2% for CanFam v3.1. Homology-based gene annotation increases this value to ∼99%. Detailed examination of the evolutionarily important pancreatic amylase region reveals that there are most likely 7 copies of the gene, indicative of a duplication of 4 ancestral copies and the disruption of 1 copy. Conclusions: GSD genome assembly and annotation were produced with major improvement in completeness, continuity, and quality over the existing canid reference. This resource will enable further research related to canine diseases, the evolutionary relationships of canids, and other aspects of canid biology.

摘要: 背景：德国牧羊犬（GSD）是地球上最常见的品种之一，并因其实用性和智能而繁殖。它通常是警察和军事工作以及保护，残疾援助和搜救的首选。但是，众所周知，GSD容易感染多种可能干扰其训练的遗传疾病。当这类疾病在以后的生活中发生时，它们尤其令人担忧，而经过充分训练的动物无法继续其职责。发现：在这里，我们提供了健康的德国牧羊犬雌性的基因组序列草案，以作为未来疾病和进化研究的参考。我们利用PacificBioscience，OxfordNanopore，10XGenomics，Bionano和Hi-C技术的组合产生了这种改良的犬科动物参考基因组（CanFam_GSD）。GSD组件的连续性是当前犬齿参考基因组（20.9vs0.267MbcontigN50）的约80倍，与当前犬齿参考基因组CanFamv3.1相比，其缺口（306vs23,876）和支架（429vs3,310）少得多。将两个染色体（4和35）组装成没有间隙的单个支架。BUSCO对基因组装配结果的分析表明，GSD装配中93.0％的保守单拷贝基因是完整的，而CanFamv3.1则为92.2％。基于同源性的基因注释可将该值增加至约99％。对具有重要进化意义的胰淀粉酶区域的详细检查显示，该基因最有可能存在7个拷贝，这表明该基因有4个祖先副本的重复和1个副本的破坏。结论：与现有犬科参考相比，GSD基因组的装配和注释在完整性，连续性和质量上均有重大改进。该资源将使有关犬类疾病，犬类的进化关系以及犬类生物学的其他方面的进一步研究成为可能。

Pubmed_ID: 32235831

Author Correction: Heritability estimates for 361 blood metabolites across 40 genome-wide association studies

作者更正：40个全基因组关联研究中361种血液代谢物的遗传力估计

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15276-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32235831/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 03/31/2020

Abstract: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.

摘要: 该文件的修订版已经发布，可以通过文件顶部的链接进行访问。

Pubmed_ID: 32234787

Water lily ( Nymphaea thermarum) genome reveals variable genomic signatures of ancient vascular cambium losses

睡莲（Nymphaea thermarum）基因组揭示了古代维管形成层损失的可变基因组特征

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1922873117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32234787/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: For more than 225 million y, all seed plants were woody trees, shrubs, or vines. Shortly after the origin of angiosperms ∼140 million y ago (MYA), the Nymphaeales (water lilies) became one of the first lineages to deviate from their ancestral, woody habit by losing the vascular cambium, the meristematic population of cells that produces secondary xylem (wood) and phloem. Many of the genes and gene families that regulate differentiation of secondary tissues also regulate the differentiation of primary xylem and phloem, which are produced by apical meristems and retained in nearly all seed plants. Here, we sequenced and assembled a draft genome of the water lily Nymphaea thermarum, an emerging system for the study of early flowering plant evolution, and compared it to genomes from other cambium-bearing and cambium-less lineages (e.g., monocots and Nelumbo). This revealed lineage-specific patterns of gene loss and divergence. Nymphaea is characterized by a significant contraction of the HD-ZIP III transcription factors, specifically loss of REVOLUTA, which influences cambial activity in other angiosperms. We also found the Nymphaea and monocot copies of cambium-associated CLE signaling peptides display unique substitutions at otherwise highly conserved amino acids. Nelumbo displays no obvious divergence in cambium-associated genes. The divergent genomic signatures of convergent loss of vascular cambium reveals that even pleiotropic genes can exhibit unique divergence patterns in association with independent events of trait loss. Our results shed light on the evolution of herbaceousness-one of the key biological innovations associated with the earliest phases of angiosperm evolution.

摘要: 在超过2.25亿年的时间里，所有种子植物都是木本树木，灌木或藤本植物。在约1.4亿年前的被子植物（MYA）起源后不久，睡莲（睡莲）成为最早的系谱之一，通过失去血管形成层（产生分生木质部的细胞的分生组织）而偏离了祖先的木本习性。（木材）和韧皮部。调节次生组织分化的许多基因和基因家族也调节由根尖分生组织产生并保留在几乎所有种子植物中的原生木质部和韧皮部的分化。在这里，我们对睡莲Nymphaeathermarum（一个用于研究早期开花植物进化的新兴系统）的基因组草图进行了测序和组装，并将其与其他含碳和无碳系（例如，单子叶植物和Nelumbo）的基因组进行了比较。。这揭示了基因丧失和分化的谱系特异性模式。睡莲的特征在于HD-ZIPIII转录因子的显着收缩，特别是REVOLUTA的丧失，这会影响其他被子植物的冈比亚活动。我们还发现形成层相关的CLE信号肽的星云和单子叶植物副本在否则高度保守的氨基酸上显示出独特的取代。Nelumbo在与形成层相关的基因中没有显示出明显的差异。血管形成层收敛性丧失的不同基因组特征表明，即使多效性基因也可以表现出独特的差异性模式，并伴有性状丧失的独立事件。我们的研究结果揭示了草本植物的进化-与被子植物进化的最早阶段相关的关键生物学创新之一。

Pubmed_ID: 32234782

Mechanistic basis for microhomology identification and genome scarring by polymerase theta

通过聚合酶θ确定微同源性和基因组瘢痕形成的机理基础

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1921791117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32234782/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: DNA polymerase theta mediates an end joining pathway (TMEJ) that repairs chromosome breaks. It requires resection of broken ends to generate long, 3' single-stranded DNA tails, annealing of complementary sequence segments (microhomologies) in these tails, followed by microhomology-primed synthesis sufficient to resolve broken ends. The means by which microhomologies are identified is thus a critical step in this pathway, but is not understood. Here we show microhomologies are identified by a scanning mechanism initiated from the 3' terminus and favoring bidirectional progression into flanking DNA, typically to a maximum of 15 nucleotides into each flank. Polymerase theta is frequently insufficiently processive to complete repair of breaks in microhomology-poor, AT-rich regions. Aborted synthesis leads to one or more additional rounds of microhomology search, annealing, and synthesis; this promotes complete repair in part because earlier rounds of synthesis generate microhomologies de novo that are sufficiently long that synthesis is more processive. Aborted rounds of synthesis are evident in characteristic genomic scars as insertions of 3 to 30 bp of sequence that is identical to flanking DNA ("templated" insertions). Templated insertions are present at higher levels in breast cancer genomes from patients with germline BRCA1/2 mutations, consistent with an addiction to TMEJ in these cancers. Our work thus describes the mechanism for microhomology identification and shows how it both mitigates limitations implicit in the microhomology requirement and generates distinctive genomic scars associated with pathogenic genome instability.

摘要: DNA聚合酶theta介导修复染色体断裂的末端连接途径（TMEJ）。它需要切除末端以产生长的3'单链DNA尾部，对这些尾部中的互补序列区段（微同源性）进行退火，然后进行足以分离残端的微同源引物合成。因此，鉴定微同源性的方法是该途径中的关键步骤，但尚未被理解。在这里，我们显示通过从3'末端启动的扫描机制识别微同源性，该机制有利于双向发展为侧翼DNA，通常每个侧翼最多包含15个核苷酸。聚合酶θ通常不足以完全修复微同源性差，AT富集区域的断裂。中止的合成导致一轮或多轮的微同源搜索，退火和合成。这促进了完全修复，部分原因是较早的合成过程产生了从头开始的微观同源性，而微观同源性足够长以至于合成过程更具进行性。在特征性的基因组疤痕中，由于与侧翼DNA相同的3到30bp的序列插入（“模板化”插入），合成中止合成失败。具有种系BRCA1/2突变的患者在乳腺癌基因组中模板插入的水平较高，与这些癌症中TMEJ的成瘾一致。因此，我们的工作描述了微同源性鉴定的机制，并显示了它既减轻了微同源性要求中隐含的局限性，又产生了与致病基因组不稳定相关的独特基因组疤痕。

Pubmed_ID: 32231278

Meta-analysis of 542,934 subjects of European ancestry identifies new genes and mechanisms predisposing to refractive error and myopia

对欧洲血统的542,934名受试者的荟萃分析确定了导致屈光不正和近视的新基因和新机制

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0599-0

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32231278/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Refractive errors, in particular myopia, are a leading cause of morbidity and disability worldwide. Genetic investigation can improve understanding of the molecular mechanisms that underlie abnormal eye development and impaired vision. We conducted a meta-analysis of genome-wide association studies (GWAS) that involved 542,934 European participants and identified 336 novel genetic loci associated with refractive error. Collectively, all associated genetic variants explain 18.4% of heritability and improve the accuracy of myopia prediction (area under the curve (AUC) = 0.75). Our results suggest that refractive error is genetically heterogeneous, driven by genes that participate in the development of every anatomical component of the eye. In addition, our analyses suggest that genetic factors controlling circadian rhythm and pigmentation are also involved in the development of myopia and refractive error. These results may enable the prediction of refractive error and the development of personalized myopia prevention strategies in the future.

摘要: 屈光不正，尤其是近视，是全世界发病率和残疾的主要原因。遗传研究可以增进对异常眼睛发育和视力障碍的分子机制的了解。我们进行了全基因组关联研究（GWAS）的荟萃分析，涉及542,934名欧洲参与者，并确定了336个与屈光不正相关的新型遗传基因座。所有相关的遗传变异共同解释了18.4％的遗传力，并提高了近视预测的准确性（曲线下面积（AUC）=0.75）。我们的结果表明，屈光不正在遗传上是异质的，由参与眼睛每个解剖结构发育的基因驱动。此外，我们的分析表明，控制昼夜节律和色素沉着的遗传因素也与近视和屈光不正的发展有关。这些结果可能使屈光不正的预测和未来个性化近视预防策略的发展成为可能。

Pubmed_ID: 32231276

Minimal phenotyping yields genome-wide association signals of low specificity for major depression

最小的表型产生对抑郁症低特异性的全基因组关联信号

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0594-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32231276/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Minimal phenotyping refers to the reliance on the use of a small number of self-reported items for disease case identification, increasingly used in genome-wide association studies (GWAS). Here we report differences in genetic architecture between depression defined by minimal phenotyping and strictly defined major depressive disorder (MDD): the former has a lower genotype-derived heritability that cannot be explained by inclusion of milder cases and a higher proportion of the genome contributing to this shared genetic liability with other conditions than for strictly defined MDD. GWAS based on minimal phenotyping definitions preferentially identifies loci that are not specific to MDD, and, although it generates highly predictive polygenic risk scores, the predictive power can be explained entirely by large sample sizes rather than by specificity for MDD. Our results show that reliance on results from minimal phenotyping may bias views of the genetic architecture of MDD and impede the ability to identify pathways specific to MDD.

摘要: 最小的表型是指依靠少数自我报告的项目进行疾病病例识别，这种现象在全基因组关联研究（GWAS）中越来越多地使用。在这里，我们报告了由最小表型定义的抑郁症和严格定义的主要抑郁症（MDD）之间的遗传结构差异：前者具有较低的基因型遗传性，无法通过纳入较轻的病例和较高比例的基因组来解释这种遗传责任与严格定义的MDD之外的其他条件相同。基于最小表型定义的GWAS可优先识别非MDD特异的基因座，尽管它会产生高度预测的多基因风险评分，但预测力完全可以通过大样本量而非MDD的特异性来解释。我们的结果表明，依赖最小表型的结果可能会使人们对MDD遗传结构的看法产生偏见，并阻碍鉴定MDD特异性途径的能力。

Pubmed_ID: 32231244

The genetic architecture of membranous nephropathy and its potential to improve non-invasive diagnosis

膜性肾病的遗传结构及其改善非侵入性诊断的潜力

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15383-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32231244/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 03/30/2020

Abstract: Membranous Nephropathy (MN) is a rare autoimmune cause of kidney failure. Here we report a genome-wide association study (GWAS) for primary MN in 3,782 cases and 9,038 controls of East Asian and European ancestries. We discover two previously unreported loci, NFKB1 (﻿rs230540, OR = 1.25, P = 3.4 × 10-12) and IRF4 (﻿rs9405192, OR = 1.29, P = ﻿1.4 × 10-14), fine-map the PLA2R1 locus (﻿rs17831251, OR = 2.25, P = 4.7 × 10-103) and report ancestry-specific effects of three classical HLA alleles: DRB1*1501 in East Asians (OR = 3.81, P = 2.0 × 10-49), DQA1*0501 in Europeans (OR = 2.88, P = 5.7 × 10-93), and DRB1*0301 in both ethnicities (OR = 3.50, P = 9.2 × 10-23 and OR = 3.39, P = 5.2 × 10-82, respectively). GWAS loci explain 32% of disease risk in East Asians and 25% in Europeans, and correctly re-classify 20-37% of the cases in validation cohorts that are antibody-negative by the serum anti-PLA2R ELISA diagnostic test. Our findings highlight an unusual genetic architecture of MN, with four loci and their interactions accounting for nearly one-third of the disease risk.

摘要: 膜性肾病（MN）是一种罕见的自身免疫性肾功能衰竭。在这里，我们报告了3,782例病例和9,038例东亚和欧洲祖先对照的原发性MN的全基因组关联研究（GWAS）。我们发现了两个以前未报告的基因座NFKB1（rs230540，OR=1.25，P=3.4×10-12）和IRF4（rs9405192，OR=1.29，P=1.4×10-14），精细映射了PLA2R1基因座（rs17831251，OR=2.25，P=4.7×10-103）并报告三个经典HLA等位基因的祖先特异性效应：东亚地区的DRB1*1501（OR=3.81，P=2.0×10-49），DQA1*欧洲人0501（OR=2.88，P=5.7×10-93）和两种种族的DRB1*0301（OR=3.50，P=9.2×10-23和OR=3.39，P=5.2×10-82）。GWAS基因座解释了东亚地区32％的疾病风险和欧洲地区25％的疾病风险，并通过血清抗PLA2RELISA诊断测试对抗体阴性的验证队列正确地重新分类了20-37％的病例。我们的发现突出了MN的不寻常遗传结构，其中四个基因座及其相互作用占疾病风险的近三分之一。

Pubmed_ID: 32229570

Model-based integration of genomics and metabolomics reveals SNP functionality in Mycobacterium tuberculosis

基于模型的基因组学和代谢组学整合揭示了结核分枝杆菌中的SNP功能

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1915551117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32229570/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 04/14/2020

Abstract: Human tuberculosis is caused by members of the Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex (MTBC) that vary in virulence and transmissibility. While genome-wide association studies have uncovered several mutations conferring drug resistance, much less is known about the factors underlying other bacterial phenotypes. Variation in the outcome of tuberculosis infection and diseases has been attributed primarily to patient and environmental factors, but recent evidence indicates an additional role for the genetic diversity among MTBC clinical strains. Here, we used metabolomics to unravel the effect of genetic variation on the strain-specific metabolic adaptive capacity and vulnerability. To define the functionality of single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) systematically, we developed a constraint-based approach that integrates metabolomic and genomic data. Our model-based predictions correctly classify SNP effects in pyruvate kinase and suggest a genetic basis for strain-specific inherent baseline susceptibility to the antibiotic para-aminosalicylic acid. Our method is broadly applicable across microbial life, opening possibilities for the development of more selective treatment strategies.

摘要: 人结核病是由结核分枝杆菌复合物（MTBC）的成员引起的，这些成员的毒力和传播能力各不相同。尽管全基因组关联研究已经发现了一些赋予耐药性的突变，但对其他细菌表型的潜在影响因素知之甚少。结核感染和疾病结局的差异主要归因于患者和环境因素，但最近的证据表明，MTBC临床菌株之间的遗传多样性还有其他作用。在这里，我们使用代谢组学来阐明遗传变异对菌株特异性代谢适应能力和脆弱性的影响。为了系统地定义单核苷酸多态性（SNP）的功能，我们开发了一种基于约束的方法，该方法整合了代谢组学和基因组数据。我们基于模型的预测正确地分类了丙酮酸激酶中的SNP效应，并为菌株对抗生素对氨基水杨酸的固有固有基线敏感性提供了遗传基础。我们的方法广泛适用于整个微生物生命，为开发更具选择性的治疗策略提供了可能性。

Pubmed_ID: 32221299

Structural basis for the increased processivity of D-family DNA polymerases in complex with PCNA

与PCNA结合的D家族DNA聚合酶的持续合成能力提高的结构基础

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15392-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32221299/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 03/27/2020

Abstract: Replicative DNA polymerases (DNAPs) have evolved the ability to copy the genome with high processivity and fidelity. In Eukarya and Archaea, the processivity of replicative DNAPs is greatly enhanced by its binding to the proliferative cell nuclear antigen (PCNA) that encircles the DNA. We determined the cryo-EM structure of the DNA-bound PolD-PCNA complex from Pyrococcus abyssi at 3.77 Å. Using an integrative structural biology approach - combining cryo-EM, X-ray crystallography, protein-protein interaction measurements, and activity assays - we describe the molecular basis for the interaction and cooperativity between a replicative DNAP and PCNA. PolD recruits PCNA via a complex mechanism, which requires two different PIP-boxes. We infer that the second PIP-box, which is shared with the eukaryotic Polα replicative DNAP, plays a dual role in binding either PCNA or primase, and could be a master switch between an initiation and a processive phase during replication.

摘要: 复制性DNA聚合酶（DNAP）已发展出以高生产力和高保真度复制基因组的能力。在Eukarya和Archaea中，复制性DNAPs通过与环绕DNA的增殖细胞核抗原（PCNA）结合而大大提高了其合成能力。我们在3.77Å处确定了深渊热球菌DNA结合的PolD-PCNA复合物的冷冻EM结构。使用整合结构生物学方法-结合了冷冻EM，X射线晶体学，蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用测量和活性测定-我们描述了复制型DNAP和PCNA之间相互作用和协同作用的分子基础。PolD通过复杂的机制招募PCNA，这需要两个不同的PIP框。我们推断，与真核Polα复制性DNAP共享的第二个PIP盒在结合PCNA或引物酶方面起着双重作用，并且可能是复制过程中起始阶段和过程阶段之间的主开关。

Pubmed_ID: 32221293

An RNA-seq based comparative approach reveals the transcriptome-wide interplay between 3'-to-5' exoRNases and RNase Y

基于RNA序列的比较方法揭示了3'至5'exoRNase和RNase Y在转录组范围内的相互作用

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15387-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32221293/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 03/27/2020

Abstract: RNA degradation is an essential process that allows bacteria to control gene expression and adapt to various environmental conditions. It is usually initiated by endoribonucleases (endoRNases), which produce intermediate fragments that are subsequently degraded by exoribonucleases (exoRNases). However, global studies of the coordinated action of these enzymes are lacking. Here, we compare the targetome of endoRNase Y with the targetomes of 3'-to-5' exoRNases from Streptococcus pyogenes, namely, PNPase, YhaM, and RNase R. We observe that RNase Y preferentially cleaves after guanosine, generating substrate RNAs for the 3'-to-5' exoRNases. We demonstrate that RNase Y processing is followed by trimming of the newly generated 3' ends by PNPase and YhaM. Conversely, the RNA 5' ends produced by RNase Y are rarely further trimmed. Our strategy enables the identification of processing events that are otherwise undetectable. Importantly, this approach allows investigation of the intricate interplay between endo- and exoRNases on a genome-wide scale.

摘要: RNA降解是使细菌能够控制基因表达并适应各种环境条件的重要过程。它通常由核糖核酸内切酶（endoRNases）引发，产生的中间片段随后被核糖核酸外切酶（exoRNases）降解。然而，缺乏对这些酶的协同作用的整体研究。在这里，我们比较了endoRNaseY的靶基因组和化脓性链球菌的3'到5'exoRNase的靶基因组，即PNPase，YhaM和RNaseR。3'至5'外切酶。我们证明，RNaseY处理后是由PNPase和YhaM修剪新生成的3'末端。相反，由RNaseY产生的RNA5'末端很少被进一步修剪。我们的策略可以识别原本无法检测到的处理事件。重要的是，这种方法可以在全基因组范围内研究内切酶与外切酶之间的复杂相互作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32221288

Mapping the breast cancer metastatic cascade onto ctDNA using genetic and epigenetic clonal tracking

使用遗传和表观遗传克隆追踪将乳腺癌转移级联定位到ctDNA

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15047-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32221288/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 03/27/2020

Abstract: Circulating tumour DNA (ctDNA) allows tracking of the evolution of human cancers at high resolution, overcoming many limitations of tissue biopsies. However, exploiting ctDNA to determine how a patient's cancer is evolving in order to aid clinical decisions remains difficult. This is because ctDNA is a mix of fragmented alleles, and the contribution of different cancer deposits to ctDNA is largely unknown. Profiling ctDNA almost invariably requires prior knowledge of what genomic alterations to track. Here, we leverage on a rapid autopsy programme to demonstrate that unbiased genomic characterisation of several metastatic sites and concomitant ctDNA profiling at whole-genome resolution reveals the extent to which ctDNA is representative of widespread disease. We also present a methylation profiling method that allows tracking evolutionary changes in ctDNA at single-molecule resolution without prior knowledge. These results have critical implications for the use of liquid biopsies to monitor cancer evolution in humans and guide treatment.

摘要: 循环肿瘤DNA（ctDNA）可以高分辨率追踪人类癌症的发展，克服了组织活检的许多局限性。但是，利用ctDNA来确定患者癌症的发展过程以帮助临床决策仍然很困难。这是因为ctDNA是片段化等位基因的混合物，而且不同癌症沉积物对ctDNA的贡献在很大程度上是未知的。对ctDNA进行分析几乎总是需要事先了解要追踪的基因组变化。在这里，我们利用快速的尸检程序来证明几个转移位点的无偏态基因组表征以及在全基因组分辨率下伴随的ctDNA分析揭示了ctDNA代表广泛疾病的程度。我们还提出了一种甲基化分析方法，该方法可以在没有先验知识的情况下以单分子分辨率跟踪ctDNA的进化变化。这些结果对于使用液体活检来监测人类癌症的进展并指导治疗具有关键意义。

Pubmed_ID: 32220313

Mitochondrial Diseases: Hope for the Future

线粒体疾病：对未来的希望

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.02.051

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32220313/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 04/02/2020

Abstract: Mitochondrial diseases are clinically heterogeneous disorders caused by a wide spectrum of mutations in genes encoded by either the nuclear or the mitochondrial genome. Treatments for mitochondrial diseases are currently focused on symptomatic management rather than improving the biochemical defect caused by a particular mutation. This review focuses on the latest advances in the development of treatments for mitochondrial disease, both small molecules and gene therapies, as well as methods to prevent transmission of mitochondrial disease through the germline.

摘要: 线粒体疾病是临床上的异质性疾病，由核或线粒体基因组编码的基因中的广泛突变引起。线粒体疾病的治疗目前集中在对症管理上，而不是改善由特定突变引起的生化缺陷。这篇综述重点关注线粒体疾病的治疗方法的最新进展，包括小分子和基因疗法，以及防止线粒体疾病通过种系传播的方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32220310

A Genomic Perspective on the Origin and Emergence of SARS-CoV-2

SARS-CoV-2起源和出现的基因组学观点

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.03.035

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32220310/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 04/16/2020

Abstract: The ongoing pandemic of a new human coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2, has generated enormous global concern. We and others in China were involved in the initial genome sequencing of the virus. Herein, we describe what genomic data reveal about the emergence SARS-CoV-2 and discuss the gaps in our understanding of its origins.

摘要: 新型人类冠状病毒SARS-CoV-2的持续大流行引起了全球的极大关注。我们和中国其他人参与了该病毒的初始基因组测序。在本文中，我们描述了有关SARS-CoV-2出现的基因组数据揭示了什么，并讨论了我们对它的起源了解的差距。

Pubmed_ID: 32219339

Binning unassembled short reads based on k-mer abundance covariance using sparse coding

使用稀疏编码基于k-mer丰度协方差对未组装的短读进行分箱

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa028

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32219339/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 04/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Sequence-binning techniques enable the recovery of an increasing number of genomes from complex microbial metagenomes and typically require prior metagenome assembly, incurring the computational cost and drawbacks of the latter, e.g., biases against low-abundance genomes and inability to conveniently assemble multi-terabyte datasets. Results: We present here a scalable pre-assembly binning scheme (i.e., operating on unassembled short reads) enabling latent genome recovery by leveraging sparse dictionary learning and elastic-net regularization, and its use to recover hundreds of metagenome-assembled genomes, including very low-abundance genomes, from a joint analysis of microbiomes from the LifeLines DEEP population cohort (n = 1,135, >1010 reads). Conclusion: We showed that sparse coding techniques can be leveraged to carry out read-level binning at large scale and that, despite lower genome reconstruction yields compared to assembly-based approaches, bin-first strategies can complement the more widely used assembly-first protocols by targeting distinct genome segregation profiles. Read enrichment levels across 6 orders of magnitude in relative abundance were observed, indicating that the method has the power to recover genomes consistently segregating at low levels.

摘要: 背景：序列合并技术能够从复杂的微生物元基因组中恢复越来越多的基因组，并且通常需要事先进行基因组组装，从而产生了计算成本和后者的缺点，例如偏向低丰度基因组以及无法方便地组装多个基因组TB的数据集。结果：我们在这里提出了一种可扩展的预组装装箱方案（即，对未组装的短读进行操作），可通过利用稀疏词典学习和弹性网正则化来实现潜在的基因组恢复，并用于恢复数百个由基因组组装的基因组，包括来自LifeLinesDEEP人群队列的微生物组的联合分析得出的低丰度基因组（n=1,135，>1010个读数）。结论：我们表明稀疏编码技术可用于大规模地进行读取级分箱，并且尽管与基于组装的方法相比，基因组重建的产量较低，但bin-first策略可以补充更广泛使用的组装优先协议通过靶向不同的基因组分离谱。观察到相对丰度跨越6个数量级的阅读富集水平，表明该方法具有回收始终以低水平分离的基因组的能力。

Pubmed_ID: 32218440

Dimensionality reduction reveals fine-scale structure in the Japanese population with consequences for polygenic risk prediction

降维揭示了日本人口的精细结构，并对多基因风险预测产生了影响

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15194-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32218440/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 03/26/2020

Abstract: The diversity in our genome is crucial to understanding the demographic history of worldwide populations. However, we have yet to know whether subtle genetic differences within a population can be disentangled, or whether they have an impact on complex traits. Here we apply dimensionality reduction methods (PCA, t-SNE, PCA-t-SNE, UMAP, and PCA-UMAP) to biobank-derived genomic data of a Japanese population (n = 169,719). Dimensionality reduction reveals fine-scale population structure, conspicuously differentiating adjacent insular subpopulations. We further enluciate the demographic landscape of these Japanese subpopulations using population genetics analyses. Finally, we perform phenome-wide polygenic risk score (PRS) analyses on 67 complex traits. Differences in PRS between the deconvoluted subpopulations are not always concordant with those in the observed phenotypes, suggesting that the PRS differences might reflect biases from the uncorrected structure, in a trait-dependent manner. This study suggests that such an uncorrected structure can be a potential pitfall in the clinical application of PRS.

摘要: 我们基因组中的多样性对于了解全球人口的人口历史至关重要。但是，我们尚不清楚种群中细微的遗传差异是否可以消除，或者它们是否会对复杂性状产生影响。在这里，我们将降维方法（PCA，t-SNE，PCA-t-SNE，UMAP和PCA-UMAP）应用于日本人群（n=169,719）的生物库衍生基因组数据。降维揭示了小规模的种群结构，明显地区分了相邻的岛状亚群。我们使用人口遗传学分析进一步阐明了这些日本亚人群的人口统计状况。最后，我们对67个复杂性状进行了全基因组多基因风险评分（PRS）分析。去卷积亚群之间的PRS差异并不总是与观察到的表型一致，这表明PRS差异可能以性状依赖的方式反映了来自未校正结构的偏倚。这项研究表明，这种未经校正的结构可能是PRS临床应用中的潜在陷阱。

Pubmed_ID: 32217751

Unconstrained genome targeting with near-PAMless engineered CRISPR-Cas9 variants

利用近PAMless工程改造的CRISPR-Cas9变体不受限制地靶向基因组

DOI: 10.1126/science.aba8853

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32217751/

Journal: Science (New York, N.Y.) ||| Not finding IF

Date: 04/17/2020

Abstract: Manipulation of DNA by CRISPR-Cas enzymes requires the recognition of a protospacer-adjacent motif (PAM), limiting target site recognition to a subset of sequences. To remove this constraint, we engineered variants of Streptococcus pyogenes Cas9 (SpCas9) to eliminate the NGG PAM requirement. We developed a variant named SpG that is capable of targeting an expanded set of NGN PAMs, and we further optimized this enzyme to develop a near-PAMless SpCas9 variant named SpRY (NRN and to a lesser extent NYN PAMs). SpRY nuclease and base-editor variants can target almost all PAMs, exhibiting robust activities on a wide range of sites with NRN PAMs in human cells and lower but substantial activity on those with NYN PAMs. Using SpG and SpRY, we generated previously inaccessible disease-relevant genetic variants, supporting the utility of high-resolution targeting across genome editing applications.

摘要: CRISPR-Cas酶对DNA的操纵需要识别与原间隔物相邻的基序（PAM），从而将靶位点识别限制在序列子集中。为了消除此限制，我们设计了化脓链球菌Cas9（SpCas9）的变体，以消除NGGPAM的要求。我们开发了一种名为SpG的变体，该变体能够靶向一组扩展的NGNPAM，并且我们进一步优化了该酶，以开发出一种近PAMless的SpCas9变体，名为SpRY（NRN和程度较小的NYNPAM）。SpRY核酸酶和碱基编辑变体可以靶向几乎所有PAM，在人类细胞中具有NRNPAM的广泛位点上均表现出强大的活性，而对于具有NYNPAM的细胞则具有较低但相当大的活​​性。使用SpG和SpRY，我们生成了以前无法获得的与疾病相关的遗传变异，从而支持在基因组编辑应用程序中进行高分辨率靶向的实用程序。

Pubmed_ID: 32214249

Structural insight into arenavirus replication machinery

结构分析对晕病毒复制机制的了解

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2114-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32214249/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Mar

Abstract: Arenaviruses can cause severe haemorrhagic fever and neurological diseases in humans and other animals, exemplified by Lassa mammarenavirus, Machupo mammarenavirus and lymphocytic choriomeningitis virus, posing great threats to public health1-4. These viruses encode a large multi-domain RNA-dependent RNA polymerase for transcription and replication of the viral genome5. Viral polymerases are one of the leading antiviral therapeutic targets. However, the structure of arenavirus polymerase is not yet known. Here we report the near-atomic resolution structures of Lassa and Machupo virus polymerases in both apo and promoter-bound forms. These structures display a similar overall architecture to influenza virus and bunyavirus polymerases but possess unique local features, including an arenavirus-specific insertion domain that regulates the polymerase activity. Notably, the ordered active site of arenavirus polymerase is inherently switched on, without the requirement for allosteric activation by 5'-viral RNA, which is a necessity for both influenza virus and bunyavirus polymerases6,7. Moreover, dimerization could facilitate the polymerase activity. These findings advance our understanding of the mechanism of arenavirus replication and provide an important basis for developing antiviral therapeutics.

摘要: 甲状旁腺病毒可引起人类和其他动物的严重出血热和神经系统疾病，例如拉沙乳肾病毒，马丘波乳肾病毒和淋巴细胞性脉络膜脑膜炎病毒，对公共健康构成了巨大威胁1-4。这些病毒编码一个大型的多域依赖RNA的RNA聚合酶，用于病毒基因组的转录和复制5。病毒聚合酶是主要的抗病毒治疗靶标之一。但是，尚不知道砂粒病毒聚合酶的结构。在这里，我们报告载脂蛋白和启动子绑定形式的拉萨和马修波病毒聚合酶的近原子分辨率结构。这些结构显示出与流感病毒和布尼亚病毒聚合酶相似的总体结构，但具有独特的局部特征，包括调节聚合酶活性的沙粒病毒特异性插入域。值得注意的是，在不需要通过5'-病毒RNA进行变构激活的情况下，固有地开启了沙粒病毒聚合酶的有序活性位点，这对于流感病毒和布尼亚病毒聚合酶都是必需的[6,7]。而且，二聚化可以促进聚合酶活性。这些发现提高了我们对砂粒病毒复制机制的理解，并为开发抗病毒疗法提供了重要的基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32214244

Microbiome analyses of blood and tissues suggest cancer diagnostic approach

血液和组织的微生物组分析表明癌症诊断方法

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2095-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32214244/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Mar

Abstract: Systematic characterization of the cancer microbiome provides the opportunity to develop techniques that exploit non-human, microorganism-derived molecules in the diagnosis of a major human disease. Following recent demonstrations that some types of cancer show substantial microbial contributions1-10, we re-examined whole-genome and whole-transcriptome sequencing studies in The Cancer Genome Atlas11 (TCGA) of 33 types of cancer from treatment-naive patients (a total of 18,116 samples) for microbial reads, and found unique microbial signatures in tissue and blood within and between most major types of cancer. These TCGA blood signatures remained predictive when applied to patients with stage Ia-IIc cancer and cancers lacking any genomic alterations currently measured on two commercial-grade cell-free tumour DNA platforms, despite the use of very stringent decontamination analyses that discarded up to 92.3% of total sequence data. In addition, we could discriminate among samples from healthy, cancer-free individuals (n = 69) and those from patients with multiple types of cancer (prostate, lung, and melanoma; 100 samples in total) solely using plasma-derived, cell-free microbial nucleic acids. This potential microbiome-based oncology diagnostic tool warrants further exploration.

摘要: 癌症微生物组的系统表征为开发利用非人类，微生物来源的分子诊断重大人类疾病的技术提供了机会。在最近的研究表明某些类型的癌症显示出重要的微生物贡献1-10之后，我们在癌症基因组图集11（TCGA）中重新检查了来自未接受过治疗的33种癌症的全基因组和全转录组测序研究（总计18,116个样本）进行微生物读取，并在大多数主要类型的癌症内和之间的组织和血液中发现了独特的微生物特征。这些TCGA血液特征适用于Ia-IIc期癌症和目前缺乏在两个商业级无细胞肿瘤DNA平台上测量的任何基因组改变的癌症，尽管使用了非常严格的去污分析，但丢弃率高达92.3％总序列数据。此外，我们可以仅使用血浆来源的细胞分选方法来区分健康，无癌的个体（n=69）和患有多种类型的癌症（前列腺癌，肺癌和黑素瘤；共100份）的患者的样本游离微生物核酸。这种潜在的基于微生物组的肿瘤学诊断工具值得进一步探索。

Pubmed_ID: 32214089

CDK1 dependent phosphorylation of hTERT contributes to cancer progression

hTERT的CDK1依赖性磷酸化有助于癌症进展

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-15289-7
