Eight super-scaffolds corresponding to the 8 chromosomes were assembled to a final size of 716.6 Mb, with a scaffold N50 of 88.78 Mb using 1,862 contigs. BUSCO evaluation reveals that the genome completeness reached 95.27%. The repeat sequences accounted for 59.13%, and 29,203 protein-coding genes were annotated in the genome. According to phylogenetic analysis using single-copy orthologous genes, we found that A. sinensis is closely related to Gossypium hirsutum and Theobroma cacao from the Malvales order, and A. sinensis diverged from their common ancestor ∼53.18-84.37 million years ago. Conclusions: Here, we present the first chromosome-level genome assembly and gene annotation of A. sinensis. This study should contribute to valuable genetic resources for further research on the agarwood formation mechanism, genome-assisted improvement, and conservation biology of Aquilaria species.

摘要: 背景：沉香（Squilng）是中国沉香生产中重要的植物资源之一。尽管由于缺乏准确和高质量的遗传信息，沉香形成的机理仍然知之甚少，但从远古时代以来，从沉香沉香树中收集的沉香树脂已在亚洲用于芳香或药用。发现：我们通过使用结合了纳米孔，Illumina和Hi-C测序的整合策略报告了中华按蚊的基因组结构。最终的基因组大小约为726.5Mb，达到了高度的连续性，重叠群N50为1.1Mb。我们将Hi-C数据与基因组组装相结合，以生成染色体水平的支架。对应于8条染色体的8个超级支架被组装成最终大小为716.6Mb，使用1,862个重叠群的N50为88.78Mb。BUSCO评估显示，基因组完整性达到95.27％。重复序列占59.13％，基因组中标注了29,203个蛋白质编码基因。根据使用单拷贝直系同源基因的系统发育分析，我们发现中华A与马尔萨斯血缘的Gossypiumhirsutum和可可豆紧密相关，中华A与它们的共同祖先相距约53.18-84.37百万年。结论：在这里，我们介绍了中华按蚊的第一个染色体水平的基因组装配和基因注释。该研究应为沉香树形成机理，基因组辅助改良和沉香物种保护生物学的进一步研究提供有价值的遗传资源。

Pubmed_ID: 32111823

Genome-wide association and multi-omic analyses reveal ACTN2 as a gene linked to heart failure

全基因组关联和多组学分析表明ACTN2是与心力衰竭有关的基因

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14843-7

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32111823/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/28/2020

Abstract: Heart failure is a major public health problem affecting over 23 million people worldwide. In this study, we present the results of a large scale meta-analysis of heart failure GWAS and replication in a comparable sized cohort to identify one known and two novel loci associated with heart failure. Heart failure sub-phenotyping shows that a new locus in chromosome 1 is associated with left ventricular adverse remodeling and clinical heart failure, in response to different initial cardiac muscle insults. Functional characterization and fine-mapping of that locus reveal a putative causal variant in a cardiac muscle specific regulatory region activated during cardiomyocyte differentiation that binds to the ACTN2 gene, a crucial structural protein inside the cardiac sarcolemma (Hi-C interaction p-value = 0.00002). Genome-editing in human embryonic stem cell-derived cardiomyocytes confirms the influence of the identified regulatory region in the expression of ACTN2. Our findings extend our understanding of biological mechanisms underlying heart failure.

摘要: 心力衰竭是一个重大的公共卫生问题，全世界有2300万人受到影响。在这项研究中，我们提出了对心力衰竭GWAS进行大规模荟萃分析并在可比较规模的队列中进行复制的结果，以鉴定与心力衰竭相关的一个已知和两个新基因座。心力衰竭亚表型表明，响应于不同的初始心肌损伤，第1号染色体上的新基因座与左心室不良重塑和临床心力衰竭有关。该基因座的功能表征和精细定位揭示了心肌细胞分化过程中激活的心肌特异调控区域中的一个假定的因果变异体，该区域与ACTN2基因结合，后者是心肌肌膜内的重要结构蛋白（Hi-C相互作用p值=0.00002）。人类胚胎干细胞来源的心肌细胞中的基因组编辑证实了ACTN2表达中所确定的调控区的影响。我们的发现扩展了我们对心力衰竭潜在生物学机制的理解。

Pubmed_ID: 32111820

Structure of the processive human Pol δ holoenzyme

进行性人类Polδ全酶的结构

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14898-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32111820/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/28/2020

Abstract: In eukaryotes, DNA polymerase δ (Pol δ) bound to the proliferating cell nuclear antigen (PCNA) replicates the lagging strand and cooperates with flap endonuclease 1 (FEN1) to process the Okazaki fragments for their ligation. We present the high-resolution cryo-EM structure of the human processive Pol δ-DNA-PCNA complex in the absence and presence of FEN1. Pol δ is anchored to one of the three PCNA monomers through the C-terminal domain of the catalytic subunit. The catalytic core sits on top of PCNA in an open configuration while the regulatory subunits project laterally. This arrangement allows PCNA to thread and stabilize the DNA exiting the catalytic cleft and recruit FEN1 to one unoccupied monomer in a toolbelt fashion. Alternative holoenzyme conformations reveal important functional interactions that maintain PCNA orientation during synthesis. This work sheds light on the structural basis of Pol δ's activity in replicating the human genome.

摘要: 在真核生物中，与增殖细胞核抗原（PCNA）结合的DNA聚合酶δ（Polδ）复制了落后的链，并与襟翼内切核酸酶1（FEN1）协同作用来处理Okazaki片段以进行连接。我们介绍了在没有FEN1存在的情况下人类进行性Polδ-DNA-PCNA复合体的高分辨率冷冻EM结构。Polδ通过催化亚基的C末端结构域锚定到三个PCNA单体之一。催化核心以开放配置位于PCNA的顶部，而调节亚基则侧向突出。这种安排使PCNA可以穿出并稳定从催化裂口出来的DNA，并以工具带的方式将FEN1募集到一个未占用的单体上。替代性全酶构象揭示了重要的功能相互作用，可在合成过程中维持PCNA的方向。这项工作阐明了Polδ在复制人类基因组中的活性的结构基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32109417

Comprehensive Genome-wide Perturbations via CRISPR Adaptation Reveal Complex Genetics of Antibiotic Sensitivity

通过CRISPR适应的全基因组范围内的扰动揭示了抗生素敏感性的复杂遗传学

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.02.007

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32109417/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 03/05/2020

Abstract: Genome-wide CRISPR screens enable systematic interrogation of gene function. However, guide RNA libraries are costly to synthesize, and their limited diversity compromises the sensitivity of CRISPR screens. Using the Streptococcus pyogenes CRISPR-Cas adaptation machinery, we developed CRISPR adaptation-mediated library manufacturing (CALM), which turns bacterial cells into "factories" for generating hundreds of thousands of crRNAs covering 95% of all targetable genomic sites. With an average gene targeted by more than 100 distinct crRNAs, these highly comprehensive CRISPRi libraries produced varying degrees of transcriptional repression critical for uncovering novel antibiotic resistance determinants. Furthermore, by iterating CRISPR adaptation, we rapidly generated dual-crRNA libraries representing more than 100,000 dual-gene perturbations. The polarized nature of spacer adaptation revealed the historical contingency in the stepwise acquisition of genetic perturbations leading to increasing antibiotic resistance. CALM circumvents the expense, labor, and time required for synthesis and cloning of gRNAs, allowing generation of CRISPRi libraries in wild-type bacteria refractory to routine genetic manipulation.

摘要: 全基因组的CRISPR筛选可以对基因功能进行系统的询问。然而，指导RNA文库的合成成本高昂，并且其有限的多样性损害了CRISPR筛选的敏感性。利用化脓链球菌CRISPR-Cas适应机制，我们开发了CRISPR适应介导的文库制造（CALM），它将细菌细胞转变为“工厂”，以产生覆盖所有可靶向基因组位点95％的数十万个crRNA。这些高度全面的CRISPRi文库的平均基因被100多种不同的crRNA靶向，可产生不同程度的转录抑制，这对于揭示新型抗生素抗性决定簇至关重要。此外，通过迭代CRISPR适应，我们快速生成了代表超过100,000个双基因扰动的双crRNA文库。间隔物适应的极化性质揭示了逐步获取遗传扰动导致抗生素抗性增加的历史偶然性。CALM避免了gRNA的合成和克隆所需的费用，劳力和时间，从而允许在常规基因操作难以耐受的野生型细菌中生成CRISPRi文库。

Pubmed_ID: 32107479

Publisher Correction: Extrachromosomal circular DNA drives oncogenic genome remodeling in neuroblastoma

出版商更正：染色体外环状DNA驱动神经母细胞瘤致癌基因组重塑

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0598-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32107479/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: An amendment to this paper has been published and can be accessed via a link at the top of the paper.

摘要: 该文件的修订版已经发布，可以通过文件顶部的链接进行访问。

Pubmed_ID: 32107379

A comparative genomics study of 23 Aspergillus species from section Flavi

Flavi切片中23种曲霉种的比较基因组学研究

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-019-14051-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32107379/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/27/2020

Abstract: Section Flavi encompasses both harmful and beneficial Aspergillus species, such as Aspergillus oryzae, used in food fermentation and enzyme production, and Aspergillus flavus, food spoiler and mycotoxin producer. Here, we sequence 19 genomes spanning section Flavi and compare 31 fungal genomes including 23 Flavi species. We reassess their phylogenetic relationships and show that the closest relative of A. oryzae is not A. flavus, but A. minisclerotigenes or A. aflatoxiformans and identify high genome diversity, especially in sub-telomeric regions. We predict abundant CAZymes (598 per species) and prolific secondary metabolite gene clusters (73 per species) in section Flavi. However, the observed phenotypes (growth characteristics, polysaccharide degradation) do not necessarily correlate with inferences made from the predicted CAZyme content. Our work, including genomic analyses, phenotypic assays, and identification of secondary metabolites, highlights the genetic and metabolic diversity within section Flavi.

摘要: Flavi节涵盖了有害和有益的曲霉菌种，例如用于食品发酵和酶生产的米曲霉，以及黄曲霉，食物变质物和霉菌毒素生产者。在这里，我们对跨越Flavi区段的19个基因组进行了测序，并比较了包括23种Flavi种在内的31个真菌基因组。我们重新评估它们的系统发生关系，并显示米曲霉的最亲戚不是黄曲霉，而是曲霉菌或黄曲霉，并鉴定出高基因组多样性，尤其是在亚端粒区域。我们预测在Flavi节中会出现大量的CAZymes（每个物种598个）和大量的次级代谢产物基因簇（每个物种73个）。但是，观察到的表型（生长特性，多糖降解）不一定与从预测的CAZyme含量得出的推论相关。我们的工作，包括基因组分析，表型分析和次级代谢产物的鉴定，着重说明了Flavi节中的遗传和代谢多样性。

Pubmed_ID: 32107378

Multi-resolution localization of causal variants across the genome

基因组中因果变异的多分辨率定位

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14791-2

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32107378/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/27/2020

Abstract: In the statistical analysis of genome-wide association data, it is challenging to precisely localize the variants that affect complex traits, due to linkage disequilibrium, and to maximize power while limiting spurious findings. Here we report on KnockoffZoom: a flexible method that localizes causal variants at multiple resolutions by testing the conditional associations of genetic segments of decreasing width, while provably controlling the false discovery rate. Our method utilizes artificial genotypes as negative controls and is equally valid for quantitative and binary phenotypes, without requiring any assumptions about their genetic architectures. Instead, we rely on well-established genetic models of linkage disequilibrium. We demonstrate that our method can detect more associations than mixed effects models and achieve fine-mapping precision, at comparable computational cost. Lastly, we apply KnockoffZoom to data from 350k subjects in the UK Biobank and report many new findings.

摘要: 在全基因组关联数据的统计分析中，要精确定位因连锁不平衡而影响复杂性状的变体，并在限制虚假发现的同时最大化功率，这是极具挑战性的。在这里，我们报告KnockoffZoom：一种灵活的方法，可以通过测试宽度减小的遗传区段的条件关联，在多种分辨率下定位因果变异，同时可证明地控制错误发现率。我们的方法利用人工基因型作为阴性对照，对于定量和二元表型同样有效，而无需对其遗传结构进行任何假设。取而代之的是，我们依靠成熟的连锁不平衡遗传模型。我们证明了我们的方法比混合效果模型可以检测更多的关联，并以可比的计算成本实现了精细的映射精度。最后，我们将KnockoffZoom应用于英国生物库中35万名受试者的数据，并报告了许多新发现。

Pubmed_ID: 32106218

Mutational signature in colorectal cancer caused by genotoxic pks + E. coli

遗传毒性pks +大肠杆菌在大肠癌中的突变特征

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2080-8

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32106218/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Apr

Abstract: Various species of the intestinal microbiota have been associated with the development of colorectal cancer1,2, but it has not been demonstrated that bacteria have a direct role in the occurrence of oncogenic mutations. Escherichia coli can carry the pathogenicity island pks, which encodes a set of enzymes that synthesize colibactin3. This compound is believed to alkylate DNA on adenine residues4,5 and induces double-strand breaks in cultured cells3. Here we expose human intestinal organoids to genotoxic pks+ E. coli by repeated luminal injection over five months. Whole-genome sequencing of clonal organoids before and after this exposure revealed a distinct mutational signature that was absent from organoids injected with isogenic pks-mutant bacteria. The same mutational signature was detected in a subset of 5,876 human cancer genomes from two independent cohorts, predominantly in colorectal cancer. Our study describes a distinct mutational signature in colorectal cancer and implies that the underlying mutational process results directly from past exposure to bacteria carrying the colibactin-producing pks pathogenicity island.

摘要: 肠道菌群的各种物种都与大肠癌的发生有关1,2，但尚未证明细菌在致癌突变的发生中具有直接作用。大肠杆菌可以携带致病岛pks，该pks编码一组合成colibactin3的酶。据信该化合物可将腺嘌呤残基4,5上的DNA烷基化，并在培养的细胞中诱导双链断裂3。在这里，我们通过在五个月内反复进行腔内注射，将人肠类器官暴露于具有遗传毒性的pks+大肠杆菌。暴露之前和之后的克隆类器官的全基因组测序揭示了独特的突变特征，而等位性pks突变细菌注射的类器官没有这种突变特征。在两个独立队列的5876个人类癌症基因组的子集中检测到了相同的突变特征，主要在结直肠癌中。我们的研究描述了大肠癌中独特的突变特征，并暗示潜在的突变过程直接来自于过去暴露于携带产生大肠菌素的pks致病岛的细菌。

Pubmed_ID: 32103178

Two conserved epigenetic regulators prevent healthy ageing

两个保守的表观遗传调节剂阻止健康衰老

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2037-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32103178/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Mar

Abstract: It has long been assumed that lifespan and healthspan correlate strongly, yet the two can be clearly dissociated1-6. Although there has been a global increase in human life expectancy, increasing longevity is rarely accompanied by an extended healthspan4,7. Thus, understanding the origin of healthy behaviours in old people remains an important and challenging task. Here we report a conserved epigenetic mechanism underlying healthy ageing. Through genome-wide RNA-interference-based screening of genes that regulate behavioural deterioration in ageing Caenorhabditis elegans, we identify 59 genes as potential modulators of the rate of age-related behavioural deterioration. Among these modulators, we found that a neuronal epigenetic reader, BAZ-2, and a neuronal histone 3 lysine 9 methyltransferase, SET-6, accelerate behavioural deterioration in C. elegans by reducing mitochondrial function, repressing the expression of nuclear-encoded mitochondrial proteins. This mechanism is conserved in cultured mouse neurons and human cells. Examination of human databases8,9 shows that expression of the human orthologues of these C. elegans regulators, BAZ2B and EHMT1, in the frontal cortex increases with age and correlates positively with the progression of Alzheimer's disease. Furthermore, ablation of Baz2b, the mouse orthologue of BAZ-2, attenuates age-dependent body-weight gain and prevents cognitive decline in ageing mice. Thus our genome-wide RNA-interference screen in C. elegans has unravelled conserved epigenetic negative regulators of ageing, suggesting possible ways to achieve healthy ageing.

摘要: 长期以来，人们一直认为寿命和健康寿命之间存在很强的相关性，但是两者可以清楚地分开1-6。尽管全球人类预期寿命有所增加，但寿命的延长很少伴随着健康期的延长[4,7]。因此，了解老年人健康行为的起源仍然是一项重要且具有挑战性的任务。在这里，我们报告了健康老龄化的保守表观遗传机制。通过全基因组的基于RNA干扰的基因筛选，调节衰老的秀丽隐杆线虫的行为恶化的基因，我们确定了59个基因作为年龄相关行为恶化率的潜在调节剂。在这些调节剂中，我们发现神经元表观遗传阅读器BAZ-2和神经元组蛋白3赖氨酸9甲基转移酶SET-6通过减少线粒体功能，抑制核编码线粒体蛋白的表达来加速线虫的行为恶化。。该机制在培养的小鼠神经元和人类细胞中是保守的。对人类数据库的检查8,9表明，这些秀丽隐杆线虫调节子BAZ2B和EHMT1的人类直系同源物在额叶皮层中的表达随年龄增长而增加，并且与阿尔茨海默氏病的进展呈正相关。此外，Baz-2的小鼠直系同源物Baz2b的消融可减弱年龄相关的体重增加，并防止衰老小鼠的认知能力下降。因此，我们对秀丽隐杆线虫的全基因组RNA干扰筛选揭示了保守的衰老后生遗传负调控因子，提示实现健康衰老的可能方法。

Pubmed_ID: 32103018

The genome evolution and low-phosphorus adaptation in white lupin

白羽扇豆的基因组进化与低磷适应

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14891-z

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32103018/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/26/2020

Abstract: White lupin (Lupinus albus) is a legume crop that develops cluster roots and has high phosphorus (P)-use efficiency (PUE) in low-P soils. Here, we assemble the genome of white lupin and find that it has evolved from a whole-genome triplication (WGT) event. We then decipher its diploid ancestral genome and reconstruct the three sub-genomes. Based on the results, we further reveal the sub-genome dominance and the genic expression of the different sub-genomes varying in relation to their transposable element (TE) density. The PUE genes in white lupin have been expanded through WGT as well as tandem and dispersed duplications. Furthermore, we characterize four main pathways for high PUE, which include carbon fixation, cluster root formation, soil-P remobilization, and cellular-P reuse. Among these, auxin modulation may be important for cluster root formation through involvement of potential genes LaABCG36s and LaABCG37s. These findings provide insights into the genome evolution and low-P adaptation of white lupin.

摘要: 白羽扇豆（Lupinusalbus）是一种豆科植物，可生长簇状根，在低磷土壤中具有较高的磷（P）利用效率（PUE）。在这里，我们组装了白羽扇豆的基因组，发现它是从全基因组三倍（WGT）事件演变而来的。然后，我们破译其二倍体祖先基因组并重建三个亚基因组。基于结果，我们进一步揭示了不同亚基因组的亚基因组优势和基因表达，这些基因组相对于其转座因子（TE）密度而变化。白羽扇豆中的PUE基因已通过WGT以及串联和分散重复进行了扩增。此外，我们表征了高PUE的四个主要途径，包括碳固定，簇根形成，土壤P固定和细胞P重用。其中，生长素调节可能通过潜在基因LaABCG36s和LaABCG37s的参与对簇根形成很重要。这些发现为白羽扇豆的基因组进化和低磷适应提供了见识。

Pubmed_ID: 32103011

Candidate silencer elements for the human and mouse genomes

人类和小鼠基因组的候选沉默子元件

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14853-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32103011/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/26/2020

Abstract: The study of gene regulation is dominated by a focus on the control of gene activation or increase in the level of expression. Just as critical is the process of gene repression or silencing. Chromatin signatures have identified enhancers, however, genome-wide identification of silencers by computational or experimental approaches are lacking. Here, we first define uncharacterized cis-regulatory elements likely containing silencers and find that 41.5% of ~7500 tested elements show silencer activity using massively parallel reporter assay (MPRA). We trained a support vector machine classifier based on MPRA data to predict candidate silencers in over 100 human and mouse cell or tissue types. The predicted candidate silencers exhibit characteristics expected of silencers. Leveraging promoter-capture HiC data, we find that over 50% of silencers are interacting with gene promoters having very low to no expression. Our results suggest a general strategy for genome-wide identification and characterization of silencer elements.

摘要: 基因调控的研究主要集中在控制基因激活或表达水平增加上。同样重要的是基因抑制或沉默的过程。染色质特征已经鉴定出增强子，但是，缺乏通过计算或实验方法在全基因组范围内鉴定沉默子的方法。在这里，我们首先定义了可能包含沉默子的未表征的顺式调控元件，并使用大规模平行报告基因分析（MPRA）发现〜7500个测试元素中有41.5％显示沉默子活性。我们根据MPRA数据训练了一种支持向量机分类器，以预测100多种人类和小鼠细胞或组织类型中的候选沉默子。预测的候选消音器表现出期望的消音器特性。利用启动子捕获的HiC数据，我们发现超过50％的沉默子与具有非常低甚至没有表达的基因启动子相互作用。我们的结果提出了用于全基因组沉默子特征鉴定和表征的一般策略。

Pubmed_ID: 32102993

The anti-viral dynamin family member MxB participates in mitochondrial integrity

抗病毒动力家族成员MxB参与线粒体完整性

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14727-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32102993/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/26/2020

Abstract: The membrane deforming dynamin family members MxA and MxB are large GTPases that convey resistance to a variety of infectious viruses. During viral infection, Mx proteins are known to show markedly increased expression via an interferon-responsive promoter to associate with nuclear pores. In this study we report that MxB is an inner mitochondrial membrane GTPase that plays an important role in the morphology and function of this organelle. Expression of mutant MxB or siRNA knockdown of MxB leads to fragmented mitochondria with disrupted inner membranes that are unable to maintain a proton gradient, while expelling their nucleoid-based genome into the cytoplasm. These findings implicate a dynamin family member in mitochondrial-based changes frequently observed during an interferon-based, anti-viral response.

摘要: 膜变形动力蛋白家族成员MxA和MxB是大的GTPases，可传递对多种传染性病毒的抗性。在病毒感染过程中，已知Mx蛋白通过干扰素反应性启动子显着增加表达，与核孔相关。在这项研究中，我们报告说MxB是线粒体内膜GTPase，在该细胞器的形态和功能中起重要作用。突变MxB的表达或MxB的siRNA敲低导致线粒体断裂，内膜破裂，无法维持质子梯度，同时将基于核苷的基因组排入细胞质。这些发现暗示在基于干扰素的抗病毒反应中经常观察到的基于线粒体的动力蛋白家族成员。

Pubmed_ID: 32101299

Chromosomal-level assembly of Juglans sigillata genome using Nanopore, BioNano, and Hi-C analysis

利用纳米孔，BioNano和Hi-C分析进行胡桃木基因组的染色体水平组装

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giaa006

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32101299/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 02/01/2020

Abstract: Background: Juglans sigillata, or iron walnut, belonging to the order Juglandales, is an economically important tree species in Asia, especially in the Yunnan province of China. However, little research has been conducted on J. sigillata at the molecular level, which hinders understanding of its evolution, speciation, and synthesis of secondary metabolites, as well as its wide adaptability to its plateau environment. To address these issues, a high-quality reference genome of J. sigillata would be useful. Findings: To construct a high-quality reference genome for J. sigillata, we first generated 38.0 Gb short reads and 66.31 Gb long reads using Illumina and Nanopore sequencing platforms, respectively. The sequencing data were assembled into a 536.50-Mb genome assembly with a contig N50 length of 4.31 Mb. Additionally, we applied BioNano technology to identify contacts among contigs, which were then used to assemble contigs into scaffolds, resulting in a genome assembly with scaffold N50 length of 16.43 Mb and contig N50 length of 4.34 Mb. To obtain a chromosome-level genome assembly, we constructed 1 Hi-C library and sequenced 79.97 Gb raw reads using the Illumina HiSeq platform. We anchored ∼93% of the scaffold sequences into 16 chromosomes and evaluated the quality of our assembly using the high contact frequency heat map. Repetitive elements account for 50.06% of the genome, and 30,387 protein-coding genes were predicted from the genome, of which 99.8% have been functionally annotated. The genome-wide phylogenetic tree indicated an estimated divergence time between J. sigillata and Juglans regia of 49 million years ago on the basis of single-copy orthologous genes. Conclusions: We provide the first chromosome-level genome for J. sigillata. It will lay a valuable foundation for future research on the genetic improvement of J. sigillata.

摘要: 背景：胡桃木（Juglandales）的胡桃木（Sigillata）是亚洲经济上重要的树种，在中国云南省尤为如此。然而，在分子水平上对剑兰（S.sigillata）的研究很少，这阻碍了人们对它的进化，形成，次生代谢产物的合成以及其对高原环境的广泛适应性的了解。为了解决这些问题，J。sigillata的高质量参考基因组将是有用的。研究结果：为了构建剑兰假单胞菌的高质量参考基因组，我们首先分别使用Illumina和Nanopore测序平台生成了38.0Gb短读和66.31Gb长读。将测序数据组装成536.50-Mb基因组组装体，其重叠群N50长度为4.31Mb。此外，我们应用了BioNano技术来识别重叠群之间的接触，然后将其用于将重叠群组装到支架中，从而形成基因组装配，其支架N50长度为16.43Mb，而重叠群N50长度为4.34Mb。为了获得染色体水平的基因组装配，我们构建了1个Hi-C文库，并使用IlluminaHiSeq平台对79.97Gb原始读取进行了测序。我们将约93％的支架序列锚定到16条染色体中，并使用高接触频率热图评估了装配的质量。重复元件占基因组的50.06％，从该基因组中预测出30,387个蛋白质编码基因，其中99.8％的蛋白已被功能注释。基于单拷贝直系同源基因，全基因组的系统发育树表明，在锡吉拉烟草和胡桃木之间的发散时间估计为4900万年前。结论：我们为J.sigillata提供了第一个染色体水平的基因组。这将为今后对剑兰遗传改良的研究奠定宝贵的基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32098967

Regulatory sites for splicing in human basal ganglia are enriched for disease-relevant information

丰富了人类基底神经节中的剪接调控位点，可用于疾病相关信息

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14483-x

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32098967/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/25/2020

Abstract: Genome-wide association studies have generated an increasing number of common genetic variants associated with neurological and psychiatric disease risk. An improved understanding of the genetic control of gene expression in human brain is vital considering this is the likely modus operandum for many causal variants. However, human brain sampling complexities limit the explanatory power of brain-related expression quantitative trait loci (eQTL) and allele-specific expression (ASE) signals. We address this, using paired genomic and transcriptomic data from putamen and substantia nigra from 117 human brains, interrogating regulation at different RNA processing stages and uncovering novel transcripts. We identify disease-relevant regulatory loci, find that splicing eQTLs are enriched for regulatory information of neuron-specific genes, that ASEs provide cell-specific regulatory information with evidence for cellular specificity, and that incomplete annotation of the brain transcriptome limits interpretation of risk loci for neuropsychiatric disease. This resource of regulatory data is accessible through our web server, http://braineacv2.inf.um.es/.

摘要: 全基因组关联研究已经产生了越来越多的与神经和精神疾病风险相关的常见遗传变异。考虑到这是许多因果变体的可能作案手法，对人脑基因表达的遗传控制的更好理解至关重要。但是，人脑采样的复杂性限制了脑相关表达定量性状基因座（eQTL）和等位基因特异性表达（ASE）信号的解释能力。我们使用来自117个人脑的壳状核和黑质的配对基因组和转录组数据，在不同的RNA加工阶段询问调节并发现新的转录本，来解决这个问题。我们确定与疾病相关的调控基因座，发现剪接的eQTL丰富了神经元特异性基因的调控信息，ASE提供了细胞特异性调控信息，并具有细胞特异性的证据，并且大脑转录组的不完整注释限制了风险基因座的解释用于神经精神疾病。可通过我们的Web服务器http://braineacv2.inf.um.es/访问此法规数据资源。

Pubmed_ID: 32098957

Measuring single cell divisions in human tissues from multi-region sequencing data

从多区域测序数据测量人体组织中的单细胞分裂

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14844-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32098957/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/25/2020

Abstract: Both normal tissue development and cancer growth are driven by a branching process of cell division and mutation accumulation that leads to intra-tissue genetic heterogeneity. However, quantifying somatic evolution in humans remains challenging. Here, we show that multi-sample genomic data from a single time point of normal and cancer tissues contains information on single-cell divisions. We present a new theoretical framework that, applied to whole-genome sequencing data of healthy tissue and cancer, allows inferring the mutation rate and the cell survival/death rate per division. On average, we found that cells accumulate 1.14 mutations per cell division in healthy haematopoiesis and 1.37 mutations per division in brain development. In both tissues, cell survival was maximal during early development. Analysis of 131 biopsies from 16 tumours showed 4 to 100 times increased mutation rates compared to healthy development and substantial inter-patient variation of cell survival/death rates.

摘要: 正常组织的发育和癌症的生长均受细胞分裂和突变积累的分支过程驱动，从而导致组织内遗传异质性。然而，量化人类的体细胞进化仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们显示正常和癌症组织的单个时间点的多样本基因组数据包含有关单细胞分裂的信息。我们提出了一个新的理论框架，该框架适用于健康组织和癌症的全基因组测序数据，可以推断出突变率和每个分区的细胞存活/死亡率。平均而言，我们发现在健康的造血过程中，细胞每细胞分裂积累1.14突变，而在大脑发育中每细胞分裂积累1.37突变。在这两个组织中，早期发育过程中细胞存活都是最大的。对来自16个肿瘤的131次活组织检查的分析显示，与健康发展以及细胞间存活/死亡率的患者间差异相比，突变率提高了4到100倍。

Pubmed_ID: 32094921

How to build a genome

如何建立基因组

DOI: 10.1038/d41586-020-00511-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094921/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Feb

Abstract: No abstract

摘要: 没有摘要

Pubmed_ID: 32094911

Systematic identification of silencers in human cells

系统鉴定人细胞中的沉默子

DOI: 10.1038/s41588-020-0578-5

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094911/

Journal: Nature genetics {'ISSN': '1061-4036', 'Name': 'nature genetics', '2015': '31.616', '2016': '27.959', '2017': '27.125', '2018': '25.455', '2019': '27.603'}

Date: 2020 Mar

Abstract: The majority of the human genome does not encode proteins. Many of these noncoding regions contain important regulatory sequences that control gene expression. To date, most studies have focused on activators such as enhancers, but regions that repress gene expression-silencers-have not been systematically studied. We have developed a system that identifies silencer regions in a genome-wide fashion on the basis of silencer-mediated transcriptional repression of caspase 9. We found that silencers are widely distributed and may function in a tissue-specific fashion. These silencers harbor unique epigenetic signatures and are associated with specific transcription factors. Silencers also act at multiple genes, and at the level of chromosomal domains and long-range interactions. Deletion of silencer regions linked to the drug transporter genes ABCC2 and ABCG2 caused chemo-resistance. Overall, our study demonstrates that tissue-specific silencing is widespread throughout the human genome and probably contributes substantially to the regulation of gene expression and human biology.

摘要: 人类基因组的大部分不编码蛋白质。这些非编码区中许多都包含控制基因表达的重要调控序列。迄今为止，大多数研究都集中在激活子如增强子上，但是尚未系统研究抑制基因表达沉默子的区域。我们已经开发了一种系统，可以在沉默子介导的caspase9转录抑制的基础上，以全基因组的方式识别沉默子区域。我们发现沉默子分布广泛，并且可能以组织特异性方式起作用。这些沉默子具有独特的表观遗传学特征，并与特定的转录因子相关。沉默子还作用于多个基因，并作用于染色体结构域和远距离相互作用。删除与药物转运蛋白基因ABCC2和ABCG2相关的沉默子区域会引起化学耐药性。总体而言，我们的研究表明，组织特异性沉默在整个人类基因组中广泛存在，并且可能对基因表达和人类生物学的调控做出了重要贡献。

Pubmed_ID: 32094642

Prickly waterlily and rigid hornwort genomes shed light on early angiosperm evolution

多刺的睡莲和僵硬的金鱼草基因组揭示了被子植物的早期进化

DOI: 10.1038/s41477-020-0594-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094642/

Journal: Nature plants {'ISSN': '2055-026x', 'Name': 'nature plants', '2015': '0', '2016': '10.3', '2017': '11.471', '2018': '13.297', '2019': '13.256'}

Date: 2020 Mar

Abstract: Angiosperms represent one of the most spectacular terrestrial radiations on the planet1, but their early diversification and phylogenetic relationships remain uncertain2-5. A key reason for this impasse is the paucity of complete genomes representing early-diverging angiosperms. Here, we present high-quality, chromosomal-level genome assemblies of two aquatic species-prickly waterlily (Euryale ferox; Nymphaeales) and the rigid hornwort (Ceratophyllum demersum; Ceratophyllales)-and expand the genomic representation for key sectors of the angiosperm tree of life. We identify multiple independent polyploidization events in each of the five major clades (that is, Nymphaeales, magnoliids, monocots, Ceratophyllales and eudicots). Furthermore, our phylogenomic analyses, which spanned multiple datasets and diverse methods, confirm that Amborella and Nymphaeales are successively sister to all other angiosperms. Furthermore, these genomes help to elucidate relationships among the major subclades within Mesangiospermae, which contain about 350,000 species. In particular, the species-poor lineage Ceratophyllales is supported as sister to eudicots, and monocots and magnoliids are placed as successively sister to Ceratophyllales and eudicots. Finally, our analyses indicate that incomplete lineage sorting may account for the incongruent phylogenetic placement of magnoliids between nuclear and plastid genomes.

摘要: 被子植物是地球上最壮观的陆地辐射之一，但其早期的多样性和系统发育关系尚不确定2-5。造成这种僵局的主要原因是缺乏代表早发被子植物的完整基因组。在这里，我们提出了两种水生物种的高品质，染色体水平的基因组组装体：多刺睡莲（Euryaleferox;Nymphaeales）和硬花金缕梅（Ceratophyllumdemersum;Ceratophyllales）-并扩大了被子植物被子植物关键部位的基因组表达生活。我们在五个主要进化枝（即，睡莲，木兰，单子叶植物，角尾藻和双子叶植物）的每一个中鉴定出多个独立的多倍体化事件。此外，我们的植物遗传学分析涵盖了多个数据集和多种方法，证实了Amborella和Nymphaeales先后与所有其他被子植物结为姐妹。此外，这些基因组有助于阐明Mesangiospermae内主要亚科之间的关系，该亚科包含约350,000种。尤其是，支持物种贫乏的角尾类动物作为双子叶植物的姊妹，而单子叶植物和木兰科植物则依次作为角形目动物和双子叶植物的姊妹。最后，我们的分析表明，不完整的谱系排序可能解释了核基因组和质体基因组之间的乳突虫在系统发育上的位置不一致。

Pubmed_ID: 32094641

SpCas9-NG self-targets the sgRNA sequence in plant genome editing

SpCas9-NG在植物基因组编辑中自我靶向sgRNA序列

DOI: 10.1038/s41477-020-0603-9

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094641/

Journal: Nature plants {'ISSN': '2055-026x', 'Name': 'nature plants', '2015': '0', '2016': '10.3', '2017': '11.471', '2018': '13.297', '2019': '13.256'}

Date: 2020 Mar

Abstract: Streptococcus pyogenes Cas9 (SpCas9)-NG recognizes NGN protospacer adjacent motifs and expands the scope of genome-editing tools. In this study, we found that SpCas9-NG not only targeted the genome but also efficiently self-targeted the single-guide RNA sequence in transfer DNA in transgenic plants, potentially increasing off-target risk by generating new single-guide RNAs. We further showed that the self-target effect of SpCas9-NG could be greatly alleviated by using a modified single-guide RNA scaffold starting with a GCCCC sequence.

摘要: 化脓链球菌Cas9（SpCas9）-NG可识别NGN原型间隔子附近的基序，并扩大了基因组编辑工具的范围。在这项研究中，我们发现SpCas9-NG不仅靶向基因组，而且还有效地自我靶向了转基因植物中转移DNA中的单向导RNA序列，可能通过产生新的单向导RNA来增加脱靶风险。我们进一步表明，通过使用从GCCCC序列开始的修饰单向导RNA支架，可以大大减轻SpCas9-NG的自我靶向作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32094358

Genetic history from the Middle Neolithic to present on the Mediterranean island of Sardinia

从新石器时代中期到地中海撒丁岛的遗传历史

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14523-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094358/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/24/2020

Abstract: The island of Sardinia has been of particular interest to geneticists for decades. The current model for Sardinia's genetic history describes the island as harboring a founder population that was established largely from the Neolithic peoples of southern Europe and remained isolated from later Bronze Age expansions on the mainland. To evaluate this model, we generate genome-wide ancient DNA data for 70 individuals from 21 Sardinian archaeological sites spanning the Middle Neolithic through the Medieval period. The earliest individuals show a strong affinity to western Mediterranean Neolithic populations, followed by an extended period of genetic continuity on the island through the Nuragic period (second millennium BCE). Beginning with individuals from Phoenician/Punic sites (first millennium BCE), we observe spatially-varying signals of admixture with sources principally from the eastern and northern Mediterranean. Overall, our analysis sheds light on the genetic history of Sardinia, revealing how relationships to mainland populations shifted over time.

摘要: 数十年来，撒丁岛一直是遗传学家特别感兴趣的地方。撒丁岛的遗传历史的当前模型描述该岛上有一个原始种群，该种群主要是从南欧新石器时代的人民那里建立的，与后来大陆上的青铜时代的扩张保持隔离。为了评估该模型，我们为整个中世纪时期的新石器时代中期的21个撒丁岛考古遗址生成了70个个体的全基因组古代DNA数据。最早的个体对地中海西部的新石器时代人群表现出很强的亲和力，其后整个岛上的遗传连续性一直持续到整个努拉吉时期（公元前第二千年）。从来自腓尼基人/双关尼人遗址（公元前一千年）的人们开始，我们观察到混合变化的信号主要来自地中海东部和北部。总体而言，我们的分析揭示了撒丁岛的遗传历史，揭示了与大陆人口的关系如何随时间变化。

Pubmed_ID: 32094342

RADICL-seq identifies general and cell type-specific principles of genome-wide RNA-chromatin interactions

RADICL-seq可确定全基因组RNA-染色质相互作用的一般和特定细胞类型原理

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14337-6

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094342/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/24/2020

Abstract: Mammalian genomes encode tens of thousands of noncoding RNAs. Most noncoding transcripts exhibit nuclear localization and several have been shown to play a role in the regulation of gene expression and chromatin remodeling. To investigate the function of such RNAs, methods to massively map the genomic interacting sites of multiple transcripts have been developed; however, these methods have some limitations. Here, we introduce RNA And DNA Interacting Complexes Ligated and sequenced (RADICL-seq), a technology that maps genome-wide RNA-chromatin interactions in intact nuclei. RADICL-seq is a proximity ligation-based methodology that reduces the bias for nascent transcription, while increasing genomic coverage and unique mapping rate efficiency compared with existing methods. RADICL-seq identifies distinct patterns of genome occupancy for different classes of transcripts as well as cell type-specific RNA-chromatin interactions, and highlights the role of transcription in the establishment of chromatin structure.

摘要: 哺乳动物基因组编码成千上万的非编码RNA。大多数非编码转录本均显示核定位，并且已证明其中一些在调节基因表达和染色质重塑中发挥作用。为了研究这种RNA的功能，已经开发了大量定位多个转录物的基因组相互作用位点的方法。但是，这些方法有一些局限性。在这里，我们介绍连接和测序的RNA和DNA相互作用复合物（RADICL-seq），该技术可绘制完整核中全基因组RNA-染色质相互作用的图。RADICL-seq是一种基于邻近结扎的方法，与现有方法相比，它可减少新生转录的偏倚，同时增加基因组覆盖率和独特的作图率效率。RADICL-seq可识别不同类别的转录物以及细胞类型特异性RNA-染色质相互作用的基因组占用模式，并突出转录在染色质结构建立中的作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32094195

Joint profiling of chromatin accessibility and CAR-T integration site analysis at population and single-cell levels

群体和单细胞水平的染色质可及性和CAR-T整合位点分析的联合分析

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1919259117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094195/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/10/2020

Abstract: Chimeric antigen receptor (CAR)-T immunotherapy has yielded impressive results in several B cell malignancies, establishing itself as a powerful means to redirect the natural properties of T lymphocytes. In this strategy, the T cell genome is modified by the integration of lentiviral vectors encoding CAR that direct tumor cell killing. However, this therapeutic approach is often limited by the extent of CAR-T cell expansion in vivo. A major outstanding question is whether or not CAR-T integration itself enhances the proliferative competence of individual T cells by rewiring their regulatory landscape. To address this question, it is critical to define the identity of an individual CAR-T cell and simultaneously chart where the CAR-T vector integrates into the genome. Here, we report the development of a method called EpiVIA (https://github.com/VahediLab/epiVIA) for the joint profiling of the chromatin accessibility and lentiviral integration site analysis at the population and single-cell levels. We validate our technique in clonal cells with previously defined integration sites and further demonstrate the ability to measure lentiviral integration sites and chromatin accessibility of host and viral genomes at the single-cell resolution in CAR-T cells. We anticipate that EpiVIA will enable the single-cell deconstruction of gene regulation during CAR-T therapy, leading to the discovery of cellular factors associated with durable treatment.

摘要: 嵌合抗原受体（CAR）-T免疫疗法已在几种B细胞恶性肿瘤中产生了令人印象深刻的结果，将自身确立为重定向T淋巴细胞自然特性的有力手段。在这种策略中，通过整合编码指导肿瘤细胞杀伤的CAR的慢病毒载体来修饰T细胞基因组。但是，这种治疗方法通常受到体内CAR-T细胞扩增程度的限制。一个主要的悬而未决的问题是，CAR-T整合本身是否会通过重新排列其调控环境来增强单个T细胞的增殖能力。为了解决这个问题，至关重要的是定义单个CAR-T细胞的身份，并同时绘制CAR-T载体整合到基因组中的位置。在这里，我们报告了一种称为EpiVIA（https://github.com/VahediLab/epiVIA）的方法的开发，该方法用于在人群和单细胞水平上联合进行染色质可及性和慢病毒整合位点分析。我们在以前定义的整合位点的克隆细胞中验证了我们的技术，并进一步证明了在CAR-T细胞中以单细胞分辨率测量慢病毒整合位点以及宿主和病毒基因组的染色质可及性的能力。我们预期EpiVIA将在CAR-T治疗期间实现基因调控的单细胞解构，从而导致发现与持久治疗相关的细胞因子。

Pubmed_ID: 32094190

Global analysis of LARP1 translation targets reveals tunable and dynamic features of 5' TOP motifs

LARP1翻译目标的全球分析揭示了5'TOP主题的可调和动态特征。

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1912864117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094190/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/10/2020

Abstract: Terminal oligopyrimidine (TOP) motifs are sequences at the 5' ends of mRNAs that link their translation to the mTOR Complex 1 (mTORC1) nutrient-sensing signaling pathway. They are commonly regarded as discrete elements that reside on ∼100 mRNAs that mostly encode translation factors. However, the full spectrum of TOP sequences and their prevalence throughout the transcriptome remain unclear, primarily because of uncertainty over the mechanism that detects them. Here, we globally analyzed translation targets of La-related protein 1 (LARP1), an RNA-binding protein and mTORC1 effector that has been shown to repress TOP mRNA translation in a few specific cases. We establish that LARP1 is the primary translation regulator of mRNAs with classical TOP motifs genome-wide, and also that these motifs are extreme instances of a broader continuum of regulatory sequences. We identify the features of TOP sequences that determine their potency and quantify these as a metric that accurately predicts mTORC1/LARP1 regulation called a TOPscore. Analysis of TOPscores across the transcriptomes of 16 mammalian tissues defines a constitutive "core" set of TOP mRNAs, but also identifies tissue-specific TOP mRNAs produced via alternative transcription initiation sites. These results establish the central role of LARP1 in TOP mRNA regulation on a transcriptome scale and show how it connects mTORC1 to a tunable and dynamic program of gene expression that is tailored to specific biological contexts.

摘要: 末端寡嘧啶（TOP）基序是mRNA的5'端序列，将其翻译与mTORComplex1（mTORC1）营养传感信号传导途径相关。它们通常被视为位于大约100个主要编码翻译因子的mRNA上的离散元件。但是，TOP序列的全谱及其在整个转录组中的普遍性仍不清楚，这主要是由于检测它们的机制不确定。在这里，我们全局分析了La相关蛋白1（LARP1），一种RNA结合蛋白和mTORC1效应子的翻译目标，该蛋白已在某些特定情况下抑制TOPmRNA的翻译。我们确定LARP1是全基因组范围内具有经典TOP图案的mRNA的主要翻译调节子，而且这些图案是调节序列更广泛连续体的极端实例。我们确定确定其效能的TOP序列特征并将其量化为准确预测mTORC1/LARP1调控的指标，称为TOPscore。横跨16个哺乳动物组织的转录组的TOPscores分析定义了TOPmRNA的组成型“核心”集，但也鉴定了通过替代转录起始位点产生的组织特异性TOPmRNA。这些结果确立了LARP1在转录组规模的TOPmRNA调控中的核心作用，并显示了LARP1如何将mTORC1连接到针对特定生物学环境而定制的基因表达的可调和动态程序。

Pubmed_ID: 32094181

Dinoflagellates with relic endosymbiont nuclei as models for elucidating organellogenesis

带有鞭毛内共生体核的鞭毛作为阐明器官发生的模型

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1911884117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094181/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/10/2020

Abstract: Nucleomorphs are relic endosymbiont nuclei so far found only in two algal groups, cryptophytes and chlorarachniophytes, which have been studied to model the evolutionary process of integrating an endosymbiont alga into a host-governed plastid (organellogenesis). However, past studies suggest that DNA transfer from the endosymbiont to host nuclei had already ceased in both cryptophytes and chlorarachniophytes, implying that the organellogenesis at the genetic level has been completed in the two systems. Moreover, we have yet to pinpoint the closest free-living relative of the endosymbiotic alga engulfed by the ancestral chlorarachniophyte or cryptophyte, making it difficult to infer how organellogenesis altered the endosymbiont genome. To counter the above issues, we need novel nucleomorph-bearing algae, in which endosymbiont-to-host DNA transfer is on-going and for which endosymbiont/plastid origins can be inferred at a fine taxonomic scale. Here, we report two previously undescribed dinoflagellates, strains MGD and TGD, with green algal endosymbionts enclosing plastids as well as relic nuclei (nucleomorphs). We provide evidence for the presence of DNA in the two nucleomorphs and the transfer of endosymbiont genes to the host (dinoflagellate) genomes. Furthermore, DNA transfer between the host and endosymbiont nuclei was found to be in progress in both the MGD and TGD systems. Phylogenetic analyses successfully resolved the origins of the endosymbionts at the genus level. With the combined evidence, we conclude that the host-endosymbiont integration in MGD/TGD is less advanced than that in cryptophytes/chrorarachniophytes, and propose the two dinoflagellates as models for elucidating organellogenesis.

摘要: 迄今为止，核形态仅是在两个藻类组（隐藻类和绿藻类）中发现的遗留共生核，它们已被研究以模拟将共生藻整合到宿主控制的质体中的进化过程（器官形成）。但是，过去的研究表明，在隐生植物和绿藻植物中，已经从内共生体向宿主核的DNA转移已经停止，这表明在遗传水平上，两个系统中的器官发生均已完成。此外，我们还没有查明被祖先的绿藻或隐生植物吞噬的内共生藻类的最接近的自由生活亲戚，因此很难推断器官发生是如何改变了内共生体基因组的。为了解决上述问题，我们需要新型的带有核型的藻类，其中共生体到宿主的DNA转移正在进行，并且可以以良好的分类学规模推断出共生体/质体的起源。在这里，我们报告两个以前未描述的鞭毛藻，菌株MGD和TGD，与绿色藻类内共生体包围着质体以及遗体核（核型）。我们提供了两个核型中DNA的存在以及内共生体基因向宿主（鞭毛藻）基因组转移的证据。此外，发现在MGD和TGD系统中，宿主与内共生核之间的DNA转移正在进行中。系统发育分析成功地解决了内共生菌属的起源。利用综合的证据，我们得出结论，MGD/TGD中的宿主-内膜整合不如隐生植物/藻生植物中的先进，并提出了两种鞭毛虫作为阐明器官发生的模型。

Pubmed_ID: 32094163

A cnidarian parasite of salmon (Myxozoa: Henneguya) lacks a mitochondrial genome

鲑鱼的一种刺胞寄生虫（Myxozoa：Henneguya）缺乏线粒体基因组

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1909907117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32094163/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/10/2020

Abstract: Although aerobic respiration is a hallmark of eukaryotes, a few unicellular lineages, growing in hypoxic environments, have secondarily lost this ability. In the absence of oxygen, the mitochondria of these organisms have lost all or parts of their genomes and evolved into mitochondria-related organelles (MROs). There has been debate regarding the presence of MROs in animals. Using deep sequencing approaches, we discovered that a member of the Cnidaria, the myxozoan Henneguya salminicola, has no mitochondrial genome, and thus has lost the ability to perform aerobic cellular respiration. This indicates that these core eukaryotic features are not ubiquitous among animals. Our analyses suggest that H. salminicola lost not only its mitochondrial genome but also nearly all nuclear genes involved in transcription and replication of the mitochondrial genome. In contrast, we identified many genes that encode proteins involved in other mitochondrial pathways and determined that genes involved in aerobic respiration or mitochondrial DNA replication were either absent or present only as pseudogenes. As a control, we used the same sequencing and annotation methods to show that a closely related myxozoan, Myxobolus squamalis, has a mitochondrial genome. The molecular results are supported by fluorescence micrographs, which show the presence of mitochondrial DNA in M. squamalis, but not in H. salminicola. Our discovery confirms that adaptation to an anaerobic environment is not unique to single-celled eukaryotes, but has also evolved in a multicellular, parasitic animal. Hence, H. salminicola provides an opportunity for understanding the evolutionary transition from an aerobic to an exclusive anaerobic metabolism.

摘要: 尽管有氧呼吸是真核生物的标志，但在缺氧环境中生长的一些单细胞谱系继而丧失了这种能力。在没有氧气的情况下，这些生物的线粒体失去了全部或部分基因组，并进化成与线粒体相关的细胞器（MRO）。关于动物中MRO的存在一直存在争议。使用深度测序方法，我们发现了Cndaria的一个成员，即粘虫Henneguyasalminicola，没有线粒体基因组，因此失去了进行有氧细胞呼吸的能力。这表明这些核心的真核生物特征在动物中并非普遍存在。我们的分析表明，沙门氏菌不仅丢失了其线粒体基因组，而且丢失了几乎所有参与线粒体基因组转录和复制的核基因。相反，我们鉴定了许多编码参与其他线粒体途径蛋白质的基因，并确定缺少有氧呼吸或线粒体DNA复制的基因或仅以假基因存在。作为对照，我们使用了相同的测序和注释方法，以显示密切相关的粘液动物，粘液鳞片（Myxobolussquamalis）具有线粒体基因组。荧光显微镜照片支持了分子结果，荧光显微镜照片显示鳞状支原体中存在线粒体DNA，而盐藻中则不存在。我们的发现证实了对厌氧环境的适应并非单细胞真核生物独有，而是在多细胞，寄生动物中进化了。因此，H。salminicola为了解从有氧代谢到独家厌氧代谢的进化过渡提供了机会。

Pubmed_ID: 32084341

A Metabolic Pathway for Activation of Dietary Glucosinolates by a Human Gut Symbiont

人肠道共生体激活膳食硫代葡萄糖苷的代谢途径。

DOI: 10.1016/j.cell.2020.01.023

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32084341/

Journal: Cell {'ISSN': '0092-8674', 'Name': 'cell', '2015': '28.71', '2016': '30.41', '2017': '31.398', '2018': '36.216', '2019': '38.637'}

Date: 02/20/2020

Abstract: Consumption of glucosinolates, pro-drug-like metabolites abundant in Brassica vegetables, has been associated with decreased risk of certain cancers. Gut microbiota have the ability to metabolize glucosinolates, generating chemopreventive isothiocyanates. Here, we identify a genetic and biochemical basis for activation of glucosinolates to isothiocyanates by Bacteroides thetaiotaomicron, a prominent gut commensal species. Using a genome-wide transposon insertion screen, we identified an operon required for glucosinolate metabolism in B. thetaiotaomicron. Expression of BT2159-BT2156 in a non-metabolizing relative, Bacteroides fragilis, resulted in gain of glucosinolate metabolism. We show that isothiocyanate formation requires the action of BT2158 and either BT2156 or BT2157 in vitro. Monocolonization of mice with mutant BtΔ2157 showed reduced isothiocyanate production in the gastrointestinal tract. These data provide insight into the mechanisms by which a common gut bacterium processes an important dietary nutrient.

摘要: 芸苔素类蔬菜中大量的前药样代谢产物芥子油苷的消费与某些癌症的风险降低有关。肠道菌群具有代谢芥子油苷的能力，可产生化学预防的异硫氰酸盐。在这里，我们确定了一种遗传和生化基础，可以通过拟南芥拟杆菌（Bacteroidesthetaiotaomicron）（一种重要的肠道共生物种）将芥子油苷活化为异硫氰酸酯。使用全基因组转座子插入筛选，我们确定了B.thetaiotaomicron中芥子油苷代谢所需的操纵子。BT2159-BT2156在非代谢亲戚脆弱拟杆菌中的表达导致芥子油苷代谢增加。我们显示异硫氰酸酯的形成需要BT2158和BT2156或BT2157在体外的作用。带有突变BtΔ2157的小鼠的单结肠显示在胃肠道中异硫氰酸盐的产生减少。这些数据提供了对常见肠道细菌处理重要饮食营养的机制的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32083286

Genomic analyses reveal distinct genetic architectures and selective pressures in buffaloes

基因组分析揭示了水牛的独特遗传结构和选择性压力

DOI: 10.1093/gigascience/giz166

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32083286/

Journal: GigaScience {'ISSN': '2047-217x', 'Name': 'gigascience', '2015': '7.463', '2016': '6.871', '2017': '7.267', '2018': '4.688', '2019': '5.993'}

Date: 02/01/2020

Abstract: Background: The domestic buffalo (Bubalus bubalis) is an essential farm animal in tropical and subtropical regions, whose genomic diversity is yet to be fully discovered. Results: In this study, we describe the demographic events and selective pressures of buffalo by analyzing 121 whole genomes (98 newly reported) from 25 swamp and river buffalo breeds. Both uniparental and biparental markers were investigated to provide the final scenario. The ancestors of swamp and river buffalo diverged ∼0.23 million years ago and then experienced independent demographic histories. They were domesticated in different regions, the swamp buffalo at the border between southwest China and southeast Asia, while the river buffalo in south Asia. The domestic stocks migrated to other regions and further differentiated, as testified by (at least) 2 ancestral components identified in each subspecies. Different signals of selective pressures were also detected in these 2 types of buffalo. The swamp buffalo, historically used as a draft animal, shows selection signatures in genes associated with the nervous system, while in river dairy breeds, genes under selection are related to heat stress and immunity. Conclusions: Our findings substantially expand the catalogue of genetic variants in buffalo and reveal new insights into the evolutionary history and distinct selective pressures in river and swamp buffalo.

摘要: 背景：家养水牛（Bubalusbubalis）是热带和亚热带地区必不可少的农场动物，其基因组多样性尚待充分发现。结果：在这项研究中，我们通过分析25个沼泽和河水牛品种的121个全基因组（98个新报告）来描述水牛的人口统计学事件和选择压力。对单亲和双亲标​​记进行了调查，以提供最终方案。沼泽和水牛的祖先大约在23万年前发散，然后经历了独立的人口历史。他们被驯养在不同的地区，西南中国和东南亚边界的沼泽水牛，而南亚的河水牛。国内种群迁移到其他地区并进一步分化，这一点由每个亚种中确定的（至少）2个祖先成分证明。在这两种类型的水牛中还检测到不同的选择压力信号。沼泽水牛曾被用作生畜，在与神经系统有关的基因中显示出选择特征，而在河道乳品中，处于选择状态的基因与热应激和免疫力有关。结论：我们的发现大大扩展了水牛的遗传变异目录，并揭示了对水牛和河水的进化历史和独特的选择压力的新见解。

Pubmed_ID: 32081890

Purging of highly deleterious mutations through severe bottlenecks in Alpine ibex

通过严重的瓶颈抑制高有害的突变

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14803-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32081890/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/21/2020

Abstract: Human activity has caused dramatic population declines in many wild species. The resulting bottlenecks have a profound impact on the genetic makeup of a species with unknown consequences for health. A key genetic factor for species survival is the evolution of deleterious mutation load, but how bottleneck strength and mutation load interact lacks empirical evidence. We analyze 60 complete genomes of six ibex species and the domestic goat. We show that historic bottlenecks rather than the current conservation status predict levels of genome-wide variation. By analyzing the exceptionally well-characterized population bottlenecks of the once nearly extinct Alpine ibex, we find genomic evidence of concurrent purging of highly deleterious mutations but accumulation of mildly deleterious mutations. This suggests that recolonization bottlenecks induced both relaxed selection and purging, thus reshaping the landscape of deleterious mutation load. Our findings highlight that even populations of ~1000 individuals can accumulate mildly deleterious mutations. Conservation efforts should focus on preventing population declines below such levels to ensure long-term survival of species.

摘要: 人类活动导致许多野生物种的种群数量急剧下降。由此产生的瓶颈对物种的遗传构成具有深远的影响，对健康的影响未知。物种生存的关键遗传因素是有害突变负荷的演变，但是瓶颈强度和突变负荷如何相互作用尚缺乏经验证据。我们分析了六只高地山羊和家山羊的60个完整基因组。我们表明，历史瓶颈而不是当前的保存状态可以预测全基因组变异的水平。通过分析曾经濒临灭绝的高山高地山羊的异常突出的种群瓶颈，我们发现了同时清除高度有害突变但积累了轻微有害突变的基因组证据。这表明重新定殖的瓶颈导致了选择的放松和清除，从而重塑了有害突变负载的格局。我们的发现突出表明，即使是约1000个人的群体也可以积累轻度有害突变。保护工作应着重防止种群数量下降到低于这一水平，以确保物种的长期生存。

Pubmed_ID: 32081864

Somatic mosaicism and common genetic variation contribute to the risk of very-early-onset inflammatory bowel disease

体细胞镶嵌症和常见的遗传变异导致极早发炎性肠病的风险

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-019-14275-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32081864/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/21/2020

Abstract: Very-early-onset inflammatory bowel disease (VEO-IBD) is a heterogeneous phenotype associated with a spectrum of rare Mendelian disorders. Here, we perform whole-exome-sequencing and genome-wide genotyping in 145 patients (median age-at-diagnosis of 3.5 years), in whom no Mendelian disorders were clinically suspected. In five patients we detect a primary immunodeficiency or enteropathy, with clinical consequences (XIAP, CYBA, SH2D1A, PCSK1). We also present a case study of a VEO-IBD patient with a mosaic de novo, pathogenic allele in CYBB. The mutation is present in ~70% of phagocytes and sufficient to result in defective bacterial handling but not life-threatening infections. Finally, we show that VEO-IBD patients have, on average, higher IBD polygenic risk scores than population controls (99 patients and 18,780 controls; P < 4 × 10-10), and replicate this finding in an independent cohort of VEO-IBD cases and controls (117 patients and 2,603 controls; P < 5 × 10-10). This discovery indicates that a polygenic component operates in VEO-IBD pathogenesis.

摘要: 早发性炎症性肠病（VEO-IBD）是一种异质表型，与一系列罕见的孟德尔疾病有关。在这里，我们对145名患者（诊断年龄中位数为3.5岁）进行了全外显子测序和全基因组基因分型，其中临床上未怀疑孟德尔疾病。在五名患者中，我们检测到原发性免疫缺陷或肠病，并产生临床后果（XIAP，CYBA，SH2D1A，PCSK1）。我们还介绍了一个在CYBB中具有新生马赛克，致病等位基因的VEO-IBD患者的案例研究。该突变存在于约70％的吞噬细胞中，足以导致细菌处理缺陷，但不会威胁生命。最后，我们表明，VEO-IBD患者平均具有比人群对照组更高的IBD多基因风险评分（99名患者和18,780名对照组；P<4×10-10），并将这一发现复制到一个独立的VEO-IBD队列中病例和对照（117例患者和2,603例对照；P<5×10-10）。该发现表明多基因组分在VEO-IBD发病机理中起作用。

Pubmed_ID: 32081846

Immuno-genomic landscape of osteosarcoma

骨肉瘤的免疫基因组景观

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14646-w

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32081846/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/21/2020

Abstract: Limited clinical activity has been seen in osteosarcoma (OS) patients treated with immune checkpoint inhibitors (ICI). To gain insights into the immunogenic potential of these tumors, we conducted whole genome, RNA, and T-cell receptor sequencing, immunohistochemistry and reverse phase protein array profiling (RPPA) on OS specimens from 48 pediatric and adult patients with primary, relapsed, and metastatic OS. Median immune infiltrate level was lower than in other tumor types where ICI are effective, with concomitant low T-cell receptor clonalities. Neoantigen expression in OS was lacking and significantly associated with high levels of nonsense-mediated decay (NMD). Samples with low immune infiltrate had higher number of deleted genes while those with high immune infiltrate expressed higher levels of adaptive resistance pathways. PARP2 expression levels were significantly negatively associated with the immune infiltrate. Together, these data reveal multiple immunosuppressive features of OS and suggest immunotherapeutic opportunities in OS patients.

摘要: 在接受免疫检查点抑制剂（ICI）治疗的骨肉瘤（OS）患者中，临床活性有限。为了深入了解这些肿瘤的免疫原性，我们对来自48例原发性，复发性和复发性小儿和成年患者的OS标本进行了全基因组，RNA和T细胞受体测序，免疫组化和反相蛋白阵列分析（RPPA）。转移OS。中位免疫浸润水平低于ICI有效的其他肿瘤类型，并伴有低T细胞受体克隆性。OS中缺乏新抗原表达，并且与无意义介导的衰变（NMD）高水平显着相关。免疫浸润度低的样品具有较高的缺失基因数量，而免疫浸润度高的样品则具有较高水平的适应性耐药途径。PARP2表达水平与免疫浸润显着负相关。总之，这些数据揭示了OS的多种免疫抑制特征，并暗示了OS患者的免疫治疗机会。

Pubmed_ID: 32080181

Collaborative interactions of heterogenous ribonucleoproteins contribute to transcriptional regulation of sterol metabolism in mice

异源核糖核蛋白的协同相互作用有助于小鼠固醇代谢的转录调控

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14711-4

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32080181/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/20/2020

Abstract: Heterogeneous nuclear ribonucleoproteins (hnRNPs) are a group of functionally versatile proteins that play critical roles in the biogenesis, cellular localization and transport of RNA. Here, we outline a role for hnRNPs in gene regulatory circuits controlling sterol homeostasis. Specifically, we find that tissue-selective loss of the conserved hnRNP RALY enriches for metabolic pathways. Liver-specific deletion of RALY alters hepatic lipid content and serum cholesterol level. In vivo interrogation of chromatin architecture and genome-wide RALY-binding pattern reveal insights into its cooperative interactions and mode of action in regulating cholesterogenesis. Interestingly, we find that RALY binds the promoter region of the master metabolic regulator Srebp2 and show that it directly interacts with coactivator Nuclear Transcription Factor Y (NFY) to influence cholesterogenic gene expression. Our work offers insights into mechanisms orchestrating selective promoter activation in metabolic control and a model by which hnRNPs can impact health and disease states.

摘要: 异质核核糖核蛋白（hnRNPs）是一组功能多样的蛋白质，在RNA的生物发生，细胞定位和运输中起关键作用。在这里，我们概述了hnRNPs在控制固醇稳态的基因调控电路中的作用。具体而言，我们发现保守的hnRNPRALY的组织选择性损失丰富了代谢途径。RALY的肝脏特异性缺失会改变肝脏脂质含量和血清胆固醇水平。在体内对染色质结构和全基因组RALY结合模式的询问揭示了其在调节胆甾醇生成中的协同相互作用和作用方式的见解。有趣的是，我们发现RALY结合了主代谢调节因子Srebp2的启动子区域，并表明它与辅激活物核转录因子Y（NFY）直接相互作用，以影响致胆固醇的基因表达。我们的工作提供了有关在代谢控制中协调选择性启动子激活的机制的见解，以及hnRNP可以影响健康和疾病状态的模型。

Pubmed_ID: 32080175

Genome of Tripterygium wilfordii and identification of cytochrome P450 involved in triptolide biosynthesis

雷公藤的基因组及雷公藤内酯醇合成的细胞色素P450的鉴定

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14776-1

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32080175/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/20/2020

Abstract: Triptolide is a trace natural product of Tripterygium wilfordii. It has antitumor activities, particularly against pancreatic cancer cells. Identification of genes and elucidation of the biosynthetic pathway leading to triptolide are the prerequisite for heterologous bioproduction. Here, we report a reference-grade genome of T. wilfordii with a contig N50 of 4.36 Mb. We show that copy numbers of triptolide biosynthetic pathway genes are impacted by a recent whole-genome triplication event. We further integrate genomic, transcriptomic, and metabolomic data to map a gene-to-metabolite network. This leads to the identification of a cytochrome P450 (CYP728B70) that can catalyze oxidation of a methyl to the acid moiety of dehydroabietic acid in triptolide biosynthesis. We think the genomic resource and the candidate genes reported here set the foundation to fully reveal triptolide biosynthetic pathway and consequently the heterologous bioproduction.

摘要: 雷公藤甲素是雷公藤的微量天然产物。它具有抗肿瘤活性，特别是针对胰腺癌细胞。基因鉴定和导致雷公藤甲素的生物合成途径的阐明是异源生物生产的前提。在这里，我们报告了一个参考等级的T.wilfordii基因组，重叠群N50为4.36Mb。我们显示雷公藤甲素生物合成途径基因的拷贝数受最近的全基因组三倍事件的影响。我们进一步整合了基因组，转录组和代谢组学数据，以绘制从基因到代谢物网络的图谱。这导致了细胞色素P450（CYP728B70）的鉴定，该色素可以催化雷公藤甲素生物合成中甲基氧化为脱氢松香酸的酸部分。我们认为这里报道的基因组资源和候选基因为充分揭示雷公藤内酯醇的生物合成途径和因此的异源生物生产奠定了基础。

Pubmed_ID: 32080174

Chromosome-level assemblies of multiple Arabidopsis genomes reveal hotspots of rearrangements with altered evolutionary dynamics

多个拟南芥基因组的染色体水平组装揭示了重排热点，进化动力学发生了变化

DOI: 10.1038/s41467-020-14779-y

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32080174/

Journal: Nature communications {'ISSN': '2041-1723', 'Name': 'nature communications', '2015': '11.329', '2016': '12.124', '2017': '12.353', '2018': '11.878', '2019': '12.121'}

Date: 02/20/2020

Abstract: Despite hundreds of sequenced Arabidopsis genomes, very little is known about the degree of genomic collinearity within single species, due to the low number of chromosome-level assemblies. Here, we report chromosome-level reference-quality assemblies of seven Arabidopsis thaliana accessions selected across its global range. Each genome reveals between 13-17 Mb rearranged, and 5-6 Mb non-reference sequences introducing copy-number changes in ~5000 genes, including ~1900 non-reference genes. Quantifying the collinearity between the genomes reveals ~350 euchromatic regions, where accession-specific tandem duplications destroy the collinearity between the genomes. These hotspots of rearrangements are characterized by reduced meiotic recombination in hybrids and genes implicated in biotic stress response. This suggests that hotspots of rearrangements undergo altered evolutionary dynamics, as compared to the rest of the genome, which are mostly based on the accumulation of new mutations and not on the recombination of existing variation, and thereby enable a quick response to the biotic stress.

摘要: 尽管有数百个测序的拟南芥基因组，但由于染色体水平装配的数量少，对单个物种内的基因组共线性程度了解甚少。在这里，我们报告在其全球范围内选择的七个拟南芥种质的染色体水平参考质量组装。每个基因组揭示了13-17Mb的重排序列，以及5-6Mb的非参考序列，从而在〜5000个基因（包括〜1900个非参考基因）中引入了拷贝数变化。量化基因组之间的共线性可揭示约350个常色区，其中特定于基因组的串联复制会破坏基因组之间的共线性。这些重排热点的特征在于杂种和涉及生物胁迫响应的基因中减数分裂重组的减少。这表明与基因组的其余部分相比，重排的热点经历了变化的进化动力学，这主要是基于新突变的积累而不是基于现有变异的重组，从而能够对生物胁迫做出快速反应。

Pubmed_ID: 32079724

CUX1 and IκBζ (NFKBIZ) mediate the synergistic inflammatory response to TNF and IL-17A in stromal fibroblasts

CUX1和IκBζ（NFKBIZ）介导基质成纤维细胞对TNF和IL-17A的协同炎症反应

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1912702117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32079724/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/10/2020

Abstract: The role of stromal fibroblasts in chronic inflammation is unfolding. In rheumatoid arthritis, leukocyte-derived cytokines TNF and IL-17A work together, activating fibroblasts to become a dominant source of the hallmark cytokine IL-6. However, IL-17A alone has minimal effect on fibroblasts. To identify key mediators of the synergistic response to TNF and IL-17A in human synovial fibroblasts, we performed time series, dose-response, and gene-silencing transcriptomics experiments. Here we show that in combination with TNF, IL-17A selectively induces a specific set of genes mediated by factors including cut-like homeobox 1 (CUX1) and IκBζ (NFKBIZ). In the promoters of CXCL1, CXCL2, and CXCL3, we found a putative CUX1-NF-κB binding motif not found elsewhere in the genome. CUX1 and NF-κB p65 mediate transcription of these genes independent of LIFR, STAT3, STAT4, and ELF3. Transcription of NFKBIZ, encoding the atypical IκB factor IκBζ, is IL-17A dose-dependent, and IκBζ only mediates the transcriptional response to TNF and IL-17A, but not to TNF alone. In fibroblasts, IL-17A response depends on CUX1 and IκBζ to engage the NF-κB complex to produce chemoattractants for neutrophil and monocyte recruitment.

摘要: 基质成纤维细胞在慢性炎症中的作用正在显现。在类风湿关节炎中，白细胞衍生的细胞因子TNF和IL-17A共同起作用，激活成纤维细胞成为标志性细胞因子IL-6的主要来源。但是，仅IL-17A对成纤维细胞的影响很小。为了确定人类滑膜成纤维细胞中对TNF和IL-17A协同反应的关键介质，我们进行了时间序列，剂量反应和基因沉默转录组学实验。在这里，我们显示与TNF结合使用时，IL-17A选择性诱导一组特定基因，这些基因受包括切样同源盒1（CUX1）和IκBζ（NFKBIZ）在内的因素介导。在CXCL1，CXCL2和CXCL3的启动子中，我们发现了基因组其他位置未发现的推定的CUX1-NF-κB结合基序。CUX1和NF-κBp65介导这些基因的转录，而与LIFR，STAT3，STAT4和ELF3无关。编码非典型IκB因子IκBζ的NFKBIZ的转录是IL-17A剂量依赖性的，并且IκBζ仅介导对TNF和IL-17A的转录反应，但不介导单独的TNF。在成纤维细胞中，IL-17A反应依赖于CUX1和IκBζ参与NF-κB复合物的产生，以吸引嗜中性粒细胞和单核细胞募集的趋化因子。

Pubmed_ID: 32076263

Single-cell and spatial transcriptomics reveal somitogenesis in gastruloids

单细胞和空间转录组学揭示了类固醇的体发生

DOI: 10.1038/s41586-020-2024-3

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32076263/

Journal: Nature {'ISSN': '0028-0836', 'Name': 'nature', '2015': '38.138', '2016': '40.137', '2017': '41.577', '2018': '43.07', '2019': '42.778'}

Date: 2020 Jun

Abstract: Gastruloids are three-dimensional aggregates of embryonic stem cells that display key features of mammalian development after implantation, including germ-layer specification and axial organization1-3. To date, the expression pattern of only a small number of genes in gastruloids has been explored with microscopy, and the extent to which genome-wide expression patterns in gastruloids mimic those in embryos is unclear. Here we compare mouse gastruloids with mouse embryos using single-cell RNA sequencing and spatial transcriptomics. We identify various embryonic cell types that were not previously known to be present in gastruloids, and show that key regulators of somitogenesis are expressed similarly between embryos and gastruloids. Using live imaging, we show that the somitogenesis clock is active in gastruloids and has dynamics that resemble those in vivo. Because gastruloids can be grown in large quantities, we performed a small screen that revealed how reduced FGF signalling induces a short-tail phenotype in embryos. Finally, we demonstrate that embedding in Matrigel induces gastruloids to generate somites with the correct rostral-caudal patterning, which appear sequentially in an anterior-to-posterior direction over time. This study thus shows the power of gastruloids as a model system for exploring development and somitogenesis in vitro in a high-throughput manner.

摘要: 胚状体是胚胎干细胞的三维聚集体，在植入后显示出哺乳动物发育的关键特征，包括胚层规格和轴向组织1-3。迄今为止，通过显微镜已经研究了仅在胃胚中的少数基因的表达模式，并且尚不清楚在胃胚中全基因组的表达模式模仿胚胎中基因表达范围的程度。在这里，我们使用单细胞RNA测序和空间转录组学比较小鼠类胚体与小鼠胚胎。我们确定了各种以前不知道存在于类胚体中的胚胎细胞类型，并表明在胚和类胚体之间相似地表达了体发生的关键调控因子。使用实时成像，我们显示体发生时钟活跃在类胃中，并具有类似于体内的动力学。因为胃类固醇可以大量生长，所以我们进行了一个小屏幕筛选，揭示了降低的FGF信号传导如何诱导胚胎中的短尾表型。最后，我们证明了在Matrigel中嵌入可诱导类胚产生具有正确的鼻尾状图案的体节，其随着时间的顺序从前到后依次出现。因此，这项研究表明了类固醇作为模型系统的能力，可用于以高通量方式探索体外发育和体发生。

Pubmed_ID: 32075920

Structure of a paramyxovirus polymerase complex reveals a unique methyltransferase-CTD conformation

副粘病毒聚合酶复合物的结构揭示了独特的甲基转移酶-CTD构象

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1919837117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32075920/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/03/2020

Abstract: Paramyxoviruses are enveloped, nonsegmented, negative-strand RNA viruses that cause a wide spectrum of human and animal diseases. The viral genome, packaged by the nucleoprotein (N), serves as a template for the polymerase complex, composed of the large protein (L) and the homo-tetrameric phosphoprotein (P). The ∼250-kDa L possesses all enzymatic activities necessary for its function but requires P in vivo. Structural information is available for individual P domains from different paramyxoviruses, but how P interacts with L and how that affects the activity of L is largely unknown due to the lack of high-resolution structures of this complex in this viral family. In this study we determined the structure of the L-P complex from parainfluenza virus 5 (PIV5) at 4.3-Å resolution using cryoelectron microscopy, as well as the oligomerization domain (OD) of P at 1.4-Å resolution using X-ray crystallography. P-OD associates with the RNA-dependent RNA polymerase domain of L and protrudes away from it, while the X domain of one chain of P is bound near the L nucleotide entry site. The methyltransferase (MTase) domain and the C-terminal domain (CTD) of L adopt a unique conformation, positioning the MTase active site immediately above the poly-ribonucleotidyltransferase domain and near the likely exit site for the product RNA 5' end. Our study reveals a potential mechanism that mononegavirus polymerases may employ to switch between transcription and genome replication. This knowledge will assist in the design and development of antivirals against paramyxoviruses.

摘要: 副粘病毒是有包膜的，无节段的负链RNA病毒，会引起广泛的人类和动物疾病。由核蛋白（N）包装的病毒基因组用作聚合酶复合物的模板，该复合物由大蛋白（L）和同四聚体磷蛋白（P）组成。约250kDaL具有其功能所需的所有酶促活性，但体内需要P。结构信息可用于来自不同副粘病毒的单个P结构域，但是由于该病毒家族缺乏这种复合物的高分辨率结构，因此很大程度上未知P如何与L相互作用以及如何影响L的活性。在这项研究中，我们使用冷冻电子显微镜确定了4.3Å分辨率的副流感病毒5（PIV5）的L-P复合物的结构，以及使用X射线晶体学测定了1.4Å分辨率的P的寡聚结构域（OD）。P-OD与L的RNA依赖性RNA聚合酶结构域关联并从其突出，而P的一条链的X结构域则在L核苷酸进入位点附近结合。L的甲基转移酶（MTase）结构域和C末端结构域（CTD）采用独特的构象，将MTase活性位点直接定位在聚核糖核苷酸转移酶结构域的上方，并靠近产物RNA5'末端的可能出口位点。我们的研究揭示了单负病毒聚合酶可能用于在转录和基因组复制之间切换的潜在机制。这些知识将有助于设计和开发针对副粘病毒的抗病毒药物。

Pubmed_ID: 32075918

Assessing aneuploidy with repetitive element sequencing

通过重复元素测序评估非整倍性

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1910041117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32075918/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/03/2020

Abstract: We report a sensitive PCR-based assay called Repetitive Element AneupLoidy Sequencing System (RealSeqS) that can detect aneuploidy in samples containing as little as 3 pg of DNA. Using a single primer pair, we amplified ∼350,000 amplicons distributed throughout the genome. Aneuploidy was detected in 49% of liquid biopsies from a total of 883 nonmetastatic, clinically detected cancers of the colorectum, esophagus, liver, lung, ovary, pancreas, breast, or stomach. Combining aneuploidy with somatic mutation detection and eight standard protein biomarkers yielded a median sensitivity of 80% in these eight cancer types, while only 1% of 812 healthy controls scored positive.

摘要: 我们报告了一种基于PCR的灵敏测定方法，称为重复元素AneupLoidy测序系统（RealSeqS），该系统可检测到包含3pgDNA的样品中的非整倍性。使用单个引物对，我们扩增了遍布整个基因组的〜350,000个扩增子。在总共883种临床上未检测到的结直肠癌，食道癌，肝癌，肺癌，卵巢癌，胰腺癌，乳腺癌或胃癌中，有49％的液体活检组织检测到非整倍性。将非整倍性与体细胞突变检测和八种标准蛋白质生物标记物结合使用，在这八种癌症类型中产生80％的中位敏感性，而812名健康对照中只有1％得分为阳性。

Pubmed_ID: 32075916

Ventral prostate and mammary gland phenotype in mice with complete deletion of the ERβ gene

ERβ基因完全缺失的小鼠腹侧前列腺和乳腺表型

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1920478117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32075916/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/03/2020

Abstract: Disagreements about the phenotype of estrogen receptor β (ERβ) knockout mouse, created by removing the DNA-binding domain of the ERβ gene or interruption of the gene with a neocassette (Oliver Smithies ERβ knockout mice [ERβOS-/-]), prompted us to create an ERβ knockout mouse by deleting the ERβ gene with the use of CRISPR/Cas9 technology. We confirmed that the ERβ gene was eliminated from the mouse genome and that no ERβ mRNA or protein was detectable in tissues of this mouse. Overall the phenotype of the ventral prostate (VP) and mammary gland (MG) in ERβcrispr-/- mice was similar to, but more severe than, that in the ERβOS-/-mice. In the VP of 6-mo-old ERβcrispr-/- mice there was epithelial hyperplasia, fibroplasia, inflammation, stromal overgrowth, and intraductal cancer-like lesions. This was accompanied by an increase in Ki67 and P63 and loss in DACH1 and PURα, two androgen receptor (AR) repressors. In the MG there was overexpression of estrogen receptor α and progesterone receptor, loss of collagen, increase in proliferation and expression of metalloproteases, and invasive epithelium. Surprisingly, by 18 mo of age, the number of hyperplastic foci was reduced, the ducts of the VP and MG became atrophic, and, in the VP, there was massive immune infiltration and massive desquamation of the luminal epithelial cells. These changes were coincident with reduced levels of androgens in males and estrogens in females. We conclude that ERβ is a tumor suppressor gene in the VP and MG where its loss increases the activity AR and ERα, respectively.

摘要: 关于雌激素受体β（ERβ）基因敲除小鼠表型的分歧，是通过去除ERβ基因的DNA结合结构域或用新盒式磁带中断了基因而产生的（OliverSmithiesERβ基因敲除小鼠[ERβOS-/-]）。通过使用CRISPR/Cas9技术删除ERβ基因来创建ERβ基因敲除小鼠。我们证实，ERβ基因已从小鼠基因组中消除，并且在该小鼠组织中未检测到ERβmRNA或蛋白质。总体而言，ERβcrispr-/-小鼠的腹侧前列腺（VP）和乳腺（MG）的表型与ERβOS-/-小鼠的相似，但更为严重。6个月大的ERβcrispr-/-小鼠的VP中有上皮增生，纤维化，炎症，基质过度生长和导管内癌样病变。这伴随着Ki67和P63的增加以及两种雄激素受体（AR）阻遏物DACH1和PURα的损失。在重症肌无力中，雌激素受体α和孕激素受体过表达，胶原蛋白丢失，金属蛋白酶的增殖和表达增加以及侵袭性上皮细胞。出人意料的是，到18岁时，增生灶的数量减少，VP和MG的导管萎缩，并且在VP中，大量的免疫浸润和腔上皮细胞的大量脱屑。这些变化与男性雄激素水平降低和女性雌激素水平降低同时发生。我们得出的结论是，ERβ是VP和MG中的抑癌基因，其丢失会分别增加AR和ERα的活性。

Pubmed_ID: 32073701

Metabolomics analysis and metabolite-agronomic trait associations using kernels of wheat (Triticum aestivum) recombinant inbred lines

利用小麦重组自交系仁的代谢组学分析和代谢产物-农艺性状关联

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14727

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32073701/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: Plants produce numerous metabolites that are important for their development and growth. However, the genetic architecture of the wheat metabolome has not been well studied. Here, utilizing a high-density genetic map, we conducted a comprehensive metabolome study via widely targeted LC-MS/MS to analyze the wheat kernel metabolism. We further combined agronomic traits and dissected the genetic relationship between metabolites and agronomic traits. In total, 1260 metabolic features were detected. Using linkage analysis, 1005 metabolic quantitative trait loci (mQTLs) were found distributed unevenly across the genome. Twenty-four candidate genes were found to modulate the levels of different metabolites, of which two were functionally annotated by in vitro analysis to be involved in the synthesis and modification of flavonoids. Combining the correlation analysis of metabolite-agronomic traits with the co-localization of methylation quantitative trait locus (mQTL) and phenotypic QTL (pQTL), genetic relationships between the metabolites and agronomic traits were uncovered. For example, a candidate was identified using correlation and co-localization analysis that may manage auxin accumulation, thereby affecting number of grains per spike (NGPS). Furthermore, metabolomics data were used to predict the performance of wheat agronomic traits, with metabolites being found that provide strong predictive power for NGPS and plant height. This study used metabolomics and association analysis to better understand the genetic basis of the wheat metabolism which will ultimately assist in wheat breeding.

摘要: 植物产生大量的代谢产物，这些代谢产物对它们的生长发育至关重要。但是，小麦代谢组的遗传结构尚未得到很好的研究。在这里，我们利用高密度遗传图谱，通过针对性强的LC-MS/MS进行了全面的代谢组学研究，以分析小麦籽粒的代谢。我们进一步结合了农艺性状，并剖析了代谢产物与农艺性状之间的遗传关系。总共检测到1260个代谢特征。使用连锁分析，发现1005个代谢定量性状基因座（mQTL）在整个基因组中分布不均。发现二十四个候选基因可调节不同代谢产物的水平，其中两个通过体外分析在功能上被注释，参与了类黄酮的合成和修饰。结合代谢产物-农艺性状的相关性分析与甲基化数量性状位点（mQTL）和表型QTL（pQTL）的共定位，揭示了代谢物与农艺性状之间的遗传关系。例如，使用相关性和共定位分析来识别候选物，该分析可以管理植物生长素的积累，从而影响每个穗的籽粒数（NGPS）。此外，代谢组学数据被用于预测小麦农艺性状的表现，并且发现了可为NGPS和植物高度提供强大预测能力的代谢物。这项研究使用代谢组学和关联分析来更好地了解小麦代谢的遗传基础，这最终将有助于小麦育种。

Pubmed_ID: 32072700

Genome-wide expression quantitative trait locus studies facilitate isolation of causal genes controlling panicle structure

全基因组表达定量性状基因座研究有助于分离控制穗结构的因果基因

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14726

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32072700/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jul

Abstract: The morphology of rice (Oryza sativa L.) panicles is an important determinant of grain yield, and elucidation of the genetic control of panicle structure is very important for fulfilling the demand for high yield in breeding programs. In a quantitative trait locus (QTL) study using 82 backcross inbred lines (BILs) derived from Koshihikari and Habataki, 68 QTLs for 25 panicle morphological traits were identified. Gene expression profiling from inflorescence meristems of BILs was obtained. A combination of phenotypic QTL (pQTL) and expression QTL (eQTL) analysis revealed co-localization between pQTLs and eQTLs, consistent with significant correlations between phenotypic traits and gene expression levels. By combining pQTL and eQTL data, two genes were identified as controlling panicle structure: OsMADS18 modulates the average length of the primary rachis and OsFTL1 has pleiotropic effects on the total number of secondary rachides, number of grains per panicle, plant height and the length of flag leaves. Phenotypes were confirmed in RNA interference knocked-down plants and overexpressor lines. The combination of pQTL and eQTL analysis could facilitate identification of genes involved in rice panicle formation.

摘要: 水稻穗的形态是决定产量的重要决定因素，阐明穗结构的遗传调控对于满足育种计划中的高产需求非常重要。在一项定量特征性状位点（QTL）研究中，使用了来自越光和Habataki的82个回交自交系（BIL），确定了25个穗形态性状的68个QTL。获得了从BIL的花序分生组织的基因表达谱。表型QTL（pQTL）和表达QTL（eQTL）分析的组合揭示了pQTL和eQTL之间的共定位，与表型性状和基因表达水平之间的显着相关性一致。通过结合pQTL和eQTL数据，确定了两个基因来控制圆锥花序结构：OsMADS18调节了初级花序的平均长度，而OsFTL1对次生花序的总数，每穗的谷粒数，植物高度和穗长有多效性影响。旗叶。在RNA干扰敲低的植物和过表达株中证实了表型。pQTL和eQTL分析的结合可以促进鉴定与水稻穗形成有关的基因。

Pubmed_ID: 32071244

Sexually dimorphic role of oxytocin in medaka mate choice

催产素在青aka配偶选择中的性二态性作用

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.1921446117

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32071244/

Journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America {'ISSN': '0027-8424', 'Name': 'proceedings of the national academy of sciences of the united states of america', '2015': '9.423', '2016': '9.661', '2017': '9.504', '2018': '9.58', '2019': '9.412'}

Date: 03/03/2020

Abstract: Oxytocin is a central neuromodulator required for facilitating mate preferences for familiar individuals in a monogamous rodent (prairie vole), irrespective of sex. While the role of oxytocin in mate choice is only understood in a few monogamous species, its function in nonmonogamous species, comprising the vast majority of vertebrate species, remains unclear. To address this issue, we evaluated the involvement of an oxytocin homolog (isotocin, referred herein as oxt) in mate choice in medaka fish (Oryzias latipes). Female medaka prefer to choose familiar mates, whereas male medaka court indiscriminately, irrespective of familiarity. We generated mutants of the oxt ligand (oxt) and receptor genes (oxtr1 and oxtr2) and revealed that the oxt-oxtr1 signaling pathway was essential for eliciting female mate preference for familiar males. This pathway was also required for unrestricted and indiscriminate mating strategy in males. That is, either oxt or oxtr1 mutation in males decreased the number of courtship displays toward novel females, but not toward familiar females. Further, males with these mutations exhibited enhanced mate-guarding behaviors toward familiar females, but not toward novel females. In addition, RNA-sequencing (seq) analysis revealed that the transcription of genes involved in gamma-amino butyric acid metabolism as well as those encoding ion-transport ATPase are up-regulated in both oxt and oxtr1 mutants only in female medaka, potentially explaining the sex difference of the mutant phenotype. Our findings provide genetic evidence that oxt-oxtr1 signaling plays a role in the mate choice for familiar individuals in a sex-specific manner in medaka fish.
