Using sequential fluorescence in situ hybridization we were able to identify all poplar chromosomes in the same metaphase cells, which led to the development of poplar karyotypes based on individually identified chromosomes. We demonstrate that five Populus species, belonging to five different sections within Populus, have maintained a remarkably conserved karyotype. No inter-chromosomal structural rearrangements were observed on any of the 19 chromosomes among the five species. Thus, the chromosomal synteny in Populus has been remarkably maintained after nearly 14 million years of divergence. We propose that the karyotypes of woody species are more stable than those of herbaceous plants since it may take a longer period of time for woody plants to fix chromosome number or structural variants in natural populations.

摘要: 核型代表了真核生物的基本遗传组成。仅在少数几个植物群中进行了基于个体识别染色体的相关物种的比较细胞遗传学分析，而在木本植物中尚未进行。我们已经基于模型木本植物胡杨（Populustrichocarpa）的参考基因组开发了一套完整的19条染色体绘画探针。使用顺序荧光原位杂交，我们能够鉴定同一中期细胞中的所有杨染色体，这导致了基于个体鉴定的染色体的杨核型的发展。我们证明了属于胡杨属植物中五个不同部分的五个胡杨属植物保持了非常保守的核型。在五个物种的19个染色体中的任何一个上均未观察到染色体间的结构重排。因此，经过近一千四百万年的差异，胡杨的染色体同义性得以显着维持。我们建议，木本植物的核型比草本植物更稳定，因为木本植物在自然种群中固定染色体数或结构变异可能需要更长的时间。

Pubmed_ID: 31520498

Single organelle function and organization as estimated from Arabidopsis mitochondrial proteomics

根据拟南芥线粒体蛋白质组学估计的单细胞器功能和组织

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14534

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31520498/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: Mitochondria host vital cellular functions, including oxidative phosphorylation and co-factor biosynthesis, which are reflected in their proteome. At the cellular level plant mitochondria are organized into hundreds of discrete functional entities, which undergo dynamic fission and fusion. It is the individual organelle that operates in the living cell, yet biochemical and physiological assessments have exclusively focused on the characteristics of large populations of mitochondria. Here, we explore the protein composition of an individual average plant mitochondrion to deduce principles of functional and structural organisation. We perform proteomics on purified mitochondria from cultured heterotrophic Arabidopsis cells with intensity-based absolute quantification and scale the dataset to the single organelle based on criteria that are justified by experimental evidence and theoretical considerations. We estimate that a total of 1.4 million protein molecules make up a single Arabidopsis mitochondrion on average. Copy numbers of the individual proteins span five orders of magnitude, ranging from >40 000 for Voltage-Dependent Anion Channel 1 to sub-stoichiometric copy numbers, i.e. less than a single copy per single mitochondrion, for several pentatricopeptide repeat proteins that modify mitochondrial transcripts. For our analysis, we consider the physical and chemical constraints of the single organelle and discuss prominent features of mitochondrial architecture, protein biogenesis, oxidative phosphorylation, metabolism, antioxidant defence, genome maintenance, gene expression, and dynamics. While assessing the limitations of our considerations, we exemplify how our understanding of biochemical function and structural organization of plant mitochondria can be connected in order to obtain global and specific insights into how organelles work.

摘要: 线粒体具有重要的细胞功能，包括氧化磷酸化和辅因子生物合成，这些都反映在其蛋白质组中。在细胞水平上，线粒体被组织成数百个离散的功能实体，它们经历了动态裂变和融合。它是在活细胞中运行的单个细胞器，但是生化和生理学评估仅集中于线粒体的大量特征。在这里，我们探索单个平均植物线粒体的蛋白质组成，以推断功能和结构组织的原理。我们使用基于强度的绝对定量对培养的异养拟南芥细胞中的纯化线粒体进行蛋白质组学分析，并根据实验证据和理论考虑证明的标准将数据集扩展到单个细胞器。我们估计平均有140万个蛋白质分子构成单个拟南芥线粒体。单个蛋白质的拷贝数跨越五个数量级，范围从电压依赖性阴离子通道1的>40000到亚化学计量拷贝数，即对于修饰线粒体转录物的几种五肽重复蛋白，每个线粒体的拷贝数均少于一个拷贝。。对于我们的分析，我们考虑了单个细胞器的物理和化学约束，并讨论了线粒体结构，蛋白质生物发生，氧化磷酸化，代谢，抗氧化剂防御，基因组维持，基因表达和动力学的突出特征。在评估我们的考虑因素的局限性时，我们举例说明了如何将我们对植物线粒体的生化功能和结构组织的理解联系起来，以便获得有关细胞器工作原理的全面而具体的见解。

Pubmed_ID: 31498930

Cellulose defects in the Arabidopsis secondary cell wall promote early chloroplast development

拟南芥次生细胞壁中的纤维素缺陷促进叶绿体的早期发育

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14527

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31498930/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: Lincomycin (LIN)-mediated inhibition of protein synthesis in chloroplasts prevents the greening of seedlings, represses the activity of photosynthesis-related genes in the nucleus, including LHCB1.2, and induces the phenylpropanoid pathway, resulting in the production of anthocyanins. In genomes uncoupled (gun) mutants, LHCB1.2 expression is maintained in the presence of LIN or other inhibitors of early chloroplast development. In a screen using concentrations of LIN lower than those employed to isolate gun mutants, we have identified happy on lincomycin (holi) mutants. Several holi mutants show an increased tolerance to LIN, exhibiting de-repressed LHCB1.2 expression and chlorophyll synthesis in seedlings. The mutations responsible were identified by whole-genome single-nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) mapping, and most were found to affect the phenylpropanoid pathway; however, LHCB1.2 expression does not appear to be directly regulated by phenylpropanoids, as indicated by the metabolic profiling of mutants. The most potent holi mutant is defective in a subunit of cellulose synthase encoded by IRREGULAR XYLEM 3, and comparative analysis of this and other cell-wall mutants establishes a link between secondary cell-wall integrity and early chloroplast development, possibly involving altered ABA metabolism or sensing.

摘要: 林可霉素（LIN）介导的叶绿体中蛋白质合成的抑制作用阻止了幼苗的绿色化，抑制了包括LHCB1.2在内的细胞核中与光合作用相关的基因的活性，并诱导了苯丙烷途径，从而产生了花色苷。在未偶联（枪）突变体的基因组中，在LIN或其他早期叶绿体发育抑制剂的存在下，LHCB1.2表达得以维持。在使用低于分离枪支突变体的浓度的LIN筛选中，我们确定了对林可霉素（holi）突变体满意的突变体。几个holi突变体显示出对LIN的耐受性增强，在幼苗中表现出抑制的LHCB1.2表达和叶绿素合成。通过全基因组单核苷酸多态性（SNP）作图鉴定了负责的突变，并且发现大多数突变影响苯丙烷途径。然而，正如突变体的代谢谱所表明的那样，LHCB1.2的表达似乎并不受苯丙烷类的直接调节。最有效的holi突变体在IRREGULARXYLEM3编码的纤维素合酶的亚基中有缺陷，对此和其他细胞壁突变体的比较分析建立了次级细胞壁完整性与早期叶绿体发育之间的联系，可能涉及ABA代谢或感应。

Pubmed_ID: 31494994

Plant Regulomics: a data-driven interface for retrieving upstream regulators from plant multi-omics data

Plant Regulomics：工厂驱动的数据驱动接口，用于从工厂多组学数据中检索上游调节剂

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14526

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31494994/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: High-throughput technology has become a powerful approach for routine plant research. Interpreting the biological significance of high-throughput data has largely focused on the functional characterization of a large gene list or genomic loci that involves the following two aspects: the functions of the genes or loci and how they are regulated as a whole, i.e. searching for the upstream regulators. Traditional platforms for functional annotation largely help resolving the first issue. Addressing the second issue is essential for a global understanding of the regulatory mechanism, but is more challenging, and requires additional high-throughput experimental evidence and a unified statistical framework for data-mining. The rapid accumulation of 'omics data provides a large amount of experimental data. We here present Plant Regulomics, an interface that integrates 19 925 transcriptomic and epigenomic data sets and diverse sources of functional evidence (58 112 terms and 695 414 protein-protein interactions) from six plant species along with the orthologous genes from 56 whole-genome sequenced plant species. All pair-wise transcriptomic comparisons with biological significance within the same study were performed, and all epigenomic data were processed to genomic loci targeted by various factors. These data were well organized to gene modules and loci lists, which were further implemented into the same statistical framework. For any input gene list or genomic loci, Plant Regulomics retrieves the upstream factors, treatments, and experimental/environmental conditions regulating the input from the integrated 'omics data. Additionally, multiple tools and an interactive visualization are available through a user-friendly web interface. Plant Regulomics is available at http://bioinfo.sibs.ac.cn/plant-regulomics.

摘要: 高通量技术已成为常规植物研究的有力方法。解释高通量数据的生物学意义主要集中在涉及以下两个方面的大型基因列表或基因组基因座的功能表征：基因或基因座的功能以及它们如何整体调控，即寻找上游监管机构。传统的功能注释平台在很大程度上有助于解决第一个问题。解决第二个问题对于全球了解监管机制至关重要，但更具挑战性，并且需要其他高通量实验证据和统一的数据挖掘统计框架。组学数据的快速积累提供了大量的实验数据。我们在这里介绍了植物调节学，该界面集成了来自六个植物物种的19925个转录组学和表观基因组数据集以及各种功能证据（58112个术语和695414个蛋白质-蛋白质相互作用）以及来自56个全基因组测序的直系同源基因的各种接口植物品种。在同一研究中进行了具有生物学意义的所有成对转录组比较，并将所有表观基因组数据处理为各种因素靶向的基因组位点。这些数据按基因模块和基因座列表进行了良好的组织，并进一步在相同的统计框架中实施。对于任何输入基因列表或基因组位点，植物基因组学从综合的组学数据中检索调节输入的上游因素，处理方法和实验/环境条件。此外，可通过用户友好的Web界面使用多种工具和交互式可视化工具。植物调节剂可在http://bioinfo.sibs.ac.cn/plant-regulomics上获得。

Pubmed_ID: 31494982

Dual-color oligo-FISH can reveal chromosomal variations and evolution in Oryza species

双色寡核苷酸FISH可以揭示稻属物种的染色体变异和进化

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14522

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31494982/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: Fluorescence in situ hybridization using probes based on oligonucleotides (oligo-FISH) is a useful tool for chromosome identification and karyotype analysis. Here we developed two oligo-FISH probes that allow the identification of each of the 12 pairs of chromosomes in rice (Oryza sativa). These two probes comprised 25 717 (green) and 25 215 (red) oligos (45 nucleotides), respectively, and generated 26 distinct FISH signals that can be used as a barcode to uniquely label each of the 12 pairs of rice chromosomes. Standard karyotypes of rice were established using this system on both mitotic and meiotic chromosomes. Moreover, dual-color oligo-FISH was used to characterize diverse chromosomal abnormalities. Oligo-FISH analyses using these probes in various wild Oryza species revealed that chromosomes from the AA, BB or CC genomes generated specific and intense signals similar to those in rice, while chromosomes with the EE genome generated less specific signals and the FF genome gave no signal. Together, the oligo-FISH probes we established will be a powerful tool for studying chromosome variations and evolution in the genus Oryza.

摘要: 使用基于寡核苷酸的探针（oligo-FISH）进行荧光原位杂交是用于染色体鉴定和核型分析的有用工具。在这里，我们开发了两个寡核苷酸-FISH探针，可以鉴定水稻（稻（Oryzasativa））的12对染色体中的每对。这两个探针分别包含25717个（绿色）和25215个（红色）寡核苷酸（45个核苷酸），并产生26个不同的FISH信号，这些信号可用作条形码以唯一标记12对水稻染色体。使用该系统在有丝分裂和减数分裂染色体上建立了水稻的标准核型。此外，双色寡核苷酸-FISH用于表征各种染色体异常。使用这些探针在各种野生稻种中进行的Oligo-FISH分析表明，来自AA，BB或CC基因组的染色体产生的特异性和强烈信号类似于水稻，而具有EE基因组的染色体产生的特异性信号更低，而FF基因组则没有。信号。我们共同建立的oligo-FISH探针将成为研究Oryza属中染色体变异和进化的强大工具。

Pubmed_ID: 31487093

Genetic variation and temperature affects hybrid barriers during interspecific hybridization

遗传变异和温度影响种间杂交过程中的杂交障碍

DOI: 10.1111/tpj.14523

URL: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31487093/

Journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology ||| Not finding IF

Date: 2020 Jan

Abstract: Genomic imprinting regulates parent-specific transcript dosage during seed development and is mainly confined to the endosperm. Elucidation of the function of many imprinted genes has been hampered by the lack of corresponding mutant phenotypes, and the role of imprinting is mainly associated with genome dosage regulation or allocation of resources. Disruption of imprinted genes has also been suggested to mediate endosperm-based post-zygotic hybrid barriers depending on genetic variation and gene dosage. Here, we have analyzed the conservation of a clade from the MADS-box type I class transcription factors in the closely related species Arabidopsis arenosa, A. lyrata, and A. thaliana, and show that AGL36-like genes are imprinted and maternally expressed in seeds of Arabidopsis species and in hybrid seeds between outbreeding species. In hybridizations between outbreeding and inbreeding species the paternally silenced allele of the AGL36-like gene is reactivated in the hybrid, demonstrating that also maternally expressed imprinted genes are perturbed during hybridization and that such effects on imprinted genes are specific to the species combination. Furthermore, we also demonstrate a quantitative effect of genetic diversity and temperature on the strength of the post-zygotic hybridization barrier. Markedly, a small decrease in temperature during seed development increases the survival of hybrid F1 seeds, suggesting that abiotic and genetic parameters play important roles in post-zygotic species barriers, pointing at evolutionary scenarios favoring such effects. OPEN RESEARCH BADGES: This article has earned an Open Data Badge for making publicly available the digitally-shareable data necessary to reproduce the reported results. The data is available at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/?term=PRJNA562212. All sequences generated in this study have been deposited in the National Center for Biotechnology Information Sequence Read Archive (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/) with project number PRJNA562212.

摘要: 基因组印迹在种子发育过程中调节亲本特异性转录物的剂量，并且主要限于胚乳。缺乏相应的突变表型阻碍了许多印迹基因功能的阐明，而印迹的作用主要与基因组剂量调节或资源分配有关。还建议破坏印记基因以介导基于胚乳的后合子后杂种屏障，这取决于遗传变异和基因剂量。在这里，我们分析了紧密相关的物种拟南芥，拟南芥和拟南芥中MADS-boxI类转录因子进化枝的保守性，并显示AGL36样基因在母体中被印记并母本表达。拟南芥种的种子和近交种之间的杂种种子。在近亲和近亲物种之间的杂交中，AGL36样基因的父本沉默的等位基因在杂种中重新激活，这表明母体表达的印迹基因在杂交过程中也会受到干扰，并且这种对印迹基因的影响是特定于物种组合的。此外，我们还证明了遗传多样性和温度对合子后杂交屏障强度的定量影响。值得注意的是，种子发育过程中温度的小幅下降提高了杂交F1种子的存活率，这表明非生物和遗传参数在合子后物种壁垒中起着重要作用，指出了有利于这种作用的进化场景。公开研究人员：本文已获得公开数据徽章，因为它可以公开提供重现报告结果所必需的数字共享数据。数据可从https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/?term=PRJNA562212获得。本研究中产生的所有序列均已保存在国家生物技术信息序列阅读中心（https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/）中，项目编号为PRJNA562212。
